anya-e0101n:11: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0101n:12: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. ;
anya-e0101n:13: Iti hidaṃ vuttaṃ, kasmā panetaṃ vuttaṃ, bhagavantaṃ kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharantaṃ rattibhāge aññataro devaputto upasaṅkamitvā attano saṃsayasamugghāṭatthaṃ –
anya-e0101n:15: Taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmi, ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0101n:16_0: Imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – jaṭāti taṇhāya jāliniyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:16_1: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanaṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:16_2: veḷugumbādīnaṃ sākhājālasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭā, sā panesā sakaparikkhāraparaparikkhāresu
anya-e0101n:16_4: bahijaṭāti vuccati. Tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā. Yathā nāma veḷugumbajaṭādīhi
anya-e0101n:16_5: veḷuādayo, evaṃ tāya taṇhājaṭāya sabbāpi ayaṃ sattanikāyasaṅkhātā pajā jaṭitā vinaddhā,
anya-e0101n:16_6: saṃsibbitāti attho. Yasmā ca evaṃ jaṭitā. Taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmīti tasmā taṃ pucchāmi.
anya-e0101n:16_7: Gotamāti bhagavantaṃ gottena ālapati. Ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti imaṃ evaṃ tedhātukaṃ
anya-e0101n:16_8: jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭaṃ ko vijaṭeyya, vijaṭetuṃ ko samatthoti pucchati.
anya-e0101n:17_0: Evaṃ puṭṭho panassa sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ
anya-e0101n:17_1: atibrahmā catuvesārajjavisārado dasabaladharo anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhu bhagavā
anya-e0101n:18: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0101n:19: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0101n:30: Visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissaṃ, taṃ me sakkacca bhāsato;
anya-e0101n:32_0: 3. Tattha visuddhīti sabbamalavirahitaṃ accantaparisuddhaṃ nibbānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tassā
anya-e0101n:32_1: visuddhiyā maggoti visuddhimaggo. Maggoti adhigamūpāyo vuccati. Taṃ visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissāmīti attho.
anya-e0101n:33: So panāyaṃ visuddhimaggo katthaci vipassanāmattavaseneva desito. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:35: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:37: “Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:39: “Kammaṃ vijjā ca dhammo ca, sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0101n:40: Etena maccā sujjhanti, na gottena dhanena vā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:45: “Ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya, yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
anya-e0101n:46: Sammappadhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ pana pañhābyākaraṇe sīlādivasena desito.
anya-e0101n:47_0: 4. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā – sīle patiṭṭhāyāti sīle ṭhatvā, sīlaṃ paripūrayamānoyeva
anya-e0101n:47_1: cettha sīle ṭhitoti vuccati. Tasmā sīlaparipūraṇena sīle patiṭṭhahitvāti ayamettha
anya-e0101n:47_2: attho. Naroti satto. Sapaññoti kammajatihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya paññavā. Cittaṃ paññañca
anya-e0101n:47_3: bhāvayanti samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno, cittasīsena hettha samādhi niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0101n:47_4: Paññānāmena ca vipassanāti. Ātāpīti vīriyavā. Vīriyañhi kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:47_5: ātāpoti vuccati. Tadassa atthīti ātāpī. Nipakoti nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā, tāya samannāgatoti
anya-e0101n:47_6: attho. Iminā padena pārihārikapaññaṃ dasseti. Imasmiñhi pañhābyākaraṇe tikkhattuṃ
anya-e0101n:47_7: paññā āgatā. Tattha paṭhamā jātipaññā, dutiyā vipassanāpaññā, tatiyā sabbakiccapariṇāyikā
anya-e0101n:47_8: pārihārikapaññā. Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhu. So imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti so iminā
anya-e0101n:47_9: ca sīlena iminā ca cittasīsena niddiṭṭhasamādhinā imāya ca tividhāya paññāya iminā
anya-e0101n:47_10: ca ātāpenāti chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu. Seyyathāpi nāma puriso pathaviyaṃ
anya-e0101n:47_11: patiṭṭhāya sunisitaṃ satthaṃ ukkhipitvā mahantaṃ veḷugumbaṃ vijaṭeyya, evameva sīlapathaviyaṃ
anya-e0101n:47_12: patiṭṭhāya samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsatthaṃ vīriyabalapaggahitena pārihārikapaññāhatthena
anya-e0101n:47_13: ukkhipitvā sabbampi taṃ attano santāne patitaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭeyya sañchindeyya
anya-e0101n:47_14: sampadāleyya. Maggakkhaṇe panesa taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti nāma. Phalakkhaṇe vijaṭitajaṭo
anya-e0101n:47_15: sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti. Tenāha bhagavā –
anya-e0101n:48: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0101n:49: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti. ;
anya-e0101n:50_0: 5. Tatrāyaṃ yāya paññāya sapaññoti vutto, tatrāssa karaṇīyaṃ natthi. Purimakammānubhāveneva
anya-e0101n:50_1: hissa sā siddhā. Ātāpī nipakoti ettha vuttavīriyavasena pana tena sātaccakārinā paññāvasena
anya-e0101n:50_2: ca sampajānakārinā hutvā sīle patiṭṭhāya cittapaññāvasena vuttā samathavipassanā
anya-e0101n:50_3: bhāvetabbāti imamatra bhagavā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena visuddhimaggaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0101n:51_0: Ettāvatā hi tisso sikkhā, tividhakalyāṇaṃ sāsanaṃ, tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayo, antadvayavajjanamajjhimapaṭipattisevanāni,
anya-e0101n:51_1: apāyādisamatikkamanupāyo, tīhākārehi kilesappahānaṃ, vītikkamādīnaṃ paṭipakkho, saṃkilesattayavisodhanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:52: Kathaṃ? Ettha hi sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā hoti, samādhinā adhicittasikkhā, paññāya adhipaññāsikkhā.
anya-e0101n:53_0: Sīlena ca sāsanassa ādikalyāṇatā pakāsitā hoti. “Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca
anya-e0101n:53_1: suvisuddha”nti hi vacanato, “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”nti ādivacanato ca sīlaṃ sāsanassa
anya-e0101n:53_2: ādi, tañca kalyāṇaṃ, avippaṭisārādiguṇāvahattā. Samādhinā majjhekalyāṇatā pakāsitā
anya-e0101n:53_3: hoti. “Kusalassa upasampadā”ti ādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe, so ca kalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:53_4: iddhividhādiguṇāvahattā. Paññāya sāsanassa pariyosānakalyāṇatā pakāsitā hoti. “Sacittapariyodāpanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:53_5: etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti hi vacanato, paññuttarato ca paññā sāsanassa pariyosānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:57_0: Tathā sīlena tevijjatāya upanissayo pakāsito hoti. Sīlasampattiñhi nissāya tisso
anya-e0101n:57_1: vijjā pāpuṇāti, na tato paraṃ. Samādhinā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo pakāsito hoti.
anya-e0101n:57_2: Samādhisampadañhi nissāya cha abhiññā pāpuṇāti, na tato paraṃ. Paññāya paṭisambhidāpabhedassa
anya-e0101n:57_3: upanissayo pakāsito hoti. Paññāsampattiñhi nissāya catasso paṭisambhidā pāpuṇāti, na aññena kāraṇena.
anya-e0101n:58: Sīlena ca kāmasukhallikānuyogasaṅkhātassa antassa vajjanaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, samādhinā attakilamathānuyogasaṅkhātassa. Paññāya majjhimāya paṭipattiyā sevanaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:59: Tathā sīlena apāyasamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hoti, samādhinā kāmadhātusamatikkamanupāyo, paññāya sabbabhavasamatikkamanupāyo.
anya-e0101n:60: Sīlena ca tadaṅgappahānavasena kilesappahānaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, samādhinā vikkhambhanappahānavasena, paññāya samucchedappahānavasena.
anya-e0101n:61: Tathā sīlena kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkho pakāsito hoti, samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkho, paññāya anusayapaṭipakkho.
anya-e0101n:62: Sīlena ca duccaritasaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, samādhinā taṇhāsaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ, paññāya diṭṭhisaṃkilesavisodhanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:63_0: Tathā sīlena sotāpannasakadāgāmibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, samādhinā anāgāmibhāvassa,
anya-e0101n:63_1: paññāya arahattassa. Sotāpanno hi “sīlesu paripūrakārī”ti vutto, tathā sakadāgāmī.
anya-e0101n:63_2: Anāgāmī pana “samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī”ti. Arahā pana “paññāya paripūrakārī”ti.
anya-e0101n:64_0: Evaṃ ettāvatā tisso sikkhā, tividhakalyāṇaṃ sāsanaṃ, tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayo, antadvayavajjanamajjhimapaṭipattisevanāni,
anya-e0101n:64_1: apāyādisamatikkamanupāyo, tīhākārehi kilesappahānaṃ, vītikkamādīnaṃ paṭipakkho, saṃkilesattayavisodhanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:64_2: sotāpannādibhāvassa ca kāraṇanti ime nava, aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā pakāsitā hontīti.
anya-e0101n:67_0: 6. Evaṃ anekaguṇasaṅgāhakena sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desitopi panesa visuddhimaggo
anya-e0101n:67_1: atisaṅkhepadesitoyeva hoti. Tasmā nālaṃ sabbesaṃ upakārāyāti vitthāramassa dassetuṃ
anya-e0101n:67_2: sīlaṃ tāva ārabbha idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:68: Kiṃ sīlaṃ, kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ, kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni, kimānisaṃsaṃ sīlaṃ, katividhaṃ cetaṃ sīlaṃ, ko cassa saṃkileso, kiṃ vodānanti.
anya-e0101n:69_0: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Kiṃ sīlanti pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ
anya-e0101n:69_1: vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “kiṃ sīlanti cetanā
anya-e0101n:69_2: sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīla”nti. Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma
anya-e0101n:69_3: pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanā. Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ
anya-e0101n:69_4: nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati. Apica cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa
anya-e0101n:69_5: satta kammapathacetanā. Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma “abhijjhaṃ pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā
anya-e0101n:69_6: viharatī”ti ādinā nayena vuttā anabhijjhābyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā. Saṃvaro sīlanti
anya-e0101n:69_7: ettha pañcavidhena saṃvaro veditabbo pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro,
anya-e0101n:69_8: khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti. Tattha iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupetoti
anya-e0101n:69_9: ayaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatīti ayaṃ satisaṃvaro.
anya-e0101n:73_0: Ayaṃ ñāṇasaṃvaro. Paccayapaṭisevanampi ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchati. Yo panāyaṃ khamo
anya-e0101n:73_1: hoti sītassa uṇhassātiādinā nayena āgato, ayaṃ khantisaṃvaro nāma. Yo cāyaṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0101n:73_2: kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetītiādinā nayena āgato, ayaṃ vīriyasaṃvaro nāma. Ājīvapārisuddhipi
anya-e0101n:73_3: ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchati. Iti ayaṃ pañcavidhopi saṃvaro, yā ca pāpabhīrukānaṃ
anya-e0101n:73_4: kulaputtānaṃ sampattavatthuto virati, sabbampetaṃ saṃvarasīlanti veditabbaṃ. Avītikkamo
anya-e0101n:73_5: sīlanti samādinnasīlassa kāyikavācasiko anatikkamo. Idaṃ tāva kiṃ sīlanti pañhassa vissajjanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:74_0: 7. Avasesesu kenaṭṭhena sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma. Samādhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:74_1: vā, kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Upadhāraṇaṃ vā, kusalānaṃ
anya-e0101n:74_2: dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti attho. Etadeva hettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū
anya-e0101n:74_3: anujānanti. Aññe pana siraṭṭho sīlattho, sītalaṭṭho sīlatthoti evamādināpi nayenettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
anya-e0101n:78_0: Yathā hi nīlapītādibhedena anekadhā bhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:78_1: nīlādibhedena bhinnassāpi sanidassana bhāvānatikkamanato. Tathā sīlassa cetanādibhedena
anya-e0101n:78_2: anekadhā bhinnassāpi yadetaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ samādhānavasena kusalānañca dhammānaṃ
anya-e0101n:78_3: patiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ sīlanaṃ, tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ, cetanādibhedena bhinnassāpi samādhānapatiṭṭhānabhāvānatikkamanato.
anya-e0101n:81: Tasmā idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma kiccaṭṭhena rasena dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, sampattiatthena rasena anavajjarasanti veditabbaṃ. Lakkhaṇādīsu hi kiccameva sampatti vā rasoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:84_0: Tayidaṃ sīlaṃ kāyasoceyyaṃ vacīsoceyyaṃ manosoceyyanti evaṃ vuttasoceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:84_1: soceyyabhāvena paccupaṭṭhāti gahaṇabhāvaṃ gacchati. Hirottappañca panassa viññūhi
anya-e0101n:84_2: padaṭṭhānanti vaṇṇitaṃ, āsannakāraṇanti attho. Hirottappe hi sati sīlaṃ uppajjati
anya-e0101n:84_3: ceva tiṭṭhati ca. Asati neva uppajjati, na tiṭṭhatīti. Evaṃ sīlassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n:86: 9. Kimānisaṃsaṃ sīlanti avippaṭisārādianekaguṇapaṭilābhānisaṃsaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “avippaṭisāratthāni kho, ānanda, kusalāni sīlāni avippaṭisārānisaṃsānī”ti.
anya-e0101n:87_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ “pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā sīlavato sīlasampadāya. Katame pañca?
anya-e0101n:87_1: Idha gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati,
anya-e0101n:87_2: ayaṃ paṭhamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya. Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavato sīlasampannassa
anya-e0101n:87_3: kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, ayaṃ dutiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya. Puna
anya-e0101n:87_4: caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati yadi khattiyaparisaṃ
anya-e0101n:87_5: yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṃ yadi gahapatiparisaṃ yadi samaṇaparisaṃ, visārado upasaṅkamati
anya-e0101n:87_6: amaṅkubhūto, ayaṃ tatiyo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya. Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo
anya-e0101n:87_7: sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, ayaṃ catuttho ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
anya-e0101n:87_8: Puna caparaṃ gahapatayo sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ
anya-e0101n:87_9: lokaṃ upapajjati, ayaṃ pañcamo ānisaṃso sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:88_0: Aparepi “ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca assaṃ manāpo ca
anya-e0101n:88_1: garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”tiādinā nayena piyamanāpatādayo
anya-e0101n:88_2: āsavakkhayapariyosānā anekā sīlānisaṃsā vuttā. Evaṃ avippaṭisārādianekaguṇānisaṃsaṃ sīlaṃ. Apica –
anya-e0101n:89: Sāsane kulaputtānaṃ, patiṭṭhā natthi yaṃ vinā;
anya-e0101n:91: Na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī;
anya-e0101n:93: Sakkuṇanti visodhetuṃ, taṃ malaṃ idha pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0101n:94: Visodhayati sattānaṃ, yaṃ ve sīlajalaṃ malaṃ.
anya-e0101n:95: Na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ;
anya-e0101n:96: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā.
anya-e0101n:98: Yaṃ sameti idaṃ ariyaṃ, sīlaṃ accantasītalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:100: Yo samaṃ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati.
anya-e0101n:102: Dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
anya-e0101n:110: 10. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ katividhaṃ cetaṃ sīlanti, tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Sabbameva tāva idaṃ sīlaṃ attano sīlanalakkhaṇena ekavidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:115_0: 11. Tattha ekavidhakoṭṭhāse attho vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Duvidhakoṭṭhāse yaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0101n:115_1: “idaṃ kattabba”nti paññattasikkhāpadapūraṇaṃ, taṃ cārittaṃ. Yaṃ “idaṃ na kattabba”nti
anya-e0101n:115_2: paṭikkhittassa akaraṇaṃ, taṃ vārittaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho. Caranti tasmiṃ sīlesu
anya-e0101n:115_3: paripūrakāritāya pavattantīti cārittaṃ. Vāritaṃ tāyanti rakkhanti tenāti vārittaṃ.
anya-e0101n:115_4: Tattha saddhāvīriyasādhanaṃ cārittaṃ, saddhāsādhanaṃ vārittaṃ. Evaṃ cārittavārittavasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:116_0: Dutiyaduke abhisamācāroti uttamasamācāro. Abhisamācāro eva ābhisamācārikaṃ. Abhisamācāraṃ
anya-e0101n:116_1: vā ārabbha paññattaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ, ājīvaṭṭhamakato avasesasīlassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:116_3: adhivacanaṃ. Tañhi maggassa ādibhāvabhūtaṃ, pubbabhāgeyeva parisodhetabbato. Tenāha
anya-e0101n:116_4: – “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti. Yāni vā
anya-e0101n:116_5: sikkhāpadāni khuddānukhuddakānīti vuttāni, idaṃ ābhisamācārikasīlaṃ. Sesaṃ ādibrahmacariyakaṃ.
anya-e0101n:116_7: Tassa sampattiyā ādibrahmacariyakaṃ sampajjati. Tenevāha – “so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu
anya-e0101n:116_8: ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ aparipūretvā ādibrahmacariyakaṃ dhammaṃ paripūressatīti netaṃ
anya-e0101n:117: Tatiyaduke pāṇātipātādīhi veramaṇimattaṃ viratisīlaṃ. Sesaṃ cetanādi aviratisīlanti evaṃ viratiavirativasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:118_0: Catutthaduke nissayoti dve nissayā taṇhānissayo ca diṭṭhinissayo ca. Tattha yaṃ “imināhaṃ
anya-e0101n:118_1: sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti evaṃ bhavasampattiṃ ākaṅkhamānena pavattitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:118_2: idaṃ taṇhānissitaṃ. Yaṃ “sīlena suddhī”ti evaṃ suddhidiṭṭhiyā pavattitaṃ, idaṃ diṭṭhinissitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:118_3: Yaṃ pana lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca tasseva sambhārabhūtaṃ, idaṃ anissitanti evaṃ nissitānissitavasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:119: Pañcamaduke kālaparicchedaṃ katvā samādinnaṃ sīlaṃ kālapariyantaṃ. Yāvajīvaṃ samādiyitvā tatheva pavattitaṃ āpāṇakoṭikanti evaṃ kālapariyantaāpāṇakoṭikavasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:120_0: Chaṭṭhaduke lābhayasañātiaṅgajīvitavasena diṭṭhapariyantaṃ sapariyantaṃ nāma. Viparītaṃ
anya-e0101n:120_1: apariyantaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “katamaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ sapariyantaṃ? Atthi
anya-e0101n:120_2: sīlaṃ lābhapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ yasapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ ñātipariyantaṃ, atthi
anya-e0101n:120_3: sīlaṃ aṅgapariyantaṃ, atthi sīlaṃ jīvitapariyantaṃ. Katamaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ lābhapariyantaṃ?
anya-e0101n:120_4: Idhekacco lābhahetu lābhapaccayā lābhakāraṇā yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamati,
anya-e0101n:120_5: idaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ lābhapariyanta”nti. Eteneva upāyena itarānipi vitthāretabbāni. Apariyantavissajjanepi
anya-e0101n:120_6: vuttaṃ “katamaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ na lābhapariyantaṃ? Idhekacco lābhahetu lābhapaccayā lābhakāraṇā
anya-e0101n:120_7: yathāsamādinnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, kiṃ so vītikkamissati,
anya-e0101n:120_8: idaṃ taṃ sīlaṃ na lābhapariyanta”nti. Etenevupāyena itarānipi vitthāretabbāni. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:121_0: Sattamaduke sabbampi sāsavaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ. Anāsavaṃ lokuttaraṃ. Tattha lokiyaṃ bhavavisesāvahaṃ
anya-e0101n:121_1: hoti bhavanissaraṇassa ca sambhāro. Yathāha – “vinayo saṃvaratthāya, saṃvaro avippaṭisāratthāya,
anya-e0101n:121_2: avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya, pāmojjaṃ pītatthāya, pīti passaddhatthāya, passaddhi
anya-e0101n:121_3: sukhatthāya, sukhaṃ samādhatthāya, samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanatthāya, yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ
anya-e0101n:121_4: nibbidatthāya, nibbidā virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya, vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanatthāya,
anya-e0101n:121_5: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ anupādāparinibbānatthāya, etadatthā kathā, etadatthā mantanā,
anya-e0101n:121_6: etadatthā upanisā, etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ, yadidaṃ anupādācittassa vimokkho”ti.
anya-e0101n:121_7: Lokuttaraṃ bhavanissaraṇāvahaṃ hoti paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa ca bhūmīti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:122_0: 12. Tikesu paṭhamattike hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena vīmaṃsāya vā pavattitaṃ
anya-e0101n:122_1: hīnaṃ. Majjhimehi chandādīhi pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ. Paṇītehi paṇītaṃ. Yasakāmatāya
anya-e0101n:122_2: vā samādinnaṃ hīnaṃ. Puññaphalakāmatāya majjhimaṃ. Kattabbamevidanti ariyabhāvaṃ
anya-e0101n:122_3: nissāya samādinnaṃ paṇītaṃ. “Ahamasmi sīlasampanno, ime panaññe bhikkhū dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti
anya-e0101n:122_4: evaṃ attukkaṃsanaparavambhanādīhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā hīnaṃ. Anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ lokiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:122_5: sīlaṃ majjhimaṃ. Lokuttaraṃ paṇītaṃ. Taṇhāvasena vā bhavabhogatthāya pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ.
anya-e0101n:122_6: Attano vimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ. Sabbasattānaṃ vimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ
anya-e0101n:123_0: Dutiyattike attano ananurūpaṃ pajahitukāmena attagarunā attanigāravena pavattitaṃ
anya-e0101n:123_1: attādhipateyyaṃ. Lokāpavādaṃ pariharitukāmena lokagarunā loke gāravena pavattitaṃ
anya-e0101n:123_2: lokādhipateyyaṃ. Dhammamahattaṃ pūjetukāmena dhammagarunā dhammagāravena pavattitaṃ
anya-e0101n:124_0: Tatiyattike yaṃ dukesu nissitanti vuttaṃ, taṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi parāmaṭṭhattā parāmaṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:124_2: Sekkhāsekkhānaṃ phalasampayuttaṃ paṭippassaddhanti evaṃ parāmaṭṭhādivasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:125_0: Catutthattike yaṃ āpattiṃ anāpajjantena pūritaṃ, āpajjitvā vā puna katapaṭikammaṃ,
anya-e0101n:125_1: taṃ visuddhaṃ. Āpattiṃ āpannassa akatapaṭikammaṃ avisuddhaṃ. Vatthumhi vā āpattiyā
anya-e0101n:125_2: vā ajjhācāre vā vematikassa sīlaṃ vematikasīlaṃ nāma. Tattha yoginā avisuddhasīlaṃ
anya-e0101n:125_3: visodhetabbaṃ, vematike vatthujjhācāraṃ akatvā vimati paṭivinetabbā “iccassa phāsu
anya-e0101n:126: Pañcamattike catūhi ariyamaggehi tīhi ca sāmaññaphalehi sampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ sekkhaṃ. Arahattaphalasampayuttaṃ asekkhaṃ. Sesaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhanti evaṃ sekkhādivasena tividhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:127_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ pana yasmā loke tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ pakatipi sīlanti vuccati, yaṃ
anya-e0101n:127_1: sandhāya “ayaṃ sukhasīlo, ayaṃ dukkhasīlo, ayaṃ kalahasīlo, ayaṃ maṇḍanasīlo”ti bhaṇanti,
anya-e0101n:127_2: tasmā tena pariyāyena “tīṇi sīlāni, kusalasīlaṃ akusalasīlaṃ abyākatasīlanti. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:127_3: kusalādivasenapi tividhanti vuttaṃ. Tattha akusalaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetassa sīlassa
anya-e0101n:127_4: lakkhaṇādīsu ekenapi na sametīti idha na upanītaṃ, tasmā vuttanayenevassa tividhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:129: Yodha sevati dussīle, sīlavante na sevati;
anya-e0101n:136: Tassa taṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ, sīlaṃ bhavati bhikkhuno.
anya-e0101n:142_0: Dutiyacatukke bhikkhū ārabbha paññattasikkhāpadāni, yāni ca nesaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ paññattito
anya-e0101n:142_1: rakkhitabbāni, idaṃ bhikkhusīlaṃ. Bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattasikkhāpadāni, yāni
anya-e0101n:142_2: ca tāsaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paññattito rakkhitabbāni, idaṃ bhikkhunisīlaṃ. Sāmaṇerasāmaṇerīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:142_4: sati vā ussāhe dasa, uposathaṅgavasena aṭṭhāti idaṃ gahaṭṭhasīlanti evaṃ bhikkhusīlādivasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:143_0: Tatiyacatukke uttarakurukānaṃ manussānaṃ avītikkamo pakatisīlaṃ. Kuladesapāsaṇḍānaṃ
anya-e0101n:143_1: attano attano mariyādācārittaṃ ācārasīlaṃ. “Dhammatā esā, ānanda, yadā bodhisatto
anya-e0101n:143_2: mātukucchiṃ okkanto hoti na bodhisattamātu purisesu mānasaṃ uppajji kāmaguṇūpasaṃhita”nti
anya-e0101n:143_3: evaṃ vuttaṃ bodhisattamātusīlaṃ dhammatāsīlaṃ. Mahākassapādīnaṃ pana suddhasattānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:143_4: bodhisattassa ca tāsu tāsu jātīsu sīlaṃ pubbahetukasīlanti evaṃ pakatisīlādivasena catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:144_0: Catutthacatukke yaṃ bhagavatā “idha bhikkhu pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno
anya-e0101n:144_1: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti vaṃ vuttaṃ sīlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:144_2: idaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana “so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī
anya-e0101n:144_3: hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā
anya-e0101n:144_4: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:144_5: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjati. Sotena saddaṃ sutvā…pe… ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā…pe…
anya-e0101n:144_6: jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā…pe… kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā…pe… manasā dhammaṃ viññāya
anya-e0101n:144_7: na nimittaggāhī…pe… manindriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ, idaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ.
anya-e0101n:144_8: Yā pana ājīvahetupaññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamassa, “kuhanā lapanā nemittikatā
anya-e0101n:144_9: nippesikatā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā”ti evamādīnañca pāpadhammānaṃ vasena pavattā
anya-e0101n:144_10: micchājīvā virati, idaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ. “Paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e0101n:144_11: yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti ādinā nayena vutto paṭisaṅkhānaparisuddho catupaccayaparibhogo
anya-e0101n:146_0: 14. Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya anupubbapadavaṇṇanāya saddhiṃ vinicchayakathā. Idhāti
anya-e0101n:146_1: imasmiṃ sāsane. Bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhaṇatāya vā bhinnapaṭadharāditāya vā
anya-e0101n:146_2: evaṃ laddhavohāro saddhāpabbajito kulaputto. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti ettha pātimokkhanti
anya-e0101n:146_3: sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti mocayati āpāyikādīhi dukkhehi,
anya-e0101n:146_4: tasmā pātimokkhanti vuccati. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyikavācasikassa avītikkamassetaṃ
anya-e0101n:146_5: nāmaṃ. Pātimokkhameva saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto
anya-e0101n:146_6: pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto, upagato samannāgatoti attho. Viharatīti iriyati. Ācāragocarasampannotiādīnamattho
anya-e0101n:148_0: Tattha katamo anācāro? Kāyiko vītikkamo vācasiko vītikkamo kāyikavācasiko vītikkamo,
anya-e0101n:148_1: ayaṃ vuccati anācāro. Sabbampi dussīlyaṃ anācāro. Idhekacco veḷudānena vā pattadānena
anya-e0101n:148_2: vā pupphaphalasinānadantakaṭṭhadānena vā cāṭukamyatāya vā muggasūpyatāya vā pāribhaṭyatāya
anya-e0101n:148_3: vā jaṅghapesanikena vā aññataraññatarena vā buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ
anya-e0101n:149_0: Tattha katamo ācāro? Kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo,
anya-e0101n:149_1: ayaṃ vuccati ācāro. Sabbopi sīlasaṃvaro ācāro. Idhekacco na veḷudānena vā na pattana
anya-e0101n:149_2: pupphana phalana sinānana dantakaṭṭhadānena vā na cāṭukamyatāya vā na muggasūpyatāya
anya-e0101n:149_3: vā na pāribhaṭyatāya vā na jaṅghapesanikena vā na aññataraññatarena vā buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:149_4: micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ vuccati ācāro.
anya-e0101n:151_0: Tattha katamo agocaro? Idhekacco vesiyāgocaro vā hoti vidhavā, thullakumārikā, paṇḍaka,
anya-e0101n:151_1: bhikkhunī, pānāgāragocaro vā hoti, saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi
anya-e0101n:151_2: titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena, yāni vā pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni
anya-e0101n:151_3: anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni anatthakāmāni ahitakāmāni aphāsukakāmāni ayogakkhemakāmāni
anya-e0101n:151_4: bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, tathārūpāni kulāni sevati bhajati
anya-e0101n:152_0: Tattha katamo gocaro? Idhekacco na vesiyāgocaro vā hoti…pe… na pānāgāragocaro vā
anya-e0101n:152_1: hoti, asaṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhi…pe… titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena, yāni
anya-e0101n:152_2: vā pana tāni kulāni saddhāni pasannāni opānabhūtāni kāsāvapajjotāni isivātapaṭivātāni
anya-e0101n:152_3: atthakāmāni…pe… yogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ…pe… upāsikānaṃ, tathārūpāni kulāni sevati
anya-e0101n:152_4: bhajati payirupāsati, ayaṃ vuccati gocaro. Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena
anya-e0101n:152_5: upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno sampanno samannāgato, tena vuccati
anya-e0101n:153_0: Api cettha imināpi nayena ācāragocarā veditabbā. Duvidho hi anācāro kāyiko vācasiko
anya-e0101n:153_1: ca. Tattha katamo kāyiko anācāro? Idhekacco saṅghagatopi acittīkārakato there bhikkhū
anya-e0101n:153_2: ghaṭṭayantopi tiṭṭhati, ghaṭṭayantopi nisīdati, puratopi tiṭṭhati, puratopi nisīdati,
anya-e0101n:153_3: uccepi āsane nisīdati, sasīsampi pārupitvā nisīdati, ṭhitakopi bhaṇati, bāhāvikkhepakopi
anya-e0101n:153_4: bhaṇati, therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupāhanānaṃ caṅkamantānaṃ saupāhano caṅkamati, nīce
anya-e0101n:153_5: caṅkame caṅkamantānaṃ ucce caṅkame caṅkamati, chamāya caṅkamantānaṃ caṅkame caṅkamati,
anya-e0101n:153_6: there bhikkhū anupakhajjāpi tiṭṭhati, anupakhajjāpi nisīdati, navepi bhikkhū āsanena
anya-e0101n:153_7: paṭibāhati, jantāgharepi there bhikkhū anāpucchā kaṭṭhaṃ pakkhipati, dvāraṃ pidahati,
anya-e0101n:153_8: udakatitthepi there bhikkhū ghaṭṭayantopi otarati, puratopi otarati, ghaṭṭayantopi
anya-e0101n:153_9: nhāyati, puratopi nhāyati, ghaṭṭayantopi uttarati, puratopi uttarati, antaragharaṃ
anya-e0101n:153_10: pavisantopi there bhikkhū ghaṭṭayantopi gacchati, puratopi gacchati, vokkamma ca
anya-e0101n:153_11: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ purato purato gacchati, yānipi tāni honti kulānaṃ ovarakāni gūḷhāni
anya-e0101n:153_12: ca paṭicchannāni ca yattha kulitthiyo kulakumāriyo nisīdanti, tatthapi sahasā pavisati,
anya-e0101n:153_13: kumārakassapi sīsaṃ parāmasati, ayaṃ vuccati kāyiko anācāro.
anya-e0101n:154_0: Tattha katamo vācasiko anācāro? Idhekacco saṅghagatopi acittīkārakato there bhikkhū
anya-e0101n:154_1: anāpucchā dhammaṃ bhaṇati. Pañhaṃ vissajjeti, pātimokkhaṃ uddisati, ṭhitakopi bhaṇati,
anya-e0101n:154_2: bāhāvikkhepakopi bhaṇati, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhopi itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā evamāha –
anya-e0101n:154_3: “itthannāme itthaṃgotte kiṃ atthi, yāgu atthi, bhattaṃ atthi, khādanīyaṃ atthi, kiṃ
anya-e0101n:154_4: pivissāma, kiṃ khādissāma, kiṃ bhuñjissāma. Kiṃ vā me dassathā”ti vippalapati, ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:154_5: vuccati vācasiko anācāro. Paṭipakkhavasena panassa ācāro veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:155_0: Apica bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena
anya-e0101n:155_1: abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu
anya-e0101n:155_2: iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena
anya-e0101n:155_3: samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo
anya-e0101n:155_4: viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācāro. Evaṃ tāva ācāro veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:156_0: Gocaro pana tividho upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti. Tattha katamo
anya-e0101n:156_1: upanissayagocaro? Dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya assutaṃ
anya-e0101n:156_2: suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodapeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti.
anya-e0101n:156_3: Yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n:157_0: Katamo ārakkhagocaro? Idha bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu
anya-e0101n:157_1: yugamattadassāvī susaṃvuto gacchati, na hatthiṃ olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na
anya-e0101n:157_2: pattiṃ, na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ olokento, na uddhaṃ ullokento, na adho olokento, na
anya-e0101n:157_3: disāvidisaṃ pekkhamāno gacchati, ayaṃ vuccati ārakkhagocaro.
anya-e0101n:158_0: Katamo upanibandhagocaro? Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā yattha cittaṃ upanibandhati. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0101n:158_1: bhagavatā – “ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo? Yadidaṃ cattāro
anya-e0101n:158_2: satipaṭṭhānā”ti, ayaṃ vuccati upanibandhagocaro. Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena
anya-e0101n:159_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu
anya-e0101n:159_1: vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu
anya-e0101n:159_2: sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sammā ādāya sikkhati. Ettha ca “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti
anya-e0101n:159_3: ettāvatā ca puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ dassitaṃ. “Ācāragocarasampanno”tiādi
anya-e0101n:159_4: pana sabbaṃ yathāpaṭipannassa taṃ sīlaṃ sampajjati, taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:161_0: 15. Yaṃ panetaṃ tadanantaraṃ “so cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādinā nayena dassitaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:161_1: tattha soti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhito bhikkhu. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:161_2: cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Porāṇā
anya-e0101n:161_3: panāhu “cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati, acittakattā, cittaṃ na passati, acakkhukattā, dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭe
anya-e0101n:161_4: pana cakkhupasādavatthukena cittena passati. Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjhatī’tiādīsu
anya-e0101n:161_5: viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti, tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha attho”ti.
anya-e0101n:161_6: Na nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:161_7: nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti, diṭṭhamatteyeva saṇṭhāti. Nānubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anuanubyañjanato
anya-e0101n:161_9: ākāraṃ na gaṇhāti, yaṃ tattha bhūtaṃ, tadeva gaṇhāti, cetiyapabbatavāsī mahātissatthero viya.
anya-e0101n:162_0: Theraṃ kira cetiyapabbatā anurādhapuraṃ piṇḍacāratthāya āgacchantaṃ aññatarā kulasuṇhā
anya-e0101n:162_1: sāmikena saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā sumaṇḍitapasādhitā devakaññā viya kālasseva anurādhapurato
anya-e0101n:162_2: nikkhamitvā ñātigharaṃ gacchantī antarāmagge disvā vipallatthacittā mahāhasitaṃ hasi.
anya-e0101n:162_3: Thero kimetanti olokento tassā dantaṭṭhike asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ –
anya-e0101n:164: Tattheva so ṭhito thero, arahattaṃ apāpuṇī”ti.
anya-e0101n:165: Sāmikopi kho panassā anumaggaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā “kiñci, bhante, itthiṃ passathā”ti pucchi. Taṃ thero āha –
anya-e0101n:166: “Nābhijānāmi itthī vā, puriso vā ito gato;
anya-e0101n:168_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu etaṃ puggalaṃ
anya-e0101n:168_1: satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo
anya-e0101n:168_2: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ anubandheyyuṃ. Tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa
anya-e0101n:168_3: satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya paṭipajjati. Evaṃ paṭipajjantoyeva ca rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:168_4: cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatītipi vuccati. Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā
anya-e0101n:168_5: asaṃvaro vā natthi. Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:168_6: Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0101n:168_7: niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati. Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:168_8: dassanakiccaṃ. Tato vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ. Tato vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
anya-e0101n:169_0: Tatrāpi neva bhavaṅgasamaye, na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro
anya-e0101n:169_1: vā atthi. Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti
anya-e0101n:169_2: vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati, asaṃvaro hoti. Evaṃ honto pana so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti
anya-e0101n:169_3: vuccati. Kasmā? Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi
anya-e0101n:169_4: vīthicittāni. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo
anya-e0101n:169_5: susaṃvutā honti, tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti. Nagaradvārena
anya-e0101n:169_6: hi pavisitvā corā yadicchanti, taṃ kareyyuṃ, evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu
anya-e0101n:169_7: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni.
anya-e0101n:170_0: Tasmiṃ pana sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni.
anya-e0101n:170_1: Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā honti, tathāpi
anya-e0101n:170_2: antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti. Nagaradvāresu hi pihitesu
anya-e0101n:170_3: corānaṃ paveso natthi, evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi
anya-e0101n:170_4: āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni. Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
anya-e0101n:171: Sotena saddaṃ sutvātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Evamidaṃ saṅkhepato rūpādīsu kilesānubandhanimittādiggāhaparivajjanalakkhaṇaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:173_0: 16. Idāni indriyasaṃvarasīlānantaraṃ vutte ājīvapārisuddhisīle ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ
anya-e0101n:173_1: channaṃ sikkhāpadānanti yāni tāni “ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ
anya-e0101n:173_2: abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā
anya-e0101n:173_3: sañcarittaṃ samāpajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā ‘yo te vihāre
anya-e0101n:173_4: vasati so bhikkhu arahā’ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa. Ājīvahetu
anya-e0101n:173_5: ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti
anya-e0101n:173_6: pācittiyassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni agilānā attano atthāya
anya-e0101n:173_7: viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa. Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ
anya-e0101n:173_8: vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ paññattāni
anya-e0101n:174_0: Kuhanātiādīsu ayaṃ pāḷi, “tattha katamā kuhanā? Lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassa pāpicchassa
anya-e0101n:174_1: icchāpakatassa yā paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena vā sāmantajappitena vā iriyāpathassa
anya-e0101n:174_2: vā aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:175_1: yā paresaṃ ālapanā lapanā sallapanā ullapanā samullapanā unnahanā samunnahanā ukkācanā
anya-e0101n:175_2: samukkācanā anuppiyabhāṇitā cāṭukamyatā muggasūpyatā pāribhaṭyatā, ayaṃ vuccati lapanā.
anya-e0101n:176_1: yaṃ paresaṃ nimittaṃ nimittakammaṃ obhāso obhāsakammaṃ sāmantajappā parikathā, ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:177_1: yā paresaṃ akkosanā vambhanā garahanā ukkhepanā samukkhepanā khipanā saṃkhipanā pāpanā
anya-e0101n:177_2: sampāpanā avaṇṇahārikā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā, ayaṃ vuccati nippesikatā.
anya-e0101n:178_0: “Tattha katamā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā? Lābhasakkārasilokasannissito pāpiccho
anya-e0101n:178_1: icchāpakato ito laddhaṃ āmisaṃ amutra harati, amutra vā laddhaṃ āmisaṃ idha āharati.
anya-e0101n:178_2: Yā evarūpā āmisena āmisassa eṭṭhi gaveṭṭhi pariyeṭṭhi esanā gavesanā pariyesanā,
anya-e0101n:179_0: 17. Imissā pana pāḷiyā evamattho veditabbo. Kuhananiddese tāva lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassāti
anya-e0101n:179_1: lābhañca sakkārañca kittisaddañca sannissitassa, patthayantassāti attho. Pāpicchassāti
anya-e0101n:179_2: asantaguṇadīpanakāmassa. Icchāpakatassāti icchāya apakatassa, upaddutassāti attho.
anya-e0101n:180_1: tividhaṃ kuhanavatthu āgataṃ. Tasmā tividhampetaṃ dassetuṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena
anya-e0101n:180_2: vāti evamādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha cīvarādīhi nimantitassa tadatthikasseva sato pāpicchataṃ
anya-e0101n:180_3: nissāya paṭikkhipanena, te ca gahapatike attani suppatiṭṭhitasaddhe ñatvā puna tesaṃ
anya-e0101n:180_4: “aho ayyo appiccho na kiñci paṭiggaṇhituṃ icchati, suladdhaṃ vata no assa sace appamattakampi
anya-e0101n:180_5: kiñci paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni cīvarādīni upanentānaṃ tadanuggahakāmataṃyeva
anya-e0101n:180_6: āvikatvā paṭiggahaṇena ca tato pabhuti api sakaṭabhārehi upanāmanahetubhūtaṃ vimhāpanaṃ
anya-e0101n:181_0: “Katamaṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu? Idha gahapatikā bhikkhuṃ nimantenti
anya-e0101n:181_2: atthiko cīvara…pe… parikkhārānaṃ bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya cīvaraṃ paccakkhāti. Piṇḍapātaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n:181_3: senāsanaṃ. Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paccakkhāti. So evamāha – ‘kiṃ samaṇassa
anya-e0101n:181_4: mahagghena cīvarena, etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo susānā vā saṅkārakūṭā vā pāpaṇikā vā
anya-e0101n:181_5: nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāreyya. Kiṃ samaṇassa mahagghena piṇḍapātena
anya-e0101n:181_6: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo uñchācariyāya piṇḍiyālopena jīvikaṃ kappeyya. Kiṃ samaṇassa
anya-e0101n:181_7: mahagghena senāsanena, etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo rukkhamūliko vā assa abbhokāsiko
anya-e0101n:181_8: vā. Kiṃ samaṇassa mahagghena gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0101n:181_9: samaṇo pūtimuttena vā hariṭakīkhaṇḍena vā osadhaṃ kareyyā’ti. Tadupādāya lūkhaṃ cīvaraṃ
anya-e0101n:181_10: dhāreti, lūkhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati, lūkhaṃ senāsanaṃ paṭisevati, lūkhaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ
anya-e0101n:181_11: paṭisevati, tamenaṃ gahapatikā evaṃ jānanti ‘ayaṃ samaṇo appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto
anya-e0101n:181_12: asaṃsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo dhutavādo’ti. Bhiyyo bhiyyo nimantenti cīvara…pe… parikkhārehi.
anya-e0101n:181_13: So evamāha – ‘tiṇṇaṃ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati. Saddhāya
anya-e0101n:181_14: sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati. Deyyadhammassa…pe… dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ
anya-e0101n:181_15: sammukhībhāvāsaddhokulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati. Tumhākañcevāyaṃ saddhā atthi,
anya-e0101n:181_16: deyyadhammo ca saṃvijjati, ahañca paṭiggāhako, sacehaṃ na paṭiggahessāmi, evaṃ tumhe
anya-e0101n:181_17: puññena paribāhirā bhavissanti, na mayhaṃ iminā attho. Apica tumhākaṃyeva anukampāya
anya-e0101n:181_18: paṭiggaṇhāmī’ti. Tadupādāya bahumpi cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Bahumpi piṇḍapātaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n:181_19: bhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā
anya-e0101n:182: Pāpicchasseva pana sato uttarimanussadhammādhigamaparidīpanavācāya tathā tathā vimhāpanaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:183_0: “Katamaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu? Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo
anya-e0101n:183_1: ‘evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī’ti ariyadhammasannissitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati ‘yo evarūpaṃ
anya-e0101n:183_2: cīvaraṃ dhāreti, so samaṇo mahesakkho’ti bhaṇati. ‘Yo evarūpaṃ pattaṃ lohathālakaṃ.
anya-e0101n:183_3: Dhammakaraṇaṃ parissāvanaṃ kuñcikaṃ, kāyabandhanaṃ upāhanaṃ dhāreti, so samaṇo mahesakkho’ti
anya-e0101n:183_4: bhaṇati. Yassa evarūpo upajjhāyo ācariyo samānupajjhāyako, samānācariyako mitto sandiṭṭho
anya-e0101n:183_5: sambhatto sahāyo. Yo evarūpe vihāre vasati aḍḍhayoge pāsāde hammiye guhāyaṃ leṇe
anya-e0101n:183_6: kuṭiyā kūṭāgāre aṭṭe māḷe uddaṇḍe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ maṇḍape rukkhamūle vasati, so
anya-e0101n:183_7: samaṇo mahesakkho’ti bhaṇati. Atha vā ‘korajikakorajiko bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko kuhakakuhako
anya-e0101n:183_8: lapakalapako mukhasambhāviko, ayaṃ samaṇo imāsaṃ evarūpānaṃ santānaṃ vihārasamāpattīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:183_9: lābhī’ti tādisaṃ gambhīraṃ gūḷhaṃ nipuṇaṃ paṭicchannaṃ lokuttaraṃ suññatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
anya-e0101n:183_10: kathaṃ kathesi. Yā evarūpā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0101n:184_0: Pāpicchasseva pana sato sambhāvanādhippāyakatena iriyāpathena vimhāpanaṃ iriyāpathasannissitaṃ
anya-e0101n:184_1: kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha – “katamaṃ iriyāpathasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu. Idhekacco
anya-e0101n:184_2: pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo ‘evaṃ maṃ jano sambhāvessatī’ti gamanaṃ saṇṭhapeti,
anya-e0101n:184_3: ṭhānaṃ saṇṭhapeti, nisajjaṃ saṇṭhapeti, sayanaṃ saṇṭhapeti, paṇidhāya gacchati, paṇidhāya
anya-e0101n:184_4: tiṭṭhati, paṇidhāya nisīdati, paṇidhāya seyyaṃ kappeti, samāhito viya gacchati, samāhito
anya-e0101n:184_5: viya tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, seyyaṃ kappeti, āpāthakajjhāyī ca hoti, yā evarūpā iriyāpathassa
anya-e0101n:184_6: aṭṭhapanā ṭhapanā saṇṭhapanā bhākuṭikā bhākuṭiyaṃ kuhanā kuhāyanā kuhitattaṃ, idaṃ
anya-e0101n:185_0: Tattha paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti paccayapaṭisevananti evaṃ saṅkhātena paccayapaṭisevanena
anya-e0101n:185_1: vā saṅkhātena. Sāmantajappitenāti samīpabhaṇitena. Iriyāpathassa vāti catuiriyāpathassa.
anya-e0101n:185_2: Aṭṭhapanātiādi ṭhapanā, ādarena vā ṭhapanā. Ṭhapanāti ṭhapanākāro. Saṇṭhapanāti abhisaṅkharaṇā,
anya-e0101n:185_4: bhākuṭikaraṇaṃ, mukhasaṅkocoti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhākuṭikaraṇaṃ sīlamassāti bhākuṭiko.
anya-e0101n:185_5: Bhākuṭikassa bhāvo bhākuṭiyaṃ. Kuhanāti vimhāpanā. Kuhassa āyanā kuhāyanā. Kuhitassa bhāvo kuhitattanti.
anya-e0101n:186_0: Lapanāniddese ālapanāti vihāraṃ āgate manusse disvā “kimatthāya bhonto āgatā, kiṃ
anya-e0101n:186_1: bhikkhū nimantituṃ, yadi evaṃ gacchatha re, ahaṃ pacchato pattaṃ gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:186_2: evaṃ āditova lapanā. Atha vā attānaṃ upanetvā “ahaṃ tisso, mayi rājā pasanno, mayi
anya-e0101n:186_3: asuko ca asuko ca rājamahāmatto pasanno”ti evaṃ attupanāyikā lapanā ālapanā. Lapanāti
anya-e0101n:186_4: puṭṭhassa sato vuttappakārameva lapanaṃ. Sallapanāti gahapatikānaṃ ukkaṇṭhane bhītassa
anya-e0101n:186_5: okāsaṃ datvā datvā suṭṭhu lapanā. Ullapanāti mahākuṭumbiko mahānāviko mahādānapatīti
anya-e0101n:186_6: evaṃ uddhaṃ katvā lapanā. Samullapanāti sabbatobhāgena uddhaṃ katvā lapanā.
anya-e0101n:187_0: Unnahanāti “upāsakā pubbe īdise kāle navadānaṃ detha, idāni kiṃ na dethā”ti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:187_1: yāva “dassāma, bhante, okāsaṃ na labhāmā”tiādīni vadanti, tāva uddhaṃ uddhaṃ nahanā,
anya-e0101n:187_2: veṭhanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā ucchuhatthaṃ disvā “kuto ābhataṃ upāsakā”ti pucchati.
anya-e0101n:187_3: Ucchukhettato, bhanteti. Kiṃ tattha ucchu madhuranti. Khāditvā, bhante, jānitabbanti.
anya-e0101n:187_4: “Na, upāsaka, bhikkhussa ucchuṃ dethā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Yā evarūpā nibbeṭhentassāpi
anya-e0101n:187_5: veṭhanakathā, sā unnahanā. Sabbatobhāgena punappunaṃ unnahanā samunnahanā.
anya-e0101n:188_0: Ukkācanāti “etaṃ kulaṃ maṃyeva jānāti. Sace ettha deyyadhammo uppajjati, mayhameva
anya-e0101n:188_1: detī”ti evaṃ ukkhipitvā kācanā ukkācanā, uddīpanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Telakandarikavatthu
anya-e0101n:188_2: cettha vattabbaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena pana punappunaṃ ukkācanā samukkācanā.
anya-e0101n:189_0: Anuppiyabhāṇitāti saccānurūpaṃ dhammānurūpaṃ vā anapaloketvā punappunaṃ piyabhaṇanameva.
anya-e0101n:189_1: Cāṭukamyatāti nīcavuttitā attānaṃ heṭṭhato heṭṭhato ṭhapetvā vattanaṃ. Muggasūpyatāti
anya-e0101n:189_2: muggasūpasadisatā. Yathā hi muggesu paccamānesu kocideva na paccati, avasesā paccanti,
anya-e0101n:189_3: evaṃ yassa puggalassa vacane kiñcideva saccaṃ hoti, sesaṃ alīkaṃ, ayaṃ puggalo muggasūpyoti
anya-e0101n:189_4: vuccati. Tassa bhāvo muggasūpyatā. Pāribhaṭyatāti pāribhaṭyabhāvo. Yo hi kuladārake
anya-e0101n:189_5: dhāti viya aṅkena vā khandhena vā paribhaṭati, dhāretīti attho. Tassa paribhaṭassa
anya-e0101n:190_0: Nemittikatāniddese nimittanti yaṃkiñci paresaṃ paccayadānasaññājanakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ.
anya-e0101n:190_1: Nimittakammanti khādanīyaṃ gahetvā gacchante disvā “kiṃ khādanīyaṃ labhitthā”tiādinā
anya-e0101n:190_2: nayena nimittakaraṇaṃ. Obhāsoti paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathā. Obhāsakammanti vacchapālake
anya-e0101n:190_3: disvā “kiṃ ime vacchā khīragovacchā udāhu takkagovacchā”ti pucchitvā “khīragovacchā,
anya-e0101n:190_4: bhante”ti vutte “na khīragovacchā, yadi khīragovacchā siyuṃ, bhikkhūpi khīraṃ labheyyu”nti
anya-e0101n:190_5: evamādinā nayena tesaṃ dārakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ nivedetvā khīradāpanādikaṃ obhāsakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:190_6: Sāmantajappāti samīpaṃ katvā jappanaṃ. Kulūpakabhikkhu vatthu cettha vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:191_0: Kulūpako kira bhikkhu bhuñjitukāmo gehaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi. Taṃ disvā adātukāmā gharaṇī
anya-e0101n:191_1: “taṇḍulā natthī”ti bhaṇantī taṇḍule āharitukāmā viya paṭivissakagharaṃ gatā. Bhikkhupi
anya-e0101n:191_2: antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā olokento kavāṭakoṇe ucchuṃ, bhājane guḷaṃ, piṭake loṇamacchaphāle,
anya-e0101n:191_3: kumbhiyaṃ taṇḍule, ghaṭe ghataṃ disvā nikkhamitvā nisīdi. Gharaṇī “taṇḍule nālattha”nti
anya-e0101n:191_4: āgatā. Bhikkhu “upāsike ‘ajja bhikkhā na sampajjissatī’ti paṭikacceva nimittaṃ addasa”nti
anya-e0101n:191_5: āha. Kiṃ, bhanteti. Kavāṭakoṇe nikkhittaṃ ucchuṃ viya sappaṃ addasaṃ, ‘taṃ paharissāmī’ti
anya-e0101n:191_6: olokento bhājane ṭhapitaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pāsāṇaṃ, leḍḍukena pahaṭena sappena kataṃ
anya-e0101n:191_7: piṭake nikkhittaloṇamacchaphālasadisaṃ phaṇaṃ, tassa taṃ leḍḍuṃ ḍaṃsitukāmassa kumbhiyā
anya-e0101n:191_8: taṇḍulasadise dante, athassa kupitassa ghaṭe pakkhittaghatasadisaṃ mukhato nikkhamantaṃ
anya-e0101n:191_9: visamissakaṃ kheḷanti. Sā “na sakkā muṇḍakaṃ vañcetu”nti ucchuṃ datvā odanaṃ pacitvā
anya-e0101n:191_10: ghataguḷamacchehi saddhiṃ sabbaṃ adāsīti. Evaṃ samīpaṃ katvā jappanaṃ sāmantajappāti
anya-e0101n:191_11: veditabbaṃ. Parikathāti yathā taṃ labhati tassa parivattetvā kathananti.
anya-e0101n:192_0: Nippesikatāniddese akkosanāti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanaṃ. Vambhanāti paribhavitvā
anya-e0101n:192_1: kathanaṃ. Garahaṇāti assaddho appasannotiādinā nayena dosāropanā. Ukkhepanāti mā
anya-e0101n:192_2: etaṃ ettha kathethāti vācāya ukkhipanaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena savatthukaṃ sahetukaṃ katvā
anya-e0101n:192_3: ukkhepanā samukkhepanā. Atha vā adentaṃ disvā “aho dānapatī”ti evaṃ ukkhipanaṃ ukkhepanā.
anya-e0101n:192_4: Mahādānapatīti evaṃ suṭṭhu ukkhepanā samukkhepanā. Khipanāti kiṃ imassa jīvitaṃ bījabhojinoti
anya-e0101n:192_5: evaṃ uppaṇḍanā. Saṃkhipanāti kiṃ imaṃ adāyakoti bhaṇatha, yo niccakālaṃ sabbesampi
anya-e0101n:192_6: natthīti vacanaṃ detīti suṭṭhutaraṃ uppaṇḍanā. Pāpanāti adāyakattassa avaṇṇassa vā
anya-e0101n:192_7: pāpanaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena pāpanā sampāpanā. Avaṇṇahārikāti evaṃ me avaṇṇabhayāpi dassatīti
anya-e0101n:192_8: gehato gehaṃ gāmato gāmaṃ janapadato janapadaṃ avaṇṇaharaṇaṃ. Parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatāti
anya-e0101n:192_9: purato madhuraṃ bhaṇitvā parammukhe avaṇṇabhāsitā. Esā hi abhimukhaṃ oloketuṃ asakkontassa
anya-e0101n:192_10: parammukhānaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ khādanamiva hoti, tasmā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatāti vuttā. Ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:192_11: vuccati nippesikatāti ayaṃ yasmā veḷupesikāya viya abbhaṅgaṃ parassa guṇaṃ nippeseti
anya-e0101n:192_12: nipuñchati, yasmā vā gandhajātaṃ nipisitvā gandhamagganā viya paraguṇe nipisitvā
anya-e0101n:192_13: vicuṇṇetvā esā lābhamagganā hoti, tasmā nippesikatāti vuccatīti.
anya-e0101n:193_0: Lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāniddese nijigīsanatāti magganā. Ito laddhanti imamhā gehā
anya-e0101n:193_1: laddhaṃ. Amutrāti amukamhi gehe. Eṭṭhīti icchanā. Gaveṭṭhīti magganā. Pariyeṭṭhīti
anya-e0101n:193_2: punappunaṃ magganā. Ādito paṭṭhāya laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ tatra tatra kuladārakānaṃ
anya-e0101n:193_3: datvā ante khīrayāguṃ labhitvā gatabhikkhuvatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ. Esanātiādīni
anya-e0101n:193_4: eṭṭhiādīnameva vevacanāni, tasmā eṭṭhīti esanā. Gaveṭṭhīti gavesanā, pariyeṭṭhīti
anya-e0101n:193_5: pariyesanā. Iccevamettha yojanā veditabbā. Ayaṃ kuhanādīnaṃ attho.
anya-e0101n:194_0: Idāni evamādīnañca pāpadhammānanti ettha ādisaddena “yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā
anya-e0101n:194_1: saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpāya tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ
anya-e0101n:194_2: kappenti. Seyyathidaṃ, aṅgaṃ, nimittaṃ, uppātaṃ, supinaṃ, lakkhaṇaṃ, mūsikacchinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:194_3: aggihomaṃ, dabbihoma”nti ādinā nayena brahmajāle vuttānaṃ anekesaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0101n:194_4: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti yvāyaṃ imesaṃ ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ
anya-e0101n:194_5: vītikkamavasena, imesañca “kuhanā lapanā nemittikatā nippesikatā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā”ti
anya-e0101n:194_6: evamādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vasena pavatto micchājīvo, yā tasmā sabbappakārāpi micchājīvā
anya-e0101n:194_7: virati, idaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho. Etaṃ āgamma jīvantīti ājīvo.
anya-e0101n:194_8: Ko so, paccayapariyesanavāyāmo. Pārisuddhīti parisuddhatā. Ājīvassa pārisuddhi ājīvapārisuddhi.
anya-e0101n:196_0: 18. Yaṃ panetaṃ tadanantaraṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha paṭisaṅkhā yonisoti
anya-e0101n:196_1: upāyena pathena paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā, paccavekkhitvāti attho. Ettha ca sītassa paṭighātāyātiādinā
anya-e0101n:196_2: nayena vuttapaccavekkhaṇameva “yoniso paṭisaṅkhā”ti veditabbaṃ. Tattha cīvaranti
anya-e0101n:196_3: antaravāsakādīsu yaṃkiñci. Paṭisevatīti paribhuñjati, nivāseti vā pārupati vā. Yāvadevāti
anya-e0101n:196_4: payojanāvadhiparicchedaniyamavacanaṃ, ettakameva hi yogino cīvarapaṭisevane payojanaṃ
anya-e0101n:196_5: yadidaṃ sītassa paṭighātāyātiādi, na ito bhiyyo. Sītassāti ajjhattadhātukkhobhavasena
anya-e0101n:196_6: vā bahiddhāutupariṇāmanavasena vā uppannassa yassa kassaci sītassa. Paṭighātāyāti
anya-e0101n:196_7: paṭihananatthaṃ. Yathā sarīre ābādhaṃ na uppādeti, evaṃ tassa vinodanatthaṃ. Sītabbhāhate
anya-e0101n:196_8: hi sarīre vikkhittacitto yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā sītassa paṭighātāya cīvaraṃ
anya-e0101n:196_9: paṭisevitabbanti bhagavā anuññāsi. Esa nayo sabbattha. Kevalañhettha uṇhassāti aggisantāpassa.
anya-e0101n:196_11: ettha pana ḍaṃsāti ḍaṃsanamakkhikā, andhamakkhikātipi vuccanti. Makasā makasā eva.
anya-e0101n:196_12: Vātāti sarajaarajādibhedā. Ātapoti sūriyātapo. Sarīsapāti ye keci sarantā gacchanti
anya-e0101n:196_13: dīghajātikā sappādayo, tesaṃ daṭṭhasamphasso ca phuṭṭhasamphasso cāti duvidho samphasso,
anya-e0101n:196_14: sopi cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinnaṃ na bādhati, tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya
anya-e0101n:196_16: hirikopīnapaṭicchādanañhi niyatapayojanaṃ, itarāni kadāci kadāci honti. Tattha hirikopīnanti
anya-e0101n:196_17: taṃ taṃ sambādhaṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiñhi aṅge vivariyamāne hirī kuppati vinassati,
anya-e0101n:196_18: taṃ taṃ hiriṃ kopanato hirikopīnanti vuccati. Tassa ca hirikopīnassa paṭicchādanatthanti
anya-e0101n:197_0: Piṇḍapātanti yaṃkiñci āhāraṃ. Yo hi koci āhāro bhikkhuno piṇḍolyena patte patitattā
anya-e0101n:197_1: piṇḍapātoti vuccati. Piṇḍānaṃ vā pāto piṇḍapāto, tattha tattha laddhānaṃ bhikkhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:197_2: sannipāto samūhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Neva davāyāti na gāmadārakādayo viya davatthaṃ, kīḷānimittanti
anya-e0101n:197_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Na madāyāti na muṭṭhikamallādayo viya madatthaṃ, balamadanimittaṃ porisamadanimittañcāti
anya-e0101n:197_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Na maṇḍanāyāti na antepurikavesiyādayo viya maṇḍanatthaṃ, aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ
anya-e0101n:197_5: pīṇabhāvanimittanti vuttaṃ hoti. Na vibhūsanāyāti na naṭanaccakādayo viya vibhūsanatthaṃ,
anya-e0101n:197_6: pasannacchavivaṇṇatānimittanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha ca neva davāyāti etaṃ mohūpanissayappahānatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:197_7: vuttaṃ. Na madāyāti etaṃ dosūpanissayappahānatthaṃ. Na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāyāti
anya-e0101n:197_8: etaṃ rāgūpanissayappahānatthaṃ. Neva davāya na madāyāti cetaṃ attano saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:197_9: Na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāyāti etaṃ parassapi saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanatthaṃ. Catūhipi
anya-e0101n:197_10: cetehi ayoniso paṭipattiyā kāmasukhallikānuyogassa ca pahānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:198_0: Yāvadevāti vuttatthameva. Imassa kāyassāti etassa catumahābhūtikassa rūpakāyassa.
anya-e0101n:198_1: Ṭhitiyāti pabandhaṭṭhitatthaṃ. Yāpanāyāti pavattiyā avicchedatthaṃ, cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:198_2: vā. Gharūpatthambhamiva hi jiṇṇagharasāmiko, akkhabbhañjanamiva ca sākaṭiko kāyassa
anya-e0101n:198_3: ṭhitatthaṃ yāpanatthañcesa piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati, na davamadamaṇḍanavibhūsanatthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:198_4: Apica ṭhitīti jīvitindriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tasmā imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti
anya-e0101n:198_5: ettāvatā etassa kāyassa jīvitindriyapavattāpanatthantipi vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:198_6: Vihiṃsūparatiyāti vihiṃsā nāma jighacchā ābādhaṭṭhena. Tassā uparamatthampesa piṇḍapātaṃ
anya-e0101n:198_7: paṭisevati, vaṇālepanamiva uṇhasītādīsu tappaṭikāraṃ viya ca. Brahmacariyānuggahāyāti
anya-e0101n:198_8: sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ca maggabrahmacariyassa ca anuggahatthaṃ. Ayañhi piṇḍapātapaṭisevanapaccayā
anya-e0101n:198_10: brahmacariyānuggahāya paṭisevati, kantāranittharaṇatthikā puttamaṃsaṃ viya, nadīnittharaṇatthikā
anya-e0101n:199_0: Itipurāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti etaṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena
anya-e0101n:199_1: purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṃ
anya-e0101n:199_3: na uppādessāmītipi paṭisevati, bhesajjamiva gilāno. Atha vā yā adhunā asappāyāparimitabhojanaṃ
anya-e0101n:199_4: nissāya purāṇakammapaccayavasena uppajjanato purāṇavedanāti vuccati. Sappāyaparimitabhojanena
anya-e0101n:199_5: tassā paccayaṃ vināsento taṃ purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi. Yā cāyaṃ adhunā kataṃ
anya-e0101n:199_6: ayuttaparibhogakammūpacayaṃ nissāya āyatiṃ uppajjanato navavedanāti vuccati. Yuttaparibhogavasena
anya-e0101n:199_7: tassā mūlaṃ anibbattento taṃ navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:200_0: Yātrā ca me bhavissatīti parimitaparibhogena jīvitindriyupacchedakassa iriyāpathabhañjakassa
anya-e0101n:200_1: vā parissayassa abhāvato cirakālagamanasaṅkhātā yātrā ca me bhavissati imassa paccayāyattavuttino
anya-e0101n:200_2: kāyassātipi paṭisevati, yāpyarogī viya tappaccayaṃ. Anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cāti
anya-e0101n:200_7: catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanato phāsuvihāro ca me bhavissatītipi paṭisevati. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:203: Ettāvatā ca payojanapariggaho majjhimā ca paṭipadā dīpitā hotīti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:204_0: Senāsananti senañca āsanañca. Yattha yattha hi seti vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā,
anya-e0101n:204_1: taṃ senaṃ. Yattha yattha āsati nisīdati, taṃ āsanaṃ. Taṃ ekato katvā senāsananti
anya-e0101n:204_4: asappāyo utu senāsanapaṭisevanena vinodetabbo hoti, tassa vinodanatthaṃ ekībhāvasukhatthañcāti
anya-e0101n:204_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Kāmañca sītapaṭighātādināva utuparissayavinodanaṃ vuttameva. Yathā pana
anya-e0101n:204_6: cīvarapaṭisevane hirikopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ niyatapayojanaṃ, itarāni kadāci kadāci bhavantīti
anya-e0101n:204_7: vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi niyataṃ utuparissayavinodanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:204_8: Atha vā ayaṃ vuttappakāro utu utuyeva. Parissayo pana duvidho pākaṭaparissayo ca,
anya-e0101n:204_9: paṭicchannaparissayo ca. Tattha pākaṭaparissayo sīhabyagghādayo. Paṭicchannaparissayo
anya-e0101n:204_10: rāgadosādayo. Ye yattha apariguttiyā ca asappāyarūpadassanādinā ca ābādhaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0101n:204_11: taṃ senāsanaṃ evaṃ jānitvā paccavekkhitvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso senāsanaṃ
anya-e0101n:205_0: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāranti ettha rogassa paṭiayanaṭṭhena paccayo, paccanīkagamanaṭṭhenāti
anya-e0101n:205_1: attho. Yassa kassaci sappāyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bhisakkassa kammaṃ tena anuññātattāti
anya-e0101n:205_2: bhesajjaṃ. Gilānapaccayova bhesajjaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaṃ, yaṃkiñci gilānassa sappāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:205_3: bhisakkakammaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādīti vuttaṃ hoti. Parikkhāroti pana “sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi
anya-e0101n:205_4: suparikkhataṃ hotī”ti ādīsu parivāro vuccati. “Ratho sīlaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti
anya-e0101n:205_5: ādīsu alaṅkāro. “Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā”ti ādīsu
anya-e0101n:205_6: sambhāro. Idha pana sambhāropi parivāropi vaṭṭati. Tañhi gilānapaccayabhesajjaṃ jīvitassa
anya-e0101n:205_7: parivāropi hoti, jīvitanāsakābādhuppattiyā antaraṃ adatvā rakkhaṇato sambhāropi.
anya-e0101n:205_8: Yathā ciraṃ pavattati, evamassa kāraṇabhāvato, tasmā parikkhāroti vuccati. Evaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjañca
anya-e0101n:205_9: taṃ parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro. Taṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ.
anya-e0101n:205_10: Gilānassa yaṃkiñci sappāyaṃ bhisakkānuññātaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādi jīvitaparikkhāranti
anya-e0101n:205_11: vuttaṃ hoti. Uppannānanti jātānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nibbattānaṃ. Veyyābādhikānanti ettha byābādhoti
anya-e0101n:205_12: dhātukkhobho, taṃsamuṭṭhānā ca kuṭṭhagaṇḍapīḷakādayo. Byābādhato uppannattā veyyābādhikā.
anya-e0101n:205_13: Vedanānanti dukkhavedanā akusalavipākavedanā. Tāsaṃ veyyābādhikānaṃ vedanānaṃ. Abyābajjhaparamatāyāti
anya-e0101n:205_14: niddukkhaparamatāya. Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti tāvāti attho.
anya-e0101n:206_0: Evamidaṃ saṅkhepato paṭisaṅkhā yoniso paccayaparibhogalakkhaṇaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ
anya-e0101n:206_1: veditabbaṃ. Vacanattho panettha – cīvarādayo hi yasmā te paṭicca nissāya paribhuñjamānā
anya-e0101n:206_2: pāṇino ayanti pavattanti, tasmā paccayāti vuccanti. Te paccaye sannissitanti paccayasannissitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:208_0: 19. Evametasmiṃ catubbidhe sīle saddhāya pātimokkhasaṃvaro sampādetabbo. Saddhāsādhano
anya-e0101n:208_2: cettha nidassanaṃ. Tasmā yathā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ anavasesaṃ saddhāya samādiyitvā
anya-e0101n:208_3: jīvitepi apekkhaṃ akarontena sādhukaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Vuttampi hetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:213_0: Aparampi vuttaṃ – “evameva kho pahārāda yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:213_1: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti. Imasmiṃ ca panatthe aṭaviyaṃ corehi
anya-e0101n:214_0: Mahāvattaniaṭaviyaṃ kira theraṃ corā kāḷavallīhi bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ. Thero yathānipannova
anya-e0101n:214_1: sattadivasāni vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇitvā tattheva kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
anya-e0101n:215_0: Aparampi theraṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe pūtilatāya bandhitvā nipajjāpesuṃ. So vanadāhe āgacchante
anya-e0101n:215_1: valliṃ acchinditvāva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi. Dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero
anya-e0101n:215_2: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ āgacchanto disvā therassa sarīraṃ jhāpetvā cetiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:218_0: Yathā ca pātimokkhasaṃvaro saddhāya, evaṃ satiyā indriyasaṃvaro sampādetabbo. Satisādhano
anya-e0101n:218_1: hi so, satiyā adhiṭṭhitānaṃ indriyānaṃ abhijjhādīhi ananvāssavanīyato. Tasmā “varaṃ,
anya-e0101n:218_2: bhikkhave, tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:218_3: sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, na tveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”ti ādinā
anya-e0101n:218_4: nayena ādittapariyāyaṃ samanussaritvā rūpādīsu visayesu cakkhudvārādipavattassa viññāṇassa
anya-e0101n:218_5: abhijjhādīhi anvāssavanīyaṃ nimittādiggāhaṃ asammuṭṭhāya satiyā nisedhentena esa
anya-e0101n:218_6: sādhukaṃ sampādetabbo. Evaṃ asampādite hi etasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi anaddhaniyaṃ
anya-e0101n:218_7: hoti aciraṭṭhitikaṃ, asaṃvihitasākhāparivāramiva sassaṃ. Haññate cāyaṃ kilesacorehi,
anya-e0101n:218_8: vivaṭadvāro viya gāmo parassa hārīhi. Cittañcassa rāgo samativijjhati, ducchannamagāraṃ
anya-e0101n:225_0: Sampādite pana tasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlampi addhaniyaṃ hoti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, susaṃvihitasākhāparivāramiva
anya-e0101n:225_1: sassaṃ. Na haññate cāyaṃ kilesacorehi, susaṃvutadvāro viya gāmo parassa hārīhi. Na
anya-e0101n:225_2: cassa cittaṃ rāgo samativijjhati, succhannamagāraṃ vuṭṭhi viya. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:231: Evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:233: Cittaṃ nāmetaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, tasmā uppannaṃ rāgaṃ asubhamanasikārena vinodetvā indriyasaṃvaro sampādetabbo, adhunāpabbajitena vaṅgīsattherena viya.
anya-e0101n:234: Therassa kira adhunāpabbajitassa piṇḍāya carato ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā rāgo uppajjati. Tato ānandattheraṃ āha –
anya-e0101n:241: “Saṅkhāre parato passa, dukkhato no ca attato;
anya-e0101n:243_0: Thero rāgaṃ vinodetvā piṇḍāya cari. Apica indriyasaṃvarapūrakena bhikkhunā kuraṇḍakamahāleṇavāsinā
anya-e0101n:243_1: cittaguttattherena viya corakamahāvihāravāsinā mahāmittattherena viya ca bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:243_2: Kuraṇḍakamahāleṇe kira sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ abhinikkhamanacittakammaṃ manoramaṃ ahosi,
anya-e0101n:243_3: sambahulā bhikkhū senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā cittakammaṃ disvā “manoramaṃ, bhante,
anya-e0101n:243_4: cittakamma”nti āhaṃsu. Thero āha “atirekasaṭṭhi me, āvuso, vassāni leṇe vasantassa
anya-e0101n:243_5: cittakammaṃ atthītipi na jānāmi, ajja dāni cakkhumante nissāya ñāta”nti. Therena
anya-e0101n:243_6: kira ettakaṃ addhānaṃ vasantena cakkhuṃ ummīletvā leṇaṃ na ullokitapubbaṃ. Leṇadvāre
anya-e0101n:243_7: cassa mahānāgarukkhopi ahosi. Sopi therena uddhaṃ na ullokitapubbo. Anusaṃvaccharaṃ
anya-e0101n:244_0: Rājā therassa guṇasampattiṃ sutvā vanditukāmo tikkhattuṃ pesetvā anāgacchante there
anya-e0101n:244_1: tasmiṃ gāme taruṇaputtānaṃ itthīnaṃ thane bandhāpetvā lañjāpesi “tāva dārakā thaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:244_2: mā labhiṃsu, yāva thero na āgacchatī”ti. Thero dārakānaṃ anukampāya mahāgāmaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0101n:244_3: Rājā sutvā “gacchatha bhaṇe, theraṃ pavesetha sīlāni gaṇhissāmī”ti antepuraṃ abhiharāpetvā
anya-e0101n:244_4: vanditvā bhojetvā “ajja, bhante, okāso natthi, sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmīti therassa pattaṃ
anya-e0101n:244_5: gahetvā thokaṃ anugantvā deviyā saddhiṃ vanditvā nivatti. Thero rājā vā vandatu devī
anya-e0101n:244_6: vā, “sukhī hotu, mahārājā”ti vadati. Evaṃ sattadivasā gatā. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu “kiṃ,
anya-e0101n:244_7: bhante, tumhe raññepi vandamāne deviyāpi vandamānāya “sukhī hotu, mahārāja”icceva
anya-e0101n:244_8: vadathāti. Thero “nāhaṃ, āvuso, rājāti vā devīti vā vavatthānaṃ karomī”ti vatvā sattāhātikkamena
anya-e0101n:244_9: “therassa idha vāso dukkho”ti raññā vissajjito kuraṇḍakamahāleṇaṃ gantvā rattibhāge
anya-e0101n:244_10: caṅkamaṃ ārūhi. Nāgarukkhe adhivatthā devatā daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Athassa
anya-e0101n:244_11: kammaṭṭhānaṃ atiparisuddhaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi. Thero “kiṃ nu me ajja kammaṭṭhānaṃ ativiya
anya-e0101n:244_12: pakāsatī”ti attamano majjhimayāmasamanantaraṃ sakalaṃ pabbataṃ unnādayanto arahattaṃ
anya-e0101n:246: Bālo viya ca utrasto, na bhave lolalocano.
anya-e0101n:249_0: Mahāmittattherassāpi mātu visagaṇḍakarogo uppajji, dhītāpissā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā
anya-e0101n:249_1: hoti. Sā taṃ āha – “gaccha ayye, bhātu santikaṃ gantvā mama aphāsukabhāvaṃ ārocetvā
anya-e0101n:249_2: bhesajjamāharā”ti. Sā gantvā ārocesi. Thero āha – “nāhaṃ mūlabhesajjādīni saṃharitvā
anya-e0101n:249_3: bhesajjaṃ pacituṃ jānāmi, apica te bhesajjaṃ ācikkhissaṃ – “ahaṃ yato pabbajito,
anya-e0101n:249_4: tato paṭṭhāya na mayā lobhasahagatena cittena indriyāni bhinditvā visabhāgarūpaṃ
anya-e0101n:249_5: olokitapubbaṃ, iminā saccavacanena mātuyā me phāsu hotu, gaccha idaṃ vatvā upāsikāya
anya-e0101n:249_6: sarīraṃ parimajjā”ti. Sā gantvā imamatthaṃ ārocetvā tathā akāsi. Upāsikāya taṃkhaṇaṃyeva
anya-e0101n:249_7: gaṇḍo pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyitvā antaradhāyi, sā uṭṭhahitvā “sace sammāsambuddho dhareyya,
anya-e0101n:249_8: kasmā mama puttasadisassa bhikkhuno jālavicitrena hatthena sīsaṃ na parāmaseyyā”ti
anya-e0101n:252_0: Yathā pana indriyasaṃvaro satiyā, tathā vīriyena ājīvapārisuddhi sampādetabbā. Vīriyasādhanā
anya-e0101n:252_1: hi sā, sammāraddhavīriyassa micchājīvappahānasambhavato. Tasmā anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ
anya-e0101n:252_2: pahāya vīriyena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi sammā esanāhi esā sampādetabbā parisuddhuppādeyeva
anya-e0101n:252_3: paccaye paṭisevamānena aparisuddhuppāde āsīvise viya parivajjayatā. Tattha apariggahitadhutaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:252_4: saṅghato, gaṇato, dhammadesanādīhi cassa guṇehi pasannānaṃ gihīnaṃ santikā uppannā
anya-e0101n:252_5: paccayā parisuddhuppādā nāma. Piṇḍapātacariyādīhi pana atiparisuddhuppādāyeva. Pariggahitadhutaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:252_6: piṇḍapātacariyādīhi dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānaṃ santikā dhutaṅganiyamānulomena uppannā
anya-e0101n:252_9: paribhuñjamānassa dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ patirūpaṃ hoti. Esa hi “uttamaariyavaṃsiko bhikkhū”ti
anya-e0101n:252_10: vuccati. Ye panete cīvarādayo paccayā, tesu yassa kassaci bhikkhuno ājīvaṃ parisodhentassa
anya-e0101n:252_11: cīvare ca piṇḍapāte ca nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattiyo na vaṭṭanti. Senāsane pana
anya-e0101n:252_12: apariggahitadhutaṅgassa nimittobhāsaparikathā vaṭṭanti. Tattha nimittaṃ nāma senāsanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:252_13: bhūmiparikammādīni karontassa “kiṃ, bhante, kariyati, ko kārāpetī”ti gihīhi vutte
anya-e0101n:252_14: “na koci”ti paṭivacanaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ nimittakammaṃ. Obhāso nāma “upāsakā
anya-e0101n:252_15: tumhe kuhiṃ vasathā”ti. Pāsāde, bhanteti. “Bhikkhūnaṃ pana upāsakā pāsādo na vaṭṭatī”ti
anya-e0101n:252_16: vacanaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ obhāsakammaṃ. Parikathā nāma “bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e0101n:252_17: senāsanaṃ sambādha”nti vacanaṃ, yā vā panaññāpi evarūpā pariyāyakathā. Bhesajje sabbampi
anya-e0101n:252_18: vaṭṭati. Tathā uppannaṃ pana bhesajjaṃ roge vūpasante paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n:253: Tattha vinayadharā “bhagavatā dvāraṃ dinnaṃ, tasmā vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti. Suttantikā pana “kiñcāpi āpatti na hoti, ājīvaṃ pana kopeti, tasmā na vaṭṭati”cceva vadanti.
anya-e0101n:254_0: Yo pana bhagavatā anuññātāpi nimittobhāsaparikathāviññattiyo akaronto appicchatādiguṇeyeva
anya-e0101n:254_1: nissāya jīvitakkhayepi paccupaṭṭhite aññatreva obhāsādīhi uppannapaccaye paṭisevati,
anya-e0101n:255_0: So kirāyasmā ekasmiṃ samaye pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṃ
anya-e0101n:255_1: aññatarasmiṃ araññe viharati, athassa ekasmiṃ divase udaravātābādho uppajjitvā atidukkhaṃ
anya-e0101n:255_2: janesi. Mahāmoggallānatthero sāyanhasamaye tassāyasmato upaṭṭhānaṃ gato theraṃ nipannaṃ
anya-e0101n:255_3: disvā taṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā “pubbe te, āvuso, kena phāsu hotī”ti pucchi. Thero āha,
anya-e0101n:255_4: “gihikāle me, āvuso, mātā sappimadhusakkarādīhi yojetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ adāsi,
anya-e0101n:255_5: tena me phāsu ahosī”ti. Sopi āyasmā “hotu, āvuso, sace mayhaṃ vā tuyhaṃ vā puññaṃ
anya-e0101n:255_6: atthi, appeva nāma sve labhissāmā”ti āha.
anya-e0101n:256_0: Imaṃ pana nesaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā sutvā “sve
anya-e0101n:256_1: ayyassa pāyāsaṃ uppādessāmī”ti tāvadeva therassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā jeṭṭhaputtassa
anya-e0101n:256_2: sarīraṃ āvisitvā pīḷaṃ janesi. Athassa tikicchānimittaṃ sannipatite ñātake āha –
anya-e0101n:256_3: “sace sve therassa evarūpaṃ nāma pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetha, taṃ muñcissāmī”ti. Te “tayā
anya-e0101n:256_4: avuttepi mayaṃ therānaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ demā”ti vatvā dutiyadivase tathārūpaṃ
anya-e0101n:257_0: Mahāmoggallānatthero pātova āgantvā “āvuso, yāva ahaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā āgacchāmi,
anya-e0101n:257_1: tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā gāmaṃ pāvisi. Te manussā paccuggantvā therassa pattaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0101n:257_2: vuttappakārassa pāyāsassa pūretvā adaṃsu. Thero gamanākāraṃ dassesi. Te “bhuñjatha
anya-e0101n:257_3: – bhante, tumhe, aparampi dassāmā”ti theraṃ bhojetvā puna pattapūraṃ adaṃsu. Thero
anya-e0101n:257_4: gantvā “handāvuso sāriputta, paribhuñjā”ti upanāmesi. Theropi taṃ disvā “atimanāpo
anya-e0101n:257_5: pāyāso, kathaṃ nu kho uppanno”ti cintento tassa uppattimūlaṃ disvā āha – “āvuso moggallāna,
anya-e0101n:257_6: aparibhogāraho piṇḍapāto”ti. Sopāyasmā “mādisena nāma ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ na paribhuñjatī”ti
anya-e0101n:257_7: cittampi anuppādetvā ekavacaneneva pattaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ gahetvā ekamante nikujjesi.
anya-e0101n:257_8: Pāyāsassa saha bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhānā therassa ābādho antaradhāyi, tato paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsa
anya-e0101n:257_9: vassāni na puna uppajji. Tato mahāmoggallānaṃ āha – “āvuso, vacīviññattiṃ nissāya
anya-e0101n:257_10: uppanno pāyāso antesu nikkhamitvā bhūmiyaṃ carantesupi paribhuñjituṃ ayuttarūpo”ti.
anya-e0101n:259: Sace bhutto bhaveyyāhaṃ, sājīvo garahito mama.
anya-e0101n:267_0: Yathā ca vīriyena ājīvapārisuddhi, tathā paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paññāya sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:267_1: Paññāsādhanaṃ hi taṃ, paññavato paccayesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassanasamatthabhāvato. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:267_2: pahāya paccayagedhaṃ dhammena samena uppanne paccaye yathāvuttena vidhinā paññāya
anya-e0101n:268_0: Tattha duvidhaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭilābhakāle, paribhogakāle ca. Paṭilābhakālepi
anya-e0101n:268_1: hi dhātuvasena vā paṭikūlavasena vā paccavekkhitvā ṭhapitāni cīvarādīni tato uttari
anya-e0101n:268_2: paribhuñjantassa anavajjova paribhogo, paribhogakālepi. Tatrāyaṃ sanniṭṭhānakaro vinicchayo –
anya-e0101n:269_0: Cattāro hi paribhogā theyyaparibhogo, iṇaparibhogo, dāyajjaparibhogo, sāmiparibhogoti.
anya-e0101n:269_1: Tatra saṅghamajjhepi nisīditvā paribhuñjantassa dussīlassa paribhogo theyyaparibhogo
anya-e0101n:269_2: nāma. Sīlavato apaccavekkhitvā paribhogo iṇaparibhogo nāma. Tasmā cīvaraṃ paribhoge
anya-e0101n:269_3: paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ, piṇḍapāto ālope ālope, tathā asakkontena purebhattapacchābhattapurimayāmamajjhimayāmapacchimayāmesu.
anya-e0101n:269_4: Sacassa apaccavekkhatova aruṇaṃ uggacchati, iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Senāsanampi
anya-e0101n:269_5: paribhoge paribhoge paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Bhesajjassa paṭiggahaṇepi paribhogepi satipaccayatāva
anya-e0101n:269_6: vaṭṭati. Evaṃ santepi paṭiggahaṇe satiṃ katvā paribhoge akarontasseva āpatti, paṭiggahaṇe
anya-e0101n:269_7: pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpatti.
anya-e0101n:270_0: Catubbidhā hi suddhi desanāsuddhi, saṃvarasuddhi, pariyeṭṭhisuddhi, paccavekkhaṇasuddhīti.
anya-e0101n:270_1: Tattha desanāsuddhi nāma pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Tañhi desanāya sujjhanato desanāsuddhīti
anya-e0101n:270_2: vuccati. Saṃvarasuddhi nāma indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Tañhi “na puna evaṃ karissāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:270_3: cittādhiṭṭhānasaṃvareneva sujjhanato saṃvarasuddhīti vuccati. Pariyeṭṭhisuddhi nāma
anya-e0101n:270_4: ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Tañhi anesanaṃ pahāya dhammena samena paccaye uppādentassa
anya-e0101n:270_5: pariyesanāya suddhattā pariyeṭṭhisuddhīti vuccati. Paccavekkhaṇasuddhi nāma paccayasannissitasīlaṃ.
anya-e0101n:270_6: Tañhi vuttappakārena paccavekkhaṇena sujjhanato paccavekkhaṇasuddhīti vuccati. Tena
anya-e0101n:270_7: vuttaṃ “paṭiggahaṇe pana satiṃ akatvā paribhoge karontassa anāpattī”ti.
anya-e0101n:271_0: Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ paccayaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo nāma. Te hi bhagavato puttā,
anya-e0101n:271_1: tasmā pitusantakānaṃ paccayānaṃ dāyādā hutvā te paccaye paribhuñjanti. Kiṃpanete
anya-e0101n:271_2: bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjanti, udāhu gihīnaṃ paccaye paribhuñjantīti. Gihīhi dinnāpi
anya-e0101n:271_3: bhagavatā anuññātattā bhagavato santakā honti, tasmā bhagavato paccaye paribhuñjantīti
anya-e0101n:272: Khīṇāsavānaṃ paribhogo sāmiparibhogo nāma. Te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjanti.
anya-e0101n:273_0: Imesu paribhogesu sāmiparibhogo ca dāyajjaparibhogo ca sabbesaṃ vaṭṭati. Iṇaparibhogo
anya-e0101n:273_1: na vaṭṭati. Theyyaparibhoge kathāyeva natthi. Yo panāyaṃ sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo,
anya-e0101n:273_2: so iṇaparibhogassa paccanīkattā āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā hoti, dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā
anya-e0101n:273_3: saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Sīlavāpi hi imāya sikkhāya samannāgatattā sekkhotveva saṅkhyaṃ
anya-e0101n:273_4: gacchati. Imesu pana paribhogesu yasmā sāmiparibhogo aggo, tasmā taṃ patthayamānena
anya-e0101n:273_5: bhikkhunā vuttappakārāya paccavekkhaṇāya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantena paccayasannissitasīlaṃ
anya-e0101n:273_6: sampādetabbaṃ. Evaṃ karonto hi kiccakārī hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:288: Imassa ca paccayasannissitasīlassa paripūrakāritāya bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇerassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ. So hi sammā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñji. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:290: Mā heva tvaṃ sāmaṇera, jivhaṃ jhāpesi asaññato.
anya-e0101n:299: 20. Pañcavidhakoṭṭhāsassa paṭhamapañcake anupasampannasīlādivasena attho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –
anya-e0101n:300_3: kusaladhamme yuttānaṃ sekkhapariyante paripūrakārīnaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:300_5: Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ, idaṃ aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhisīlaṃ. Katamaṃ paṭippassaddhipārisuddhisīlaṃ?
anya-e0101n:300_6: Tathāgatasāvakānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:301: Tattha anupasampannānaṃ sīlaṃ gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā pariyantapārisuddhisīlanti veditabbaṃ. Upasampannānaṃ –
anya-e0101n:306_0: Evaṃ gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi anavasesavasena samādānabhāvañca lābhayasañātiaṅgajīvitavasena
anya-e0101n:307: “Dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
anya-e0101n:308: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti. –
anya-e0101n:309: Imaṃ sappurisānussatiṃ avijahanto jīvitasaṃsayepi sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkamma tadeva apariyantapārisuddhisīlaṃ nissāya upāsakassa piṭṭhigatova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Yathāha –
anya-e0101n:310: “Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0101n:314_0: Puthujjanakalyāṇakānaṃ sīlaṃ upasampadato paṭṭhāya sudhotajātimaṇi viya suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:314_1: viya ca atiparisuddhattā cittuppādamattakenapi malena virahitaṃ arahattasseva padaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:315_0: Mahāsaṅgharakkhitattheraṃ kira atikkantasaṭṭhivassaṃ maraṇamañce nipannaṃ bhikkhusaṅgho
anya-e0101n:315_1: lokuttarādhigamaṃ pucchi. Thero “natthi me lokuttaradhammo”ti āha. Athassa upaṭṭhāko
anya-e0101n:315_2: daharabhikkhu āha – “bhante, tumhe parinibbutāti samantā dvādasayojanā manussā sannipatitā,
anya-e0101n:315_3: tumhākaṃ puthujjanakālakiriyāya mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatī”ti. Āvuso, ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:315_4: “metteyyaṃ bhagavantaṃ passissāmī”ti na vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesiṃ. Tena hi maṃ nisīdāpetvā
anya-e0101n:315_5: okāsaṃ karohīti. So theraṃ nisīdāpetvā bahi nikkhanto. Thero tassa saha nikkhamanāva
anya-e0101n:315_6: arahattaṃ patvā accharikāya saññaṃ adāsi. Saṅgho sannipatitvā āha – “bhante, evarūpe
anya-e0101n:315_7: maraṇakāle lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattentā dukkaraṃ karitthā”ti. Nāvuso etaṃ dukkaraṃ,
anya-e0101n:315_8: apica vo dukkaraṃ ācikkhissāmi – “ahaṃ, āvuso, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya asatiyā aññāṇapakataṃ
anya-e0101n:315_9: kammaṃ nāma na passāmī”ti. Bhāgineyyopissa paññāsavassakāle evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
anya-e0101n:317: Ubhayena naṃ garahanti, sīlato ca sutena ca.
anya-e0101n:319: Sīlato naṃ pasaṃsanti, tassa sampajjate sutaṃ.
anya-e0101n:321: Sīlato naṃ garahanti, nāssa sampajjate sutaṃ.
anya-e0101n:323: Ubhayena naṃ pasaṃsanti, sīlato ca sutena ca.
anya-e0101n:327_0: Sekkhānaṃ pana sīlaṃ diṭṭhivasena aparāmaṭṭhattā, puthujjanānaṃ vā pana rāgavasena
anya-e0101n:327_2: sīlaṃ viya. So hi āyasmā tathārūpaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya arahatte patiṭṭhātukāmo verike āha –
anya-e0101n:332_0: Aññataropi mahāthero bāḷhagilāno sahatthā āhārampi paribhuñjituṃ asakkonto sake muttakarīse
anya-e0101n:332_1: palipanno samparivattati, taṃ disvā aññataro daharo “aho dukkhā jīvitasaṅkhārā”ti
anya-e0101n:332_2: āha. Tamenaṃ mahāthero āha – “ahaṃ, āvuso, idāni miyyamāno saggasampattiṃ labhissāmi,
anya-e0101n:332_3: natthi me ettha saṃsayo, imaṃ pana sīlaṃ bhinditvā laddhasampatti nāma sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
anya-e0101n:332_4: paṭiladdhagihibhāvasadisī”ti vatvā “sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmī”ti tattheva nipanno
anya-e0101n:332_5: tameva rogaṃ sammasanto arahattaṃ patvā bhikkhusaṅghassa imāhi gāthāhi byākāsi –
anya-e0101n:339: “Dhiratthu maṃ āturaṃ pūtikāyaṃ, duggandhiyaṃ asuci byādhidhammaṃ;
anya-e0101n:340: Yatthappamattā adhimucchitā pajā, hāpenti maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:341: Arahantādīnaṃ pana sīlaṃ sabbadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā parisuddhattā paṭippassaddhipārisuddhīti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ pariyantapārisuddhiādivasena pañcavidhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:343: Dutiyapañcake pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pahānādivasena attho veditabbo. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –
anya-e0101n:344_0: “Pañca sīlāni pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlaṃ, veramaṇī sīlaṃ, cetanā sīlaṃ, saṃvaro
anya-e0101n:344_1: sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīlaṃ. Adinnādānassa, kāmesumicchācārassa, musāvādassa, pisuṇāya
anya-e0101n:344_2: vācāya, pharusāya vācāya, samphappalāpassa, abhijjhāya, byāpādassa, micchādiṭṭhiyā,
anya-e0101n:344_3: nekkhammena kāmacchandassa, abyāpādena byāpādassa, ālokasaññāya thinamiddhassa, avikkhepena
anya-e0101n:344_4: uddhaccassa, dhammavavatthānena vicikicchāya, ñāṇena avijjāya, pāmojjena aratiyā,
anya-e0101n:344_5: paṭhamena jhānena nīvaraṇānaṃ, dutiyena jhānena vitakkavicārānaṃ, tatiyena jhānena
anya-e0101n:344_6: pītiyā, catutthena jhānena sukhadukkhānaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya
anya-e0101n:344_10: anattānupassanāya attasaññāya, nibbidānupassanāya nandiyā, virāgānupassanāya rāgassa,
anya-e0101n:344_12: ghanasaññāya, vayānupassanāya āyūhanassa, vipariṇāmānupassanāya dhuvasaññāya, animittānupassanāya
anya-e0101n:344_13: nimittassa, appaṇihitānupassanāya paṇidhiyā, suññatānupassanāya abhinivesassa, adhipaññādhammavipassanāya
anya-e0101n:344_16: sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhekaṭṭhānaṃ kilesānaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggena oḷārikānaṃ kilesānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:344_17: anāgāmimaggena aṇusahagatānaṃ kilesānaṃ, arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṃ pahānaṃ sīlaṃ,
anya-e0101n:344_18: veramaṇī, cetanā, saṃvaro, avītikkamo sīlaṃ. Evarūpāni sīlāni cittassa avippaṭisārāya
anya-e0101n:344_19: saṃvattanti, pāmojjāya saṃvattanti, pītiyā saṃvattanti, passaddhiyā saṃvattanti,
anya-e0101n:344_20: somanassāya saṃvattanti, āsevanāya saṃvattanti, bhāvanāya saṃvattanti, bahulīkammāya
anya-e0101n:344_21: saṃvattanti, alaṅkārāya saṃvattanti, parikkhārāya saṃvattanti, parivārāya saṃvattanti,
anya-e0101n:344_22: pāripūriyā saṃvattanti, ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya
anya-e0101n:345_0: Ettha ca pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:345_1: anuppādamattato. Yasmā pana taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ tassa tassa kusaladhammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:345_2: upadhāraṇaṃ hoti, vikampābhāvakaraṇena ca samādānaṃ. Tasmā pubbe vutteneva upadhāraṇasamādhānasaṅkhātena
anya-e0101n:345_3: sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti vuttaṃ. Itare cattāro dhammā tato tato veramaṇivasena, tassa
anya-e0101n:345_4: tassa saṃvaravasena, tadubhayasampayuttacetanāvasena, taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassa avītikkamanavasena
anya-e0101n:345_5: ca cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Sīlaṭṭho pana tesaṃ pubbe pakāsitoyevāti.
anya-e0101n:346: Ettāvatā ca kiṃ sīlaṃ? Kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni? Kimānisaṃsaṃ sīlaṃ? Katividhaṃ cetaṃ sīlanti? Imesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:348_0: 21. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “ko cassa saṃkileso, kiṃ vodāna”nti. Tatra vadāma – khaṇḍādibhāvo
anya-e0101n:348_1: sīlassa saṃkileso, akhaṇḍādibhāvo vodānaṃ. So pana khaṇḍādibhāvo lābhayasādihetukena
anya-e0101n:349_0: Tathā hi yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:349_1: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:349_2: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni,
anya-e0101n:349_3: tassa piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā
anya-e0101n:349_4: gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa antarantarā visabhāgavaṇṇabinduvicitrā
anya-e0101n:349_5: gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ tāva lābhādihetukena bhedena khaṇḍādibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0101n:351_0: “Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva
anya-e0101n:351_1: kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ
anya-e0101n:351_2: parimaddanaṃ nhāpanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati, so tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca
anya-e0101n:351_3: vittiṃ āpajjati, idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi
anya-e0101n:351_4: kammāsampi. Ayaṃ vuccati, brāhmaṇa, aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena
anya-e0101n:351_5: saṃyogena, na parimuccati jātiyā. Jarāya maraṇena…pe… na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
anya-e0101n:352_0: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena
anya-e0101n:352_1: saddhiṃ dvayaṃ dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Napi mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ…pe… sādiyati.
anya-e0101n:352_2: Apica kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati, so tadassādeti…pe…
anya-e0101n:353_0: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃ
anya-e0101n:353_1: dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Napi mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ…pe… sādiyati. Napi mātugāmena
anya-e0101n:353_2: saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati. Apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ
anya-e0101n:353_3: upanijjhāyati pekkhati, so tadassādeti…pe… na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
