anya-e0101n:354_0: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena… napi mātugāmassa…
anya-e0101n:354_1: napi mātugāmena… napi mātugāmassa…pe… pekkhati. Apica kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti
anya-e0101n:354_2: tirokuṭṭā vā tiropākārā vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā,
anya-e0101n:355_0: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena… napi mātugāmassa…
anya-e0101n:355_1: napi mātugāmena… napi mātugāmassa…pe… rodantiyā vā. Apica kho yānissa tāni pubbe
anya-e0101n:355_2: mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni, tāni anussarati, so tadassādeti…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
anya-e0101n:356_0: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena…pe… napi
anya-e0101n:356_1: mātugāmassa…pe… napi yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
anya-e0101n:356_2: tāni anussarati. Apica kho passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
anya-e0101n:356_3: samappitaṃ samaṅgībhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ, so tadassādeti…pe… dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
anya-e0101n:357_0: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena…pe… napi
anya-e0101n:357_1: passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā…pe… paricārayamānaṃ. Apica kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:357_2: paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena
anya-e0101n:357_3: vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti. So tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ
anya-e0101n:357_4: āpajjati. Idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampī”ti.
anya-e0101n:358: Evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca khaṇḍādibhāvo saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:359_0: Akhaṇḍādibhāvo pana sabbaso sikkhāpadānaṃ abhedena, bhinnānañca sappaṭikammānaṃ paṭikammakaraṇena,
anya-e0101n:359_1: sattavidhamethunasaṃyogābhāvena ca, aparāya ca “kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso issā
anya-e0101n:359_2: macchariyaṃ māyā sātheyyaṃ thambho sārambho māno atimāno mado pamādo”tiādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ
anya-e0101n:360_0: Yāni hi sīlāni lābhādīnampi atthāya abhinnāni, pamādadosena vā bhinnānipi paṭikammakatāni,
anya-e0101n:360_1: methunasaṃyogehi vā kodhupanāhādīhi vā pāpadhammehi anupahatāni, tāni sabbaso akhaṇḍāni
anya-e0101n:360_2: acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsānīti vuccanti. Tāniyeva bhujissabhāvakaraṇato ca bhujissāni,
anya-e0101n:360_3: viññūhi pasatthattā viññupasatthāni, taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhattā aparāmaṭṭhāni,
anya-e0101n:360_4: upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni ca honti.
anya-e0101n:361_0: Taṃ panetaṃ vodānaṃ dvīhākārehi sampajjati sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā
anya-e0101n:361_1: ca ānisaṃsadassanena. Tattha “pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā”ti
anya-e0101n:362_0: Apica dussīlo puggalo dussīlyahetu amanāpo hoti devamanussānaṃ, ananusāsanīyo sabrahmacārīnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:362_1: dukkhito dussīlyagarahāsu, vippaṭisārī sīlavataṃ pasaṃsāsu, tāya ca pana dussīlyatāya
anya-e0101n:362_2: sāṇasāṭako viya dubbaṇṇo hoti. Ye kho panassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanti, tesaṃ dīgharattaṃ
anya-e0101n:362_3: apāyadukkhāvahanato dukkhasamphasso. Yesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, tesaṃ namahapphalakaraṇato
anya-e0101n:362_4: appaggho. Anekavassagaṇikagūthakūpo viya dubbisodhano. Chavālātamiva ubhato paribāhiro.
anya-e0101n:362_5: Bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantopi abhikkhuyeva gogaṇaṃ anubandhagadrabho viya. Satatubbiggo
anya-e0101n:362_6: sabbaverikapuriso viya. Asaṃvāsāraho matakaḷevaraṃ viya. Sutādiguṇayuttopi sabrahmacārīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:362_7: apūjāraho susānaggi viya brāhmaṇānaṃ. Abhabbo visesādhigame andho viya rūpadassane.
anya-e0101n:362_8: Nirāso saddhamme caṇḍālakumārako viya rajje. Sukhitosmīti maññamānopi dukkhitova
anya-e0101n:363_2: dukkhaṃ dassento sabbākārena paccakkhakammavipāko bhagavā āha –
anya-e0101n:364_0: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ
anya-e0101n:364_1: sajotibhūta’nti? Evaṃ, bhanteti. Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ
anya-e0101n:364_2: yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya
anya-e0101n:364_3: vā upanipajjeyya vā, yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ vā brāhmaṇakaññaṃ vā gahapatikaññaṃ vā mudutalunahatthapādaṃ
anya-e0101n:364_4: āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vāti. Etadeva, bhante, varaṃ yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:364_5: vā…pe… upanipajjeyya vā. Dukkhaṃ hetaṃ, bhante, yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n:364_6: upanipajjeyya vāti. Ārocayāmi vo, bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave, yathā etadeva
anya-e0101n:364_7: tassa varaṃ dussīlassa pāpadhammassa asucisaṅkassarasamācārassa paṭicchannakammantassa
anya-e0101n:364_8: assamaṇassa samaṇapaṭiññassa abrahmacārissa brahmacāripaṭiññassa antopūtikassa avassutassa
anya-e0101n:364_9: kasambujātassa yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ…pe… upanipajjeyya vā. Taṃ kissa hetu?
anya-e0101n:364_10: Tatonidānaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, na
anya-e0101n:364_11: tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:365: Evaṃ aggikkhandhupamāya itthipaṭibaddhapañcakāmaguṇaparibhogapaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā eteneva upāyena –
anya-e0101n:366_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso daḷhāya vāḷarajjuyā
anya-e0101n:366_1: ubho jaṅghā veṭhetvā ghaṃseyya, sā chaviṃ chindeyya, chaviṃ chetvā cammaṃ chindeyya,
anya-e0101n:366_2: cammaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ chindeyya, maṃsaṃ chetvā nhāruṃ chindeyya, nhāruṃ chetvā aṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0101n:366_3: chindeyya, aṭṭhiṃ chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭheyya, yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ
anya-e0101n:366_4: vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā abhivādanaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:367_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tiṇhāya sattiyā
anya-e0101n:367_1: teladhotāya paccorasmiṃ pahareyya, yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ
anya-e0101n:367_2: vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā añjalikammaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:368_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayopaṭṭena
anya-e0101n:368_1: ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena kāyaṃ sampaliveṭheyya, yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ
anya-e0101n:368_2: vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:369_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayosaṅkunā
anya-e0101n:369_1: ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena mukhaṃ vivaritvā tattaṃ lohaguḷaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ
anya-e0101n:369_2: sajotibhūtaṃ mukhe pakkhipeyya, taṃ tassa oṭṭhampi ḍaheyya, mukhampi, jivhampi, kaṇṭhampi,
anya-e0101n:369_3: udarampi ḍaheyya, antampi antaguṇampi ādāya adhobhāgaṃ nikkhameyya, yaṃ vā khattiya…
anya-e0101n:369_4: brāhmaṇa… gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
anya-e0101n:370_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso sīse vā gahetvā
anya-e0101n:370_1: khandhe vā gahetvā tattaṃ ayomañcaṃ vā ayopīṭhaṃ vā ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:370_2: abhinisīdāpeyya vā abhinipajjāpeyya vā, yaṃ vā khattiya… brāhmaṇa… gahapatimahāsālānaṃ
anya-e0101n:371_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso uddhaṃpādaṃ
anya-e0101n:371_1: adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya ayokumbhiyā pakkhipeyya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya,
anya-e0101n:371_2: so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyya, sakimpi adho gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:371_3: sakimpi tiriyaṃ gaccheyya, yaṃ vā khattiya… brāhmaṇa… gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ
anya-e0101n:385: Dussīlassa vihāre, saddhādeyyamhi kā nivāsa rati;
anya-e0101n:388: Antopūtīti ca yaṃ, nindanto āha lokagaru.
anya-e0101n:391: Gūthaṃ viya kuṇapaṃ viya, maṇḍanakāmā vivajjayantīdha;
anya-e0101n:392: Yaṃ nāma sīlavanto, santo kiṃ jīvitaṃ tassa.
anya-e0101n:395: Karuṇāya vatthubhūto, kāruṇikajanassa nāma ko añño;
anya-e0101n:396: Dussīlasamo dussī, latāya iti bahuvidhā dosāti.
anya-e0101n:397: Evamādinā paccavekkhaṇena sīlavipattiyaṃ ādīnavadassanaṃ vuttappakāraviparītato sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsadassanañca veditabbaṃ. Apica –
anya-e0101n:399: Pabbajjā saphalā tassa, yassa sīlaṃ sunimmalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:405: Karoti api devānaṃ, sīlagandhe kathāva kā.
anya-e0101n:412: Yā manussesu sampatti, yā ca devesu sampadā;
anya-e0101n:413: Na sā sampannasīlassa, icchato hoti dullabhā.
anya-e0101n:418_0: Evañhi vibhāvayato sīlavipattito ubbijjitvā sīlasampattininnaṃ mānasaṃ hoti. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:418_1: yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ sīlavipattiyā ādīnavaṃ imañca sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsaṃ disvā sabbādarena
anya-e0101n:419: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge sīlaṃ tāva paridīpitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:423_0: 22. Idāni yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:423_1: te guṇe sampādetuṃ yasmā samādinnasīlena yoginā dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Evañhissa
anya-e0101n:423_3: sīlañceva suparisuddhaṃ bhavissati, vatāni ca sampajjissanti. Iti anavajjasīlabbataguṇaparisuddhasabbasamācāro
anya-e0101n:423_4: porāṇe ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhāya catutthassa bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātassa ariyavaṃsassa
anya-e0101n:424_0: Bhagavatā hi pariccattalokāmisānaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃyeva
anya-e0101n:424_1: ārādhetukāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ terasadhutaṅgāni anuññātāni. Seyyathidaṃ – paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0101n:429_0: 23. Tattha atthatoti tāva rathikasusānasaṅkārakūṭādīnaṃ yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:429_1: upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu tesu paṃsukūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ, atha vā paṃsu
anya-e0101n:429_2: viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulatīti paṃsukūlaṃ, kucchitabhāvaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:429_3: laddhanibbacanassa paṃsukūlassa dhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko.
anya-e0101n:429_4: Paṃsukūlikassa aṅgaṃ paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ. Aṅganti kāraṇaṃ vuccati. Tasmā yena samādānena
anya-e0101n:429_5: so paṃsukūliko hoti, tassetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:430: Eteneva nayena saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhātaṃ ticīvaraṃ sīlamassāti tecīvariko. Tecīvarikassa aṅgaṃ tecīvarikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:431_0: Bhikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ pana āmisapiṇḍānaṃ pātoti piṇḍapāto, parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ
anya-e0101n:431_1: patte nipatananti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto
anya-e0101n:431_2: gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko. Piṇḍāya vā patituṃ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī, patitunti carituṃ,
anya-e0101n:431_3: piṇḍapātī eva piṇḍapātiko. Piṇḍapātikassa aṅgaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:432_0: Dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ, apetaṃ dānatoti apadānaṃ, anavakhaṇḍananti attho. Saha
anya-e0101n:432_1: apadānena sapadānaṃ, avakhaṇḍanarahitaṃ anugharanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sapadānaṃ carituṃ
anya-e0101n:432_2: idamassa sīlanti sapadānacārī, sapadānacārī eva sapadānacāriko. Tassa aṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:433: Ekāsane bhojanaṃ ekāsanaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti ekāsaniko. Tassa aṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:434_0: Dutiyabhājanassa paṭikkhittattā kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte piṇḍo pattapiṇḍo. Idāni
anya-e0101n:434_1: pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ katvā pattapiṇḍo sīlamassāti pattapiṇḍiko. Tassa
anya-e0101n:435_0: Khalūti paṭisedhanatthe nipāto. Pavāritena satā pacchā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
anya-e0101n:435_1: nāma, tassa pacchābhattassa bhojanaṃ pacchābhattabhojanaṃ, tasmiṃ pacchābhattabhojane
anya-e0101n:435_2: pacchābhattasaññaṃ katvā pacchābhattaṃ sīlamassāti pacchābhattiko. Na pacchābhattiko
anya-e0101n:435_4: pana vuttaṃ khalūti eko sakuṇo. So mukhena phalaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ patite puna aññaṃ
anya-e0101n:435_5: na khādati. Tādiso ayanti khalupacchābhattiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:436: Araññe nivāso sīlamassāti āraññiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ āraññikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:437: Rukkhamūle nivāso rukkhamūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti rukkhamūliko. Rukkhamūlikassa aṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ. Abbhokāsikasosānikaṅgesupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0101n:438_0: Yadeva santhataṃ yathāsanthataṃ, idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhasenāsanassetaṃ
anya-e0101n:438_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tasmiṃ yathāsanthate viharituṃ sīlamassāti yathāsanthatiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ
anya-e0101n:439: Sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharituṃ sīlamassāti nesajjiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ nesajjikaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0101n:440_0: Sabbāneva panetāni tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
anya-e0101n:440_1: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesanti dhutaṅgāni. Atha vā
anya-e0101n:440_2: dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgāni. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:441_0: Sabbāneva panetāni samādānacetanālakkhaṇāni. Vuttampi cetaṃ “yo samādiyati, so puggalo.
anya-e0101n:441_1: Yena samādiyati, cittacetasikā ete dhammā. Yā samādānacetanā, taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0101n:441_2: paṭikkhipati, taṃ vatthū”ti. Sabbāneva ca loluppaviddhaṃsanarasāni, nilloluppabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0101n:442_0: Samādānavidhānatotiādīsu pana pañcasu sabbāneva dhutaṅgāni dharamāne bhagavati bhagavatova
anya-e0101n:442_1: santike samādātabbāni. Parinibbute mahāsāvakassa santike. Tasmiṃ asati khīṇāsavassa,
anya-e0101n:442_2: anāgāmissa, sakadāgāmissa, sotāpannassa, tipiṭakassa, dvipiṭakassa, ekapiṭakassa,
anya-e0101n:442_3: ekasaṅgītikassa, aṭṭhakathācariyassa. Tasmiṃ asati dhutaṅgadharassa, tasmimpi asati
anya-e0101n:442_4: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sammāsambuddhassa santike vadantena
anya-e0101n:442_5: viya samādātabbāni, apica sayampi samādātuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve
anya-e0101n:442_6: bhātikattherānaṃ jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthu kathetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva sādhāraṇakathā.
anya-e0101n:444_1: tāva “gahapatidānacīvaraṃ paṭikkhipāmi, paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesu dvīsu
anya-e0101n:444_2: vacanesu aññatarena samādinnaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāvettha samādānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:445_0: Evaṃ samādinnadhutaṅgena pana tena sosānikaṃ, pāpaṇikaṃ, rathiyacoḷaṃ, saṅkāracoḷaṃ,
anya-e0101n:445_1: sotthiyaṃ, nhānacoḷaṃ, titthacoḷaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ, aggiḍaḍḍhaṃ, gokhāyitaṃ, upacikākhāyitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:445_2: undūrakhāyitaṃ, antacchinnaṃ, dasācchinnaṃ, dhajāhaṭaṃ, thūpacīvaraṃ, samaṇacīvaraṃ,
anya-e0101n:445_3: ābhisekikaṃ, iddhimayaṃ, panthikaṃ, vātāhaṭaṃ, devadattiyaṃ, sāmuddiyantietesu aññataraṃ
anya-e0101n:445_4: cīvaraṃ gahetvā phāletvā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya thiraṭṭhānāni dhovitvā cīvaraṃ katvā
anya-e0101n:446_0: Tattha sosānikanti susāne patitakaṃ. Pāpaṇikanti āpaṇadvāre patitakaṃ. Rathiyacoḷanti
anya-e0101n:446_1: puññatthikehi vātapānantarena rathikāya chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. Saṅkāracoḷanti saṅkāraṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:446_2: chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. Sotthiyanti gabbhamalaṃ puñchitvā chaḍḍitavatthaṃ. Tissāmaccamātā
anya-e0101n:446_3: kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbhamalaṃ puñchāpetvā paṃsukūlikā gaṇhissantīti tālaveḷimagge
anya-e0101n:446_4: chaḍḍāpesi. Bhikkhū jiṇṇakaṭṭhānatthameva gaṇhanti. Nhānacoḷanti yaṃ bhūtavejjehi
anya-e0101n:447_0: Titthacoḷanti nhānatitthe chaḍḍitapilotikā. Gatapaccāgatanti yaṃ manussā susānaṃ
anya-e0101n:447_1: gantvā paccāgatā nhatvā chaḍḍenti. Aggiḍaḍḍhanti agginā ḍaḍḍhappadesaṃ. Tañhi manussā
anya-e0101n:447_2: chaḍḍenti. Gokhāyitādīni pākaṭāneva. Tādisānipi hi manussā chaḍḍenti. Dhajāhaṭanti
anya-e0101n:447_3: nāvaṃ ārohantā dhajaṃ bandhitvā ārūhanti. Taṃ tesaṃ dassanātikkame gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:447_4: Yampi yuddhabhūmiyaṃ dhajaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ dvinnampi senānaṃ gatakāle gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:448_0: Thūpacīvaranti vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā balikammaṃ kataṃ. Samaṇacīvaranti bhikkhusantakaṃ.
anya-e0101n:448_1: Ābhisekikanti rañño abhisekaṭṭhāne chaḍḍitacīvaraṃ. Iddhimayanti ehibhikkhucīvaraṃ.
anya-e0101n:448_2: Panthikanti antarāmagge patitakaṃ. Yaṃ pana sāmikānaṃ satisammosena patitaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0101n:448_3: thokaṃ rakkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Vātāhaṭanti vātena paharitvā dūre pātitaṃ, taṃ pana
anya-e0101n:448_4: sāmike apassantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Devadattiyanti anuruddhattherassa viya devatāhi
anya-e0101n:449_0: Yaṃ pana saṅghassa demāti dinnaṃ, coḷakabhikkhāya vā caramānehi laddhaṃ, na taṃ paṃsukūlaṃ.
anya-e0101n:449_1: Bhikkhudattiyepi yaṃ vassaggena gāhetvā vā dīyati, senāsanacīvaraṃ vā hoti, na taṃ
anya-e0101n:449_2: paṃsukūlaṃ. No gāhāpetvā dinnameva paṃsukūlaṃ. Tatrapi yaṃ dāyakehi bhikkhussa pādamūle
anya-e0101n:449_3: nikkhittaṃ, tena pana bhikkhunā paṃsukūlikassa hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ, taṃ ekatosuddhikaṃ
anya-e0101n:449_4: nāma. Yaṃ bhikkhuno hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ, tena pana pādamūle ṭhapitaṃ, tampi ekatosuddhikaṃ.
anya-e0101n:449_5: Yaṃ bhikkhunopi pādamūle ṭhapitaṃ, tenāpi tatheva dinnaṃ, taṃ ubhatosuddhikaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0101n:449_6: hatthe ṭhapetvā laddhaṃ, hattheyeva ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ anukkaṭṭhacīvaraṃ nāma. Iti imaṃ
anya-e0101n:449_7: paṃsukūlabhedaṃ ñatvā paṃsukūlikena cīvaraṃ paribhuñjitabbanti idamettha vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:450_0: Ayaṃ pana pabhedo, tayo paṃsukūlikā ukkaṭṭho majjhimo mudūti. Tattha sosānikaṃyeva
anya-e0101n:450_1: gaṇhanto ukkaṭṭho hoti. Pabbajitā gaṇhissantīti ṭhapitakaṃ gaṇhanto majjhimo. Pādamūle
anya-e0101n:451: Tesu yassa kassaci attano ruciyā gihidinnakaṃ sāditakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:452_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, “paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ nissāya pabbajjā”ti vacanato nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvo,
anya-e0101n:452_1: paṭhame ariyavaṃse patiṭṭhānaṃ, ārakkhadukkhābhāvo, aparāyattavuttitā, corabhayena
anya-e0101n:452_2: abhayatā, paribhogataṇhāya abhāvo, samaṇasāruppaparikkhāratā, “appāni ceva sulabhāni
anya-e0101n:452_3: ca tāni ca anavajjānī”ti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitapaccayatā, pāsādikatā, appicchatādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:452_4: phalanipphatti, sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhanaṃ, pacchimāya janatāya diṭṭhānugatiāpādananti.
anya-e0101n:456: Yaṃ lokagarunā ko taṃ, paṃsukūlaṃ na dhāraye.
anya-e0101n:457: Tasmā hi attano bhikkhu, paṭiññaṃ samanussaraṃ;
anya-e0101n:461: 25. Tadanantaraṃ pana tecīvarikaṅgaṃ “catutthakacīvaraṃ paṭikkhipāmi, tecīvarikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:462_0: Tena pana tecīvarikena cīvaradussaṃ labhitvā yāva aphāsukabhāvena kātuṃ vā na sakkoti,
anya-e0101n:462_1: vicārakaṃ vā na labhati, sūciādīsu vāssa kiñci na sampajjati, tāva nikkhipitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:462_2: Nikkhittapaccayā doso natthi. Rajitakālato pana paṭṭhāya nikkhipituṃ na vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n:463_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhena rajanakāle paṭhamaṃ antaravāsakaṃ
anya-e0101n:463_1: vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā rajitvā taṃ nivāsetvā itaraṃ rajitabbaṃ. Taṃ pārupitvā saṅghāṭi
anya-e0101n:463_2: rajitabbā. Saṅghāṭiṃ pana nivāsetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Idamassa gāmantasenāsane vattaṃ.
anya-e0101n:463_3: Āraññake pana dve ekato dhovitvā rajituṃ vaṭṭati. Yathā pana kañci disvā sakkoti
anya-e0101n:463_4: kāsāvaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā uparikātuṃ, evaṃ āsanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ. Majjhimassa rajanasālāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:463_5: rajanakāsāvaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā rajanakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:463_6: Mudukassa sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ cīvarāni nivāsetvā vā pārupitvā vā rajanakammaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e0101n:463_7: vaṭṭati. Tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇampi tassa vaṭṭati. Pariharituṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:463_8: Sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ cīvarampi antarantarā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Dhutaṅgatecīvarikassa
anya-e0101n:463_9: pana catutthaṃ vattamānaṃ aṃsakāsāvameva vaṭṭati. Tañca kho vitthārato vidatthi,
anya-e0101n:464: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi catutthakacīvaraṃ sāditakkhaṇeyeva dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:465_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, tecīvariko bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena. Tenassa
anya-e0101n:465_1: pakkhino viya samādāyeva gamanaṃ, appasamārambhatā, vatthasannidhiparivajjanaṃ, sallahukavuttitā,
anya-e0101n:472: 26. Piṇḍapātikaṅgampi “atirekalābhaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:473_0: Tena pana piṇḍapātikena “saṅghabhattaṃ, uddesabhattaṃ, nimantanabhattaṃ, salākabhattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:473_1: pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ, āgantukabhattaṃ, gamikabhattaṃ, gilānabhattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:473_2: gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ, vihārabhattaṃ, dhurabhattaṃ, vārakabhatta”nti etāni cuddasa
anya-e0101n:473_3: bhattāni na sāditabbāni. Sace pana “saṅghabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā nayena avatvā
anya-e0101n:473_4: “amhākaṃ gehe saṅgho bhikkhaṃ gaṇhātu, tumhepi bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā dinnāni
anya-e0101n:473_5: honti, tāni sādituṃ vaṭṭanti. Saṅghato nirāmisasalākāpi vihāre pakkabhattampi vaṭṭatiyevāti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:474_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho puratopi pacchatopi āhaṭabhikkhaṃ
anya-e0101n:474_1: gaṇhati, pattadvāre ṭhatvā pattaṃ gaṇhantānampi deti, paṭikkamanaṃ āharitvā dinnabhikkhampi
anya-e0101n:474_2: gaṇhati, taṃ divasaṃ pana nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhati. Majjhimo taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvāpi
anya-e0101n:474_3: gaṇhati, svātanāya pana nādhivāseti. Mudukosvātanāyapi punadivasāyapi bhikkhaṃ adhivāseti.
anya-e0101n:474_4: Te ubhopi serivihārasukhaṃ na labhanti, ukkaṭṭhova labhati. Ekasmiṃ kira gāme ariyavaṃso
anya-e0101n:474_5: hoti, ukkaṭṭho itare āha – “āyāmāvuso, dhammasavanāyā”ti. Tesu eko ekenamhi, bhante,
anya-e0101n:474_6: manussena nisīdāpitoti āha. Aparo mayā, bhante, svātanāya ekassa bhikkhā adhivāsitāti.
anya-e0101n:474_7: Evaṃ te ubho parihīnā. Itaro pātova piṇḍāya caritvā gantvā dhammarasaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
anya-e0101n:475: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi saṅghabhattādiatirekalābhaṃ sāditakkhaṇeva dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:476_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjā”ti vacanato nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvo,
anya-e0101n:476_1: dutiye ariyavaṃse patiṭṭhānaṃ, aparāyattavuttitā, “appāni ceva sulabhāni ca tāni
anya-e0101n:476_2: ca anavajjānī”ti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitapaccayatā, kosajjanimmaddanatā, parisuddhājīvatā,
anya-e0101n:488: 27. Sapadānacārikaṅgampi “loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipāmi, sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:489_0: Tena pana sapadānacārikena gāmadvāre ṭhatvā parissayābhāvo sallakkhetabbo. Yassā
anya-e0101n:489_1: racchāya vā gāme vā parissayo hoti, taṃ pahāya aññattha carituṃ vaṭṭati. Yasmiṃ gharadvāre
anya-e0101n:489_2: vā racchāya vā gāme vā kiñci na labhati, agāmasaññaṃ katvā gantabbaṃ. Yattha kiñci
anya-e0101n:489_3: labhati, taṃ pahāya gantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Iminā ca bhikkhunā kālataraṃ pavisitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:489_4: evañhi aphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya aññattha gantuṃ sakkhissati. Sace panassa vihāre dānaṃ
anya-e0101n:489_5: dentā antarāmagge vā āgacchantā manussā pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ denti vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:489_6: Iminā ca maggaṃ gacchantenāpi bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ sampattagāmaṃ anatikkamitvā caritabbameva.
anya-e0101n:489_7: Tattha alabhitvā vā thokaṃ labhitvā vā gāmapaṭipāṭiyā caritabbanti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:490_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho purato āhaṭabhikkhampi pacchato
anya-e0101n:490_1: āhaṭabhikkhampi paṭikkamanaṃ āharitvā diyyamānampi na gaṇhati, pattadvāre pana pattaṃ
anya-e0101n:490_2: vissajjeti. Imasmiñhi dhutaṅge mahākassapattherena sadiso nāma natthi. Tassapi pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānameva
anya-e0101n:490_3: paññāyati. Majjhimo purato vā pacchato vā āhaṭampi paṭikkamanaṃ āhaṭampi gaṇhati,
anya-e0101n:490_4: pattadvārepi pattaṃ vissajjeti, na pana bhikkhaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdati. Evaṃ so ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikassa
anya-e0101n:490_5: anulometi. Muduko taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvā āgameti.
anya-e0101n:491: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi loluppacāre uppannamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:492_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, kulesu niccanavakatā, candūpamatā, kulamaccherappahānaṃ, samānukampitā,
anya-e0101n:492_1: kulūpakādīnavābhāvo, avhānānabhinandanā, abhihārena anatthikatā, appicchatādīnaṃ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n:503: 28. Ekāsanikaṅgampi “nānāsanabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, ekāsanikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:504_0: Tena pana ekāsanikena āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdantena therāsane anisīditvā “idaṃ mayhaṃ
anya-e0101n:504_1: pāpuṇissatī”ti patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ sallakkhetvā nisīditabbaṃ. Sacassa vippakate bhojane
anya-e0101n:504_2: ācariyo vā upajjhāyo vā āgacchati, uṭṭhāya vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero
anya-e0101n:504_3: panāha “āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā, ayañca vippakatabhojano, tasmā vattaṃ karotu,
anya-e0101n:504_4: bhojanaṃ pana mā bhuñjatū”ti. Idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:505_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho appaṃ vā hotu bahu vā, yamhi
anya-e0101n:505_1: bhojane hatthaṃ otāreti, tato aññaṃ gaṇhituṃ na labhati. Sacepi manussā “therena
anya-e0101n:505_2: na kiñci bhutta”nti sappiādīni āharanti, bhesajjatthameva vaṭṭanti, na āhāratthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:505_3: Majjhimo yāva patte bhattaṃ na khīyati, tāva aññaṃ gaṇhituṃ labhati. Ayañhi bhojanapariyantiko
anya-e0101n:505_4: nāma hoti. Muduko yāva āsanā na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjituṃ labhati. So hi udakapariyantiko
anya-e0101n:505_5: vā hoti yāva pattadhovanaṃ na gaṇhāti tāva bhuñjanato, āsanapariyantiko vā yāva na
anya-e0101n:506: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi nānāsanabhojanaṃ bhuttakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:507: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, appābādhatā, appātaṅkatā, lahuṭṭhānaṃ, balaṃ, phāsuvihāro, anatirittapaccayā anāpatti, rasataṇhāvinodanaṃ appicchatādīnaṃ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n:518: 29. Pattapiṇḍikaṅgampi “dutiyakabhājanaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:519_0: Tena pana pattapiṇḍikena yāgupānakāle bhājane ṭhapetvā byañjane laddhe byañjanaṃ
anya-e0101n:519_1: vā paṭhamaṃ khāditabbaṃ, yāgu vā pātabbā. Sace pana yāguyaṃ pakkhipati, pūtimacchakādimhi
anya-e0101n:519_2: byañjane pakkhitte yāgu paṭikūlā hoti, appaṭikūlameva ca katvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:519_3: Tasmā tathārūpaṃ byañjanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana madhusakkarādikaṃ appaṭikūlaṃ
anya-e0101n:519_4: hoti, taṃ pakkhipitabbaṃ. Gaṇhantena ca pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbaṃ. Āmakasākaṃ hatthena
anya-e0101n:519_5: gahetvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati. Tathā pana akatvā patteyeva pakkhipitabbaṃ. Dutiyakabhājanassa
anya-e0101n:519_6: pana paṭikkhittattā aññaṃ rukkhapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭatīti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:520_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa aññatra ucchukhādanakālā kacavarampi
anya-e0101n:520_1: chaḍḍetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Odanapiṇḍamacchamaṃsapūvepi bhinditvā khādituṃ na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:520_2: Majjhimassa ekena hatthena bhinditvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati, hatthayogī nāmesa. Muduko
anya-e0101n:520_3: pana pattayogī nāma hoti, tassa yaṃ sakkā hoti patte pakkhipituṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ hatthena
anya-e0101n:520_4: vā dantehi vā bhinditvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:521: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi dutiyakabhājanaṃ sāditakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:522: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, nānārasataṇhāvinodanaṃ. Atricchatāya pahānaṃ, āhāre payojanamattadassitā, thālakādipariharaṇakhedābhāvo, avikkhittabhojitā, appicchatādīnaṃ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n:529: 30. Khalupacchābhattikaṅgampi “atirittabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:530: Tena pana khalupacchābhattikena pavāretvā puna bhojanaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ. Idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:531_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho yasmā paṭhamapiṇḍe pavāraṇā nāma
anya-e0101n:531_1: natthi, tasmiṃ pana ajjhohariyamāne aññaṃ paṭikkhipato hoti, tasmā evaṃ pavārito
anya-e0101n:531_2: paṭhamapiṇḍaṃ ajjhoharitvā dutiyapiṇḍaṃ na bhuñjati. Majjhimo yasmiṃ bhojane pavārito,
anya-e0101n:531_3: tadeva bhuñjati. Muduko pana yāva āsanā na vuṭṭhāti tāva bhuñjati.
anya-e0101n:532: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi pavāritānaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā bhuttakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:533: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, anatirittabhojanāpattiyā dūrabhāvo, odarikattābhāvo, nirāmisasannidhitā, puna pariyesanāya abhāvo, appicchatādīnaṃ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n:534: Pariyesanāya khedaṃ, na yāti na karoti sannidhiṃ dhīro;
anya-e0101n:540: 31. Āraññikaṅgampi “gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, āraññikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:541: Tena pana āraññikena gāmantasenāsanaṃ pahāya araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Tattha saddhiṃ upacārena gāmoyeva gāmantasenāsanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:542: Gāmo nāma yo koci ekakuṭiko vā anekakuṭiko vā parikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā samanusso vā amanusso vā antamaso atirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho yo koci satthopi.
anya-e0101n:543_0: Gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa sace anurādhapurasseva dve indakhīlā honti,
anya-e0101n:543_1: abbhantarime indakhīle ṭhitassa thāmamajjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:543_2: yathā taruṇamanussā attano balaṃ dassentā bāhaṃ pasāretvā leḍḍuṃ khipanti, evaṃ khittassa
anya-e0101n:543_3: leḍḍussa patanaṭṭhānabbhantaranti vinayadharā. Suttantikā pana kākanivāraṇaniyamena
anya-e0101n:543_4: khittassāti vadanti. Aparikkhittagāme yaṃ sabbapaccantimassa gharassa dvāre ṭhito
anya-e0101n:543_5: mātugāmo bhājanena udakaṃ chaḍḍeti, tassa patanaṭṭhānaṃ gharūpacāro. Tato vuttanayena
anya-e0101n:544_0: Araññaṃ pana vinayapariyāye tāva “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca sabbametaṃ arañña”nti
anya-e0101n:544_1: vuttaṃ. Abhidhammapariyāye “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:544_2: Imasmiṃ pana suttantikapariyāye “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti
anya-e0101n:544_3: idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ. Taṃ āropitena ācariyadhanunā parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato aparikkhittassa
anya-e0101n:544_4: paṭhamaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya yāva vihāraparikkhepā minitvā vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:545_0: Sace pana vihāro aparikkhitto hoti, yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ senāsanaṃ vā bhattasālā vā
anya-e0101n:545_1: dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānaṃ vā bodhi vā cetiyaṃ vā dūre cepi senāsanato hoti, taṃ paricchedaṃ
anya-e0101n:545_2: katvā minitabbanti vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vihārassapi
anya-e0101n:545_3: gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabbanti vuttaṃ. Idamettha pamāṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:546_0: Sacepi āsanne gāmo hoti, vihāre ṭhitehi mānusakānaṃ saddo suyyati, pabbatanadīādīhi
anya-e0101n:546_1: pana antaritattā na sakkā ujuṃ gantuṃ. Yo tassa pakatimaggo hoti, sacepi nāvāya sañcaritabbo,
anya-e0101n:546_2: tena maggena pañcadhanusatikaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Yo pana āsannagāmassa aṅgasampādanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:546_3: tato tato maggaṃ pidahati, ayaṃ dhutaṅgacoro hoti.
anya-e0101n:547_0: Sace pana āraññikassa bhikkhuno upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā gilāno hoti, tena araññe
anya-e0101n:547_1: sappāyaṃ alabhantena gāmantasenāsanaṃ netvā upaṭṭhātabbo. Kālasseva pana nikkhamitvā
anya-e0101n:547_2: aṅgayuttaṭṭhāne aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Sace aruṇuṭṭhānavelāyaṃ tesaṃ ābādho vaḍḍhati,
anya-e0101n:547_3: tesaṃyeva kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. Na dhutaṅgasuddhikena bhavitabbanti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:548: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhena sabbakālaṃ araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Majjhimo cattāro vassike māse gāmante vasituṃ labhati. Muduko hemantikepi.
anya-e0101n:549_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi yathā paricchinne kāle araññato āgantvā gāmantasenāsane dhammassavanaṃ
anya-e0101n:549_1: suṇantānaṃ aruṇe uṭṭhitepi dhutaṅgaṃ na bhijjati. Sutvā gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge
anya-e0101n:549_2: uṭṭhitepi na bhijjati. Sace pana uṭṭhitepi dhammakathike muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā gamissāmāti
anya-e0101n:549_3: niddāyantānaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahati, attano vā ruciyā gāmantasenāsane aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapenti,
anya-e0101n:550_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, āraññiko bhikkhu araññasaññaṃ manasikaronto bhabbo aladdhaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:550_1: samādhiṃ paṭiladdhuṃ laddhaṃ vā rakkhituṃ, satthāpissa attamano hoti. Yathāha – “tenāhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:550_2: nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārenā”ti. Pantasenāsanavāsino cassa
anya-e0101n:550_3: asappāyarūpādayo cittaṃ na vikkhipanti, vigatasantāso hoti, jīvitanikantiṃ jahati,
anya-e0101n:550_4: pavivekasukharasaṃ assādeti, paṃsukūlikādibhāvopi cassa patirūpo hotīti.
anya-e0101n:553: Eko araññe nivasaṃ, yaṃ sukhaṃ labhate yati;
anya-e0101n:554: Rasaṃ tassa na vindanti, api devā saindakā.
anya-e0101n:561: 32. Rukkhamūlikaṅgampi “channaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:562_0: Tena pana rukkhamūlikena sīmantarikarukkhaṃ, cetiyarukkhaṃ, niyyāsarukkhaṃ, phalarukkhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:562_1: vaggulirukkhaṃ, susirarukkhaṃ, vihāramajjhe ṭhitarukkhanti ime rukkhe vivajjetvā
anya-e0101n:563_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho yathārucitaṃ rukkhaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0101n:563_1: paṭijaggāpetuṃ na labhati. Pādena paṇṇasaṭaṃ apanetvā vasitabbaṃ. Majjhimo taṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:563_2: sampattehiyeva paṭijaggāpetuṃ labhati. Mudukena ārāmikasamaṇuddese pakkositvā sodhāpetvā
anya-e0101n:563_3: samaṃ kārāpetvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ kārāpetvā dvāraṃ yojāpetvā vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:563_4: Mahadivase pana rukkhamūlikena tattha anisīditvā aññattha paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:564: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi channe vāsaṃ kappitakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Jānitvā channe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpitamatteti aṅguttarabhāṇakā. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:565_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāti vacanato nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvo,
anya-e0101n:565_1: appāni ceva sulabhāni ca tāni ca anavajjānīti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitapaccayatā, abhiṇhaṃ
anya-e0101n:576: 33. Abbhokāsikaṅgampi “channañca rukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmi, abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:577_0: Tassa pana abbhokāsikassa dhammassavanāya vā uposathatthāya vā uposathāgāraṃ pavisituṃ
anya-e0101n:577_1: vaṭṭati. Sace paviṭṭhassa devo vassati, deve vassamāne anikkhamitvā vassūparame nikkhamitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:577_2: Bhojanasālaṃ vā aggisālaṃ vā pavisitvā vattaṃ kātuṃ, bhojanasālāya there bhikkhū
anya-e0101n:577_3: bhattena āpucchituṃ, uddisantena vā uddisāpentena vā channaṃ pavisituṃ, bahi dunnikkhittāni
anya-e0101n:577_4: mañcapīṭhādīni anto pavesetuñca vaṭṭati. Sace maggaṃ gacchantena vuḍḍhatarānaṃ parikkhāro
anya-e0101n:577_5: gahito hoti, deve vassante maggamajjhe ṭhitaṃ sālaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace na kiñci
anya-e0101n:577_6: gahitaṃ hoti, sālāya ṭhassāmīti vegena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Pakatigatiyā gantvā paviṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:577_7: pana yāva vassūparamā ṭhatvā gantabbanti idamassa vidhānaṃ. Rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0101n:578_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa rukkhaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā gehaṃ
anya-e0101n:578_1: vā upanissāya vasituṃ na vaṭṭati. Abbhokāseyeva cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasitabbaṃ. Majjhimassa
anya-e0101n:578_2: rukkhapabbatagehāni upanissāya anto appavisitvā vasituṃ vaṭṭati. Mudukassa acchannamariyādaṃ
anya-e0101n:578_3: pabbhārampi sākhāmaṇḍapopi pīṭhapaṭopi khettarakkhakādīhi chaḍḍitā tatraṭṭhakakuṭikāpi vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n:579: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi vāsatthāya channaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Jānitvā tattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpitamatteti aṅguttarabhāṇakā. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:580_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, āvāsapalibodhupacchedo, thinamiddhapanūdanaṃ, “migā viya asaṅgacārino,
anya-e0101n:580_1: aniketā viharanti bhikkhavo”ti pasaṃsāya anurūpatā, nissaṅgatā, cātuddisatā, appicchatādīnaṃ anulomavuttitāti.
anya-e0101n:586: Yasmā tasmā hi sappañño, abbhokāsarato siyāti.
anya-e0101n:589: 34. Sosānikaṅgampi “na susānaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, sosānikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:590_0: Tena pana sosānikena yaṃ manussā gāmaṃ nivesantā “idaṃ susāna”nti vavatthapenti,
anya-e0101n:590_1: na tattha vasitabbaṃ. Na hi matasarīre ajjhāpite taṃ susānaṃ nāma hoti, jhāpitakālato
anya-e0101n:590_2: pana paṭṭhāya sacepi dvādasavassāni chaḍḍitaṃ, taṃ susānameva.
anya-e0101n:591_0: Tasmiṃ pana vasantena caṅkamamaṇḍapādīni kāretvā mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapetvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ
anya-e0101n:591_1: upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammaṃ vācentena na vasitabbaṃ. Garukaṃ hi idaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ, tasmā uppannaparissayavighātatthāya
anya-e0101n:591_2: saṅghattheraṃ vā rājayuttakaṃ vā jānāpetvā appamattena vasitabbaṃ. Caṅkamantena addhakkhikena
anya-e0101n:592_0: Susānaṃ gacchantenāpi mahāpathā ukkamma uppathamaggena gantabbaṃ. Divāyeva ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:592_1: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Evañhissa taṃ rattiṃ bhayānakaṃ na bhavissati, amanussā rattiṃ
anya-e0101n:592_2: viravitvā viravitvā āhiṇḍantāpi na kenaci paharitabbā. Ekadivasampi susānaṃ agantuṃ
anya-e0101n:592_3: na vaṭṭati. Majjhimayāmaṃ susāne khepetvā pacchimayāme paṭikkamituṃ vaṭṭatīti aṅguttarabhāṇakā.
anya-e0101n:592_5: sevitabbaṃ. Kulagehaṃ na pavisitabbanti idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:593_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhena yattha dhuvaḍāhadhuvakuṇapadhuvarodanāni
anya-e0101n:593_1: atthi, tattheva vasitabbaṃ. Majjhimassa tīsu ekasmimpi sati vaṭṭati. Mudukassa vuttanayena
anya-e0101n:594: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi na susānamhi vāsaṃ kappanena dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Susānaṃ agatadivaseti aṅguttarabhāṇakā. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:595_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso maraṇassatipaṭilābho, appamādavihāritā, asubhanimittādhigamo, kāmarāgavinodanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:606: 35. Yathāsanthatikaṅgampi “senāsanaloluppaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, yathāsanthatikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:607: Tena pana yathāsanthatikena yadassa senāsanaṃ “idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti gāhitaṃ hoti, teneva tuṭṭhabbaṃ, na añño uṭṭhāpetabbo. Idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:608_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭho attano pattasenāsanaṃ dūreti
anya-e0101n:608_1: vā accāsanneti vā amanussadīghajātikādīhi upaddutanti vā uṇhanti vā sītalanti vā
anya-e0101n:608_2: pucchituṃ na labhati. Majjhimo pucchituṃ labhati. Gantvā pana oloketuṃ na labhati.
anya-e0101n:608_3: Muduko gantvā oloketvā sacassa taṃ na ruccati, aññaṃ gahetuṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:609: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi senāsanaloluppe uppannamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjatīti ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:610_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, “yaṃ laddhaṃ tena tuṭṭhabba”nti vuttovādakaraṇaṃ, sabrahmacārīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:611: Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena santuṭṭho, yathāsanthatiko yati;
anya-e0101n:613: Na so rajjati seṭṭhamhi, hīnaṃ laddhā na kuppati;
anya-e0101n:619: 36. Nesajjikaṅgampi “seyyaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, nesajjikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī”ti imesaṃ aññataravacanena samādinnaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:620: Tena pana nesajjikena rattiyā tīsu yāmesu ekaṃ yāmaṃ uṭṭhāya caṅkamitabbaṃ. Iriyāpathesu hi nipajjitumeva na vaṭṭati. Idamassa vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:621_0: Pabhedato pana ayampi tividho hoti. Tattha ukkaṭṭhassa neva apassenaṃ, na dussapallatthikā,
anya-e0101n:621_1: na āyogapaṭṭo vaṭṭati. Majjhimassa imesu tīsu yaṃkiñci vaṭṭati. Mudukassa apassenampi
anya-e0101n:621_2: dussapallatthikāpi āyogapaṭṭopi bibbohanampi pañcaṅgopi sattaṅgopi vaṭṭati. Pañcaṅgo
anya-e0101n:621_3: pana piṭṭhiapassayena saddhiṃ kato. Sattaṅgo nāma piṭṭhiapassayena ca ubhatopassesu
anya-e0101n:621_4: apassayehi ca saddhiṃ kato. Taṃ kira miḷābhayattherassa akaṃsu. Thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyi.
anya-e0101n:622: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi seyyaṃ kappitamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati. Ayamettha bhedo.
anya-e0101n:623_0: Ayaṃ panānisaṃso, “seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharatī”ti vuttassa
anya-e0101n:636: Tattha kusalattikatoti sabbāneva hi dhutaṅgāni sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ vasena siyā kusalāni, siyā abyākatāni, natthi dhutaṅgaṃ akusalanti.
anya-e0101n:637_0: Yo pana vadeyya “pāpiccho icchāpakato āraññiko hotīti ādivacanato akusalampi dhutaṅga”nti.
anya-e0101n:637_1: So vattabbo – na mayaṃ “akusalacittena araññe na vasatī”ti vadāma. Yassa hi araññe
anya-e0101n:637_2: nivāso, so āraññiko. So ca pāpiccho vā bhaveyya appiccho vā. Imāni pana tena tena
anya-e0101n:637_3: samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni, kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti
anya-e0101n:637_4: laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgametesanti dhutaṅgāni. Atha vā dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato
anya-e0101n:637_5: aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgānīti vuttaṃ. Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,
anya-e0101n:637_6: yassetāni aṅgāni bhaveyyuṃ, na ca akusalaṃ kiñci dhunāti, yesaṃ taṃ aṅgantikatvā
anya-e0101n:637_7: dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṃ. Nāpi akusalaṃ cīvaraloluppādīni ceva niddhunāti paṭipattiyā
anya-e0101n:637_8: ca aṅgaṃ hoti. Tasmā suvuttamidaṃ “natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga”nti.
anya-e0101n:638_0: “Yesampi kusalattikavinimuttaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ, tesaṃ atthato dhutaṅgameva natthi. Asantaṃ
anya-e0101n:638_1: kassa dhunanato dhutaṅgaṃ nāma bhavissati. Dhutaguṇe samādāya vattatīti vacanavirodhopi
anya-e0101n:638_2: ca nesaṃ āpajjati, tasmā taṃ na gahetabba”nti ayaṃ tāva kusalattikato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:639: Dhutādīnaṃ vibhāgatoti dhuto veditabbo. Dhutavādo veditabbo. Dhutadhammā veditabbā. Dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni. Kassa dhutaṅgasevanā sappāyāti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:640: Tattha dhutoti dhutakileso vā puggalo kilesadhunano vā dhammo.
anya-e0101n:641: Dhutavādoti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavādo, atthi na dhuto dhutavādo, atthi neva dhuto na dhutavādo, atthi dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca.
anya-e0101n:642_0: Tattha yo dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni, paraṃ pana dhutaṅgena na ovadati, nānusāsati
anya-e0101n:642_1: bākulatthero viya, ayaṃ dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha, “tayidaṃ āyasmā bākulo dhuto
anya-e0101n:642_2: na dhutavādo”ti. Yo pana na dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni, kevalaṃ aññe dhutaṅgena
anya-e0101n:642_3: ovadati anusāsati upanandatthero viya, ayaṃ na dhuto dhutavādo. Yathāha, “tayidaṃ
anya-e0101n:642_4: āyasmā upanando sakyaputto na dhuto dhutavādo”ti. Yo ubhayavipanno lāḷudāyī viya,
anya-e0101n:642_5: ayaṃ neva dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha, “tayidaṃ āyasmā lāḷudāyī neva dhuto na dhutavādo”ti.
anya-e0101n:642_6: Yo pana ubhayasampanno dhammasenāpati viya, ayaṃ dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Yathāha,
anya-e0101n:642_7: “tayidaṃ āyasmā sāriputto dhuto ceva dhutavādo cāti.
anya-e0101n:643_0: Dhutadhammā veditabbāti appicchatā, santuṭṭhitā, sallekhatā, pavivekatā, idamatthitāti
anya-e0101n:643_1: ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārakā pañca dhammā “appicchataṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato
anya-e0101n:643_2: dhutadhammā nāma, tattha appicchatā ca santuṭṭhitā ca alobho. Sallekhatā ca pavivekatā
anya-e0101n:643_3: ca dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ca amohe ca. Idamatthitā ñāṇameva. Tattha ca
anya-e0101n:643_4: alobhena paṭikkhepavatthūsu lobhaṃ, amohena tesveva ādīnavapaṭicchādakaṃ mohaṃ dhunāti.
anya-e0101n:643_5: Alobhena ca anuññātānaṃ paṭisevanamukhena pavattaṃ kāmasukhānuyogaṃ, amohena dhutaṅgesu
anya-e0101n:643_6: atisallekhamukhena pavattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dhunāti. Tasmā ime dhammā dhutadhammāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:644: Dhutaṅgāni veditabbānīti terasa dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ…pe… nesajjikaṅganti. Tāni atthato lakkhaṇādīhi ca vuttāneva.
anya-e0101n:645_0: Kassa dhutaṅgasevanā sappāyāti rāgacaritassa ceva mohacaritassa ca. Kasmā? Dhutaṅgasevanā
anya-e0101n:645_1: hi dukkhāpaṭipadā ceva sallekhavihāro ca. Dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammati.
anya-e0101n:645_2: Sallekhaṃ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyati. Āraññikaṅgarukkhamūlikaṅgapaṭisevanā
anya-e0101n:645_3: vā ettha dosacaritassāpi sappāyā. Tattha hissa asaṅghaṭṭiyamānassa viharato dosopi
anya-e0101n:646_0: Samāsabyāsatoti imāni pana dhutaṅgāni samāsato tīṇi sīsaṅgāni, pañca asambhinnaṅgānīti
anya-e0101n:646_1: aṭṭheva honti. Tattha sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ, ekāsanikaṅgaṃ, abbhokāsikaṅganti imāni
anya-e0101n:646_2: tīṇi sīsaṅgāni. Sapadānacārikaṅgañhi rakkhanto piṇḍapātikaṅgampi rakkhissati. Ekāsanikaṅgañca
anya-e0101n:646_4: rakkhantassa kiṃ atthi rukkhamūlikaṅgayathāsanthatikaṅgesu rakkhitabbaṃ nāma. Iti
anya-e0101n:646_5: imāni tīṇi sīsaṅgāni, āraññikaṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ, tecīvarikaṅgaṃ, nesajjikaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0101n:646_6: sosānikaṅganti imāni pañca asambhinnaṅgāni cāti aṭṭheva honti.
anya-e0101n:647_0: Puna dve cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni, pañca piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni, pañca senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni,
anya-e0101n:647_1: ekaṃ vīriyapaṭisaṃyuttanti evaṃ cattārova honti. Tattha nesajjikaṅgaṃ vīriyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Itarāni pākaṭāneva.
anya-e0101n:648_0: Puna sabbāneva nissayavasena dve honti paccayanissitāni dvādasa, vīriyanissitaṃ ekanti.
anya-e0101n:648_1: Sevitabbāsevitabbavasenapi dveyeva honti. Yassa hi dhutaṅgaṃ sevantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:648_2: vaḍḍhati, tena sevitabbāni. Yassa sevato hāyati, tena na sevitabbāni. Yassa pana
anya-e0101n:648_3: sevatopi asevatopi vaḍḍhateva, na hāyati, tenāpi pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampantena
anya-e0101n:648_4: sevitabbāni. Yassāpi sevatopi asevatopi na vaḍḍhati, tenāpi sevitabbāniyeva āyatiṃ vāsanatthāyāti.
anya-e0101n:649_0: Evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbavasena duvidhānipi sabbāneva cetanāvasena ekavidhāni honti.
anya-e0101n:649_1: Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṃ samādānacetanāti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “yā cetanā, taṃ dhutaṅganti vadantī”ti.
anya-e0101n:650_0: Byāsato pana bhikkhūnaṃ terasa, bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭha, sāmaṇerānaṃ dvādasa, sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:650_1: satta, upāsakaupāsikānaṃ dveti dvācattālīsa honti. Sace pana abbhokāse āraññikaṅgasampannaṃ
anya-e0101n:650_2: susānaṃ hoti, ekopi bhikkhu ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṃ sakkoti. Bhikkhunīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:650_3: pana āraññikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅgañca dvepi sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittāni, abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0101n:650_4: rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ, sosānikaṅganti imāni tīṇi dupparihārāni. Bhikkhuniyā hi dutiyikaṃ
anya-e0101n:650_5: vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati. Evarūpe ca ṭhāne samānacchandā dutiyikā dullabhā. Sacepi
anya-e0101n:650_6: labheyya saṃsaṭṭhavihārato na mucceyya. Evaṃ sati yassatthāya dhutaṅgaṃ seveyya,
anya-e0101n:650_7: svevassā attho na sampajjeyya. Evaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pañca hāpetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:650_8: aṭṭheva hontīti veditabbāni. Yathāvuttesu pana ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṃ sesāni dvādasa
anya-e0101n:650_9: sāmaṇerānaṃ, satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ veditabbāni. Upāsakaupāsikānaṃ pana ekāsanikaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0101n:650_10: pattapiṇḍikaṅganti imāni dve patirūpāni ceva sakkā ca paribhuñjitunti dve dhutaṅgānīti
anya-e0101n:650_11: evaṃ byāsato dvecattālīsa hontīti ayaṃ samāsabyāsato vaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:651_0: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena
anya-e0101n:651_1: desite visuddhimagge yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa
anya-e0101n:651_2: vodānaṃ hoti, tesaṃ sampādanatthaṃ samādātabbadhutaṅgakathā bhāsitā hoti.
anya-e0101n:655_0: 38. Idāni yasmā evaṃ dhutaṅgapariharaṇasampāditehi appicchatādīhi guṇehi pariyodāte
anya-e0101n:655_1: imasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitena “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti
anya-e0101n:655_2: vacanato cittasīsena niddiṭṭho samādhi bhāvetabbo. So ca atisaṅkhepadesitattā viññātumpi
anya-e0101n:655_3: tāva na sukaro, pageva bhāvetuṃ, tasmā tassa vitthārañca bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ
anya-e0101n:656_0: Ko samādhi? Kenaṭṭhena samādhi? Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni? Katividho
anya-e0101n:656_1: samādhi? Ko cassa saṃkileso? Kiṃ vodānaṃ? Kathaṃ bhāvetabbo? Samādhibhāvanāya ko ānisaṃsoti?
anya-e0101n:657_0: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Ko samādhīti samādhi bahuvidho nānappakārako. Taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvayituṃ
anya-e0101n:657_1: ārabbhamānaṃ vissajjanaṃ adhippetañceva atthaṃ na sādheyya, uttari ca vikkhepāya
anya-e0101n:657_2: saṃvatteyya, tasmā idhādhippetameva sandhāya vadāma, kusalacittekaggatā samādhi.
anya-e0101n:658_0: Kenaṭṭhena samādhīti samādhānaṭṭhena samādhi. Kimidaṃ samādhānaṃ nāma? Ekārammaṇe
anya-e0101n:658_1: cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ sammā ca ādhānaṃ, ṭhapananti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā yassa dhammassānubhāvena
anya-e0101n:658_2: ekārammaṇe cittacetasikā samaṃ sammā ca avikkhipamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0101n:659_0: Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha pana avikkhepalakkhaṇo samādhi,
anya-e0101n:660_0: 39. Katividho samādhīti avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho. Upacāraappanāvasena duvidho,
anya-e0101n:660_2: ca. Tividho hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena, tathā savitakkasavicārādivasena pītisahagatādivasena
anya-e0101n:662_0: Tattha ekavidhakoṭṭhāso uttānatthoyeva. Duvidhakoṭṭhāse channaṃ anussatiṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0101n:662_1: maraṇassatiyā upasamānussatiyā āhāre paṭikūlasaññāya catudhātuvavatthānassāti imesaṃ
anya-e0101n:662_2: vasena laddhacittekaggatā, yā ca appanāsamādhīnaṃ pubbabhāge ekaggatā, ayaṃ upacārasamādhi.
anya-e0101n:662_3: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti
anya-e0101n:662_4: ādivacanato pana yā parikammānantarā ekaggatā, ayaṃ appanāsamādhīti evaṃ upacārappanāvasena duvidho.
anya-e0101n:663: Dutiyaduke tīsu bhūmīsu kusalacittekaggatā lokiyo samādhi. Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā lokuttaro samādhīti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho.
anya-e0101n:664_0: Tatiyaduke catukkanaye dvīsu pañcakanaye tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā sappītiko samādhi.
anya-e0101n:664_1: Avasesesu dvīsu jhānesu ekaggatā nippītiko samādhi. Upacārasamādhi pana siyā sappītiko,
anya-e0101n:665_0: Catutthaduke catukkanaye tīsu pañcakanaye catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi.
anya-e0101n:665_1: Avasesasmiṃ upekkhāsahagato samādhi. Upacārasamādhi pana siyā sukhasahagato, siyā
anya-e0101n:667: Tikesu paṭhamattike paṭiladdhamatto hīno, nātisubhāvito majjhimo, subhāvito vasippatto paṇītoti evaṃ hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tividho.
anya-e0101n:668_0: Dutiyattike paṭhamajjhānasamādhi saddhiṃ upacārasamādhinā savitakkasavicāro. Pañcakanaye
anya-e0101n:668_1: dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakkavicāramatto. Yo hi vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṃ disvā vicāre
anya-e0101n:668_2: adisvā kevalaṃ vitakkappahānamattaṃ ākaṅkhamāno paṭhamajjhānaṃ atikkamati, so avitakkavicāramattaṃ
anya-e0101n:668_3: samādhiṃ paṭilabhati. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Catukkanaye pana dutiyādīsu pañcakanaye
anya-e0101n:668_4: tatiyādīsu tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā avitakkāvicāro samādhīti evaṃ savitakkasavicārādivasena tividho.
anya-e0101n:669_0: Tatiyattike catukkanaye ādito dvīsu pañcakanaye ca tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā pītisahagato
anya-e0101n:669_1: samādhi. Tesveva tatiye ca catutthe ca jhāne ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi. Avasāne
anya-e0101n:669_2: upekkhāsahagato. Upacārasamādhi pana pītisukhasahagato vā hoti upekkhāsahagato vāti
anya-e0101n:670_0: Catutthattike upacārabhūmiyaṃ ekaggatā paritto samādhi. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakusale
anya-e0101n:670_1: ekaggatā mahaggato samādhi. Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā appamāṇo samādhīti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:672: Catukkesu paṭhamacatukke atthi samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño, atthi dukkhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño, atthi sukhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño, atthi sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiññoti.
anya-e0101n:673_0: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:673_1: tāva pavattā samādhibhāvanā paṭipadāti vuccati. Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā,
anya-e0101n:673_2: tāva pavattā paññā abhiññāti vuccati. Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti, nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammasamudācāragahaṇatāya
anya-e0101n:673_3: kicchā asukhāsevanāti attho. Ekaccassa tadabhāvena sukhā. Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā
anya-e0101n:673_4: hoti mandā asīghappavatti. Ekaccassa khippā amandā sīghappavatti.
anya-e0101n:674_0: Tattha yāni parato sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni
anya-e0101n:674_1: ca vaṇṇayissāma, tesu yo asappāyasevī hoti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā
anya-e0101n:674_2: hoti. Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā. Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:674_3: sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti, pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī,
anya-e0101n:674_4: tassa vomissakatā veditabbā. Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā
anya-e0101n:674_5: bhāvanamanuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti. Vipariyāyena sukhā. Appanākosallāni pana
anya-e0101n:674_6: asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti. Sampādentassa khippā.
anya-e0101n:675_0: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:675_1: Taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hoti. Anabhibhūtassa sukhā. Avijjābhibhūtassa
anya-e0101n:675_2: ca dandhā abhiññā hoti. Anabhibhūtassa khippā. Yo ca samathe akatādhikāro, tassa
anya-e0101n:675_3: dukkhā paṭipadā hoti. Katādhikārassa sukhā. Yo pana vipassanāya akatādhikāro hoti,
anya-e0101n:675_4: tassa dandhā abhiññā hoti, katādhikārassa khippā. Kilesindriyavasena cāpi etāsaṃ
anya-e0101n:675_5: pabhedo veditabbo. Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca
anya-e0101n:675_6: abhiññā, tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññā. Mandakilesassa ca mudindriyassa sukhā
anya-e0101n:675_7: paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā. Tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññāti.
anya-e0101n:676_0: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya ca abhiññāya
anya-e0101n:676_1: samādhiṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa so samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiññoti vuccati. Esa nayo
anya-e0101n:677_0: Dutiyacatukke atthi samādhi paritto parittārammaṇo, atthi paritto appamāṇārammaṇo,
anya-e0101n:677_1: atthi appamāṇo parittārammaṇo, atthi appamāṇo appamāṇārammaṇoti. Tattha yo samādhi
anya-e0101n:677_2: appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, ayaṃ paritto. Yo pana avaḍḍhite
anya-e0101n:677_3: ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṃ parittārammaṇo. Yo paguṇo subhāvito, uparijhānassa paccayo
anya-e0101n:677_4: bhavituṃ sakkoti, ayaṃ appamāṇo. Yo ca vaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṃ appamāṇārammaṇo.
anya-e0101n:677_5: Vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāya pana vomissakanayo veditabbo. Evaṃ parittaparittārammaṇādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:678_1: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tato vūpasantavitakkavicāraṃ tivaṅgikaṃ dutiyaṃ, tato virattapītikaṃ
anya-e0101n:678_2: duvaṅgikaṃ tatiyaṃ, tato pahīnasukhaṃ upekkhāvedanāsahitassa samādhino vasena duvaṅgikaṃ
anya-e0101n:678_3: catutthaṃ. Iti imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī honti. Evaṃ catujhānaṅgavasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:679_0: Catutthacatukke atthi samādhi hānabhāgiyo, atthi ṭhitibhāgiyo, atthi visesabhāgiyo,
anya-e0101n:679_1: atthi nibbedhabhāgiyo. Tattha paccanīkasamudācāravasena hānabhāgiyatā, tadanudhammatāya
anya-e0101n:679_3: nibbedhabhāgiyatā ca veditabbā. Yathāha, “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā
anya-e0101n:679_4: saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī paññā. Tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati
anya-e0101n:679_5: ṭhitibhāginī paññā. Avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti visesabhāginī
anya-e0101n:679_6: paññā. Nibbidāsahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti virāgūpasañhitā nibbedhabhāginī
anya-e0101n:679_7: paññā”ti. Tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi cattāro hontīti. Evaṃ hānabhāgiyādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:680_0: Pañcamacatukke kāmāvacaro samādhi, rūpāvacaro samādhi, arūpāvacaro samādhi, apariyāpanno
anya-e0101n:680_1: samādhīti evaṃ cattāro samādhī. Tattha sabbāpi upacārekaggatā kāmāvacaro samādhi.
anya-e0101n:680_2: Tathā rūpāvacarādikusalacittekaggatā itare tayoti evaṃ kāmāvacarādivasena catubbidho.
anya-e0101n:681_0: Chaṭṭhacatukke “chandaṃ ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ,
anya-e0101n:681_1: ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhi…pe… vīriyaṃ ce bhikkhu…pe… cittaṃ ce bhikkhu…pe… vīmaṃsaṃ
anya-e0101n:681_2: ce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ, ayaṃ vuccati
anya-e0101n:682_0: Pañcake yaṃ catukkabhede vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, taṃ vitakkamattātikkamena dutiyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:682_1: vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiyanti evaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañca jhānāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0101n:682_2: Tesaṃ aṅgabhūtā ca pañca samādhīti evaṃ pañcajhānaṅgavasena pañcavidhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:683_0: 40. Ko cassa saṃkileso kiṃ vodānanti ettha pana vissajjanaṃ vibhaṅge vuttameva. Vuttañhi
anya-e0101n:683_1: tattha “saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyo dhammo. Vodānanti visesabhāgiyo dhammo”ti. Tattha
anya-e0101n:683_2: “paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhiṃ kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti hānabhāginī
anya-e0101n:683_3: paññā”ti iminā nayena hānabhāgiyadhammo veditabbo. “Avitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā
anya-e0101n:683_4: samudācaranti visesabhāginī paññā”ti iminā nayena visesabhāgiyadhammo veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:685_0: 41. Kathaṃ bhāvetabboti ettha pana yo tāva ayaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhotiādīsu
anya-e0101n:685_1: ariyamaggasampayutto samādhi vutto, tassa bhāvanānayo paññābhāvanānayeneva saṅgahito.
anya-e0101n:685_2: Paññāya hi bhāvitāya so bhāvito hoti. Tasmā taṃ sandhāya evaṃ bhāvetabboti na kiñci visuṃ vadāma.
anya-e0101n:686_0: Yo panāyaṃ lokiyo, so vuttanayena sīlāni visodhetvā suparisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitena
anya-e0101n:686_1: yvāssa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi, taṃ upacchinditvā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ
anya-e0101n:686_2: upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:686_3: gahetvā samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ
anya-e0101n:686_4: katvā sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena bhāvetabboti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0101n:687: Ayaṃ pana vitthāro, yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “yvāssa dasasu palibodhesu palibodho atthi, taṃ upacchinditvā”ti, ettha –
anya-e0101n:688: Āvāso ca kulaṃ lābho, gaṇo kammañca pañcamaṃ;
anya-e0101n:689: Addhānaṃ ñāti ābādho, gantho iddhīti te dasāti. –
anya-e0101n:690: Ime dasa palibodhā nāma. Tattha āvāsoyeva āvāsapalibodho. Esa nayo kulādīsu.
anya-e0101n:691_0: Tattha āvāsoti ekopi ovarako vuccati ekampi pariveṇaṃ sakalopi saṅghārāmo. Svāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:691_1: na sabbasseva palibodho hoti. Yo panettha navakammādīsu ussukkaṃ vā āpajjati, bahubhaṇḍasannicayo
anya-e0101n:691_2: vā hoti, yena kenaci vā kāraṇena apekkhavā paṭibaddhacitto, tasseva palibodho hoti, na itarassa.
anya-e0101n:692_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – dve kira kulaputtā anurādhapurā nikkhamitvā anupubbena thūpārāme
anya-e0101n:692_1: pabbajiṃsu. Tesu eko dve mātikā paguṇā katvā pañcavassiko hutvā pavāretvā pācinakhaṇḍarājiṃ
anya-e0101n:692_2: nāma gato. Eko tattheva vasati. Pācinakhaṇḍarājigato tattha ciraṃ vasitvā thero hutvā
anya-e0101n:692_3: cintesi “paṭisallānasāruppamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ, handa naṃ sahāyakassāpi ārocemī”ti. Tato
anya-e0101n:692_4: nikkhamitvā anupubbena thūpārāmaṃ pāvisi. Pavisantaṃyeva ca naṃ disvā samānavassikatthero
anya-e0101n:692_5: paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā vattaṃ akāsi. Āgantukatthero senāsanaṃ pavisitvā
anya-e0101n:692_6: cintesi “idāni me sahāyo sappiṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā pānakaṃ vā pesessati. Ayañhi imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:692_7: nagare ciranivāsī”ti. So rattiṃ aladdhā pāto cintesi “idāni upaṭṭhākehi gahitaṃ yāgukhajjakaṃ
anya-e0101n:692_8: pesessatī”ti. Tampi adisvā “pahiṇantā natthi, paviṭṭhassa maññe dassatī”ti pātova
anya-e0101n:692_9: tena saddhiṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi. Te dve ekaṃ vīthiṃ caritvā uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāguṃ labhitvā
anya-e0101n:692_10: āsanasālāyaṃ nisīditvā piviṃsu. Tato āgantuko cintesi “nibaddhayāgu maññe natthi,
anya-e0101n:692_11: bhattakāle idāni manussā paṇītaṃ bhattaṃ dassantī”ti, tato bhattakālepi piṇḍāya caritvā
anya-e0101n:692_12: laddhameva bhuñjitvā itaro āha – “kiṃ, bhante, sabbakālaṃ evaṃ yāpethā”ti? Āmāvusoti.
anya-e0101n:692_13: Bhante, pācinakhaṇḍarāji phāsukā, tattha gacchāmāti. Thero nagarato dakkhiṇadvārena
anya-e0101n:692_14: nikkhamanto kumbhakāragāmamaggaṃ paṭipajji. Itaro āha – “kiṃ pana, bhante, imaṃ maggaṃ
anya-e0101n:692_15: paṭipannatthā”ti? Nanu tvamāvuso, pācinakhaṇḍarājiyā vaṇṇaṃ abhāsīti? Kiṃ pana, bhante,
anya-e0101n:692_16: tumhākaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasitaṭṭhāne na koci atirekaparikkhāro atthīti? Āmāvuso mañcapīṭhaṃ
anya-e0101n:692_17: saṅghikaṃ, taṃ paṭisāmitameva, aññaṃ kiñci natthīti. Mayhaṃ pana, bhante, kattaradaṇḍo
anya-e0101n:692_18: telanāḷi upāhanatthavikā ca tatthevāti. Tayāvuso, ekadivasaṃ vasitvā ettakaṃ ṭhapitanti?
anya-e0101n:692_19: Āma, bhante. So pasannacitto theraṃ vanditvā “tumhādisānaṃ, bhante, sabbattha araññavāsoyeva.
anya-e0101n:692_20: Thūpārāmo catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ dhātunidhānaṭṭhānaṃ, lohapāsāde sappāyaṃ dhammassavanaṃ
anya-e0101n:692_21: mahācetiyadassanaṃ theradassanañca labbhati, buddhakālo viya pavattati. Idheva tumhe
anya-e0101n:692_22: vasathā”ti dutiyadivase pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā sayameva agamāsīti. Īdisassa āvāso na palibodho hoti.
anya-e0101n:693_0: Kulanti ñātikulaṃ vā upaṭṭhākakulaṃ vā. Ekaccassa hi upaṭṭhākakulampi “sukhitesu
anya-e0101n:693_1: sukhito”tiādinā nayena saṃsaṭṭhassa viharato palibodho hoti, so kulamānusakehi vinā
anya-e0101n:693_2: dhammassavanāya sāmantavihārampi na gacchati. Ekaccassa mātāpitaropi palibodhā na
anya-e0101n:694_0: So kira uddesatthaṃ rohaṇaṃ agamāsi. Therabhaginīpi upāsikā sadā theraṃ tassa pavattiṃ
anya-e0101n:694_1: pucchati. Thero ekadivasaṃ daharaṃ ānessāmīti rohaṇābhimukho pāyāsi. Daharopi “ciraṃ
anya-e0101n:694_2: me idha vutthaṃ, upajjhāyaṃ dāni passitvā upāsikāya ca pavattiṃ ñatvā āgamissāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:694_3: rohaṇato nikkhami. Te ubhopi gaṅgātīre samāgacchiṃsu. So aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle
anya-e0101n:694_4: therassa vattaṃ katvā “kuhiṃ yāsī”ti pucchito tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Thero suṭṭhu te
anya-e0101n:694_5: kataṃ, upāsikāpi sadā pucchati, ahampi etadatthameva āgato, gaccha tvaṃ, ahaṃ pana
anya-e0101n:694_6: idheva imaṃ vassaṃ vasissāmīti taṃ uyyojesi. So vassūpanāyikadivaseyeva taṃ vihāraṃ
anya-e0101n:695_0: Athassa pitā dutiyadivase āgantvā “kassa, bhante, amhākaṃ senāsanaṃ patta”nti pucchanto
anya-e0101n:695_1: “āgantukassa daharassā”ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āha – “bhante, amhākaṃ
anya-e0101n:695_2: senāsane vassaṃ upagatassa vattaṃ atthī”ti. Kiṃ upāsakāti? Temāsaṃ amhākaṃyeva ghare
anya-e0101n:695_3: bhikkhaṃ gahetvā pavāretvā gamanakāle āpucchitabbanti. So tuṇhibhāvena adhivāsesi.
anya-e0101n:695_4: Upāsakopi gharaṃ gantvā “amhākaṃ āvāse eko āgantuko ayyo upagato sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo”ti
anya-e0101n:695_5: āha. Upāsikā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādesi. Daharopi
anya-e0101n:695_6: bhattakāle ñātigharaṃ agamāsi. Na naṃ koci sañjāni.
anya-e0101n:696_0: So temāsampi tattha piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā vassaṃvuttho “ahaṃ gacchāmī”ti āpucchi.
anya-e0101n:696_1: Athassa ñātakā “sve, bhante, gacchathā”ti dutiyadivase ghareyeva bhojetvā telanāḷiṃ
anya-e0101n:696_2: pūretvā ekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ navahatthañca sāṭakaṃ datvā “gacchatha, bhante”ti āhaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:697_0: Upajjhāyopissa pavāretvā paṭipathaṃ āgacchanto pubbe diṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva taṃ addasa.
anya-e0101n:697_1: So aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle therassa vattaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ thero pucchi “kiṃ, bhaddamukha,
anya-e0101n:697_2: diṭṭhā te upāsikā”ti? So “āma, bhante”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tena telena therassa
anya-e0101n:697_3: pāde makkhetvā guḷena pānakaṃ katvā tampi sāṭakaṃ therasseva datvā theraṃ vanditvā
anya-e0101n:697_4: “mayhaṃ, bhante, rohaṇaṃyeva sappāya”nti agamāsi. Theropi vihāraṃ āgantvā dutiyadivase
anya-e0101n:698_0: Upāsikāpi “mayhaṃ bhātā mama puttaṃ gahetvā idāni āgacchatī”ti sadā maggaṃ olokayamānāva
anya-e0101n:698_1: tiṭṭhati. Sā taṃ ekakameva āgacchantaṃ disvā “mato me maññe putto, ayaṃ thero ekakova
anya-e0101n:698_2: āgacchatī”ti therassa pādamūle nipatitvā paridevamānā rodi. Thero “nūna daharo appicchatāya
anya-e0101n:698_3: attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva gato”ti taṃ samassāsetvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā pattatthavikato
anya-e0101n:699_0: Upāsikā pasīditvā puttena gatadisābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā namassamānā āha – “mayhaṃ
anya-e0101n:699_1: puttasadisaṃ vata maññe bhikkhuṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā bhagavā rathavinītapaṭipadaṃ,
anya-e0101n:699_3: desesi. Vijātamātuyā nāma gehe temāsaṃ bhuñjamānopi ‘ahaṃ putto tvaṃ mātā’ti na vakkhati,
anya-e0101n:699_4: aho acchariyamanusso”ti. Evarūpassa mātāpitaropi palibodhā na honti, pageva aññaṃ upaṭṭhākakula”nti.
anya-e0101n:700_0: Lābhoti cattāro paccayā. Te kathaṃ palibodhā honti? Puññavantassa hi bhikkhuno gatagataṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:700_1: manussā mahāparivāre paccaye denti. So tesaṃ anumodento dhammaṃ desento samaṇadhammaṃ
anya-e0101n:700_2: kātuṃ na okāsaṃ labhati. Aruṇuggamanato yāva paṭhamayāmo, tāva manussasaṃsaggo na
anya-e0101n:700_3: upacchijjati. Puna balavapaccūseyeva bāhullikapiṇḍapātikā āgantvā “bhante, asuko
anya-e0101n:700_4: upāsako upāsikā amacco amaccadhītā tumhākaṃ dassanakāmā”ti vadanti, so gaṇhāvuso,
anya-e0101n:700_5: pattacīvaranti gamanasajjova hotīti niccabyāvaṭo, tasseva te paccayā palibodhā honti.
anya-e0101n:700_6: Tena gaṇaṃ pahāya yattha naṃ na jānanti, tattha ekakena caritabbaṃ. Evaṃ so palibodho upacchijjatīti.
anya-e0101n:701_0: Gaṇoti suttantikagaṇo vā ābhidhammikagaṇo vā, yo tassa uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:701_1: dento samaṇadhammassa okāsaṃ na labhati, tasseva gaṇo palibodho hoti, tena so evaṃ
anya-e0101n:701_2: upacchinditabbo. Sace tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahu gahitaṃ hoti, appaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ niṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n:701_3: araññaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Sace appaṃ gahitaṃ, bahu avasiṭṭhaṃ, yojanato paraṃ agantvā
anya-e0101n:701_4: antoyojanaparicchede aññaṃ gaṇavācakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ime āyasmā uddesādīhi saṅgaṇhatū”ti
anya-e0101n:701_5: vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ alabhamānena “mayhamāvuso, ekaṃ kiccaṃ atthi, tumhe yathāphāsukaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0101n:701_6: gacchathā”ti gaṇaṃ pahāya attano kammaṃ kattabbanti.
anya-e0101n:702_0: Kammanti navakammaṃ. Taṃ karontena vaḍḍhakīādīhi laddhāladdhaṃ jānitabbaṃ, katākate
anya-e0101n:702_1: ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbanti sabbadā palibodho hoti. Sopi evaṃ upacchinditabbo, sace appaṃ
anya-e0101n:702_2: avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti niṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace bahu, saṅghikañce navakammaṃ, saṅghassa vā saṅghabhārahārakabhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:702_3: vā niyyādetabbaṃ. Attano santakañce, attano bhārahārakānaṃ niyyādetabbaṃ. Tādise
anya-e0101n:703_0: Addhānanti maggagamanaṃ. Yassa hi katthaci pabbajjāpekkho vā hoti, paccayajātaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:703_1: kiñci laddhabbaṃ hoti. Sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ, araññaṃ pavisitvā
anya-e0101n:703_2: samaṇadhammaṃ karontassapi gamikacittaṃ nāma duppaṭivinodanīyaṃ hoti, tasmā gantvā
anya-e0101n:703_3: taṃ kiccaṃ tīretvāva samaṇadhamme ussukkaṃ kātabbanti.
anya-e0101n:704_1: ghare mātā pitā bhātāti evamādikā. Te gilānā imassa palibodhā honti, tasmā so palibodho
anya-e0101n:705_0: Tattha upajjhāyo tāva gilāno sace lahuṃ na vuṭṭhāti, yāvajīvampi paṭijaggitabbo.
anya-e0101n:705_3: nissayauddesā anupacchinnā, tāva paṭijaggitabbā. Pahontena tato uddhampi paṭijaggitabbā
anya-e0101n:705_4: eva. Mātāpitūsu upajjhāye viya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Sacepi hi te rajje ṭhitā honti, puttato
anya-e0101n:705_5: ca upaṭṭhānaṃ paccāsīsanti, kātabbameva. Atha tesaṃ bhesajjaṃ natthi, attano santakaṃ
anya-e0101n:705_6: dātabbaṃ. Asati bhikkhācariyāya pariyesitvāpi dātabbameva. Bhātubhaginīnaṃ pana tesaṃ
anya-e0101n:705_7: santakameva yojetvā dātabbaṃ. Sace natthi attano santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ datvā pacchā
anya-e0101n:705_8: labhantena gaṇhitabbaṃ. Alabhantena na codetabbā. Aññātakassa bhaginisāmikassa bhesajjaṃ
anya-e0101n:705_9: neva kātuṃ na dātuṃ vaṭṭati. “Tuyhaṃ sāmikassa dehī”ti vatvā pana bhaginiyā dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:705_10: Bhātujāyāyapi eseva nayo. Tesaṃ pana puttā imassa ñātakā evāti tesaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
anya-e0101n:706_0: Ābādhoti yokoci rogo. So bādhayamāno palibodho hoti, tasmā bhesajjakaraṇena upacchinditabbo.
anya-e0101n:706_1: Sace pana katipāhaṃ bhesajjaṃ karontassapi na vūpasammati, nāhaṃ tuyhaṃ dāso, na
anya-e0101n:706_2: bhaṭako, taṃyeva hi posento anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe dukkhaṃ pattoti attabhāvaṃ garahitvā
anya-e0101n:707: Ganthoti pariyattiharaṇaṃ. Taṃ sajjhāyādīhi niccabyāvaṭassa palibodho hoti, na itarassa. Tatrimāni vatthūni –
anya-e0101n:708_0: Majjhimabhāṇakadevatthero kira malayavāsidevattherassa santikaṃ gantvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:708_1: yāci. Thero kīdisosi, āvuso, pariyattiyanti pucchi. Majjhimo me, bhante, paguṇoti.
anya-e0101n:708_2: Āvuso, majjhimo nāmeso dupparihāro, mūlapaṇṇāsaṃ sajjhāyantassa majjhimapaṇṇāsako
anya-e0101n:708_3: āgacchati, taṃ sajjhāyantassa uparipaṇṇāsako. Kuto tuyhaṃ kammaṭṭhānanti? Bhante,
anya-e0101n:708_4: tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā puna na olokessāmīti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
anya-e0101n:708_5: ekūnavīsativassāni sajjhāyaṃ akatvā vīsatime vasse arahattaṃ patvā sajjhāyatthāya
anya-e0101n:708_6: āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “vīsati me, āvuso, vassāni pariyattiṃ anolokentassa, apica kho
anya-e0101n:708_7: kataparicayo ahamettha ārabhathā”ti vatvā ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā ekabyañjanepissa kaṅkhā nāhosi.
anya-e0101n:709_0: Karuḷiyagirivāsīnāgattheropi aṭṭhārasavassāni pariyattiṃ chaḍḍetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhātukathaṃ
anya-e0101n:709_1: uddisi. Tesaṃ gāmavāsikattherehi saddhiṃ saṃsandentānaṃ ekapañhopi uppaṭipāṭiyā āgato nāhosi.
anya-e0101n:710_0: Mahāvihārepi tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero nāma aṭṭhakathaṃ anuggahetvāva pañcanikāyamaṇḍale
anya-e0101n:710_1: tīṇi piṭakāni parivattessāmīti suvaṇṇabheriṃ paharāpesi. Bhikkhusaṅgho katamācariyānaṃ
anya-e0101n:710_2: uggaho, attano ācariyuggahaññeva vadatu, itarathā vattuṃ na demāti āha. Upajjhāyopi
anya-e0101n:710_3: naṃ attano upaṭṭhānamāgataṃ pucchi “tvamāvuso, bheriṃ paharāpesī”ti? Āma, bhante.
anya-e0101n:710_4: Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Pariyattiṃ, bhante, parivattessāmīti. Āvuso abhaya, ācariyā idaṃ padaṃ
anya-e0101n:710_5: kathaṃ vadantīti? Evaṃ vadanti, bhanteti. Thero hunti paṭibāhi. Puna so aññena aññena
anya-e0101n:710_6: pariyāyena evaṃ vadanti bhanteti tikkhattuṃ āha. Thero sabbaṃ hunti paṭibāhitvā “āvuso,
anya-e0101n:710_7: tayā paṭhamaṃ kathito eva ācariyamaggo, ācariyamukhato pana anuggahitattā ‘evaṃ ācariyā
anya-e0101n:710_8: vadantī’ti saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi. Gaccha attano ācariyānaṃ santike suṇāhī”ti. Kuhiṃ,
anya-e0101n:710_9: bhante, gacchāmīti? Gaṅgāya parato rohaṇajanapade tulādhārapabbatavihāre sabbapariyattiko
anya-e0101n:710_10: mahādhammarakkhitatthero nāma vasati, tassa santikaṃ gacchāti. Sādhu, bhanteti theraṃ
anya-e0101n:710_11: vanditvā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi.
anya-e0101n:710_12: Thero kasmā āgatosīti pucchi. Dhammaṃ sotuṃ, bhanteti. Āvuso abhaya, dīghamajjhimesu
anya-e0101n:710_13: maṃ kālena kālaṃ pucchanti. Avasesaṃ pana me tiṃsamattāni vassāni na olokitapubbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:710_14: Apica tvaṃ rattiṃ mama santike parivattehi. Ahaṃ te divā kathayissāmīti. So sādhu,
anya-e0101n:710_15: bhanteti tathā akāsi. Pariveṇadvāre mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā gāmavāsino divase divase
anya-e0101n:710_16: dhammassavanatthāya āgacchanti. Thero rattiṃ parivatti. Taṃ divā kathayanto anupubbena
anya-e0101n:710_17: desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā abhayattherassa santike taṭṭikāya nisīditvā “āvuso, mayhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:710_18: kathehī”ti āha. Bhante, kiṃ bhaṇatha, nanu mayā tumhākameva santike sutaṃ? Kimahaṃ
anya-e0101n:710_19: tumhehi aññātaṃ kathessāmīti? Tato naṃ thero añño esa, āvuso, gatakassa maggo nāmāti
anya-e0101n:710_20: āha. Abhayathero kira tadā sotāpanno hoti. Athassa so kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā āgantvā
anya-e0101n:710_21: lohapāsāde dhammaṃ parivattento thero parinibbutoti assosi. Sutvā “āharathāvuso,
anya-e0101n:710_22: cīvara”nti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā “anucchaviko, āvuso, amhākaṃ ācariyassa arahattamaggo.
anya-e0101n:710_23: Ācariyo no, āvuso, uju ājānīyo. So attano dhammantevāsikassa santike taṭṭikāya nisīditvā
anya-e0101n:710_24: ‘mayhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī’ti āha. Anucchaviko, āvuso, therassa arahattamaggo”ti.
anya-e0101n:711_0: Iddhīti pothujjanikā iddhi. Sā hi uttānaseyyakadārako viya taruṇasassaṃ viya ca dupparihārā
anya-e0101n:711_1: hoti. Appamattakeneva bhijjati. Sā pana vipassanāya palibodho hoti, na samādhissa,
anya-e0101n:711_2: samādhiṃ patvā pattabbato. Tasmā vipassanatthikena iddhipalibodho upacchinditabbo,
anya-e0101n:711_3: itarena avasesāti ayaṃ tāva palibodhakathāya vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:713_0: 42. Kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ettha pana duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:713_2: nāma bhikkhusaṅghādīsu mettā maraṇassati ca. Asubhasaññātipi eke.
anya-e0101n:714_0: Kammaṭṭhānikena hi bhikkhunā paṭhamaṃ tāva paricchinditvā sīmaṭṭhakabhikkhusaṅghe
anya-e0101n:714_1: sukhitā hontu abyāpajjāti mettā bhāvetabbā. Tato sīmaṭṭhakadevatāsu. Tato gocaragāmamhi
anya-e0101n:714_2: issarajane. Tato tattha manusse upādāya sabbasattesu. So hi bhikkhusaṅghe mettāya
anya-e0101n:714_3: sahavāsīnaṃ muducittataṃ janeti. Athassa te sukhasaṃvāsā honti. Sīmaṭṭhakadevatāsu
anya-e0101n:714_4: mettāya mudukatacittāhi devatāhi dhammikāya rakkhāya susaṃvihitarakkho hoti. Gocaragāmamhi
anya-e0101n:714_5: issarajane mettāya mudukatacittasantānehi issarehi dhammikāya rakkhāya surakkhitaparikkhāro
anya-e0101n:714_6: hoti. Tattha manussesu mettāya pasāditacittehi tehi aparibhūto hutvā vicarati. Sabbasattesu
anya-e0101n:714_7: mettāya sabbattha appaṭihatacāro hoti. Maraṇassatiyā pana avassaṃ mayā maritabbanti
anya-e0101n:714_8: cintento anesanaṃ pahāya uparūpari vaḍḍhamānasaṃvego anolīnavuttiko hoti. Asubhasaññāparicitacittassa
anya-e0101n:714_9: panassa dibbānipi ārammaṇāni lobhavasena cittaṃ na pariyādiyanti.
anya-e0101n:715: Evaṃ bahūpakārattā sabbattha atthayitabbaṃ icchitabbanti ca adhippetassa yogānuyogakammassa ṭhānañcāti sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:716_0: Cattālīsāya pana kammaṭṭhānesu yaṃ yassa cariyānukūlaṃ, taṃ tassa niccaṃ pariharitabbattā
anya-e0101n:716_1: uparimassa ca uparimassa bhāvanākammassa padaṭṭhānattā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:716_2: Iti imaṃ duvidhampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ yo deti, ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyako nāma. Taṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ.
anya-e0101n:718: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0101n:719: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojakoti. ;
anya-e0101n:720: Evamādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantena hitesiṃ vuddhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ.
anya-e0101n:721_0: “Mamaṃ hi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”ti ādivacanato
anya-e0101n:721_1: pana sammāsambuddhoyeva sabbākārasampanno kalyāṇamitto. Tasmā tasmiṃ sati tasseva
anya-e0101n:721_2: bhagavato santike gahitakammaṭṭhānaṃ sugahitaṃ hoti. Parinibbute pana tasmiṃ asītiyā
anya-e0101n:721_3: mahāsāvakesu yo dharati, tassa santike gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Tasmiṃ asati yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:721_4: gahetukāmo hoti, tasseva vasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:721_5: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā āsavakkhayappattassa khīṇāsavassa santike gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:722_0: Kiṃ pana khīṇāsavo ahaṃ khīṇāsavoti attānaṃ pakāsetīti? Kiṃ vattabbaṃ, kārakabhāvaṃ
anya-e0101n:722_1: hi jānitvā pakāseti. Nanu assaguttatthero āraddhakammaṭṭhānassa bhikkhuno “kammaṭṭhānakārako
anya-e0101n:722_2: aya”nti jānitvā ākāse cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññāpetvā tattha pallaṅkena nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesīti.
anya-e0101n:723_0: Tasmā sace khīṇāsavaṃ labhati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce labhati, anāgāmisakadāgāmisotāpannajhānalābhīputhujjanatipiṭakadharadvipiṭakadharaekapiṭakadharesu
anya-e0101n:723_1: purimassa purimassa santike. Ekapiṭakadharepi asati yassa ekasaṅgītipi aṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0101n:723_2: saddhiṃ paguṇā, ayañca lajjī hoti, tassa santike gahetabbaṃ. Evarūpo hi tantidharo
anya-e0101n:723_3: vaṃsānurakkhako paveṇīpālako ācariyo ācariyamatikova hoti, na attanomatiko hoti.
anya-e0101n:723_4: Teneva porāṇakattherā “lajjī rakkhissati lajjī rakkhissatī”ti tikkhattuṃ āhaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:724_0: Pubbe vuttakhīṇāsavādayo cettha attanā adhigatamaggameva ācikkhanti. Bahussuto pana
anya-e0101n:724_1: taṃ taṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uggahaparipucchānaṃ visodhitattā ito cito ca suttañca
anya-e0101n:724_2: kāraṇañca sallakkhetvā sappāyāsappāyaṃ yojetvā gahanaṭṭhāne gacchanto mahāhatthī
anya-e0101n:724_3: viya mahāmaggaṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessati. Tasmā evarūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ
anya-e0101n:724_4: kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:725_0: Sace panetaṃ ekavihāreyeva labhati, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ, no ce labhati, yattha so vasati,
anya-e0101n:725_1: tattha gantabbaṃ. Gacchantena ca na dhotamakkhitehi pādehi upāhanā ārūhitvā chattaṃ
anya-e0101n:725_2: gahetvā telanāḷimadhuphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā antevāsikaparivutena gantabbaṃ. Gamikavattaṃ
anya-e0101n:725_3: pana pūretvā attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā antarāmagge yaṃ yaṃ vihāraṃ pavisati
anya-e0101n:725_4: sabbattha vattapaṭipattiṃ kurumānena sallahukaparikkhārena paramasallekhavuttinā hutvā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:726_0: Taṃ vihāraṃ pavisantena antarāmaggeyeva dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā gahetvā pavisitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:726_1: na ca “muhuttaṃ vissametvā pādadhovanamakkhanādīni katvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:726_2: aññaṃ pariveṇaṃ pavisitabbaṃ. Kasmā? Sace hissa tatra ācariyassa visabhāgā bhikkhū
anya-e0101n:726_3: bhaveyyuṃ, te āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ācariyassa avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā “naṭṭhosi, sace
anya-e0101n:726_4: tassa santikaṃ āgato”ti vippaṭisāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ, yena tatova paṭinivatteyya, tasmā
anya-e0101n:726_5: ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā ujukaṃ tattheva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:727_0: Sace ācariyo daharataro hoti, pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇādīni na sāditabbāni. Sace vuḍḍhataro
anya-e0101n:727_1: hoti, gantvā ācariyaṃ vanditvā ṭhātabbaṃ. “Nikkhipāvuso, pattacīvara”nti vuttena
anya-e0101n:727_2: nikkhipitabbaṃ. “Pānīyaṃ pivā”ti vuttena sace icchati pātabbaṃ. “Pāde dhovāhī”ti
anya-e0101n:727_3: vuttena na tāva pādā dhovitabbā. Sace hi ācariyena ābhataṃ udakaṃ bhaveyya, na sāruppaṃ
anya-e0101n:727_4: siyā. “Dhovāhāvuso, na mayā ābhataṃ, aññehi ābhata”nti vuttena pana yattha ācariyo
anya-e0101n:727_5: na passati, evarūpe paṭicchanne vā okāse, abbhokāse vihārassāpi vā ekamante nisīditvā pādā dhovitabbā.
anya-e0101n:728_0: Sace ācariyo telanāḷiṃ āharati uṭṭhahitvā ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetabbā. Sace
anya-e0101n:728_1: hi na gaṇheyya, “ayaṃ bhikkhu ito eva paṭṭhāya sambhogaṃ kopetī”ti ācariyassa aññathattaṃ
anya-e0101n:728_2: bhaveyya. Gahetvā pana na āditova pādā makkhetabbā. Sace hi taṃ ācariyassa gattabbhañjanatelaṃ
anya-e0101n:728_3: bhaveyya, na sāruppaṃ siyā. Tasmā sīsaṃ makkhetvā khandhādīni makkhetabbāni. “Sabbapārihāriyatelamidaṃ,
anya-e0101n:728_4: āvuso, pādepi makkhehī”ti vuttena pana thokaṃ sīse katvā pāde makkhetvā “imaṃ telanāḷiṃ
anya-e0101n:728_5: ṭhapemi, bhante”ti vatvā ācariye gaṇhante dātabbā.
anya-e0101n:729_0: Āgatadivasato paṭṭhāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ me, bhante, kathetha iccevaṃ na vattabbaṃ. Dutiyadivasato
anya-e0101n:729_1: pana paṭṭhāya sace ācariyassa pakatiupaṭṭhāko atthi, taṃ yācitvā vattaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:729_2: Sace yācitopi na deti, okāse laddheyeva kātabbaṃ. Karontena khuddakamajjhimamahantāni
anya-e0101n:729_3: tīṇi dantakaṭṭhāni upanāmetabbāni. Sītaṃ uṇhanti duvidhaṃ mukhadhovanaudakañca nhānodakañca
anya-e0101n:729_4: paṭiyādetabbaṃ. Tato yaṃ ācariyo tīṇi divasāni paribhuñjati, tādisameva niccaṃ upanāmetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:729_5: Niyamaṃ akatvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā paribhuñjantassa yathāladdhaṃ upanāmetabbaṃ. Kiṃ bahunā
anya-e0101n:729_6: vuttena? Yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā “antevāsikena, bhikkhave, ācariyamhi sammā vattitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:729_7: Tatrāyaṃ sammā vattanā, kālasseva uṭṭhāya upāhanā omuñcitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ
anya-e0101n:729_8: karitvā dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātabbaṃ, mukhodakaṃ dātabbaṃ, āsanaṃ paññapetabbaṃ. Sace yāgu
anya-e0101n:729_9: hoti, bhājanaṃ dhovitvā yāgu upanāmetabbā”ti ādikaṃ khandhake sammāvattaṃ paññattaṃ,
anya-e0101n:730_0: Evaṃ vattasampattiyā garuṃ ārādhayamānena sāyaṃ vanditvā yāhīti vissajjitena gantabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:730_1: yadā so kissāgatosīti pucchati, tadā āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Sace so neva pucchati,
anya-e0101n:730_2: vattaṃ pana sādiyati, dasāhe vā pakkhe vā vītivatte ekadivasaṃ vissajjitenāpi agantvā
anya-e0101n:730_3: okāsaṃ kāretvā āgamanakāraṇaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Akāle vā gantvā kimatthamāgatosīti puṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:730_4: ārocetabbaṃ. Sace so pātova āgacchāti vadati, pātova gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:731_0: Sace panassa tāya velāya pittābādhena vā kucchi pariḍayhati, aggimandatāya vā bhattaṃ
anya-e0101n:731_1: na jīrati, añño vā koci rogo bādhati, taṃ yathābhūtaṃ āvikatvā attano sappāyavelaṃ
anya-e0101n:731_2: ārocetvā tāya velāya upasaṅkamitabbaṃ. Asappāyavelāya hi vuccamānampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:731_3: na sakkā hoti manasikātunti. Ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvāti ettha vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:733_0: 43. Idāni attano cariyānukūlanti ettha cariyāti cha cariyā rāgacariyā, dosacariyā,
anya-e0101n:733_1: mohacariyā, saddhācariyā, buddhicariyā, vitakkacariyāti. Keci pana rāgādīnaṃ saṃsaggasannipātavasena
anya-e0101n:733_2: aparāpi catasso, tathā saddhādīnanti imāhi aṭṭhahi saddhiṃ cuddasa icchanti. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:733_3: pana bhede vuccamāne rāgādīnaṃ saddhādīhipi saṃsaggaṃ katvā anekā cariyā honti, tasmā
anya-e0101n:733_4: saṅkhepena chaḷeva cariyā veditabbā. Cariyā, pakati, ussannatāti atthato ekaṃ. Tāsaṃ
anya-e0101n:733_5: vasena chaḷeva puggalā honti rāgacarito, dosacarito, mohacarito, saddhācarito, buddhicarito, vitakkacaritoti.
anya-e0101n:734_0: Tattha yasmā rāgacaritassa kusalappavattisamaye saddhā balavatī hoti, rāgassa āsannaguṇattā.
anya-e0101n:734_1: Yathā hi akusalapakkhe rāgo siniddho nātilūkho, evaṃ kusalapakkhe saddhā. Yathā rāgo
