anya-e0101n:734_2: vatthukāme pariyesati, evaṃ saddhā sīlādiguṇe. Yathā rāgo ahitaṃ na pariccajati,
anya-e0101n:734_3: evaṃ saddhā hitaṃ na pariccajati, tasmā rāgacaritassa saddhācarito sabhāgo.
anya-e0101n:735_0: Yasmā pana dosacaritassa kusalappavattisamaye paññā balavatī hoti, dosassa āsannaguṇattā.
anya-e0101n:735_1: Yathā hi akusalapakkhe doso nissineho na ārammaṇaṃ allīyati, evaṃ kusalapakkhe paññā.
anya-e0101n:735_2: Yathā ca doso abhūtampi dosameva pariyesati, evaṃ paññā bhūtaṃ dosameva. Yathā doso
anya-e0101n:735_3: sattaparivajjanākārena pavattati, evaṃ paññā saṅkhāraparivajjanākārena, tasmā dosacaritassa
anya-e0101n:736_0: Yasmā pana mohacaritassa anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya vāyamamānassa
anya-e0101n:736_1: yebhuyyena antarāyakarā vitakkā uppajjanti, mohassa āsannalakkhaṇattā. Yathā hi moho
anya-e0101n:736_2: paribyākulatāya anavaṭṭhito, evaṃ vitakko nānappakāravitakkanatāya. Yathā ca moho
anya-e0101n:736_3: apariyogāhaṇatāya cañcalo. Tathā vitakko lahuparikappanatāya, tasmā mohacaritassa
anya-e0101n:737_0: Apare taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena aparāpi tisso cariyā vadanti. Tattha taṇhā rāgoyeva,
anya-e0101n:737_1: māno ca taṃsampayuttoti tadubhayaṃ rāgacariyaṃ nātivattati. Mohanidānattā ca diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0101n:738: 44. Tā panetā cariyā kinnidānā? Kathañca jānitabbaṃ “ayaṃ puggalo rāgacarito, ayaṃ puggalo dosādīsu aññataracarito”ti? Kiṃ caritassa puggalassa kiṃ sappāyanti?
anya-e0101n:739_0: Tatra purimā tāva tisso cariyā pubbāciṇṇanidānā, dhātudosanidānā cāti ekacce vadanti.
anya-e0101n:739_1: Pubbe kira iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulo rāgacarito hoti, saggā vā cavitvā idhūpapanno.
anya-e0101n:739_2: Pubbe chedanavadhabandhanaverakammabahulo dosacarito hoti, nirayanāgayonīhi vā cavitvā
anya-e0101n:739_3: idhūpapanno. Pubbe majjapānabahulo sutaparipucchāvihīno ca mohacarito hoti, tiracchānayoniyā
anya-e0101n:739_4: vā cavitvā idhūpapannoti evaṃ pubbāciṇṇanidānāti vadanti. Dvinnaṃ pana dhātūnaṃ ussannattā
anya-e0101n:739_5: puggalo mohacarito hoti pathavīdhātuyā ca āpodhātuyā ca. Itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ ussannattā
anya-e0101n:739_6: dosacarito. Sabbāsaṃ samattā pana rāgacaritoti. Dosesu ca semhādhiko rāgacarito hoti.
anya-e0101n:739_7: Vātādhiko mohacarito. Semhādhiko vā mohacarito. Vātādhiko rāgacaritoti evaṃ dhātudosanidānāti vadanti.
anya-e0101n:740_0: Tattha yasmā pubbe iṭṭhappayogasubhakammabahulāpi saggā cavitvā idhūpapannāpi ca
anya-e0101n:740_1: na sabbe rāgacaritāyeva honti, na itare vā dosamohacaritā. Evaṃ dhātūnañca yathāvutteneva
anya-e0101n:740_2: nayena ussadaniyamo nāma natthi. Dosaniyame ca rāgamohadvayameva vuttaṃ, tampi ca
anya-e0101n:740_3: pubbāparaviruddhameva. Saddhācariyādīsu ca ekissāpi nidānaṃ na vuttameva. Tasmā sabbametaṃ
anya-e0101n:741_0: Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ matānusārena vinicchayo, vuttañhetaṃ ussadakittane
anya-e0101n:741_1: “ime sattā pubbahetuniyāmena lobhussadā dosussadā mohussadā alobhussadā adosussadā
anya-e0101n:742_0: Yassa hi kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobho balavā hoti alobho mando, adosāmohā balavanto dosamohā
anya-e0101n:742_1: mandā, tassa mando alobho lobhaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Adosāmohā pana balavanto
anya-e0101n:742_2: dosamohe pariyādātuṃ sakkoti. Tasmā so tena kammena dinnapaṭisandhivasena nibbatto
anya-e0101n:742_3: luddho hoti sukhasīlo akkodhano paññavā vajirūpamañāṇo.
anya-e0101n:743_0: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhadosā balavanto honti alobhādosā mandā, amoho balavā
anya-e0101n:743_1: moho mando, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca. Paññavā pana hoti vajirūpamañāṇo
anya-e0101n:744: Yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca, sīlako pana hoti akkodhano (bākulatthero viya).
anya-e0101n:745: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi lobhadosamohā balavanto honti alobhādayo mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti duṭṭho ca mūḷho ca.
anya-e0101n:746: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho appakileso hoti dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo, duṭṭho pana hoti dandhapañño ca.
anya-e0101n:747: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti aduṭṭho sīlako ca, dandho pana hoti.
anya-e0101n:748: Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca, duṭṭho ca pana hoti kodhano.
anya-e0101n:749: Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādosāmohā balavanto honti lobhādayo mandā, so purimanayeneva mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n:750_0: Ettha ca yo luddhoti vutto, ayaṃ rāgacarito. Duṭṭhadandhā dosamohacaritā. Paññavā
anya-e0101n:750_1: buddhicarito. Aluddhaaduṭṭhā pasannapakatitāya saddhācaritā. Yathā vā amohaparivārena
anya-e0101n:750_2: kammunā nibbatto buddhicarito, evaṃ balavasaddhāparivārena kammunā nibbatto saddhācarito.
anya-e0101n:750_3: Kāmavitakkādiparivārena kammunā nibbatto vitakkacarito. Lobhādinā vomissaparivārena
anya-e0101n:750_4: kammunā nibbatto vomissacaritoti. Evaṃ lobhādīsu aññataraññataraparivāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ
anya-e0101n:751: 45. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ kathañca jānitabbaṃ ayaṃ puggalo rāgacaritotiādi. Tatrāyaṃ nayo.
anya-e0101n:754_0: Tattha iriyāpathatoti rāgacarito hi pakatigamanena gacchanto cāturiyena gacchati,
anya-e0101n:754_1: saṇikaṃ pādaṃ nikkhipati, samaṃ nikkhipati, samaṃ uddharati, ukkuṭikañcassa padaṃ
anya-e0101n:754_2: hoti. Dosacarito pādaggehi khaṇanto viya gacchati, sahasā pādaṃ nikkhipati, sahasā
anya-e0101n:754_3: uddharati, anukaḍḍhitañcassa padaṃ hoti. Mohacarito paribyākulāya gatiyā gacchati,
anya-e0101n:754_4: chambhito viya padaṃ nikkhipati, chambhito viya uddharati, sahasānupīḷitañcassa padaṃ
anya-e0101n:759_0: Ṭhānampi rāgacaritassa pāsādikaṃ hoti madhurākāraṃ, dosacaritassa thaddhākāraṃ, mohacaritassa
anya-e0101n:759_1: ākulākāraṃ. Nisajjāyapi eseva nayo. Rāgacarito ca ataramāno samaṃ seyyaṃ paññapetvā
anya-e0101n:759_2: saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati, vuṭṭhāpiyamāno
anya-e0101n:759_3: ca sīghaṃ avuṭṭhāya saṅkito viya saṇikaṃ paṭivacanaṃ deti. Dosacarito taramāno yathā
anya-e0101n:759_4: vā tathā vā seyyaṃ paññapetvā pakkhittakāyo bhākuṭiṃ katvā sayati, vuṭṭhāpiyamāno
anya-e0101n:759_5: ca sīghaṃ vuṭṭhāya kupito viya paṭivacanaṃ deti. Mohacarito dussaṇṭhānaṃ seyyaṃ paññapetvā
anya-e0101n:759_6: vikkhittakāyo bahulaṃ adhomukho sayati, vuṭṭhāpiyamāno ca huṅkāraṃ karonto dandhaṃ
anya-e0101n:759_7: vuṭṭhāti. Saddhācaritādayo pana yasmā rāgacaritādīnaṃ sabhāgā, tasmā tesampi tādisova
anya-e0101n:759_8: iriyāpatho hotīti. Evaṃ tāva iriyāpathato cariyāyo vibhāvaye.
anya-e0101n:760_0: Kiccāti sammajjanādīsu ca kiccesu rāgacarito sādhukaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā ataramāno
anya-e0101n:760_1: vālikaṃ avippakiranto sinduvārakusumasantharamiva santharanto suddhaṃ samaṃ sammajjati.
anya-e0101n:760_2: Dosacarito gāḷhaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā taramānarūpo ubhato vālikaṃ ussārento kharena
anya-e0101n:760_3: saddena asuddhaṃ visamaṃ sammajjati. Mohacarito sithilaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā samparivattakaṃ
anya-e0101n:761_0: Yathā sammajjane, evaṃ cīvaradhovanarajanādīsupi sabbakiccesu nipuṇamadhurasamasakkaccakārī
anya-e0101n:761_2: mohacarito. Cīvaradhāraṇampi ca rāgacaritassa nātigāḷhaṃ nātisithilaṃ hoti pāsādikaṃ
anya-e0101n:761_3: parimaṇḍalaṃ. Dosacaritassa atigāḷhaṃ aparimaṇḍalaṃ. Mohacaritassa sithilaṃ paribyākulaṃ.
anya-e0101n:761_4: Saddhācaritādayo tesaṃyevānusārena veditabbā, taṃ sabhāgattāti. Evaṃ kiccato cariyāyo vibhāvaye.
anya-e0101n:762_0: Bhojanāti rāgacarito siniddhamadhurabhojanappiyo hoti, bhuñjamāno ca nātimahantaṃ
anya-e0101n:762_1: parimaṇḍalaṃ ālopaṃ katvā rasapaṭisaṃvedī ataramāno bhuñjati, kiñcideva ca sāduṃ
anya-e0101n:762_2: labhitvā somanassaṃ āpajjati. Dosacarito lūkhaambilabhojanappiyo hoti, bhuñjamāno
anya-e0101n:762_3: ca mukhapūrakaṃ ālopaṃ katvā arasapaṭisaṃvedī taramāno bhuñjati, kiñcideva ca asāduṃ
anya-e0101n:762_4: labhitvā domanassaṃ āpajjati. Mohacarito aniyataruciko hoti, bhuñjamāno ca aparimaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0101n:762_5: parittaṃ ālopaṃ katvā bhājane chaḍḍento mukhaṃ makkhento vikkhittacitto taṃ taṃ vitakkento
anya-e0101n:762_6: bhuñjati. Saddhācaritādayopi tesaṃyevānusārena veditabbā, taṃsabhāgattāti. Evaṃ bhojanato cariyāyo vibhāvaye.
anya-e0101n:763_0: Dassanāditoti rāgacarito īsakampi manoramaṃ rūpaṃ disvā vimhayajāto viya ciraṃ oloketi,
anya-e0101n:763_1: parittepi guṇe sajjati, bhūtampi dosaṃ na gaṇhāti, pakkamantopi amuñcitukāmova hutvā
anya-e0101n:763_2: sāpekkho pakkamati. Dosacarito īsakampi amanoramaṃ rūpaṃ disvā kilantarūpo viya na
anya-e0101n:763_3: ciraṃ oloketi, parittepi dose paṭihaññati, bhūtampi guṇaṃ na gaṇhāti, pakkamantopi
anya-e0101n:763_4: muñcitukāmova hutvā anapekkho pakkamati. Mohacarito yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ disvā parapaccayiko
anya-e0101n:763_5: hoti, paraṃ nindantaṃ sutvā nindati, pasaṃsantaṃ sutvā pasaṃsati, sayaṃ pana aññāṇupekkhāya
anya-e0101n:763_6: upekkhakova hoti. Esa nayo saddasavanādīsupi. Saddhācaritādayo pana tesaṃyevānusārena
anya-e0101n:763_7: veditabbā, taṃsabhāgattāti. Evaṃ dassanādito cariyāyo vibhāvaye.
anya-e0101n:764_0: Dhammappavattito cevāti rāgacaritassa ca māyā, sāṭheyyaṃ, māno, pāpicchatā, mahicchatā,
anya-e0101n:764_1: asantuṭṭhitā, siṅgaṃ, cāpalyanti evamādayo dhammā bahulaṃ pavattanti. Dosacaritassa
anya-e0101n:764_2: kodho, upanāho, makkho, paḷāso, issā, macchariyanti evamādayo. Mohacaritassa thinaṃ,
anya-e0101n:764_3: middhaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, kukkuccaṃ, vicikicchā, ādhānaggāhitā, duppaṭinissaggitāti evamādayo.
anya-e0101n:764_4: Saddhācaritassa muttacāgatā, ariyānaṃ dassanakāmatā, saddhammaṃ sotukāmatā, pāmojjabahulatā,
anya-e0101n:764_5: asaṭhatā, amāyāvitā, pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādoti evamādayo. Buddhicaritassa sovacassatā,
anya-e0101n:764_7: ṭhānesu saṃvego, saṃviggassa ca yoniso padhānanti evamādayo. Vitakkacaritassa bhassabahulatā,
anya-e0101n:764_8: gaṇārāmatā, kusalānuyoge arati, anavaṭṭhitakiccatā, rattiṃ dhūmāyanā, divā pajjalanā,
anya-e0101n:764_9: hurāhuraṃ dhāvanāti evamādayo dhammā bahulaṃ pavattantīti. Evaṃ dhammappavattito cariyāyo vibhāvaye.
anya-e0101n:765_0: Yasmā pana idaṃ cariyāvibhāvanavidhānaṃ sabbākārena neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:765_1: āgataṃ, kevalaṃ ācariyamatānusārena vuttaṃ, tasmā na sārato paccetabbaṃ. Rāgacaritassa
anya-e0101n:765_2: hi vuttāni iriyāpathādīni dosacaritādayopi appamādavihārino kātuṃ sakkonti. Saṃsaṭṭhacaritassa
anya-e0101n:765_3: ca puggalassa ekasseva bhinnalakkhaṇā iriyāpathādayo na upapajjanti. Yaṃ panetaṃ
anya-e0101n:765_4: aṭṭhakathāsu cariyāvibhāvanavidhānaṃ vuttaṃ, tadeva sārato paccetabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0101n:765_5: “cetopariyañāṇassa lābhī ācariyo cariyaṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessati, itarena antevāsiko
anya-e0101n:765_6: pucchitabbo”ti. Tasmā cetopariyañāṇena vā taṃ vā puggalaṃ pucchitvā jānitabbaṃ. Ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_0: 46. Kiṃ caritassa puggalassa kiṃ sappāyanti ettha pana senāsanaṃ tāva rāgacaritassa
anya-e0101n:766_1: adhotavedikaṃ bhūmaṭṭhakaṃ akatapabbhārakaṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ paṇṇasālādīnaṃ aññataraṃ
anya-e0101n:766_2: rajokiṇṇaṃ jatukābharitaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ atiuccaṃ vā atinīcaṃ vā ujjaṅgalaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_3: asucivisamamaggaṃ, yattha mañcapīṭhampi maṅkuṇabharitaṃ durūpaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ, yaṃ olokentasseva
anya-e0101n:766_4: jigucchā uppajjati, tādisaṃ sappāyaṃ. Nivāsanapārupanaṃ antacchinnaṃ olambavilambasuttakākiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_5: jālapūvasadisaṃ sāṇi viya kharasamphassaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ bhārikaṃ kicchapariharaṇaṃ sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:766_6: Pattopi dubbaṇṇo mattikāpatto vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato ayopatto vā garuko dussaṇṭhāno sīsakapālamiva
anya-e0101n:766_7: jeguccho vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāramaggopi amanāpo anāsannagāmo visamo vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāragāmopi
anya-e0101n:766_8: yattha manussā apassantā viya caranti, yattha ekakulepi bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā nikkhamantaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_9: “ehi, bhante”ti āsanasālaṃ pavesetvā yāgubhattaṃ datvā gacchantā gāvī viya vaje pavesetvā
anya-e0101n:766_10: anapalokentā gacchanti, tādiso vaṭṭati. Parivisakamanussāpi dāsā vā kammakarā vā
anya-e0101n:766_11: dubbaṇṇā duddasikā kiliṭṭhavasanā duggandhā jegucchā, ye acittīkārena yāgubhattaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_12: chaḍḍentā viya parivisanti, tādisā sappāyā. Yāgubhattakhajjakampi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_14: kevalaṃ udarapūramattaṃ vaṭṭati. Iriyāpathopissa ṭhānaṃ vā caṅkamo vā vaṭṭati. Ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:766_15: nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci aparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ rāgacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:767_0: Dosacaritassa senāsanaṃ nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ suvibhattabhittithambhasopānaṃ
anya-e0101n:767_3: tattha tattha vāsatthāya nikkhittakusumavāsagandhasugandhaṃ yaṃ dassanamatteneva
anya-e0101n:767_4: pītipāmojjaṃ janayati, evarūpaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa pana senāsanassa maggopi sabbaparissayavimutto
anya-e0101n:767_8: ekapaṭṭaṃ vā dupaṭṭaṃ vā sallahukaṃ samaṇasāruppena surattaṃ suddhavaṇṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:767_9: Patto udakapupphuḷamiva susaṇṭhāno maṇi viya sumaṭṭho nimmalo samaṇasāruppena suparisuddhavaṇṇo
anya-e0101n:767_10: ayomayo vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāramaggo parissayavimutto samo manāpo nātidūranāccāsannagāmo
anya-e0101n:767_11: vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāragāmopi yattha manussā “idāni ayyo āgamissatī”ti sittasammaṭṭhe
anya-e0101n:767_12: padese āsanaṃ paññāpetvā paccuggantvā pattaṃ ādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsane
anya-e0101n:767_13: nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ sahatthā parivisanti, tādiso vaṭṭati. Parivesakā panassa ye
anya-e0101n:767_14: honti abhirūpā pāsādikā sunhātā suvilittā dhūpavāsakusumagandhasurabhino nānāvirāgasucimanuññavatthābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā
anya-e0101n:767_15: sakkaccakārino, tādisā sappāyā. Yāgubhattakhajjakampi vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ ojavantaṃ
anya-e0101n:767_16: manoramaṃ sabbākārapaṇītaṃ yāvadatthaṃ vaṭṭati. Iriyāpathopissa seyyā vā nisajjā
anya-e0101n:767_17: vā vaṭṭati, ārammaṇaṃ nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci suparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ dosacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:768_0: Mohacaritassa senāsanaṃ disāmukhaṃ asambādhaṃ vaṭṭati, yattha nisinnassa vivaṭā disā
anya-e0101n:768_1: khāyanti, iriyāpathesu caṅkamo vaṭṭati. Ārammaṇaṃ panassa parittaṃ suppamattaṃ sarāvamattaṃ
anya-e0101n:768_2: vā (khuddakaṃ) na vaṭṭati. Sambādhasmiñhi okāse cittaṃ bhiyyo sammohamāpajjati, tasmā
anya-e0101n:768_3: vipulaṃ mahākasiṇaṃ vaṭṭati. Sesaṃ dosacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ mohacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:769: Saddhācaritassa sabbampi dosacaritamhi vuttavidhānaṃ sappāyaṃ. Ārammaṇesu cassa anussatiṭṭhānampi vaṭṭati.
anya-e0101n:770: Buddhicaritassa senāsanādīsu idaṃ nāma asappāyanti natthi.
anya-e0101n:771_0: Vitakkacaritassa senāsanaṃ vivaṭaṃ disāmukhaṃ yattha nisinnassa ārāmavanapokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakāni
anya-e0101n:771_1: gāmanigamajanapadapaṭipāṭiyo nīlobhāsā ca pabbatā paññāyanti, taṃ na vaṭṭati, tañhi
anya-e0101n:771_2: vitakkavidhāvanasseva paccayo hoti, tasmā gambhīre darīmukhe vanappaṭicchanne hatthikucchipabbhāramahindaguhāsadise
anya-e0101n:771_3: senāsane vasitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇampissa vipulaṃ na vaṭṭati. Tādisañhi vitakkavasena sandhāvanassa
anya-e0101n:772_0: Sesaṃ rāgacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ vitakkacaritassa sappāyaṃ. Ayaṃ attano
anya-e0101n:772_2: Na ca tāva cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbākārena āvikataṃ. Tañhi anantarassa mātikāpadassa
anya-e0101n:774_0: 47. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha
anya-e0101n:774_2: ārammaṇato, bhūmito, gahaṇato, paccayato, cariyānukūlatoti imehi tāva dasahākārehi
anya-e0101n:775_0: Tattha saṅkhātaniddesatoti cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesūti hi vuttaṃ, tatrimāni cattālīsa
anya-e0101n:775_1: kammaṭṭhānāni dasa kasiṇā, dasa asubhā, dasa anussatiyo, cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāro
anya-e0101n:776: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ, āpokasiṇaṃ, tejokasiṇaṃ, vāyokasiṇaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ, pītakasiṇaṃ, lohitakasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇaṃ, ālokakasiṇaṃ, paricchinnākāsakasiṇanti ime dasa kasiṇā.
anya-e0101n:777: Uddhumātakaṃ, vinīlakaṃ, vipubbakaṃ, vicchiddakaṃ, vikkhāyitakaṃ, vikkhittakaṃ, hatavikkhittakaṃ, lohitakaṃ, puḷuvakaṃ, aṭṭhikanti ime dasa asubhā.
anya-e0101n:778: Buddhānussati, dhammānussati, saṅghānussati, sīlānussati, cāgānussati, devatānussati, maraṇānussati, kāyagatāsati, ānāpānassati, upasamānussatīti imā dasa anussatiyo.
anya-e0101n:779: Mettā, karuṇā, muditā, upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā.
anya-e0101n:780_1: ime cattāro āruppā. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ekā saññā. Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti
anya-e0101n:781_0: Upacārappanāvahatoti ṭhapetvā kāyagatāsatiñca ānāpānassatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
anya-e0101n:781_1: āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, catudhātuvavatthānanti imāneva hettha dasakammaṭṭhānāni upacāravahāni.
anya-e0101n:782_0: Jhānappabhedatoti appanāvahesu cettha ānāpānassatiyā saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇā catukkajjhānikā
anya-e0101n:782_1: honti. Kāyagatāsatiyā saddhiṃ dasa asubhā paṭhamajjhānikā. Purimā tayo brahmavihārā
anya-e0101n:782_2: tikajjhānikā. Catutthabrahmavihāro cattāro ca āruppā catutthajjhānikāti evaṃ jhānappabhedato.
anya-e0101n:783_0: Samatikkamatoti dve samatikkamā aṅgasamatikkamo ca ārammaṇasamatikkamo ca. Tattha
anya-e0101n:783_1: sabbesupi tikacatukkajjhānikesu kammaṭṭhānesu aṅgasamatikkamo hoti vitakkavicārādīni
anya-e0101n:783_2: jhānaṅgāni samatikkamitvā tesvevārammaṇesu dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ pattabbato. Tathā catutthabrahmavihāre.
anya-e0101n:783_3: Sopi hi mettādīnaṃyeva ārammaṇe somanassaṃ samatikkamitvā pattabboti. Catūsu pana
anya-e0101n:783_4: āruppesu ārammaṇasamatikkamo hoti. Purimesu hi navasu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ samatikkamitvā
anya-e0101n:783_5: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pattabbaṃ. Ākāsādīni ca samatikkamitvā viññāṇañcāyatanādīni. Sesesu
anya-e0101n:784_0: Vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanatoti imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:784_1: Yattakañhi okāsaṃ kasiṇena pharati, tadabbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ sotuṃ
anya-e0101n:784_2: dibbena cakkhunā rūpāni passituṃ parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hoti.
anya-e0101n:784_3: Kāyagatāsati pana asubhāni ca na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Kasmā? Okāsena paricchinnattā ānisaṃsābhāvā
anya-e0101n:784_4: ca. Sā ca nesaṃ okāsena paricchinnatā bhāvanānaye āvibhavissati. Tesu pana vaḍḍhitesu
anya-e0101n:784_5: kuṇaparāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, na koci ānisaṃso atthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ sopākapañhābyākaraṇe,
anya-e0101n:784_6: “vibhūtā bhagavā rūpasaññā avibhūtā aṭṭhikasaññā”ti. Tatra hi nimittavaḍḍhanavasena
anya-e0101n:784_7: rūpasaññā vibhūtāti vuttā. Aṭṭhikasaññā avaḍḍhanavasena avibhūtāti vuttā.
anya-e0101n:785_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ “kevalaṃ aṭṭhisaññāya, apharī pathaviṃ ima”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ lābhissa sato
anya-e0101n:785_1: upaṭṭhānākāravasena vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi dhammāsokakāle karavīkasakuṇo samantā ādāsabhittīsu
anya-e0101n:785_2: attano chāyaṃ disvā sabbadisāsu karavīkasaññī hutvā madhuraṃ giraṃ nicchāresi, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:785_3: theropi aṭṭhikasaññāya lābhittā sabbadisāsu upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ passanto kevalāpi
anya-e0101n:786_0: Yadi evaṃ yā asubhajjhānānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā vuttā, sā virujjhatīti. Sā ca na virujjhati.
anya-e0101n:786_1: Ekacco hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti. Ekacco appake. Iminā
anya-e0101n:786_2: pariyāyena ekaccassa parittārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ hoti. Ekaccassa appamāṇārammaṇanti. Yo
anya-e0101n:786_3: vā etaṃ vaḍḍhane ādīnavaṃ apassanto vaḍḍheti. Taṃ sandhāya “appamāṇārammaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:787_0: Yathā ca etāni, evaṃ sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Kasmā? Tesu hi ānāpānanimittaṃ tāva
anya-e0101n:787_1: vaḍḍhayato vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, okāsena ca paricchinnaṃ. Iti sādīnavattā okāsena
anya-e0101n:787_2: ca paricchinnattā na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Brahmavihārā sattārammaṇā, tesaṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhayato
anya-e0101n:787_3: sattarāsiyeva vaḍḍheyya, na ca tena attho atthi, tasmā tampi na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Yaṃ
anya-e0101n:787_4: pana vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā”ti ādi, taṃ pariggahavaseneva
anya-e0101n:787_5: vuttaṃ. Ekāvāsadviāvāsādinā hi anukkamena ekissā disāya satte pariggahetvā bhāvento
anya-e0101n:787_6: ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvāti vutto. Na nimittaṃ vaḍḍhento. Paṭibhāganimittameva cettha natthi.
anya-e0101n:787_7: Yadayaṃ vaḍḍheyya, parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha pariggahavaseneva veditabbā. Āruppārammaṇesupi
anya-e0101n:787_8: ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimattā. Tañhi kasiṇāpagamavaseneva manasi kātabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ
anya-e0101n:787_9: vaḍḍhayatopi na kiñci hoti. Viññāṇaṃ sabhāvadhammattā. Na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṃ
anya-e0101n:787_11: sabhāvadhammattāyeva na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Sesāni animittattā. Paṭibhāganimittañhi vaḍḍhetabbaṃ
anya-e0101n:787_12: nāma bhaveyya. Buddhānussatiādīnañca neva paṭibhāganimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā
anya-e0101n:788_0: Ārammaṇatoti imesu ca cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasakasiṇā, dasaasubhā, ānāpānassati,
anya-e0101n:788_1: kāyagatāsatīti imāni dvāvīsatipaṭibhāganimittārammaṇāni. Sesāni na paṭibhāganimittārammaṇāni.
anya-e0101n:788_2: Tathā dasasu anussatīsu ṭhapetvā ānāpānassatiñca kāyagatāsatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
anya-e0101n:788_4: imāni dvādasa sabhāvadhammārammaṇāni. Dasa kasiṇā, dasa asubhā, ānāpānassati, kāyagatāsatīti
anya-e0101n:788_5: imāni dvāvīsati nimittārammaṇāni. Sesāni cha na vattabbārammaṇāni. Tathā vipubbakaṃ,
anya-e0101n:788_6: lohitakaṃ, puḷuvakaṃ, ānāpānassati, āpokasiṇaṃ, tejokasiṇaṃ, vāyokasiṇaṃ, yañca ālokakasiṇe
anya-e0101n:788_7: sūriyādīnaṃ obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇanti imāni aṭṭha calitārammaṇāni, tāni ca kho pubbabhāge,
anya-e0101n:788_8: paṭibhāgaṃ pana sannisinnameva hoti. Sesāni na calitārammaṇānīti evaṃ ārammaṇato.
anya-e0101n:789_0: Bhūmitoti ettha ca dasa asubhā, kāyagatāsati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imāni dvādasa
anya-e0101n:789_1: devesu nappavattanti. Tāni dvādasa, ānāpānassati cāti imāni terasa brahmaloke nappavattanti.
anya-e0101n:789_2: Arūpabhave pana ṭhapetvā cattāro āruppe aññaṃ nappavattati. Manussesu sabbānipi pavattantīti evaṃ bhūmito.
anya-e0101n:790_0: Gahaṇatoti diṭṭhaphuṭṭhasutaggahaṇatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Tatra ṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n:790_1: vāyokasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā, dasa asubhāti imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭhena gahetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:790_2: Pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho. Kāyagatāsatiyaṃ tacapañcakaṃ
anya-e0101n:790_3: diṭṭhena, sesaṃ sutenāti evaṃ tassā ārammaṇaṃ diṭṭhasutena gahetabbaṃ. Ānāpānassati
anya-e0101n:790_4: phuṭṭhena, vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhena, sesāni aṭṭhārasa sutena gahetabbāni. Upekkhābrahmavihāro,
anya-e0101n:790_5: cattāro āruppāti imāni cettha na ādikammikena gahetabbāni. Sesāni pañcatiṃsa gahetabbānīti evaṃ gahaṇato.
anya-e0101n:791_0: Paccayatoti imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā ākāsakasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā āruppānaṃ
anya-e0101n:791_1: paccayā honti, dasa kasiṇā abhiññānaṃ, tayo brahmavihārā catutthabrahmavihārassa,
anya-e0101n:791_2: heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ āruppaṃ uparimassa uparimassa, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā,
anya-e0101n:792_0: Cariyānukūlatoti cariyānaṃ anukūlatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Seyyathidaṃ – rāgacaritassa
anya-e0101n:792_1: tāva ettha dasa asubhā, kāyagatāsatīti ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlāni. Dosacaritassa
anya-e0101n:792_2: cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇānīti aṭṭha. Mohacaritassa, vitakkacaritassa
anya-e0101n:792_3: ca ekaṃ ānāpānassati kammaṭṭhānameva. Saddhācaritassa purimā cha anussatiyo. Buddhicaritassa
anya-e0101n:792_4: maraṇassati, upasamānussati, catudhātuvavatthānaṃ, āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti cattāri.
anya-e0101n:792_5: Sesakasiṇāni, cattāro ca āruppā sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni. Kasiṇesu ca yaṃkiñci parittaṃ
anya-e0101n:793_0: Evamettha cariyānukūlato vinicchayo veditabboti sabbañcetaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena
anya-e0101n:793_1: ca atisappāyavasena ca vuttaṃ. Rāgādīnaṃ pana avikkhambhikā saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārā
anya-e0101n:793_2: kusalabhāvanā nāma natthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ meghiyasutte –
anya-e0101n:794_0: “Cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā. Asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya. Mettā bhāvetabbā
anya-e0101n:794_1: byāpādassa pahānāya. Ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya. Aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā
anya-e0101n:795_0: Rāhulasuttepi “mettaṃ, rāhula, bhāvanaṃ bhāvehī”tiādinā nayena ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0101n:795_1: vuttāni. Tasmā vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā sabbattha adhippāyo pariyesitabboti
anya-e0101n:795_2: ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha kammaṭṭhānakathā vinicchayo.
anya-e0101n:796_0: 48. Gahetvāti imassa pana padassa ayamatthadīpanā. “Tena yoginā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ
anya-e0101n:796_1: kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā”ti ettha vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0101n:796_2: buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā
anya-e0101n:797_0: Tatra “imāhaṃ bhagavā attabhāvaṃ tumhākaṃ pariccajāmī”ti evaṃ buddhassa bhagavato
anya-e0101n:797_1: attā niyyātetabbo. Evañhi aniyyātetvā pantesu senāsanesu viharanto bheravārammaṇe
anya-e0101n:797_2: āpāthamāgate santhambhituṃ asakkonto gāmantaṃ osaritvā gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho hutvā anesanaṃ
anya-e0101n:797_3: āpajjitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyya. Niyyātitattabhāvassa panassa bheravārammaṇe āpāthamāgatepi
anya-e0101n:797_4: bhayaṃ na uppajjati. “Nanu tayā, paṇḍita, purimameva attā buddhānaṃ niyyātito”ti
anya-e0101n:797_5: paccavekkhato panassa somanassameva uppajjati. Yathā hi purisassa uttamaṃ kāsikavatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:797_6: bhaveyya, tassa tasmiṃ mūsikāya vā kīṭehi vā khādite uppajjeyya domanassaṃ. Sace
anya-e0101n:797_7: pana taṃ acīvarakassa bhikkhuno dadeyya, athassa taṃ tena bhikkhunā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ
anya-e0101n:797_8: kariyamānaṃ disvāpi somanassameva uppajjeyya. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:798_0: Ācariyassa niyyātentenāpi “imāhaṃ, bhante, attabhāvaṃ tumhākaṃ pariccajāmī”ti vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:798_1: Evaṃ aniyyātitattabhāvo hi atajjanīyo vā hoti, dubbaco vā anovādakaro, yenakāmaṃgamo
anya-e0101n:798_2: vā ācariyaṃ anāpucchāva yatthicchati, tattha gantā, tamenaṃ ācariyo āmisena vā dhammena
anya-e0101n:798_3: vā na saṅgaṇhāti, gūḷhaṃ ganthaṃ na sikkhāpeti. So imaṃ duvidhaṃ saṅgahaṃ alabhanto
anya-e0101n:798_4: sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati, nacirasseva dussīlyaṃ vā gihibhāvaṃ vā pāpuṇāti. Niyyātitattabhāvo
anya-e0101n:798_5: pana neva atajjanīyo hoti, na yenakāmaṃgamo, suvaco ācariyāyattavuttiyeva hoti. So
anya-e0101n:798_6: ācariyato duvidhaṃ saṅgahaṃ labhanto sāsane vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattherassa antevāsikā viya.
anya-e0101n:799_0: Therassa kira santikaṃ tayo bhikkhū āgamaṃsu. Tesu eko “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākamatthāyā”ti
anya-e0101n:799_1: vutte sataporise papāte patituṃ ussaheyyanti āha. Dutiyo “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākamatthāyā”ti
anya-e0101n:799_2: vutte imaṃ attabhāvaṃ paṇhito paṭṭhāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe ghaṃsento niravasesaṃ khepetuṃ
anya-e0101n:799_3: ussaheyyanti āha. Tatiyo “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākamatthāyā”ti vutte assāsapassāse uparundhitvā
anya-e0101n:799_4: kālakiriyaṃ kātuṃ ussaheyyanti āha. Thero bhabbāvatime bhikkhūti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0101n:799_5: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā tayopi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti ayamānisaṃso attaniyyātane. Tena
anya-e0101n:799_6: vuttaṃ “buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā”ti.
anya-e0101n:800_0: 49. Sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā ca hutvāti ettha pana tena yoginā alobhādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:800_1: vasena chahākārehi sampannajjhāsayena bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ sampannajjhāsayo hi tissannaṃ
anya-e0101n:800_2: bodhīnaṃ aññataraṃ pāpuṇāti. Yathāha, “cha ajjhāsayā bodhisattānaṃ bodhiparipākāya
anya-e0101n:800_3: saṃvattanti, alobhajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā lobhe dosadassāvino, adosajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā
anya-e0101n:800_4: dose dosadassāvino, amohajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā mohe dosadassāvino, nekkhammajjhāsayā
anya-e0101n:800_5: ca bodhisattā gharāvāse dosadassāvino, pavivekajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā saṅgaṇikāya
anya-e0101n:800_6: dosadassāvino, nissaraṇajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā sabbabhavagatīsu dosadassāvino”ti.
anya-e0101n:800_8: sabbe te imeheva chahākārehi attanā attanā pattabbaṃ visesaṃ pattā. Tasmā imehi chahākārehi
anya-e0101n:800_9: sampannajjhāsayena bhavitabbaṃ. Tadadhimuttatāya pana adhimuttisampannena bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:801_0: 50. Evaṃ sampannajjhāsayādhimuttino panassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācato cetopariyañāṇalābhinā
anya-e0101n:801_1: ācariyena cittācāraṃ oloketvā cariyā jānitabbā. Itarena kiṃ caritosi? Ke vā te dhammā
anya-e0101n:801_2: bahulaṃ samudācaranti? Kiṃ vā te manasikaroto phāsu hoti? Katarasmiṃ vā te kammaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:801_3: cittaṃ namatīti evamādīhi nayehi pucchitvā jānitabbā. Evaṃ ñatvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:802_0: Kathentena ca tividhena kathetabbaṃ. Pakatiyā uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa ekaṃ dve nisajjāni
anya-e0101n:802_1: sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā dātabbaṃ. Santike vasantassa āgatāgatakkhaṇe kathetabbaṃ. Uggahetvā
anya-e0101n:802_2: aññatra gantukāmassa nātisaṃkhittaṃ nātivitthārikaṃ katvā kathetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:803_0: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ tāva kathentena cattāro kasiṇadosā, kasiṇakaraṇaṃ, katassa
anya-e0101n:803_1: bhāvanānayo, duvidhaṃ nimittaṃ, duvidho samādhi, sattavidhaṃ sappāyāsappāyaṃ, dasavidhaṃ
anya-e0101n:803_2: appanākosallaṃ, vīriyasamatā, appanāvidhānanti ime nava ākārā kathetabbā. Sesakammaṭṭhānesupi
anya-e0101n:803_3: tassa tassa anurūpaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ bhāvanāvidhāne āvibhavissati.
anya-e0101n:804_0: Evaṃ kathiyamāne pana kammaṭṭhāne tena yoginā nimittaṃ gahetvā sotabbaṃ. Nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:804_1: gahetvāti idaṃ heṭṭhimapadaṃ, idaṃ uparimapadaṃ, ayamassa attho, ayamadhippāyo, idamopammanti
anya-e0101n:804_2: evaṃ taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ upanibandhitvāti attho. Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sakkaccaṃ suṇantena
anya-e0101n:804_3: hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti. Athassa taṃ nissāya visesādhigamo sampajjati, na
anya-e0101n:804_4: itarassāti ayaṃ gahetvāti imassa padassa atthaparidīpanā.
anya-e0101n:805: Ettāvatā kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano cariyānukūlaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti imāni padāni sabbākārena vitthāritāni hontīti.
anya-e0101n:811_0: 51. Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantenā”ti
anya-e0101n:811_1: ettha yassa tāvācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasato phāsu hoti, tena tattheva kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:811_2: parisodhentena vasitabbaṃ. Sace tattha phāsu na hoti, yo añño gāvute vā aḍḍhayojane
anya-e0101n:811_3: vā yojanamattepi vā sappāyo vihāro hoti, tattha vasitabbaṃ. Evañhi sati kammaṭṭhānassa
anya-e0101n:811_4: kismiñcideva ṭhāne sandehe vā satisammose vā jāte kālasseva vihāre vattaṃ katvā antarāmagge
anya-e0101n:811_5: piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccapariyosāneyeva ācariyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃdivasamācariyassa
anya-e0101n:811_6: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā dutiyadivase ācariyaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā antarāmagge
anya-e0101n:811_7: piṇḍāya caritvā akilamantoyeva attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantuṃ sakkhissati. Yo pana
anya-e0101n:811_8: yojanappamāṇepi phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ na labhati, tena kammaṭṭhāne sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:811_9: chinditvā suvisuddhaṃ āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ katvā dūrampi gantvā samādhibhāvanāya
anya-e0101n:811_10: ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:813_0: 52. Tattha ananurūpo nāma aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgato. Tatrime aṭṭhārasa
anya-e0101n:813_1: dosā – mahattaṃ, navattaṃ, jiṇṇattaṃ, panthanissitattaṃ, soṇḍī, paṇṇaṃ, pupphaṃ,
anya-e0101n:813_2: phalaṃ, patthanīyatā, nagarasannissitatā, dārusannissitatā, khettasannissitatā, visabhāgānaṃ
anya-e0101n:813_4: asappāyatā, kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena dosena
anya-e0101n:813_5: samannāgato ananurūpo nāma. Na tattha vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:814_0: Kasmā? Mahāvihāre tāva bahū nānāchandā sannipatanti, te aññamaññaṃ paṭiviruddhatāya
anya-e0101n:814_1: vattaṃ na karonti. Bodhiyaṅgaṇādīni asammaṭṭhāneva honti. Anupaṭṭhāpitaṃ pānīyaṃ
anya-e0101n:814_2: paribhojanīyaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ gocaragāme piṇḍāya carissāmīti pattacīvaramādāya nikkhanto
anya-e0101n:814_3: sace passati vattaṃ vā akataṃ pānīyaghaṭaṃ vā rittaṃ, athānena vattaṃ kātabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:814_4: pānīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ. Akaronto vattabhede dukkaṭaṃ āpajjati. Karontassa kālo atikkamati,
anya-e0101n:814_5: atidivā paviṭṭho niṭṭhitāya bhikkhāya kiñci na labhati. Paṭisallānagatopi sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:814_6: uccāsaddena saṅghakammehi ca vikkhipati. Yattha pana sabbaṃ vattaṃ katameva hoti,
anya-e0101n:814_7: avasesāpi ca saṅghaṭṭanā natthi. Evarūpe mahāvihārepi vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:815: Navavihāre bahu navakammaṃ hoti, akarontaṃ ujjhāyanti. Yattha pana bhikkhū evaṃ vadanti “āyasmā yathāsukhaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karotu, mayaṃ navakammaṃ karissāmā”ti evarūpe vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:816: Jiṇṇavihāre pana bahu paṭijaggitabbaṃ hoti, antamaso attano senāsanamattampi appaṭijaggantaṃ ujjhāyanti, paṭijaggantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ parihāyati.
anya-e0101n:817_0: Panthanissite mahāpathavihāre rattindivaṃ āgantukā sannipatanti. Vikāle āgatānaṃ
anya-e0101n:817_1: attano senāsanaṃ datvā rukkhamūle vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe vā vasitabbaṃ hoti. Punadivasepi
anya-e0101n:817_2: evamevāti kammaṭṭhānassa okāso na hoti. Yattha pana evarūpo āgantukasambādho na hoti, tattha vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:818_0: Soṇḍī nāma pāsāṇapokkharaṇī hoti, tattha pānīyatthaṃ mahājano samosarati, nagaravāsīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:818_1: rājakulūpakattherānaṃ antevāsikā rajanakammatthāya āgacchanti, tesaṃ bhājanadārudoṇikādīni
anya-e0101n:818_2: pucchantānaṃ asuke ca asuke ca ṭhāneti dassetabbāni honti, evaṃ sabbakālampi niccabyāvaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n:819_0: Yattha nānāvidhaṃ sākapaṇṇaṃ hoti, tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnassāpi
anya-e0101n:819_1: santike sākahārikā gāyamānā paṇṇaṃ uccinantiyo visabhāgasaddasaṅghaṭṭanena kammaṭṭhānantarāyaṃ karonti.
anya-e0101n:820: Yattha pana nānāvidhā mālāgacchā supupphitā honti, tatrāpi tādisoyeva upaddavo.
anya-e0101n:821_0: Yattha nānāvidhaṃ ambajambupanasādiphalaṃ hoti, tattha phalatthikā āgantvā yācanti,
anya-e0101n:821_1: adentassa kujjhanti, balakkārena vā gaṇhanti, sāyanhasamaye vihāramajjhe caṅkamantena
anya-e0101n:821_2: te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vuttā yathāruci akkosanti. Avāsāyapissa parakkamanti.
anya-e0101n:822_1: vihāre viharantaṃ ayamarahāti sambhāvetvā vanditukāmā manussā samantā osaranti, tenassa
anya-e0101n:822_2: na phāsu hoti, yassa pana taṃ sappāyaṃ hoti, tena divā aññatra gantvā rattiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:823_0: Nagarasannissite visabhāgārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchanti, kumbhadāsiyopi ghaṭehi nighaṃsantiyo
anya-e0101n:823_1: gacchanti, okkamitvā maggaṃ na denti, issaramanussāpi vihāramajjhe sāṇiṃ parikkhipitvā nisīdanti.
anya-e0101n:824_0: Dārusannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabbupakaraṇarukkhā ca santi, tattha kaṭṭhahārikā
anya-e0101n:824_1: pubbe vuttasākapupphahārikā viya aphāsuṃ karonti, vihāre rukkhā santi, te chinditvā
anya-e0101n:824_2: gharāni karissāmāti manussā āgantvā chindanti. Sace sāyanhasamayaṃ padhānagharā nikkhamitvā
anya-e0101n:824_3: vihāramajjhe caṅkamanto te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vadati, yathāruci akkosanti,
anya-e0101n:825_0: Yo pana khettasannissito hoti samantā khettehi parivārito, tattha manussā vihāramajjheyeva
anya-e0101n:825_1: khalaṃ katvā dhaññaṃ maddanti, pamukhesu sayanti, aññampi bahuṃ aphāsuṃ karonti.
anya-e0101n:825_2: Yatrāpi mahāsaṅghabhogo hoti, ārāmikā kulānaṃ gāvo rundhanti, udakavāraṃ paṭisedhenti,
anya-e0101n:825_3: manussā vīhisīsaṃ gahetvā “passatha tumhākaṃ ārāmikānaṃ kamma”nti saṅghassa dassenti.
anya-e0101n:825_4: Tena tena kāraṇena rājarājamahāmattānaṃ gharadvāraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti, ayampi khettasannissiteneva saṅgahito.
anya-e0101n:826_0: Visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitāti yattha aññamaññaṃ visabhāgaverī bhikkhū viharanti,
anya-e0101n:826_1: ye kalahaṃ karontā mā, bhante, evaṃ karothāti vāriyamānā etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgatakālato
anya-e0101n:827: Yopi udakapaṭṭanaṃ vā thalapaṭṭanaṃ vā nissito hoti, tattha abhiṇhaṃ nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgatamanussā okāsaṃ detha, pānīyaṃ detha, loṇaṃ dethāti ghaṭṭayantā aphāsuṃ karonti.
anya-e0101n:828: Paccantasannissite pana manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti.
anya-e0101n:829_0: Rajjasīmasannissite rājabhayaṃ hoti. Tañhi padesaṃ eko rājā na mayhaṃ vase vattatīti
anya-e0101n:829_1: paharati, itaropi na mayhaṃ vase vattatīti. Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño
anya-e0101n:829_2: vijite vicarati, kadāci etassa. Atha naṃ “carapuriso aya”nti maññamānā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
anya-e0101n:830_0: Asappāyatāti visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇasamosaraṇena vā amanussapariggahitatāya vā asappāyatā.
anya-e0101n:830_1: Tatridaṃ vatthu. Eko kira thero araññe vasati. Athassa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāladvāre
anya-e0101n:830_2: ṭhatvā gāyi. So nikkhamitvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi, sā gantvā caṅkamanasīse gāyi. Thero caṅkamanasīsaṃ
anya-e0101n:830_3: agamāsi. Sā sataporise papāte ṭhatvā gāyi. Thero paṭinivatti. Atha naṃ sā vegenāgantvā
anya-e0101n:830_4: gahetvā “mayā, bhante, na eko na dve tumhādisā khāditā”ti āha.
anya-e0101n:831_0: Kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti yattha na sakkā hoti ācariyaṃ vā ācariyasamaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:831_1: vā upajjhāyasamaṃ vā kalyāṇamittaṃ laddhuṃ. Tattha so kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābho mahādosoyevāti
anya-e0101n:831_2: imesaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgato ananurūpoti veditabbo. Vuttampi
anya-e0101n:833: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
anya-e0101n:839_0: 53. Yo pana gocaragāmato nātidūranāccāsannatādīhi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgato, ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:839_1: anurūpo nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “kathañca, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ
anya-e0101n:839_2: hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ,
anya-e0101n:839_4: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasireneva uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
anya-e0101n:839_5: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā
anya-e0101n:839_6: vinayadharā mātikādharā, te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ,
anya-e0101n:839_7: bhante, kathaṃ imassa ko attho’ti, tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca
anya-e0101n:839_8: uttānīkaronti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
anya-e0101n:839_9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hotī”ti.
anya-e0101n:840: Ayaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ananurūpaṃ vihāraṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantenā”ti ettha vitthāro.
anya-e0101n:842_0: 54. Khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvāti evaṃ patirūpe vihāre viharantena yepissa te
anya-e0101n:842_1: honti khuddakapalibodhā, tepi upacchinditabbā. Seyyathidaṃ, dīghāni kesanakhalomāni
anya-e0101n:842_2: chinditabbāni. Jiṇṇacīvaresu daḷhīkammaṃ vā tunnakammaṃ vā kātabbaṃ. Kiliṭṭhāni vā
anya-e0101n:842_3: rajitabbāni. Sace patte malaṃ hoti, patto pacitabbo. Mañcapīṭhādīni sodhetabbānīti.
anya-e0101n:844: 55. Idāni sabbaṃ bhāvanāvidhānaṃ aparihāpentena bhāvetabboti ettha ayaṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakammaṭṭhānavasena vitthārakathā hoti.
anya-e0101n:845_0: Evaṃ upacchinnakhuddakapalibodhena hi bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
anya-e0101n:845_1: bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā pavivitte okāse sukhanisinnena katāya vā akatāya vā
anya-e0101n:846_0: “Pathavīkasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto pathaviyaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti kate vā akate vā sāntake,
anya-e0101n:846_1: no anantake, sakoṭiye, no akoṭiye, savaṭṭume, no avaṭṭume, sapariyante, no apariyante,
anya-e0101n:846_2: suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā. So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karoti, sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti,
anya-e0101n:846_3: suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapeti. So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā
anya-e0101n:846_4: suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n:846_5: sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhati ‘addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā
anya-e0101n:846_6: muccissāmī’ti. So vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:847_0: Tattha yena atītabhavepi sāsane vā isipabbajjāya vā pabbajitvā pathavīkasiṇe catukkapañcakajjhānāni
anya-e0101n:847_1: nibbattitapubbāni, evarūpassa puññavato upanissayasampannassa akatāya pathaviyā kasitaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:847_2: vā khalamaṇḍale vā nimittaṃ uppajjati, mallakattherassa viya. Tassa kirāyasmato kasitaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:847_3: olokentassa taṃṭhānappamāṇameva nimittaṃ udapādi. So taṃ vaḍḍhetvā pañcakajjhānāni
anya-e0101n:847_4: nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0101n:848_0: Yo panevaṃ akatādhikāro hoti, tena ācariyasantike uggahitakammaṭṭhānavidhānaṃ avirādhetvā
anya-e0101n:848_1: cattāro kasiṇadose pariharantena kasiṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Nīlapītalohitaodātasambhedavasena
anya-e0101n:848_2: hi cattāro pathavīkasiṇadosā. Tasmā nīlādivaṇṇaṃ mattikaṃ aggahetvā gaṅgāvahe mattikāsadisāya
anya-e0101n:848_3: aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya kasiṇaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tañca kho vihāramajjhe sāmaṇerādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:848_4: na kātabbaṃ. Vihārapaccante pana paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pabbhāre vā paṇṇasālāya vā saṃhārimaṃ
anya-e0101n:848_5: vā tatraṭṭhakaṃ vā kātabbaṃ. Tatra saṃhārimaṃ catūsu daṇḍakesu pilotikaṃ vā cammaṃ
anya-e0101n:848_6: vā kaṭasārakaṃ vā bandhitvā tattha apanītatiṇamūlasakkharakathalikāya sumadditāya
anya-e0101n:848_7: mattikāya vuttappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭaṃ limpetvā kātabbaṃ. Taṃ parikammakāle bhūmiyaṃ attharitvā
anya-e0101n:848_8: oloketabbaṃ. Tatraṭṭhakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ padumakaṇṇikākārena khāṇuke ākoṭetvā vallīhi vinandhitvā
anya-e0101n:848_9: kātabbaṃ. Yadi sā mattikā nappahoti, adho aññaṃ pakkhipitvā uparibhāge suparisodhitāya
anya-e0101n:848_10: aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātabbaṃ. Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:848_11: sandhāya “suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sāntake no anantake”tiādi panassa
anya-e0101n:849_0: 56. Tasmā evaṃ vuttappamāṇaparicchedaṃ katvā rukkhapāṇikā visabhāgavaṇṇaṃ samuṭṭhapeti.
anya-e0101n:849_1: Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā pāsāṇapāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā samaṃ bherītalasadisaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:849_2: sammajjitvā nhatvā āgantvā kasiṇamaṇḍalato aḍḍhateyyahatthantare padese paññatte
anya-e0101n:849_3: vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake suatthate pīṭhe nisīditabbaṃ. Tato dūratare nisinnassa
anya-e0101n:849_4: hi kasiṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, āsannatare kasiṇadosā paññāyanti. Uccatare nisinnena gīvaṃ
anya-e0101n:849_5: onamitvā oloketabbaṃ hoti, nīcatare jaṇṇukāni rujanti. Tasmā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā
anya-e0101n:849_6: “appassādā kāmā”tiādinā nayena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā kāmanissaraṇe sabbadukkhasamatikkamupāyabhūte
anya-e0101n:849_8: “ayaṃ dāni sā sabbabuddha paccekabuddha ariyasāvakehi paṭipannā nekkhammapaṭipadā”ti
anya-e0101n:849_9: paṭipattiyā sañjātagāravena “addhā imāya paṭipadāya pavivekasukharasassa bhāgī bhavissāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:849_10: ussāhaṃ janayitvā samena ākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:850_0: Atiummīlayato hi cakkhu kilamati, maṇḍalañca ativibhūtaṃ hoti, tenassa nimittaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0101n:850_1: Atimandaṃ ummīlayato maṇḍalamavibhūtaṃ hoti, cittañca līnaṃ hoti, evampi nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:850_2: nuppajjati. Tasmā ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viya samenākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā
anya-e0101n:850_3: nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ, na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo, na lakkhaṇaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:850_4: Apica vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n:850_5: manasi kātabbaṃ. Pathavī mahī, medinī, bhūmi, vasudhā, vasundharātiādīsu pathavīnāmesu
anya-e0101n:850_6: yamicchati, yadassa saññānukūlaṃ hoti, taṃ vattabbaṃ. Apica pathavīti etadeva nāmaṃ
anya-e0101n:850_7: pākaṭaṃ, tasmā pākaṭavaseneva pathavī pathavīti bhāvetabbaṃ. Kālena ummīletvā kālena
anya-e0101n:850_8: nimīletvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Yāva uggahanimittaṃ nuppajjati, tāva kālasatampi kālasahassampi
anya-e0101n:851_0: 57. Tassevaṃ bhāvayato yadā nimīletvā āvajjantassa ummīlitakāle viya āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:851_1: tadā uggahanimittaṃ jātaṃ nāma hoti. Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya na tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:851_2: Attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā tattha nisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ. Pādadhovanapapañcaparihāratthaṃ
anya-e0101n:851_3: panassa ekapaṭalikupāhanā ca kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo. Athānena sace taruṇo samādhi
anya-e0101n:851_4: kenacideva asappāyakāraṇena nassati, upāhanā āruyha kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:851_5: gantvā nimittaṃ ādāya āgantvā sukhanisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ, punappunaṃ samannāharitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:851_6: takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ kātabbaṃ. Tassevaṃ karontassa anukkamena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti,
anya-e0101n:851_7: kilesā sannisīdanti, upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati, paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:852_0: Tatrāyaṃ purimassa ca uggahanimittassa imassa ca viseso, uggahanimitte kasiṇadoso
anya-e0101n:852_1: paññāyati, paṭibhāganimittaṃ thavikato nihatādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya sudhotasaṅkhathālaṃ
anya-e0101n:852_2: viya valāhakantarā nikkhantacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya meghamukhe balākā viya uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:852_3: padāletvā nikkhantamiva tato sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suparisuddhaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:852_4: Tañca kho neva vaṇṇavantaṃ, na saṇṭhānavantaṃ. Yadi hi taṃ īdisaṃ bhaveyya, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ
anya-e0101n:852_5: siyā oḷārikaṃ sammasanupagaṃ tilakkhaṇabbhāhataṃ, na panetaṃ tādisaṃ. Kevalañhi samādhilābhino
anya-e0101n:853: 58. Uppannakālato ca panassa paṭṭhāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva, upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samāhitamevāti.
anya-e0101n:854_0: Duvidho hi samādhi upacārasamādhi ca appanāsamādhi ca. Dvīhākārehi cittaṃ samādhiyati
anya-e0101n:854_1: upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā paṭilābhabhūmiyaṃ vā. Tattha upacārabhūmiyaṃ nīvaraṇappahānena
anya-e0101n:855_0: Dvinnaṃ pana samādhīnaṃ idaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ, upacāre aṅgāni na thāmajātāni honti, aṅgānaṃ
anya-e0101n:855_1: athāmajātattā, yathā nāma daharo kumārako ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:855_2: patati, evameva upacāre uppanne cittaṃ kālena nimittamārammaṇaṃ karoti, kālena bhavaṅgamotarati.
anya-e0101n:855_3: Appanāyaṃ pana aṅgāni thāmajātāni honti, tesaṃ thāmajātattā, yathā nāma balavā puriso
anya-e0101n:855_4: āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya, evameva appanāsamādhimhi uppanne cittaṃ sakiṃ
anya-e0101n:855_5: bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhati, kusalajavanapaṭipāṭivaseneva pavattatīti.
anya-e0101n:856_0: Tatra yadetaṃ upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa uppādanaṃ
anya-e0101n:856_1: nāma atidukkaraṃ. Tasmā sace teneva pallaṅkena taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanaṃ adhigantuṃ
anya-e0101n:856_2: sakkoti, sundaraṃ. No ce sakkoti, athānena taṃ nimittaṃ appamattena cakkavattigabbho
anya-e0101n:861: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
anya-e0101n:865_0: Tatrassa yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ vā nimittaṃ nuppajjati, uppannaṃ vā vinassati,
anya-e0101n:865_1: anupaṭṭhitā ca sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṃ na samādhiyati, ayaṃ asappāyo.
anya-e0101n:865_2: Yattha nimittaṃ uppajjati ceva thāvarañca hoti, sati upaṭṭhāti, cittaṃ samādhiyati
anya-e0101n:865_3: nāgapabbatavāsīpadhāniyatissattherassa viya, ayaṃ sappāyo. Tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū
anya-e0101n:865_4: āvāsā honti, tattha ekamekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yatthassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
anya-e0101n:865_5: hoti, tattha vasitabbaṃ. Āvāsasappāyatāya hi tambapaṇṇidīpamhi cūḷanāgaleṇe vasantā
anya-e0101n:865_6: tattheva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sotāpannādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:865_7: pana aññattha ariyabhūmiṃ patvā tattha arahattappattānañca gaṇanā natthi. Evamaññesupi
anya-e0101n:866: Gocaragāmo pana yo senāsanato uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā nātidūre diyaḍḍhakosabbhantare hoti sulabhasampannabhikkho, so sappāyo. Viparīto asappāyo.
anya-e0101n:867: Bhassanti dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāpariyāpannaṃ asappāyaṃ, tañhissa nimittantaradhānāya saṃvattati. Dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyaṃ, tampi mattāya bhāsitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:868_0: Puggalopi atiracchānakathiko sīlādiguṇasampanno, yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:868_1: samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ thirataraṃ hoti, evarūpo sappāyo. Kāyadaḷhībahulo
anya-e0101n:868_2: pana tiracchānakathiko asappāyo. So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva
anya-e0101n:868_3: karoti, tādisañca āgamma koṭapabbatavāsīdaharasseva samāpattipi nassati, pageva nimittaṃ.
anya-e0101n:869_0: Bhojanaṃ pana kassaci madhuraṃ, kassaci ambilaṃ sappāyaṃ hoti. Utupi kassaci sīto,
anya-e0101n:869_1: kassaci uṇho sappāyo hoti. Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu hoti, asamāhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:869_2: vā cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thirataraṃ hoti, taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca utu sappāyo.
anya-e0101n:869_3: Itaraṃ bhojanaṃ itaro ca utu asappāyo.
anya-e0101n:870_0: Iriyāpathesupi kassaci caṅkamo sappāyo hoti, kassaci sayanaṭṭhānanisajjānaṃ aññataro.
anya-e0101n:870_1: Tasmā taṃ āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmiṃ iriyāpathe asamāhitaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:870_2: cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thirataraṃ hoti, so sappāyo. Itaro asappāyoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:871: Iti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyaṃ sevitabbaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipannassa hi nimittāsevanabahulassa nacireneva kālena hoti kassaci appanā.
anya-e0101n:873_0: 60. Yassa pana evampi paṭipajjato na hoti, tena dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:873_1: Tatrāyaṃ nayo, dasāhākārehi appanākosallaṃ icchitabbaṃ, vatthuvisadakiriyato, indriyasamattapaṭipādanato,
anya-e0101n:873_2: nimittakusalato, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti,
anya-e0101n:873_3: yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti, yasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0101n:873_4: cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti, yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ
anya-e0101n:873_5: tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanato, samāhitapuggalasevanato, tadadhimuttatoti.
anya-e0101n:874_0: 61. Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:874_1: Yadā hissa kesanakhalomāni dīghāni honti, sarīraṃ vā sedamalaggahitaṃ, tadā ajjhattikavatthu
anya-e0101n:874_2: avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Yadā panassa cīvaraṃ jiṇṇaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:874_3: senāsanaṃ vā uklāpaṃ hoti, tadā bāhiravatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Ajjhattikabāhire
anya-e0101n:874_4: ca vatthumhi avisade uppannesu cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hoti, aparisuddhāni
anya-e0101n:874_5: dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya. Aparisuddhena ñāṇena
anya-e0101n:874_6: saṅkhāre sammasato saṅkhārāpi avibhūtā honti, kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi
anya-e0101n:874_7: vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ na gacchati. Visade pana ajjhattikabāhire vatthumhi uppannesu
anya-e0101n:874_8: cittacetasikesu ñāṇampi visadaṃ hoti parisuddhaṃ, parisuddhāni dīpakapallikavaṭṭitelāni
anya-e0101n:874_9: nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya. Parisuddhena ca ñāṇena saṅkhāre sammasato
anya-e0101n:874_10: saṅkhārāpi vibhūtā honti, kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjato kammaṭṭhānampi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:875_0: 62. Indriyasamattapaṭipādanaṃ nāma saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Sace
anya-e0101n:875_1: hissa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti itarāni mandāni, tato vīriyindriyaṃ paggahakiccaṃ,
anya-e0101n:875_2: satindriyaṃ upaṭṭhānakiccaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ avikkhepakiccaṃ, paññindriyaṃ dassanakiccaṃ
anya-e0101n:875_3: kātuṃ na sakkoti, tasmā taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena vā yathā vā manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:875_4: balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena hāpetabbaṃ. Vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:875_5: Sace pana vīriyindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, atha neva saddhindriyaṃ adhimokkhakiccaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e0101n:875_6: sakkoti, na itarāni itarakiccabhedaṃ, tasmā taṃ passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:875_7: Tatrāpi soṇattheravatthu dassetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ
anya-e0101n:875_8: attano kiccesu asamatthatā veditabbā. Visesato panettha saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca
anya-e0101n:875_9: samataṃ pasaṃsanti. Balavasaddho hi mandapañño muddhappasanno hoti, avatthusmiṃ pasīdati.
anya-e0101n:875_10: Balavapañño mandasaddho kerāṭikapakkhaṃ bhajati, bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho
anya-e0101n:875_11: hoti. Ubhinnaṃ samatāya vatthusmiṃyeva pasīdati. Balavasamādhiṃ pana mandavīriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:875_12: samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati. Balavavīriyaṃ mandasamādhiṃ vīriyassa
anya-e0101n:875_13: uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati. Samādhi pana vīriyena saṃyojito kosajje
anya-e0101n:875_14: patituṃ na labhati. Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saṃyojitaṃ uddhacce patituṃ na labhati, tasmā
anya-e0101n:875_15: tadubhayaṃ samaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ubhayasamatāya hi appanā hoti. Apica samādhikammikassa
anya-e0101n:875_16: balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ saddahanto okappento appanaṃ pāpuṇissati. Samādhipaññāsu
anya-e0101n:875_17: pana samādhikammikassa ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Vipassanākammikassa
anya-e0101n:875_18: paññā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ubhinnaṃ pana samatāyapi
anya-e0101n:875_19: appanā hotiyeva. Sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭati. Sati hi cittaṃ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ
anya-e0101n:875_20: saddhāvīriyapaññānaṃ vasena uddhaccapātato kosajjapakkhena ca samādhinā kosajjapātato
anya-e0101n:875_21: rakkhati, tasmā sā loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu, sabbakammikaamacco viya ca
anya-e0101n:875_22: sabbarājakiccesu sabbattha icchitabbā. Tenāha – “sati ca pana sabbatthikā vuttā bhagavatā.
anya-e0101n:875_23: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Cittañhi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā ca sati, na vinā satiyā
anya-e0101n:876_0: 63. Nimittakosallaṃ nāma pathavīkasiṇādikassa cittekaggatānimittassa akatassa karaṇakosallaṃ,
anya-e0101n:876_1: katassa ca bhāvanākosallaṃ, bhāvanāya laddhassa rakkhaṇakosallañca, taṃ idha adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0101n:877_0: 64. Kathañca yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggaṇhāti?
anya-e0101n:877_1: Yadāssa atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadā passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo
anya-e0101n:877_2: tayo abhāvetvā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0101n:878_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha allāni
anya-e0101n:878_1: ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, allāni ca gomayāni pakkhipeyya, allāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya,
anya-e0101n:878_2: udakavātañca dadeyya, paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so, bhikkhave, puriso
anya-e0101n:878_3: parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti? No hetaṃ, bhante. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0101n:878_4: līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, akālo
anya-e0101n:878_5: samādhi…pe… akālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:878_6: cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi dusamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti. Yasmiṃ ca kho, bhikkhave, līnaṃ
anya-e0101n:878_7: cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:878_8: bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:878_9: cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ
anya-e0101n:878_10: aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca
anya-e0101n:878_11: gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni ca kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya, mukhavātañca dadeyya, na
anya-e0101n:878_12: ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti? Evaṃ bhante”ti.
anya-e0101n:879: Ettha ca yathāsakamāhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:880_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, kusalākusalā dhammā sāvajjānavajjā dhammā hīnappaṇītā dhammā kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgā
anya-e0101n:880_1: dhammā. Tattha yoniso manasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:880_2: uppādāya uppannassa vā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya
anya-e0101n:881_0: Tathā “atthi, bhikkhave, ārambhadhātu nikkamadhātu parakkamadhātu. Tattha yoniso
anya-e0101n:881_1: manasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa
anya-e0101n:881_2: vā vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā saṃvattatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:882_0: Tathā “atthi, bhikkhave, pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammā. Tattha yoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
anya-e0101n:882_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā pītisambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:883_1: manasikāro nāma. Ārambhadhātuādīnaṃ uppādanavasena pavattamanasikāro ārambhadhātuādīsu
anya-e0101n:883_2: yoniso manasikāro nāma. Tattha ārambhadhātūti paṭhamavīriyaṃ vuccati. Nikkamadhātūti
anya-e0101n:883_3: kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavataraṃ. Parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato
anya-e0101n:883_4: tatopi balavataraṃ. Pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammāti pana pītiyā eva etaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0101n:884_0: Apica satta dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paripucchakatā,
anya-e0101n:885_2: gatamaggo mayā gantabbo, so ca na sakkā kusītena gantu”nti evaṃ gamanavīthipaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n:885_4: satthā, so ca anatikkamanīyasāsano amhākañca bahūpakāro paṭipattiyā ca pūjiyamāno
anya-e0101n:885_5: pūjito hoti na itarathā”ti evaṃ satthu mahattapaccavekkhaṇatā, “saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0101n:885_6: me mahādāyajjaṃ gahetabbaṃ, tañca na sakkā kusītena gahetu”nti evaṃ dāyajjamahattapaccavekkhaṇatā,
anya-e0101n:886_0: Ekādasadhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti buddhānussati, dhamma… saṅgha…
anya-e0101n:886_1: sīla… cāga… devatānussati, upasamānussati, lūkhapuggalaparivajjanatā, siniddhapuggalasevanatā,
anya-e0101n:886_2: pasādaniyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇatā, tadadhimuttatāti. Iti imehi ākārehi ete dhamme
anya-e0101n:886_3: uppādento dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo bhāveti nāma. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:887_0: 65. Kathaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti? Yadāssa
anya-e0101n:887_1: accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo tayo
anya-e0101n:888_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
anya-e0101n:888_1: sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe… na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so,
anya-e0101n:888_2: bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti? No hetaṃ, bhante. Evameva
anya-e0101n:888_3: kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, akālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:888_4: bhāvanāya, akālo vīriya…pe… akālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu?
anya-e0101n:888_5: Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi duvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Yasmiṃ ca kho,
anya-e0101n:888_6: bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:888_7: bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya.
anya-e0101n:888_8: Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:888_9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha
anya-e0101n:888_10: allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya…pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:888_11: puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti? Evaṃ, bhante”ti.
anya-e0101n:889: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0101n:890_0: “Atthi, bhikkhave, kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi. Tattha yoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
anya-e0101n:890_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:891_0: Tathā “atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimittaṃ abyagganimittaṃ. Tattha yoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
anya-e0101n:891_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:892_0: Tathā “atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyā dhammā. Tattha yoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
anya-e0101n:892_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya uppannassa vā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0101n:893_0: Tattha yathāssa passaddhiādayo uppannapubbā, taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ uppādanavasena
anya-e0101n:893_1: pavattamanasikārova tīsupi padesu yoniso manasikāro nāma. Samathanimittanti ca samathassevetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:894_0: Apica satta dhammā passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti paṇītabhojanasevanatā,
anya-e0101n:895_0: Ekādasa dhammā samādhisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti vatthuvisadatā, nimittakusalatā,
anya-e0101n:895_1: indriyasamattapaṭipādanatā, samaye cittassa niggahaṇatā, samaye cittassa paggahaṇatā,
anya-e0101n:895_2: nirassādassa cittassa saddhāsaṃvegavasena sampahaṃsanatā, sammāpavattassa ajjhupekkhanatā,
anya-e0101n:896_0: Pañca dhammā upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti sattamajjhattatā, saṅkhāramajjhattatā,
anya-e0101n:896_2: tadadhimuttatāti. Iti imehākārehi ete dhamme uppādento passaddhisambojjhaṅgādayo
anya-e0101n:896_3: bhāveti nāma. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n:897_0: 66. Kathaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti?
anya-e0101n:897_1: Yadāssa paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānadhigamena vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:897_2: tadā naṃ aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena saṃvejeti. Aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūni nāma
anya-e0101n:897_3: jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:897_4: anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhanti. Buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānussaraṇena
anya-e0101n:897_5: cassa pasādaṃ janeti. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti.
anya-e0101n:898_0: Kathaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati?
anya-e0101n:898_1: Yadāssa evaṃ paṭipajjato alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ
anya-e0101n:898_2: cittaṃ hoti, tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu na byāpāraṃ āpajjati, sārathi viya
anya-e0101n:898_3: samappavattesu assesu. Evaṃ yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0101n:899: Asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanatā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ anāruḷhapubbānaṃ anekakiccapasutānaṃ vikkhittahadayānaṃ puggalānaṃ ārakā pariccāgo.
anya-e0101n:900: Samāhitapuggalasevanatā nāma nekkhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ samādhilābhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:907: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
anya-e0101n:908: Hitvā hi sammāvāyāmaṃ, visesaṃ nāma māṇavo;
anya-e0101n:919_0: 68. Tatrāyamatthadīpanā – yathā hi acheko madhukaro asukasmiṃ rukkhe pupphaṃ pupphitanti
anya-e0101n:919_1: ñatvā tikkhena vegena pakkhando taṃ atikkamitvā paṭinivattento khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:919_2: Aparo acheko mandena javena pakkhando khīṇeyeva sampāpuṇāti. Cheko pana samena javena
anya-e0101n:919_3: pakkhando sukhena puppharāsiṃ sampatvā yāvadicchakaṃ reṇuṃ ādāya madhuṃ sampādetvā
anya-e0101n:920_0: Yathā ca sallakattaantevāsikesu udakathālagate uppalapatte satthakammaṃ sikkhantesu
anya-e0101n:920_1: eko acheko vegena satthaṃ pātento uppalapattaṃ dvidhā vā chindati, udake vā paveseti.
anya-e0101n:920_2: Aparo acheko chijjanapavesanabhayā satthakena phusitumpi na visahati. Cheko pana
anya-e0101n:920_3: samena payogena tattha satthapahāraṃ dassetvā pariyodātasippo hutvā tathārūpesu ṭhānesu
anya-e0101n:921_0: Yathā ca yo catubyāmappamāṇaṃ makkaṭasuttamāharati, so cattāri sahassāni labhatīti
anya-e0101n:921_1: raññā vutte eko achekapuriso vegena makkaṭasuttamākaḍḍhanto tahiṃ tahiṃ chindatiyeva.
anya-e0101n:921_2: Aparo acheko chedanabhayā hatthena phusitumpi na visahati. Cheko pana koṭito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n:921_3: samena payogena daṇḍake vedhetvā āharitvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:922_0: Yathā ca acheko niyāmako balavavāte laṅkāraṃ pūrento nāvaṃ videsaṃ pakkhandāpeti.
anya-e0101n:922_1: Aparo acheko mandavāte laṅkāraṃ oropento nāvaṃ tattheva ṭhapeti. Cheko pana mandavāte
anya-e0101n:922_2: laṅkāraṃ pūretvā balavavāte aḍḍhalaṅkāraṃ katvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:923_0: Yathā ca yo telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūreti, so lābhaṃ labhatīti ācariyena antevāsikānaṃ
anya-e0101n:923_1: vutte eko acheko lābhaluddho vegena pūrento telaṃ chaḍḍeti. Aparo acheko telachaḍḍanabhayā
anya-e0101n:923_2: āsiñcitumpi na visahati. Cheko pana samena payogena pūretvā lābhaṃ labhati.
anya-e0101n:924_0: Evameva eko bhikkhu uppanne nimitte sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:924_1: karoti, tassa cittaṃ accāraddhavīriyattā uddhacce patati, so na sakkoti appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ.
anya-e0101n:924_2: Eko accāraddhavīriyatāya dosaṃ disvā kiṃ dānime appanāyāti vīriyaṃ hāpeti, tassa
anya-e0101n:924_3: cittaṃ atilīnavīriyattā kosajje patati, sopi na sakkoti appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ. Yo pana
anya-e0101n:924_4: īsakampi līnaṃ līnabhāvato uddhataṃ uddhaccato mocetvā samena payogena nimittābhimukhaṃ
anya-e0101n:924_5: pavatteti, so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti, tādisena bhavitabbaṃ. Imamatthaṃ sandhāya etaṃ vuttaṃ –
anya-e0101n:930_0: 69. Iti evaṃ nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādayato panassa idāni appanā ijjhissatīti
anya-e0101n:930_1: bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā pathavī pathavīti anuyogavasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:930_2: ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanamuppajjati. Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca
anya-e0101n:930_3: vā javanāni javanti. Tesu avasāne ekaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ, sesāni kāmāvacarāni. Pakaticittehi
anya-e0101n:930_5: yathā gāmādīnaṃ āsannapadeso gāmūpacāro nagarūpacāroti vuccati, evaṃ appanāya āsannattā
anya-e0101n:930_6: samīpacārattā vā upacārānītipi, ito pubbe parikammānaṃ, upari appanāya ca anulomato
anya-e0101n:930_7: anulomānītipi vuccanti. Yañcettha sabbantimaṃ, taṃ parittagottābhibhavanato, mahaggatagottabhāvanato
anya-e0101n:930_8: ca gotrabhūtipi vuccati. Agahitaggahaṇena panettha paṭhamaṃ parikammaṃ, dutiyaṃ upacāraṃ,
anya-e0101n:930_9: tatiyaṃ anulomaṃ, catutthaṃ gotrabhu. Paṭhamaṃ vā upacāraṃ, dutiyaṃ anulomaṃ, tatiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:930_10: gotrabhu, catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ. Catutthameva hi pañcamaṃ vā appeti,
anya-e0101n:930_11: tañca kho khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasena. Tato paraṃ javanaṃ patati. Bhavaṅgassa vāro hoti.
anya-e0101n:931_0: Ābhidhammikagodattatthero pana “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ
anya-e0101n:931_1: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā āsevanapaccayena
anya-e0101n:931_2: pacchimo pacchimo dhammo balavā hoti, tasmā chaṭṭhepi sattamepi appanā hotīti āha,
anya-e0101n:931_3: taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “attano matimattaṃ therasseta”nti vatvā paṭikkhittaṃ. Catutthapañcamesuyeva
anya-e0101n:931_4: pana appanā hoti. Parato javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti, bhavaṅgassa āsannattāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:931_5: Tameva vicāretvā vuttattā na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ. Yathā hi puriso chinnapapātābhimukho
anya-e0101n:931_6: dhāvanto ṭhātukāmopi pariyante pādaṃ katvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti papāte eva patati, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:931_7: chaṭṭhe vā sattame vā appetuṃ na sakkoti, bhavaṅgassa āsannattā. Tasmā catutthapañcamesuyeva
anya-e0101n:932_0: Sā ca pana ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva. Sattasu hi ṭhānesu addhānaparicchedo nāma natthi
anya-e0101n:932_1: paṭhamappanāyaṃ, lokiyābhiññāsu, catūsu maggesu, maggānantaraphale, rūpārūpabhavesu
anya-e0101n:932_2: bhavaṅgajjhāne, nirodhassa paccaye nevasaññānāsaññāyatane, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa
anya-e0101n:932_3: phalasamāpattiyanti. Ettha maggānantaraphalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upari na hoti. Nirodhassa paccayo
anya-e0101n:932_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dvinnamupari na hoti. Rūpārūpesu bhavaṅgassa parimāṇaṃ natthi,
anya-e0101n:932_5: sesaṭṭhānesu ekameva cittanti. Iti ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva appanā. Tato bhavaṅgapāto.
anya-e0101n:932_6: Atha bhavaṅgaṃ vocchinditvā jhānapaccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanaṃ, tato jhānapaccavekkhaṇanti.
anya-e0101n:933_0: Ettāvatā ca panesa vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
anya-e0101n:933_1: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Evamanena pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:933_2: pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ
anya-e0101n:934_0: 70. Tattha vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi viviccitvā vinā hutvā apakkamitvā. Yo panāyamettha
anya-e0101n:934_1: evakāro, so niyamatthoti veditabbo. Yasmā ca niyamattho, tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:934_2: upasampajja viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ
anya-e0101n:935_0: Kathaṃ? “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ paññāyati, nūna jhānassa
anya-e0101n:935_1: kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā yesu sati idaṃ nappavattati, andhakāre sati padīpobhāso viya.
anya-e0101n:935_2: Tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti, orimatīrapariccāgena pārimatīrasseva. Tasmā niyamaṃ karotīti.
anya-e0101n:936_0: Tattha siyā, kasmā panesa pubbapadeyeva vutto, na uttarapade, kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi
anya-e0101n:936_1: aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyāti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃnissaraṇato
anya-e0101n:936_2: hi pubbapade esa vutto. Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ
anya-e0101n:936_3: jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha, “kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ nekkhamma”nti.
anya-e0101n:936_4: Uttarapadepi pana yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro
anya-e0101n:936_5: ānetvā vuccati, evaṃ vattabbo. Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusaladhammehi
anya-e0101n:936_6: avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ. Tasmā “vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva akusalehi
anya-e0101n:936_7: dhammehī”ti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo. Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti iminā
anya-e0101n:936_8: sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo, kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
anya-e0101n:936_9: tathāpi kāyaviveko cittaviveko vikkhambhanavivekoti tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0101n:937_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca niddese “katame vatthukāmā, manāpiyā rūpā”tiādinā
anya-e0101n:937_1: nayena vatthukāmā vuttā, ye ca tattheva vibhaṅge ca “chando kāmo, rāgo kāmo, chandarāgo
anya-e0101n:937_2: kāmo, saṅkappo kāmo, rāgo kāmo, saṅkapparāgo kāmo, ime vuccanti kāmā”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā
anya-e0101n:937_3: vuttā, te sabbepi saṅgahitāicceva daṭṭhabbā. Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi
anya-e0101n:937_4: viviccevāti attho yujjati, tena kāyaviveko vutto hoti. Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti
anya-e0101n:937_5: kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati, tena cittaviveko vutto hoti.
anya-e0101n:937_6: Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo, dutiyena kilesakāmehi
anya-e0101n:937_7: vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti. Evaṃ vatthukāmakilesakāmavivekavacanatoyeva
anya-e0101n:937_8: ca etesaṃ paṭhamena saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ, dutiyena saṃkilesappahānaṃ. Paṭhamena
anya-e0101n:937_9: lolabhāvassa hetupariccāgo, dutiyena bālabhāvassa. Paṭhamena ca payogasuddhi, dutiyena
anya-e0101n:937_10: āsayaposanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hotīti viññātabbaṃ. Esa tāva nayo kāmehīti ettha vuttakāmesu vatthukāmapakkhe.
anya-e0101n:938_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandoyeva
anya-e0101n:938_1: kāmoti adhippeto. So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmo chando kāmo”tiādinā
anya-e0101n:938_2: nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto. Kilesakāmattā vā purimapade vutto,
anya-e0101n:938_3: akusalapariyāpannattā dutiyapade. Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:939_0: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā, kāmacchando”tiādinā
anya-e0101n:939_1: nayena vibhaṅge upari jhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato nīvaraṇāneva
anya-e0101n:939_2: vuttāni. Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni, tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni viddhaṃsakāni
anya-e0101n:939_3: vighātakānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho, pīti byāpādassa,
anya-e0101n:939_4: vitakko thinamiddhassa, sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāyāti peṭake vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:940_0: Evamettha vivicceva kāmehīti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti.
anya-e0101n:940_1: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ, agahitaggahaṇena pana
anya-e0101n:940_2: paṭhamena kāmacchandassa, dutiyena sesanīvaraṇānaṃ. Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu
anya-e0101n:940_6: dutiyena avijjāya taṃsampayuttakānañca. Apica paṭhamena lobhasampayuttānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0101n:940_7: cittuppādānaṃ, dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko
anya-e0101n:940_8: vutto hotīti veditabbo. Ayaṃ tāva vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti ettha atthappakāsanā.
anya-e0101n:941_0: 71. Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
anya-e0101n:941_1: savitakkaṃ savicārantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha vitakkanaṃ vitakko, ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:941_2: Svāyaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo, āhananapariyāhananaraso. Tathā hi
anya-e0101n:941_3: tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati. Ārammaṇe
anya-e0101n:942: Vicaraṇaṃ vicāro, anusañcaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo, tattha sahajātānuyojanaraso, cittassa anuppabandhanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
anya-e0101n:943_0: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇḍābhighāto
anya-e0101n:943_1: viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko. Sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇḍānuravo
anya-e0101n:943_2: viya anuppabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko paṭhamuppattikāle paripphandanabhūto
anya-e0101n:943_3: cittassa ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo viya padumābhimukhapāto viya
anya-e0101n:943_4: ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa. Santavutti vicāro nātiparipphandanabhāvo cittassa
anya-e0101n:943_5: ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya, paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa
anya-e0101n:943_6: bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge. Dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa
anya-e0101n:943_7: ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso
anya-e0101n:943_8: abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko. Vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ
anya-e0101n:943_9: viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ anuppabandhena pavattiyaṃ yujjati.
anya-e0101n:943_10: So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0101n:944_0: Apica malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
anya-e0101n:944_1: parimajjantassa daḷhagahaṇahattho viya vitakko, parimajjanahattho viya vicāro. Tathā
anya-e0101n:944_2: kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho
anya-e0101n:944_3: viya vitakko, ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro. Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa
anya-e0101n:944_4: majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko, bahi paribbhamanakaṇṭako
anya-e0101n:944_5: viya anumajjano vicāro. Iti iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho
anya-e0101n:944_6: viya pupphena phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti vuccati. Vibhaṅge
anya-e0101n:944_7: pana “iminā ca vitakkena iminā ca vicārena upeto hoti samupeto”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānā
anya-e0101n:944_8: desanā katā. Attho pana tatrāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:945: Vivekajanti ettha vivitti viveko, nīvaraṇavigamoti attho. Vivittoti vā viveko, nīvaraṇavivitto jhānasampayuttadhammarāsīti attho. Tasmā vivekā, tasmiṃ vā viveke jātanti vivekajaṃ.
anya-e0101n:946_0: 72. Pītisukhanti ettha pīṇayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā, kāyacittapīnanarasā,
anya-e0101n:946_1: pharaṇarasā vā, odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā. Sā panesā khuddikā pīti, khaṇikāpīti, okkantikāpīti,
anya-e0101n:946_2: ubbegāpīti, pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti. Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva
anya-e0101n:946_3: kātuṃ sakkoti. Khaṇikāpīti khaṇe khaṇe vijjuppādasadisā hoti. Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṃ
anya-e0101n:946_4: vīci viya kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā bhijjati. Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ
anya-e0101n:946_5: katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā. Tathā hi puṇṇavallikavāsī mahātissatthero puṇṇamadivase
anya-e0101n:946_6: sāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā candālokaṃ disvā mahācetiyābhimukho hutvā “imāya vata velāya
anya-e0101n:946_7: catasso parisā mahācetiyaṃ vandantī”ti pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:946_8: ubbegāpītiṃ uppādetvā sudhātale pahaṭacitrageṇḍuko viya ākāse uppatitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇeyeva
anya-e0101n:946_9: patiṭṭhāsi. Tathā girikaṇḍakavihārassa upanissaye vattakālakagāme ekā kuladhītāpi
anya-e0101n:947_0: Tassā kira mātāpitaro sāyaṃ dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ gacchantā “amma tvaṃ garubhārā
anya-e0101n:947_1: akāle vicarituṃ na sakkosi, mayaṃ tuyhaṃ pattiṃ katvā dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti agamaṃsu.
anya-e0101n:947_2: Sā gantukāmāpi tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontī ghare ohīyitvā gharājire ṭhatvā
anya-e0101n:947_3: candālokena girikaṇḍake ākāsacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokentī cetiyassa dīpapūjaṃ addasa, catasso
anya-e0101n:947_4: ca parisā mālāgandhādīhi cetiyapūjaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ karontiyo bhikkhusaṅghassa
anya-e0101n:947_5: ca gaṇasajjhāyasaddaṃ assosi. Athassā “dhaññāvatime, ye vihāraṃ gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe
anya-e0101n:947_6: anusañcarituṃ, evarūpañca madhuradhammakathaṃ sotuṃ labhantī”ti muttarāsisadisaṃ
anya-e0101n:947_7: cetiyaṃ passantiyā eva ubbegāpīti udapādi. Sā ākāse laṅghitvā mātāpitūnaṃ purimataraṃyeva
anya-e0101n:947_8: ākāsato cetiyaṅgaṇe oruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā dhammaṃ suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro
anya-e0101n:947_9: āgantvā “amma tvaṃ katarena maggena āgatāsī”ti pucchiṃsu. Sā “ākāsena āgatāmhi, na
anya-e0101n:947_10: maggenā”ti vatvā “amma ākāsena nāma khīṇāsavā sañcaranti, tvaṃ kathaṃ āgatā”ti vuttā
anya-e0101n:947_11: āha – “mayhaṃ candālokena cetiyaṃ ālokentiyā ṭhitāya buddhārammaṇā balavapīti uppajji.
anya-e0101n:947_12: Athāhaṃ neva attano ṭhitabhāvaṃ, na nisinnabhāvaṃ aññāsiṃ, gahitanimitteneva pana
anya-e0101n:948_0: Evaṃ ubbegāpīti ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā hoti. Pharaṇāpītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ
anya-e0101n:948_1: dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:949_0: Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ
anya-e0101n:949_1: paripūreti kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca. Passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ
anya-e0101n:949_2: gacchantī duvidhampi sukhaṃ paripūreti kāyikañca cetasikañca. Sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ
anya-e0101n:949_3: paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ
anya-e0101n:949_4: appanā samādhinti. Tāsu yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṃ
anya-e0101n:949_5: gatā pharaṇāpīti, ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā pītīti.
anya-e0101n:950_0: 73. Itaraṃ pana sukhanaṃ sukhaṃ, suṭṭhu vā khādati, khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti
anya-e0101n:950_1: sukhaṃ, taṃ sātalakkhaṇaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ, anuggahapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:950_2: Satipi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti. Paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ
anya-e0101n:950_3: sukhaṃ. Yattha pīti, tattha sukhaṃ. Yattha sukhaṃ, tattha na niyamato pīti. Saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā
anya-e0101n:950_5: viya pīti. Vanacchāyāpavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukhaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato
anya-e0101n:950_6: cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Iti ayañca pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā
anya-e0101n:950_7: jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ pītisukhanti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:951_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ, dhammavinayādayo viya. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhamassa
anya-e0101n:951_1: jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ. Yatheva hi jhānaṃ, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:951_2: pītisukhampettha vivekajameva hoti, tañcassa atthi, tasmā ekapadeneva “vivekajaṃpītisukha”ntipi
anya-e0101n:951_3: vattuṃ yujjati. Vibhaṅge pana “idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagata”ntiādinā nayena
anya-e0101n:951_4: vuttaṃ. Attho pana tatthāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:952_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānanti idaṃ parato āvibhavissati. Upasampajjāti upagantvā, pāpuṇitvāti
anya-e0101n:952_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Upasampādayitvā vā, nipphādetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vibhaṅge pana “upasampajjāti
anya-e0101n:952_2: paṭhamassa jhānassa lābho paṭilābho patti sampatti phusanā sacchikiriyā upasampadā”ti
anya-e0101n:952_3: vuttaṃ. Tassāpi evamevattho daṭṭhabbo. Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena
anya-e0101n:952_4: itivuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī hutvā attabhāvassa iriyaṃ vuttiṃ pālanaṃ yapanaṃ yāpanaṃ
anya-e0101n:952_5: cāraṃ vihāraṃ abhinipphādeti. Vuttañhetaṃ vibhaṅge “viharatīti iriyati vattati pāleti
anya-e0101n:952_6: yapeti yāpeti carati viharati, tena vuccati viharatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:954_0: 74. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgata”nti, tattha kāmacchando,
