anya-e0101n:954_1: byāpādo, thinamiddhaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ, vicikicchāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ
anya-e0101n:954_2: pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā. Na hi etesu appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:954_3: Tenassetāni pahānaṅgānīti vuccanti. Kiñcāpi hi jhānakkhaṇe aññepi akusalā dhammā
anya-e0101n:954_4: pahīyanti, tathāpi etāneva visesena jhānantarāyakarāni. Kāmacchandena hi nānāvisayappalobhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:954_5: cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati. Kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā taṃ na kāmadhātuppahānāya
anya-e0101n:954_6: paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati. Byāpādena cārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na nirantaraṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n:954_7: Thinamiddhābhibhūtaṃ akammaññaṃ hoti. Uddhaccakukkuccaparetaṃ avūpasantameva hutvā
anya-e0101n:954_8: paribbhamati. Vicikicchāya upahataṃ jhānādhigamasādhikaṃ paṭipadaṃ nārohati. Iti
anya-e0101n:955_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti, vicāro anuppabandhati, tehi avikkhepāya
anya-e0101n:955_1: sampāditappayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīṇanaṃ, sukhañca upabrūhanaṃ
anya-e0101n:955_3: anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyati, tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti
anya-e0101n:955_4: sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:955_5: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti. Tenassa etāni pañca samannāgataṅgānīti
anya-e0101n:955_6: vuccanti. Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0101n:955_7: pana aṅgamattavaseneva caturaṅginī senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgiko ca maggoti
anya-e0101n:955_8: vuccati, evamidampi aṅgamattavaseneva pañcaṅgikanti vā pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti vā
anya-e0101n:956_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi, atha kho upacāre pakaticittato
anya-e0101n:956_1: balavatarāni. Idha pana upacāratopi balavatarāni rūpāvacaralakkhaṇappattāni. Ettha
anya-e0101n:956_2: hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati. Vicāro
anya-e0101n:956_3: ativiya ārammaṇaṃ anumajjamāno. Pītisukhaṃ sabbāvantampi kāyaṃ pharamānaṃ. Tenevāha
anya-e0101n:956_4: – “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti. Cittekaggatāpi
anya-e0101n:956_5: heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇesu phusitā hutvā uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:956_6: ayametesaṃ itarehi viseso. Tattha cittekaggatā kiñcāpi savitakkaṃ savicāranti imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:956_7: pāṭhe na niddiṭṭhā, tathāpi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti
anya-e0101n:956_8: evaṃ vuttattā aṅgameva. Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato, soyeva tena vibhaṅge pakāsitoti.
anya-e0101n:958_1: tividhakalyāṇatā. Tesaṃyeva ca ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:960_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, sampahaṃsanā
anya-e0101n:960_1: pariyosānaṃ, paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, ādissa kati lakkhaṇāni? Ādissa
anya-e0101n:960_2: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni, yo tassa paribandho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati, visuddhattā cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:960_3: majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Yañca
anya-e0101n:960_4: paribandhato cittaṃ visujjhati, yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:960_5: paṭipajjati, yañca paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi
anya-e0101n:960_6: ādi, ādissa imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti
anya-e0101n:961_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, majjhassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Majjhassa
anya-e0101n:961_1: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni, visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
anya-e0101n:961_2: ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Yañca visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca samathapaṭipannaṃ
anya-e0101n:961_3: ajjhupekkhati, yañca ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā
anya-e0101n:961_4: majjhe, majjhassa imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva
anya-e0101n:962_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ, pariyosānassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Pariyosānassa
anya-e0101n:962_1: cattāri lakkhaṇāni, tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā, indriyānaṃ
anya-e0101n:962_3: sampahaṃsanā. Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ, pariyosānassa imāni cattāri
anya-e0101n:962_4: lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti catulakkhaṇasampannañcā”ti.
anya-e0101n:963_0: Tatra paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma sasambhāriko upacāro. Upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā. Sampahaṃsanā
anya-e0101n:963_1: nāma paccavekkhaṇāti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Yasmā pana “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva
anya-e0101n:963_2: hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā antoappanāyameva
anya-e0101n:964_0: Kathaṃ? Yasmiñhi vāre appanā uppajjati, tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa
anya-e0101n:964_1: jhānassa paribandho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati. Visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ
anya-e0101n:964_2: samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati. Majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ nāma samappavatto appanāsamādhiyeva.
anya-e0101n:964_3: Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittaṃ ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattamupagacchamānaṃ majjhimaṃ
anya-e0101n:964_4: samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati nāma, evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena tattha pakkhandati
anya-e0101n:964_5: nāma. Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākāranipphādikā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva
anya-e0101n:965_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto
anya-e0101n:965_1: visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathabhāvupagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna
anya-e0101n:965_2: samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathapaṭipannabhāvato
anya-e0101n:965_3: eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
anya-e0101n:965_4: akaronto ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena
anya-e0101n:966_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tattha jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā
anya-e0101n:966_1: aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā, yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi
anya-e0101n:966_2: vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni, yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ
anya-e0101n:966_3: anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati, yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā, sabbepi te
anya-e0101n:966_4: ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā
anya-e0101n:966_5: sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā pariyodāpitattā nipphannāva, tasmā “dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena
anya-e0101n:966_6: pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:967_0: Tattha yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Yathāha – “tathāpaggahitaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:967_1: sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhati, upekkhāvasena paññāvasena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, upekkhāvasena
anya-e0101n:967_2: nānattakilesehi cittaṃ vimuccati, vimokkhavasena paññāvasena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ
anya-e0101n:967_3: hoti. Vimuttattā te dhammā ekarasā honti. Ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā”ti. Tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā
anya-e0101n:968_0: Idāni paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇanti ettha gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ,
anya-e0101n:968_1: paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhamaṃ. Ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajhāpanato vā jhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:968_2: Pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ pana sakalaṭṭhena pathavīkasiṇanti vuccati, taṃ nissāya paṭiladdhanimittampi,
anya-e0101n:968_3: pathavīkasiṇanimitte paṭiladdhajhānampi. Tatra imasmiṃ atthe jhānaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti
anya-e0101n:968_4: veditabbaṃ. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇa”nti.
anya-e0101n:970_0: 76. Evamadhigate pana etasmiṃ tena yoginā vālavedhinā viya, sūdena viya ca ākārā
anya-e0101n:970_1: pariggahetabbā. Yathā hi sukusalo dhanuggaho vālavedhāya kammaṃ kurumāno yasmiṃ vāre
anya-e0101n:970_2: vālaṃ vijjhati, tasmiṃ vāre akkantapadānañca dhanudaṇḍassa ca jiyāya ca sarassa ca
anya-e0101n:970_3: ākāraṃ pariggaṇheyya. “Evaṃ me ṭhitena evaṃ dhanudaṇḍaṃ evaṃ jiyaṃ evaṃ saraṃ gahetvā
anya-e0101n:970_4: vālo viddho”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya tatheva te ākāre sampādento avirādhetvā vālaṃ vijjheyya.
anya-e0101n:970_5: Evameva yogināpi “imaṃ nāma me bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ sevamānena evarūpe
anya-e0101n:970_6: senāsane iminā nāma iriyāpathena imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ adhigata”nti ete bhojanasappāyādayo
anya-e0101n:970_7: ākārā pariggahetabbā. Evañhi so naṭṭhe vā tasmiṃ te ākāre sampādetvā puna uppādetuṃ,
anya-e0101n:970_8: appaguṇaṃ vā paguṇaṃ karonto punappunaṃ appetuṃ sakkhissati.
anya-e0101n:971_0: Yathā ca kusalo sūdo bhattāraṃ parivisanto tassa yaṃ yaṃ ruciyā bhuñjati, taṃ taṃ
anya-e0101n:971_1: sallakkhetvā tato paṭṭhāya tādisameva upanāmento lābhassa bhāgī hoti, evamayampi
anya-e0101n:971_2: adhigatakkhaṇe bhojanādayo ākāre gahetvā te sampādento naṭṭhe naṭṭhe punappunaṃ appanāya
anya-e0101n:971_3: lābhī hoti. Tasmā tena vālavedhinā viya sūdena viya ca ākārā pariggahetabbā. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0101n:972_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo rājānaṃ vā rājamahāmattaṃ vā nānaccayehi
anya-e0101n:972_1: sūpehi paccupaṭṭhito assa ambilaggehipi tittakaggehipi kaṭukaggehipi madhuraggehipi
anya-e0101n:972_2: khārikehipi akhārikehipi loṇikehipi aloṇikehipi. Sa kho so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto
anya-e0101n:972_3: kusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti ‘idaṃ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati,
anya-e0101n:972_4: imassa vā abhiharati, imassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti, imassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, ambilaggaṃ
anya-e0101n:972_5: vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati, ambilaggassa vā abhiharati, ambilaggassa vā bahuṃ
anya-e0101n:972_6: gaṇhāti, ambilaggassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati…pe… aloṇikassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī’ti. Sa kho
anya-e0101n:972_7: so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo sūdo lābhī ceva hoti acchādanassa, lābhī vetanassa,
anya-e0101n:972_8: lābhī abhihārānaṃ. Taṃ kissa hetu? Tathā hi so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo
anya-e0101n:972_9: sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti. Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco paṇḍito
anya-e0101n:972_10: byatto kusalo bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati…pe… vedanāsu vedanā… citte cittā…
anya-e0101n:972_11: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
anya-e0101n:972_12: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ samādhiyati, upakkilesā pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n:972_13: so taṃ nimittaṃ uggaṇhāti. Sa kho so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu lābhī
anya-e0101n:972_14: ceva hoti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ, lābhī satisampajaññassa. Taṃ kissa hetu? Tathā
anya-e0101n:972_15: hi so, bhikkhave, paṇḍito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī”ti.
anya-e0101n:973_0: Nimittaggahaṇena cassa puna te ākāre sampādayato appanāmattameva ijjhati, na ciraṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:973_1: Ciraṭṭhānaṃ pana samādhiparibandhānaṃ dhammānaṃ suvisodhitattā hoti. Yo hi bhikkhu
anya-e0101n:973_2: kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandaṃ na suṭṭhu vikkhambhetvā, kāyapassaddhivasena
anya-e0101n:973_3: kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ na suppaṭipassaddhaṃ katvā, ārambhadhātumanasikārādivasena thinamiddhaṃ
anya-e0101n:973_4: na suṭṭhu paṭivinodetvā, samathanimittamanasikārādivasena uddhaccakukkuccaṃ na susamūhataṃ
anya-e0101n:973_5: katvā, aññepi samādhiparibandhe dhamme na suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati, so
anya-e0101n:973_6: avisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya avisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya ca khippameva
anya-e0101n:973_7: nikkhamati. Yo pana samādhiparibandhe dhamme suṭṭhu visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjati,
anya-e0101n:973_8: so suvisodhitaṃ āsayaṃ paviṭṭhabhamaro viya suparisuddhaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭharājā viya
anya-e0101n:973_9: ca sakalampi divasabhāgaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃyeva hoti. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0101n:978_0: Tasmā ciraṭṭhitikāmena paribandhakadhamme visodhetvā jhānaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ. Cittabhāvanāvepullatthañca
anya-e0101n:978_1: yathāladdhaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tassa dve vaḍḍhanābhūmiyo upacāraṃ vā
anya-e0101n:978_2: appanaṃ vā. Upacāraṃ patvāpi hi taṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati appanaṃ patvāpi. Ekasmiṃ pana
anya-e0101n:978_3: ṭhāne avassaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “yathāladdhaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ vaḍḍhetabba”nti.
anya-e0101n:980_0: 77. Tatrāyaṃ vaḍḍhananayo, tena yoginā taṃ nimittaṃ pattavaḍḍhanapūvavaḍḍhanabhattavaḍḍhanalatāvaḍḍhanadussavaḍḍhanayogena
anya-e0101n:980_1: avaḍḍhetvā yathā nāma kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ naṅgalena paricchinditvā paricchedabbhantare
anya-e0101n:980_2: kasati, yathā vā pana bhikkhū sīmaṃ bandhantā paṭhamaṃ nimittāni sallakkhetvā pacchā
anya-e0101n:980_3: bandhanti, evameva tassa yathāladdhassa nimittassa anukkamena ekaṅguladvaṅgulativaṅgulacaturaṅgulamattaṃ
anya-e0101n:980_4: manasā paricchinditvā yathāparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Aparicchinditvā pana na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:980_6: paricchedavasena vaḍḍhayantena cakkavāḷaparicchedena vā tato vāpi uttari paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:981_0: Yathā hi haṃsapotakā pakkhānaṃ uṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya parittaṃ parittaṃ padesaṃ uppatantā
anya-e0101n:981_1: paricayaṃ katvā anukkamena candimasūriyasantikaṃ gacchanti, evameva bhikkhu vuttanayena
anya-e0101n:981_2: nimittaṃ paricchinditvā vaḍḍhento yāva cakkavāḷaparicchedā tato vā uttari vaḍḍheti.
anya-e0101n:981_3: Athassa taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhitaṭṭhāne pathaviyā ukkūlavikūlanadīviduggapabbatavisamesu
anya-e0101n:982_0: Tasmiṃ pana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena samāpajjanabahulena bhavitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:982_1: na paccavekkhaṇabahulena. Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni
anya-e0101n:982_2: hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. Athassa tāni evaṃ upaṭṭhitattā upari ussukkanāya paccayataṃ āpajjanti.
anya-e0101n:982_3: So appaguṇe jhāne ussukkamāno pattapaṭhamajjhānā ca parihāyati, na ca sakkoti dutiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate
anya-e0101n:983_1: carituṃ. Tassā evamassa ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ agatapubbañceva disaṃ gaccheyyaṃ, akhāditapubbāni
anya-e0101n:983_2: ca tiṇāni khādeyyaṃ, apītapubbāni ca pānīyāni piveyya’nti. Sā purimaṃ pādaṃ na supatiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_3: patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchimaṃ pādaṃ uddhareyya, sā na ceva agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:983_4: na ca akhāditapubbāni tiṇāni khādeyya, na ca apītapubbāni pānīyāni piveyya. Yasmiñcassā
anya-e0101n:983_5: padese ṭhitāya evamassa ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ agatapubbañceva…pe… piveyya’nti. Tañca padesaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_6: na sotthinā paccāgaccheyya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Tathā hi sā, bhikkhave, gāvī pabbateyyā
anya-e0101n:983_7: bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate carituṃ, evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco
anya-e0101n:983_8: bhikkhu bālo abyatto akhettaññū akusalo vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0101n:983_9: viharituṃ. So taṃ nimittaṃ nāsevati, na bhāveti, na bahulīkaroti, na svādhiṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_10: adhiṭṭhāti, tassa evaṃ hoti ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_11: upasampajja vihareyya’nti. So na sakkoti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā…pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_12: upasampajja viharituṃ. Tassevaṃ hoti ‘yaṃnūnāhaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:983_13: upasampajja vihareyya’nti. So na sakkoti vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0101n:983_14: viharituṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ubhato bhaṭṭho ubhato parihīno, seyyathāpi
anya-e0101n:983_15: sā gāvī pabbateyyā bālā abyattā akhettaññū akusalā visame pabbate caritu”nti.
anya-e0101n:984: Tasmānena tasmiṃyeva tāva paṭhamajjhāne pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā bhavitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:986_0: 78. Tatrimā pañca vasiyo āvajjanavasī, samāpajjanavasī, adhiṭṭhānavasī, vuṭṭhānavasī,
anya-e0101n:986_1: paccavekkhaṇavasīti. Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ āvajjeti,
anya-e0101n:986_2: āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti āvajjanavasī. Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ…pe…
anya-e0101n:986_3: samāpajjati, samāpajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti samāpajjanavasī. Evaṃ sesāpi vitthāretabbā.
anya-e0101n:987_0: Ayaṃ panettha atthappakāsanā, paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato
anya-e0101n:987_1: bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca vā
anya-e0101n:987_2: javanāni javanti. Tato dve bhavaṅgāni, tato puna vicārārammaṇaṃ āvajjanaṃ, vuttanayāneva
anya-e0101n:987_3: javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu yadā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ sakkoti, athassa
anya-e0101n:987_4: āvajjanavasī siddhā hoti. Ayaṃ pana matthakappattā vasī bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriye
anya-e0101n:987_5: labbhati, aññesaṃ vā evarūpe kāle. Ito paraṃ sīghatarā āvajjanavasī nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:988: Āyasmato pana mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandanāgarājadamane viya sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n:989_0: Accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
anya-e0101n:989_1: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma. Tadubhayadassanatthaṃ buddharakkhitattherassa
anya-e0101n:990_0: So hāyasmā upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko hutvā therambatthale mahārohaṇaguttattherassa
anya-e0101n:990_1: gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatānaṃ tiṃsamattānaṃ iddhimantasahassānaṃ majjhe nisinno therassa
anya-e0101n:990_2: yāguṃ paṭiggāhayamānaṃ upaṭṭhākanāgarājānaṃ gahessāmīti ākāsato pakkhandantaṃ supaṇṇarājānaṃ
anya-e0101n:990_3: disvā tāvadeva pabbataṃ nimminitvā nāgarājānaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā tattha pāvisi. Supaṇṇarājā
anya-e0101n:990_4: pabbate pahāraṃ datvā palāyi. Mahāthero āha – “sace, āvuso, buddharakkhito nābhavissa,
anya-e0101n:991: Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttā. Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tattha āvajjanānantarānīti.
anya-e0101n:993_0: 79. Imāsu pana pañcasu vasīsu ciṇṇavasinā paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti
anya-e0101n:993_1: āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā, vitakkavicārānaṃ oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ
anya-e0101n:993_2: disvā dutiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikatvā paṭhamajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya dutiyādhigamāya
anya-e0101n:993_3: yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0101n:993_4: paccavekkhato vitakkavicārā oḷārikato upaṭṭhahanti, pītisukhañceva cittekaggatā ca
anya-e0101n:993_5: santato upaṭṭhāti, tadāssa oḷārikaṅgaṃ pahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:993_7: bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:993_8: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti, yesamavasāne ekaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0101n:994_0: Ettāvatā cesa vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ
anya-e0101n:994_1: avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Evamanena
anya-e0101n:995_0: 80. Tattha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0101n:995_1: vūpasamā samatikkamā, dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe apātubhāvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi
anya-e0101n:995_2: dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi. Aññeyeva hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo,
anya-e0101n:995_3: aññe idha. Oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ
anya-e0101n:995_4: dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti dīpanatthaṃ “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:996_0: Ajjhattanti idha niyakajjhattamadhippetaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana “ajjhattaṃ paccatta”nti
anya-e0101n:996_1: ettakameva vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca niyakajjhattamadhippetaṃ, tasmā attani jātaṃ attano santāne
anya-e0101n:996_2: nibbattanti ayamettha attho. Sampasādananti sampasādanaṃ vuccati saddhā. Sampasādanayogato
anya-e0101n:996_3: jhānampi sampasādanaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya. Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā
anya-e0101n:996_4: vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena ca cetaso sampasādayati, tasmāpi sampasādananti
anya-e0101n:996_5: vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:996_6: Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:997_0: Tatrāyamatthayojanā, eko udetīti ekodi, vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho
anya-e0101n:997_1: hutvā udetīti attho. Seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccati. Vitakkavicāravirahato vā eko
anya-e0101n:997_2: asahāyo hutvā itipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha vā sampayuttadhamme udāyatīti udi, uṭṭhāpetīti
anya-e0101n:997_3: attho. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi, samādhissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iti imaṃ
anya-e0101n:997_4: ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ. So panāyaṃ ekodi yasmā
anya-e0101n:997_5: cetaso, na sattassa, na jīvassa, tasmā etaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:998_0: Nanu cāyaṃ saddhā paṭhamajjhānepi atthi, ayañca ekodināmako samādhi, atha kasmā idameva
anya-e0101n:998_1: “sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvañcā”ti vuttanti. Vuccate, aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena
anya-e0101n:998_2: vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti, tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya “sampasādana”nti
anya-e0101n:998_3: na vuttaṃ. Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo, tasmā “ekodibhāva”ntipi
anya-e0101n:998_4: na vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
anya-e0101n:998_5: balavasaddhāsahāyapaṭilābheneva ca samādhipi pākaṭo, tasmā idameva evaṃ vuttanti
anya-e0101n:998_6: veditabbaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana “sampasādananti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo.
anya-e0101n:998_7: Cetaso ekodibhāvanti yā cittassa ṭhiti…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:998_8: vuttena pana tena saddhiṃ ayamatthavaṇṇanā yathā na virujjhati, aññadatthu saṃsandati
anya-e0101n:999_0: 81. Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ, etassa vā vitakko natthīti
anya-e0101n:999_1: avitakkaṃ. Imināva nayena avicāraṃ. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “iti ayañca vitakko ayañca
anya-e0101n:999_2: vicāro santā honti samitā vūpasantā atthaṅgatā abbhatthaṅgatā appitā byappitā sositā
anya-e0101n:999_3: visositā byantikatā, tena vuccati avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti.
anya-e0101n:1000_0: Etthāha “nanu ca ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’ti imināpi ayamattho siddho, atha kasmā
anya-e0101n:1000_1: puna vuttaṃ ‘avitakkaṃ avicāra’nti”. Vuccate, evametaṃ siddhovāyamattho, na panetaṃ
anya-e0101n:1000_2: tadatthadīpakaṃ. Nanu avocumha “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato
anya-e0101n:1000_3: paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo hotīti dassanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti evaṃ vutta”nti.
anya-e0101n:1001_0: Apica vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ sampasādanaṃ, na kilesakālussiyassa. Vitakkavicārānañca
anya-e0101n:1001_1: vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṃ, na upacārajjhānamiva nīvaraṇappahānā, paṭhamajjhānamiva ca
anya-e0101n:1001_2: na aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā
anya-e0101n:1001_3: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya
anya-e0101n:1001_4: cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
anya-e0101n:1001_6: “avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Tasmā purimaṃ vatvāpi vattabbamevāti.
anya-e0101n:1002_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho. Tattha
anya-e0101n:1002_1: kiñcāpi paṭhamampi sampayuttasamādhito jātaṃ, atha kho ayameva samādhi “samādhī”ti
anya-e0101n:1002_2: vattabbataṃ arahati vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā, suppasannattā
anya-e0101n:1002_3: ca, tasmā imassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idameva “samādhija”nti vuttaṃ. Pītisukhanti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0101n:1003_0: Dutiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā dutiyaṃ. Idaṃ dutiyaṃ samāpajjatītipi dutiyaṃ. Yaṃ pana
anya-e0101n:1003_2: dvaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā. Yathā ca paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti,
anya-e0101n:1003_3: na tathā imassa vitakkavicārā. Appanākkhaṇeyeva ca panetaṃ vinā tehi uppajjati. Tenassa
anya-e0101n:1003_4: te “pahānaṅga”nti vuccanti. Pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ uppattivasena
anya-e0101n:1003_5: tivaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā. Tasmā yaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti sampasādo pīti sukhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1003_6: cittassa ekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1003_7: Ṭhapetvā pana sampasādanaṃ nippariyāyena upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena
anya-e0101n:1003_8: tivaṅgikameva etaṃ hoti. Yathāha – “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tivaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0101n:1003_9: pīti sukhaṃ cittassa ekaggatā”ti. Sesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayameva.
anya-e0101n:1005_0: 82. Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato
anya-e0101n:1005_2: cetaso uppilāvitaṃ, etenetaṃ oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī’ti vuttāya pītiyā oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti
anya-e0101n:1005_3: ca tattha dosaṃ disvā tatiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0101n:1005_4: tatiyādhigamāya yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa
anya-e0101n:1005_5: jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato pīti oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, sukhañceva ekaggatā ca santato
anya-e0101n:1005_6: upaṭṭhāti. Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī
anya-e0101n:1005_7: pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto “idāni tatiyajjhānaṃ uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ
anya-e0101n:1005_8: upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1005_9: Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti, yesaṃ avasāne ekaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ
anya-e0101n:1005_10: tatiyajjhānikaṃ, sesāni vuttanayeneva kāmāvacarānīti. Ettāvatā ca panesa pītiyā ca
anya-e0101n:1005_11: virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno, sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ
anya-e0101n:1005_12: taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti.
anya-e0101n:1006_0: 83. Tattha pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo
anya-e0101n:1006_1: vā. Ubhinnaṃ pana antarā casaddo sampiṇḍanattho, so vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicārānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1006_2: vūpasamaṃ vā. Tattha yadā vūpasamameva sampiṇḍeti, tadā “pītiyā ca virāgā kiñca bhiyyo
anya-e0101n:1006_3: vūpasamā cā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti,
anya-e0101n:1006_4: tasmā “pītiyā jigucchanā ca vūpasamā cā”ti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo. Yadā pana vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ
anya-e0101n:1006_5: sampiṇḍeti, tadā “pītiyā ca virāgā, kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1006_6: yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti, tasmā “pītiyā
anya-e0101n:1006_7: ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:1007_0: Kāmañcete vitakkavicārā dutiyajjhāneyeva vūpasantā, imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1007_1: vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ. Vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0101n:1007_2: nūna vitakkavicāravūpasamo maggo imassa jhānassāti. Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge appahīnānampi
anya-e0101n:1007_3: sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā”ti evaṃ pahānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1007_4: vuccamānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti, tadadhigamāya ussukkānaṃ ussāhajanakaṃ, evameva idha
anya-e0101n:1007_5: avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti. Tenāyamattho
anya-e0101n:1008_0: 84. Upekkhako ca viharatīti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā. Samaṃ passati, apakkhapatitā
anya-e0101n:1008_1: hutvā passatīti attho. Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī
anya-e0101n:1009_0: Upekkhā pana dasavidhā hoti chaḷaṅgupekkhā, brahmavihārupekkhā, bojjhaṅgupekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1010_0: Tattha yā “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti, na dummano,
anya-e0101n:1010_1: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
anya-e0101n:1011: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ brahmavihārupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1012: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ bojjhaṅgupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1013: Yā pana “kālenakālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasikarotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā, ayaṃ vīriyupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1014_0: Yā “kati saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, kati saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
anya-e0101n:1014_1: uppajjanti. Aṭṭha saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti. Dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
anya-e0101n:1014_2: uppajjantī”ti evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā gahaṇe majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
anya-e0101n:1015: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaññitā upekkhā, ayaṃ vedanupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1016: Yā “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati, upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1017: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1018: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā, ayaṃ jhānupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1019: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ pārisuddhupekkhā nāma.
anya-e0101n:1020_0: Tatra chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā
anya-e0101n:1020_1: ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā, tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti. Tena
anya-e0101n:1020_2: tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo. Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena
anya-e0101n:1020_3: bhedo viya. Tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā, na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo. Yattha
anya-e0101n:1020_4: vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā, na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1021_0: Yathā cetāsamatthato ekībhāvo, evaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanupekkhānampi. Paññā eva
anya-e0101n:1021_1: hi sā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā. Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ
anya-e0101n:1021_2: ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu
anya-e0101n:1021_3: kho, no”ti avalokentassa sovattikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa “sappo, na sappo”ti
anya-e0101n:1021_4: vicinane majjhattatā hoti, evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye
anya-e0101n:1021_5: diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati, ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā
anya-e0101n:1021_6: nāma. Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ tāhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1021_7: imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva
anya-e0101n:1021_8: pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti. Evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte
anya-e0101n:1021_9: viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā, ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā nāma. Iti
anya-e0101n:1021_10: vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti. Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu
anya-e0101n:1021_11: majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti. Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca
anya-e0101n:1022_0: Iti imāsu upekkhāsu jhānupekkhā idhādhippetā. Sā majjhattalakkhaṇā, anābhogarasā,
anya-e0101n:1022_1: abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā, pītivirāgapadaṭṭhānāti. Etthāha, nanu cāyamatthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva
anya-e0101n:1022_2: hoti, sā ca paṭhamadutiyajjhānesupi atthi. Tasmā tatrāpi upekkhako ca viharatīti
anya-e0101n:1022_3: evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā, sā kasmā na vuttāti. Aparibyattakiccato. Aparibyattañhi tassā
anya-e0101n:1022_4: tattha kiccaṃ vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā. Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā
anya-e0101n:1022_5: ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā, tasmā vuttāti.
anya-e0101n:1025_0: 85. Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato. Sampajānātīti sampajāno. Puggalena
anya-e0101n:1025_1: sati ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ. Tattha saraṇalakkhaṇā sati, asammussanarasā, ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0101n:1026_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi. Muṭṭhasatissa hi asampajānassa
anya-e0101n:1026_1: upacāramattampi na sampajjati, pageva appanā. Oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1026_2: viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti, abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgappahānena
anya-e0101n:1026_3: pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
anya-e0101n:1026_4: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo, yathā dhenupago vaccho
anya-e0101n:1026_5: dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati, evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1026_6: pītito apanītaṃ, taṃ satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
anya-e0101n:1026_7: pītisampayuttameva siyā. Sukhe vāpi sattā sārajjanti, idañca atimadhuraṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1026_8: tato paraṃ sukhābhāvā. Satisampajaññānubhāvena panettha sukhe asārajjanā hoti, no
anya-e0101n:1026_9: aññathāti imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1027_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo
anya-e0101n:1027_1: natthi. Evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ. Yaṃ vā taṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0101n:1027_2: sukhaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo, yassa phuṭattā
anya-e0101n:1027_3: jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya. Tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento sukhañca kāyena
anya-e0101n:1028_0: 86. Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu
anya-e0101n:1028_1: yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgipuggalaṃ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti
anya-e0101n:1028_2: paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti, pasaṃsantīti
anya-e0101n:1028_3: adhippāyo. Kinti? Upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti. Taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0101n:1029_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti? Pasaṃsārahato. Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe
anya-e0101n:1029_1: sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako, na tattha sukhābhisaṅgena ākaḍḍhiyati.
anya-e0101n:1029_2: Yathā ca pīti na uppajjati, evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā. Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva
anya-e0101n:1029_3: ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, tasmā pasaṃsāraho hoti. Iti pasaṃsārahato
anya-e0101n:1029_4: naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsento “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti
anya-e0101n:1030_0: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā tatiyaṃ, idaṃ tatiyaṃ samāpajjatītipi tatiyaṃ. Yaṃ pana
anya-e0101n:1030_1: vuttaṃ “ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ duvaṅgasamannāgata”nti, ettha pītiyā pahānavasena ekaṅgavippahīnatā
anya-e0101n:1030_2: veditabbā. Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya appanākkhaṇeyeva pahīyati.
anya-e0101n:1030_3: Tena nassa sā pahānaṅganti vuccati. Sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ uppattivasena
anya-e0101n:1030_4: duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā. Tasmā yaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti upekkhā sati sampajaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:1030_5: sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1030_7: aṅgānaṃ vasena duvaṅgikamevetaṃ hoti. Yathāha – “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye duvaṅgikaṃ
anya-e0101n:1030_8: jhānaṃ hoti, sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti. Sesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayameva.
anya-e0101n:1032_0: 87. Evamadhigate pana tasmiṃpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇatatiyajjhānato
anya-e0101n:1032_1: vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā, ‘yadeva tattha sukhamiti cetaso ābhogo,
anya-e0101n:1032_2: etenetaṃ oḷārikaṃ akkhāyatī’ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca
anya-e0101n:1032_3: tattha dosaṃ disvā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikatvā tatiyajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya
anya-e0101n:1032_4: catutthādhigamāya yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa
anya-e0101n:1032_5: jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato cetasikasomanassasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, upekkhāvedanā
anya-e0101n:1032_6: ceva cittekaggatā ca santato upaṭṭhāti, tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaaṅgapaṭilābhāya
anya-e0101n:1032_7: ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto “idāni catutthaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1032_8: uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1032_9: uppajjati. Tato tasmiṃyevārammaṇe cattāri pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti, yesaṃ avasāne
anya-e0101n:1032_10: ekaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ, sesāni vuttappakārāneva kāmāvacarāni. Ayaṃ pana
anya-e0101n:1032_11: viseso, yasmā sukhavedanā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
anya-e0101n:1032_12: catutthajjhāne ca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya uppajjitabbaṃ, tasmā tāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāni
anya-e0101n:1032_13: honti. Upekkhāsampayuttattāyeva cettha pītipi parihāyatīti. Ettāvatā cesa sukhassa
anya-e0101n:1032_14: ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1032_15: upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Evamanena ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1032_16: duvaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ
anya-e0101n:1033_0: 88. Tattha sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa
anya-e0101n:1033_1: ca pahānā. Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva, na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe. Somanassadomanassānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1033_2: atthaṅgamāti cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva
anya-e0101n:1034_0: Kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti. Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe. Somanassañhi catutthajjhānassa
anya-e0101n:1034_2: Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānampi indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva
anya-e0101n:1035_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, atha kasmā “kattha
anya-e0101n:1035_1: cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva
anya-e0101n:1035_2: kāmehipi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ettha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1035_3: aparisesaṃ nirujjhati. Kattha cuppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1035_4: aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1035_5: jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti
anya-e0101n:1035_6: evaṃ jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti? Atisayanirodhattā. Atisayanirodho hi nesaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu,
anya-e0101n:1035_7: na nirodhoyeva. Nirodhoyeva pana upacārakkhaṇe, nātisayanirodho.
anya-e0101n:1036_0: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena
anya-e0101n:1036_1: vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti, na tveva antoappanāyaṃ. Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ
anya-e0101n:1036_2: na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti, paṭipakkhena avihatattā. Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena
anya-e0101n:1036_3: sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti, sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1036_4: paṭipakkhena vihatattā. Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa
anya-e0101n:1036_5: yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati. Vitakkavicārābhāve
anya-e0101n:1036_6: ca neva uppajjati. Yattha pana uppajjati, tattha vitakkavicārabhāve, appahīnā eva
anya-e0101n:1036_7: ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti, na tveva dutiyajjhāne,
anya-e0101n:1036_8: pahīnapaccayattā. Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa
anya-e0101n:1036_9: siyā uppatti, na tveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
anya-e0101n:1036_10: niruddhāti. Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya
anya-e0101n:1036_11: upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti, na tveva catutthajjhāne.
anya-e0101n:1036_12: Tasmā eva ca etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
anya-e0101n:1037_0: Etthāha “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā”ti?
anya-e0101n:1037_1: Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Yā hi ayaṃ adukkhamasukhanti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
anya-e0101n:1037_2: sā sukhumā duviññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ, tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā
anya-e0101n:1037_3: vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1037_4: vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati, athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ “ayaṃ so gaṇhatha
anya-e0101n:1037_5: na”nti tampi gāhayati, evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāhari. Evañhi
anya-e0101n:1037_6: samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ, ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1037_7: adukkhamasukhā vedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
anya-e0101n:1038_0: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1038_1: Dukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā. Yathāha – “cattāro kho, āvuso, paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
anya-e0101n:1038_2: cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1038_3: upasampajja viharati. Ime khvāvuso, cattāro paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā”ti.
anya-e0101n:1039: Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ tattha pahīnāti vuttā, evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1040_0: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānamatidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1040_1: Etāsu hi sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa. Dukkhaṃ domanassassa paccayo,
anya-e0101n:1040_2: domanassaṃ dosassa. Sukhādighātena cassa sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
anya-e0101n:1041_0: Adukkhamasukhanti dukkhābhāvena adukkhaṃ. Sukhābhāvena asukhaṃ. Etenettha dukkhasukhapaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:1041_1: tatiyavedanaṃ dīpeti, na dukkhasukhābhāvamattaṃ. Tatiyavedanā nāma adukkhamasukhā,
anya-e0101n:1041_2: upekkhātipi vuccati. Sā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattarasā, avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā,
anya-e0101n:1042_0: 89. Upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti upekkhāya janitasatiyā pārisuddhiṃ. Imasmiñhi jhāne
anya-e0101n:1042_1: suparisuddhā sati, yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā, na aññena. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:1042_2: etaṃ “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti vuccati. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya
anya-e0101n:1042_3: visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā. Tena vuccati upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti. Yāya ca
anya-e0101n:1042_4: upekkhāya ettha satiyā pārisuddhi hoti, sā atthato tatramajjhattatātiveditabbā. Na
anya-e0101n:1042_5: kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā, apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā, satisīsena pana desanā vuttā.
anya-e0101n:1043_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati. Yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā
anya-e0101n:1043_1: sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā divā vijjamānāpi
anya-e0101n:1043_2: candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā, evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
anya-e0101n:1043_4: vijjamānāpi paṭhamādijjhānabhedesu aparisuddhā hoti. Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā
anya-e0101n:1043_5: aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:1043_6: tesu ekampi “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti na vuttaṃ. Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā
anya-e0101n:1043_7: sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā ativiya
anya-e0101n:1043_8: parisuddhā. Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo
anya-e0101n:1043_9: parisuddhā honti pariyodātā. Tasmā idameva “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1044_0: Catutthanti gaṇanānupubbatā catutthaṃ. Idaṃ catutthaṃ samāpajjatītipi catutthaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1044_1: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “ekaṅgavippahīnaṃ duvaṅgasamannāgata”nti, tattha somanassassa pahānavasena
anya-e0101n:1044_2: ekaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā. Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva
anya-e0101n:1044_3: pahīyati. Tenassa taṃ pahānaṅganti vuccati. Upekkhāvedanā cittassekaggatāti imesaṃ
anya-e0101n:1044_4: pana dvinnaṃ uppattivasena duvaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā. Sesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayameva.
anya-e0101n:1046_0: 90. Pañcakajjhānaṃ pana nibbattentena paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti
anya-e0101n:1046_1: āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā, vitakkassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti ca tattha dosaṃ disvā
anya-e0101n:1046_2: dutiyajjhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā paṭhamajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādāya dutiyādhigamāya
anya-e0101n:1046_3: yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā paṭhamajjhānā vuṭṭhāya satassa sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni
anya-e0101n:1046_4: paccavekkhato vitakkamattaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, vicārādayo santato. Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya
anya-e0101n:1046_5: santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:1046_6: vuttanayeneva dutiyajjhānaṃ uppajjati. Tassa vitakkamattameva pahānaṅgaṃ. Vicārādīni
anya-e0101n:1047_0: Evamadhigate pana tasmimpi vuttanayeneva pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasinā hutvā paguṇadutiyajjhānato
anya-e0101n:1047_1: vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ samāpatti āsannavitakkapaccatthikā, vicārassa oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā”ti
anya-e0101n:1047_2: ca tattha dosaṃ disvā tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ santato manasikaritvā dutiyajjhāne nikantiṃ
anya-e0101n:1047_3: pariyādāya tatiyādhigamāya yogo kātabbo. Athassa yadā dutiyajjhānato vuṭṭhāya satassa
anya-e0101n:1047_4: sampajānassa jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhato vicāramattaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti, pītiādīni
anya-e0101n:1047_5: santato. Tadāssa oḷārikaṅgappahānāya santaṅgapaṭilābhāya ca tadeva nimittaṃ “pathavī
anya-e0101n:1047_6: pathavī”ti punappunaṃ manasikaroto vuttanayeneva tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ uppajjati. Tassa
anya-e0101n:1047_7: vicāramattameva pahānaṅgaṃ catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viya pītiādīni tīṇi samannāgataṅgāni.
anya-e0101n:1048: Iti yaṃ catukkanaye dutiyaṃ, taṃ dvidhā bhinditvā pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca hoti. Yāni ca tattha tatiyacatutthāni, tāni ca catutthapañcamāni honti. Paṭhamaṃ paṭhamamevāti.
anya-e0101n:1055_0: 91. Idāni pathavīkasiṇānantare āpokasiṇe vitthārakathā hoti. Yatheva hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1055_1: evaṃ āpokasiṇampi bhāvetukāmena sukhanisinnena āpasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, kate
anya-e0101n:1055_2: vā akate vāti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha. Ito parañhi ettakampi
anya-e0101n:1056_0: Idhāpi pubbekatādhikārassa puññavato akate āpasmiṃ pokkharaṇiyā vā taḷāke vā loṇiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1056_1: vā samudde vā nimittaṃ uppajjati cūḷasivattherassa viya. Tassa kirāyasmato lābhasakkāraṃ
anya-e0101n:1056_2: pahāya vivittavāsaṃ vasissāmīti mahātitthe nāvamārūhitvā jambudīpaṃ gacchato antarā
anya-e0101n:1057_1: āpaṃ agahetvā yaṃ pana bhūmiṃ asampattameva ākāse suddhavatthena gahitaṃ udakaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1057_2: aññaṃ vā tathārūpaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ, tena pattaṃ vā kuṇḍikaṃ vā samatittikaṃ
anya-e0101n:1057_3: pūretvā vihārapaccante vuttappakāre paṭicchanne okāse ṭhapetvā sukhanisinnena na
anya-e0101n:1057_4: vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo. Na lakkhaṇaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ. Nissayasavaṇṇameva katvā ussadavasena
anya-e0101n:1057_5: paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ ṭhapetvā ambu, udakaṃ, vāri, salilantiādīsu āponāmesu pākaṭanāmavaseneva
anya-e0101n:1058_0: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato anukkamena vuttanayeneva nimittadvayaṃ uppajjati. Idha pana uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1058_1: calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti, sace pheṇapupphuḷakamissaṃ udakaṃ hoti, tādisameva upaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1058_2: kasiṇadoso paññāyati. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana nipparipphandaṃ ākāse ṭhapitamaṇitālavaṇṭaṃ
anya-e0101n:1058_3: viya maṇimayādāsamaṇḍalamiva ca hutvā upaṭṭhāti. So tassa saha upaṭṭhāneneva upacārajjhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1060_0: 92. Tejokasiṇaṃ bhāvetukāmenāpi tejasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ. Tattha katādhikārassa
anya-e0101n:1060_1: puññavato akate nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa dīpasikhāya vā uddhane vā pattapacanaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1060_2: vā davadāhe vā yattha katthaci aggijālaṃ olokentassa nimittaṃ uppajjati cittaguttattherassa
anya-e0101n:1060_3: viya. Tassa hāyasmato dhammassavanadivase uposathāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa dīpasikhaṃ olokentasseva nimittaṃ uppajji.
anya-e0101n:1061_0: Itarena pana kātabbaṃ. Tatridaṃ karaṇavidhānaṃ, siniddhāni sāradārūni phāletvā sukkhāpetvā
anya-e0101n:1061_1: ghaṭikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ katvā patirūpaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā gantvā pattapacanākārena
anya-e0101n:1061_2: rāsiṃ katvā ālimpetvā kaṭasārake vā camme vā paṭe vā vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1061_3: chiddaṃ kātabbaṃ. Taṃ purato ṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā heṭṭhā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1061_4: vā upari dhūmasikhaṃ vā amanasikaritvā vemajjhe ghanajālāya nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1061_5: nīlanti vā pītanti vātiādivasena vaṇṇo na paccavekkhitabbo, uṇhattavasena lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1061_6: na manasi kātabbaṃ. Nissayasavaṇṇameva katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n:1061_7: pāvako, kaṇhavattanī, jātavedo, hutāsanotiādīsu aggināmesu pākaṭanāmavaseneva “tejo
anya-e0101n:1062_0: Tassevaṃ bhāvayato anukkamena vuttanayeneva nimittadvayaṃ uppajjati. Tattha uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1062_1: jālaṃ chijjitvā chijjitvā patanasadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Akate gaṇhantassa pana kasiṇadoso
anya-e0101n:1062_2: paññāyati, alātakhaṇḍaṃ vā aṅgārapiṇḍo vā chārikā vā dhūmo vā upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1062_3: niccalaṃ ākāse ṭhapitarattakambalakkhaṇḍaṃ viya suvaṇṇatālavaṇṭaṃ viya kañcanatthambho
anya-e0101n:1062_4: viya ca upaṭṭhāti. So tassa saha upaṭṭhāneneva upacārajjhānaṃ, vuttanayeneva catukkapañcakajjhānāni
anya-e0101n:1064_0: 93. Vāyokasiṇaṃ bhāvetukāmenāpi vāyusmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ. Tañca kho diṭṭhavasena
anya-e0101n:1064_1: vā phuṭṭhavasena vā. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “vāyokasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto vāyusmiṃ nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1064_2: gaṇhāti, ucchaggaṃ vā eritaṃ sameritaṃ upalakkheti, veḷaggaṃ vā…pe… rukkhaggaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:1064_3: kesaggaṃ vā eritaṃ sameritaṃ upalakkheti, kāyasmiṃ vā phuṭṭhaṃ upalakkhetī”ti. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:1064_4: samasīsaṭṭhitaṃ ghanapattaṃ ucchuṃ vā veḷuṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā caturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ ghanakesassa
anya-e0101n:1064_5: purisassa sīsaṃ vā vātena pahariyamānaṃ disvā “ayaṃ vāto etasmiṃ ṭhāne paharatī”ti
anya-e0101n:1064_6: satiṃ ṭhapetvā, yaṃ vā panassa vātapānantarikāya vā bhittichiddena vā pavisitvā vāto
anya-e0101n:1064_7: kāyappadesaṃ paharati, tattha satiṃ ṭhapetvā vātamālutaanilādīsu vāyunāmesu pākaṭanāmavaseneva
anya-e0101n:1064_8: “vāto vāto”ti bhāvetabbaṃ. Idha uggahanimittavaḍḍhanato otāritamattassa pāyāsassa
anya-e0101n:1064_9: usumavaṭṭisadisaṃ calaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ sannisinnaṃ hoti niccalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1066_0: 94. Tadanantaraṃ pana nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlakasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1066_1: vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti vacanato katādhikārassa puññavato tāva tathārūpaṃ
anya-e0101n:1066_2: mālāgacchaṃ vā pūjāṭhānesu pupphasantharaṃ vā nīlavatthamaṇīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ disvāva
anya-e0101n:1066_3: nimittaṃ uppajjati. Itarena nīluppalagirikaṇṇikādīni pupphāni gahetvā yathā kesaraṃ
anya-e0101n:1066_4: vā vaṇṭaṃ vā na paññāyati, evaṃ caṅgoṭakaṃ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ vā pattehiyeva samatittikaṃ
anya-e0101n:1066_5: pūretvā santharitabbaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇena vā vatthena bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā pūretabbaṃ. Mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1066_6: vā assa bheritalamiva bandhitabbaṃ. Kaṃsanīlapalāsanīlaañjananīlānaṃ vā aññatarena
anya-e0101n:1066_7: dhātunā pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena saṃhārimaṃ vā bhittiyaṃyeva vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ katvā
anya-e0101n:1066_8: visabhāgavaṇṇena paricchinditabbaṃ. Tato pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena “nīlaṃ nīla”nti
anya-e0101n:1066_9: manasikāro pavattetabbo. Idhāpi uggahanimitte kasiṇadoso paññāyati, kesaradaṇḍakapattantarikādīni
anya-e0101n:1066_10: upaṭṭhahanti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ kasiṇamaṇḍalato muñcitvā ākāse maṇitālavaṇṭasadisaṃ
anya-e0101n:1068_0: 95. Pītakasiṇepi eseva nayo. Vuttañhetaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto pītakasmiṃ nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1068_1: gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti. Tasmā idhāpi katādhikārassa
anya-e0101n:1068_2: puññavato tathārūpaṃ mālāgacchaṃ vā pupphasantharaṃ vā pītavatthadhātūnaṃ vā aññataraṃ
anya-e0101n:1068_3: disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati cittaguttattherassa viya. Tassa kirāyasmato cittalapabbate
anya-e0101n:1068_4: pattaṅgapupphehi kataṃ āsanapūjaṃ passato saha dassaneneva āsanappamāṇaṃ nimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1068_5: udapādi. Itarena kaṇikārapupphādinā vā pītavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva
anya-e0101n:1068_6: kasiṇaṃ katvā “pītakaṃ pītaka”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti. Pītakasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1070_0: 96. Lohitakasiṇepi eseva nayo. Vuttañhetaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto lohitakasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1070_1: nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti. Tasmā idhāpi katādhikārassa
anya-e0101n:1070_2: puññavato tathārūpaṃ bandhujīvakādimālāgacchaṃ vā pupphasantharaṃ vā lohitakavatthamaṇidhātūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1070_3: vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati. Itarena jayasumanabandhujīvakarattakoraṇḍakādipupphehi
anya-e0101n:1070_4: vā rattavatthena vā dhātunā vā nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva kasiṇaṃ katvā “lohitakaṃ
anya-e0101n:1070_5: lohitaka”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo. Sesaṃ tādisamevāti. Lohitakasiṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1072_0: 97. Odātakasiṇepi odātakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto odātasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā
anya-e0101n:1072_1: vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato tathārūpaṃ
anya-e0101n:1072_2: mālāgacchaṃ vā vassikasumanādipupphasantharaṃ vā kumudapadumarāsiṃ vā odātavatthadhātūnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1072_3: vā aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati, tipumaṇḍalarajatamaṇḍalacandamaṇḍalesupi
anya-e0101n:1072_4: uppajjatiyeva. Itarena vuttappakārehi odātapupphehi vā odātavatthena vā dhātunā vā
anya-e0101n:1072_5: nīlakasiṇe vuttanayeneva kasiṇaṃ katvā “odātaṃ odāta”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1074_0: 98. Ālokakasiṇe pana ālokakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto ālokasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti bhittichidde
anya-e0101n:1074_1: vā tāḷacchidde vā vātapānantarikāya vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato yaṃ
anya-e0101n:1074_2: bhittichiddādīnaṃ aññatarena sūriyāloko vā candāloko vā pavisitvā bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1074_3: vā maṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, ghanapaṇṇarukkhasākhantarena vā ghanasākhāmaṇḍapantarena
anya-e0101n:1074_4: vā nikkhamitvā bhūmiyameva maṇḍalaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, taṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:1074_5: Itarenāpi tadeva vuttappakāramobhāsamaṇḍalaṃ “obhāso obhāso”ti vā “āloko āloko”ti
anya-e0101n:1074_6: vā bhāvetabbaṃ. Tathā asakkontena ghaṭe dīpaṃ jāletvā ghaṭamukhaṃ pidahitvā ghaṭe
anya-e0101n:1074_7: chiddaṃ katvā bhittimukhaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Tena chiddena dīpāloko nikkhamitvā bhittiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1074_8: maṇḍalaṃ karoti, taṃ āloko ālokoti bhāvetabbaṃ. Idamitarehi ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti. Idha
anya-e0101n:1074_9: uggahanimittaṃ bhittiyaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ vā uṭṭhitamaṇḍalasadisameva hoti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1076_0: 99. Paricchinnākāsakasiṇepi ākāsakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto ākāsasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti bhittichidde
anya-e0101n:1076_1: vā tāḷacchidde vā vātapānantarikāya vāti vacanato katādhikārassa tāva puññavato bhittichiddādīsu
anya-e0101n:1076_2: aññataraṃ disvāva nimittaṃ uppajjati. Itarena succhannamaṇḍape vā cammakaṭasārakādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1076_3: vā aññatarasmiṃ vidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇaṃ chiddaṃ katvā tadeva vā bhittichiddādibhedaṃ
anya-e0101n:1076_4: chiddaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti bhāvetabbaṃ. Idha uggahanimittaṃ saddhiṃ bhittipariyantādīhi
anya-e0101n:1076_5: chiddasadisameva hoti, vaḍḍhiyamānampi na vaḍḍhati. Paṭibhāganimittamākāsamaṇḍalameva
anya-e0101n:1076_6: hutvā upaṭṭhāti, vaḍḍhiyamānañca vaḍḍhati. Sesaṃ pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
anya-e0101n:1085_0: 100. Imesu hi pathavīkasiṇavasena ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādibhāvo, ākāse vā udake
anya-e0101n:1085_1: vā pathaviṃ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṃ, ṭhānanisajjādikappanaṃ vā, parittaappamāṇanayena
anya-e0101n:1086: Āpokasiṇavasena pathaviyaṃ ummujjananimmujjanaṃ, udakavuṭṭhisamuppādanaṃ, nadīsamuddādinimmānaṃ, pathavīpabbatapāsādādīnaṃ kampananti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1087_0: Tejokasiṇavasena dhūmāyanā, pajjalanā, aṅgāravuṭṭhisamuppādanaṃ, tejasā tejopariyādānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1087_1: yadeva so icchati tassa ḍahanasamatthatā, dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthāya ālokakaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1089: Nīlakasiṇavasena nīlarūpanimmānaṃ, andhakārakaraṇaṃ, suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇanayena abhibhāyatanapaṭilābho, subhavimokkhādhigamoti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1090: Pītakasiṇavasena pītakarūpanimmānaṃ, suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā, vuttanayeneva abhibhāyatanapaṭilābho, subhavimokkhādhigamo cāti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1091: Lohitakasiṇavasena lohitakarūpanimmānaṃ, vuttanayeneva abhibhāyatanapaṭilābho, subhavimokkhādhigamoti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1092: Odātakasiṇavasena odātarūpanimmānaṃ, thinamiddhassa dūrabhāvakaraṇaṃ, andhakāravidhamanaṃ, dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthāya ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1093: Ālokakasiṇavasena sappabhārūpanimmānaṃ, thinamiddhassa dūrabhāvakaraṇaṃ, andhakāravidhamanaṃ, dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthaṃ ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1094: Ākāsakasiṇavasena paṭicchannānaṃ vivaṭakaraṇaṃ, antopathavīpabbatādīsupi ākāsaṃ nimminitvā iriyāpathakappanaṃ, tirokuḍḍādīsu asajjamānagamananti evamādīni ijjhanti.
anya-e0101n:1095: Sabbāneva uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇanti imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhanti. Vuttañhetaṃ “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti. Uddhamadhotiriyaṃ advayamappamāṇa”ntiādi.
anya-e0101n:1096_0: Tattha uddhanti uparigaganatalābhimukhaṃ. Adhoti heṭṭhābhūmitalābhimukhaṃ. Tiriyanti
anya-e0101n:1096_1: khettamaṇḍalamiva samantā paricchinditaṃ. Ekacco hi uddhameva kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍheti, ekacco
anya-e0101n:1096_2: adho, ekacco samantato. Tena tena vā kāraṇena evaṃ pasāreti. Ālokamiva dibbacakkhunā
anya-e0101n:1096_3: rūpadassanakāmo. Tena vuttaṃ uddhamadhotiriyanti. Advayanti idaṃ pana ekassa aññabhāvānupagamanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1096_4: vuttaṃ. Yathā hi udakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sabbadisāsu udakameva hoti, na aññaṃ, evameva
anya-e0101n:1096_5: pathavīkasiṇaṃ pathavīkasiṇameva hoti, natthi tassa añño kasiṇasambhedoti. Eseva
anya-e0101n:1096_6: nayo sabbattha. Appamāṇanti idaṃ tassa pharaṇaappamāṇavasena vuttaṃ. Tañhi cetasā
anya-e0101n:1096_7: pharanto sakalameva pharati. Na ayamassa ādi idaṃ majjhanti pamāṇaṃ gaṇhātīti.
anya-e0101n:1097_0: 101. Ye ca te sattā kammāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena vā samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena
anya-e0101n:1097_1: vā samannāgatā asaddhā acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu
anya-e0101n:1097_2: sammattanti vuttā, tesamekassāpekakasiṇepi bhāvanā na ijjhati. Tattha kammāvaraṇena
anya-e0101n:1097_4: ceva ubhatobyañjanakapaṇḍakā ca. Vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatāti ahetukadvihetukapaṭisandhikā.
anya-e0101n:1097_5: Asaddhāti buddhādīsu saddhāvirahitā. Acchandikāti apaccanīkapaṭipadāyaṃ chandavirahitā.
anya-e0101n:1097_6: Duppaññāti lokiyalokuttarasammādiṭṭhiyā virahitā. Abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu
anya-e0101n:1097_7: dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu niyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattasaṅkhātañca ariyamaggaṃ
anya-e0101n:1097_8: okkamituṃ abhabbāti attho. Na kevalañca kasiṇeyeva, aññesupi kammaṭṭhānesu etesamekassapi
anya-e0101n:1097_9: bhāvanā na ijjhati. Tasmā vigatavipākāvaraṇenapi kulaputtena kammāvaraṇañca kilesāvaraṇañca
anya-e0101n:1097_10: ārakā parivajjetvā saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayādīhi saddhañca chandañca paññañca
anya-e0101n:1104_0: 102. Kasiṇānantaramuddiṭṭhesu pana uddhumātakaṃ, vinīlakaṃ, vipubbakaṃ, vicchiddakaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1104_1: vikkhāyitakaṃ, vikkhittakaṃ, hatavikkhittakaṃ, lohitakaṃ, puḷavakaṃ, aṭṭhikanti dasasu
anya-e0101n:1104_2: aviññāṇakāsubhesu bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena
anya-e0101n:1104_3: sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātaṃ, uddhumātameva uddhumātakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā
anya-e0101n:1104_4: kucchitaṃ uddhumātanti uddhumātakaṃ. Tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1105_0: Vinīlaṃ vuccati viparibhinnanīlavaṇṇaṃ, vinīlameva vinīlakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1105_1: vinīlanti vinīlakaṃ. Maṃsussadaṭṭhānesu rattavaṇṇassa pubbasannicayaṭṭhānesu setavaṇṇassa
anya-e0101n:1105_2: yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nīlaṭṭhāne nīlasāṭakapārutasseva chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1106: Paribhinnaṭṭhānesu vissandamānaṃ pubbaṃ vipubbaṃ, vipubbameva vipubbakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ. Tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1107: Vicchiddaṃ vuccati dvidhā chindanena apadhāritaṃ, vicchiddameva vicchiddakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vicchiddanti vicchiddakaṃ. Vemajjhe chinnassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1108_0: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāditanti vikkhāyitaṃ, vikkhāyitameva
anya-e0101n:1108_1: vikkhāyitakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vikkhāyitanti vikkhāyitakaṃ. Tathārūpassa
anya-e0101n:1109_0: Vividhaṃ khittaṃ vikkhittaṃ, vikkhittameva vikkhittakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1109_1: vikkhittanti vikkhittakaṃ. Aññena hatthaṃ aññena pādaṃ aññena sīsanti evaṃ tato tato
anya-e0101n:1110: Hatañca taṃ purimanayeneva vikkhittakañcāti hatavikkhittakaṃ. Kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayena vikkhittassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1111: Lohitaṃ kirati vikkhipati ito cito ca paggharatīti lohitakaṃ. Paggharitalohitamakkhitassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1112: Puḷavā vuccanti kimayo, puḷave kiratīti puḷavakaṃ. Kimiparipuṇṇassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1113_0: Aṭṭhiyeva aṭṭhikaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ aṭṭhīti aṭṭhikaṃ. Aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāyapi
anya-e0101n:1113_1: ekaṭṭhikassapetamadhivacanaṃ. Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni nissāya uppannanimittānampi
anya-e0101n:1115_1: jhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena yoginā pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0101n:1115_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetabbaṃ. Tenassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena asubhanimittatthāya gamanavidhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1115_4: evaṃ appanāvidhānapariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Tenāpi sabbaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetvā
anya-e0101n:1115_5: pubbe vuttappakāraṃ senāsanaṃ upagantvā uddhumātakanimittaṃ pariyesantena vihātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1116_0: 104. Evaṃ viharantena ca asukasmiṃ nāma gāmadvāre vā aṭavimukhe vā panthe vā pabbatapāde
anya-e0101n:1116_1: vā rukkhamūle vā susāne vā uddhumātakasarīraṃ nikkhittanti kathentānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvāpi
anya-e0101n:1116_2: na tāvadeva atitthena pakkhandantena viya gantabbaṃ. Kasmā? Asubhaṃ hi nāmetaṃ vāḷamigādhiṭṭhitampi
anya-e0101n:1116_3: amanussādhiṭṭhitampi hoti. Tatrassa jīvitantarāyopi siyā. Gamanamaggo vā panettha
anya-e0101n:1116_4: gāmadvārena vā nahānatitthena vā kedārakoṭiyā vā hoti. Tattha visabhāgarūpaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:1116_5: tadeva vā sarīraṃ visabhāgaṃ hoti. Purisassa hi itthisarīraṃ itthiyā ca purisasarīraṃ
anya-e0101n:1116_6: visabhāgaṃ, tadetaṃ adhunāmataṃ subhatopi upaṭṭhāti, tenassa brahmacariyantarāyopi
anya-e0101n:1116_7: siyā. Sace pana “nayidaṃ mādisassa bhāriya”nti attānaṃ takkayati, evaṃ takkayamānena gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1117_0: 105. Gacchantena ca saṅghattherassa vā aññatarassa vā abhiññātassa bhikkhuno kathetvā
anya-e0101n:1117_1: gantabbaṃ. Kasmā? Sace hissa susāne amanussasīhabyagghādīnaṃ rūpasaddādianiṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassa
anya-e0101n:1117_2: aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā pavedhenti, bhuttaṃ vā na parisaṇṭhāti, añño vā ābādho hoti. Athassa
anya-e0101n:1117_3: so vihāre pattacīvaraṃ surakkhitaṃ karissati. Dahare vā sāmaṇere vā pahiṇitvā taṃ
anya-e0101n:1117_4: bhikkhuṃ paṭijaggissati. Apica susānaṃ nāma nirāsaṅkaṭṭhānanti maññamānā katakammāpi
anya-e0101n:1117_5: akatakammāpi corā samosaranti. Te manussehi anubaddhā bhikkhussa samīpe bhaṇḍakaṃ
anya-e0101n:1117_6: chaḍḍetvāpi palāyanti. Manussā “sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ addasāmā”ti bhikkhuṃ gahetvā viheṭhenti.
anya-e0101n:1117_7: Athassa so “mā imaṃ viheṭhayittha, mamāyaṃ kathetvā iminā nāma kammena gato”ti te
anya-e0101n:1117_8: manusse saññāpetvā sotthibhāvaṃ karissati. Ayaṃ ānisaṃso kathetvā gamane. Tasmā vuttappakārassa
anya-e0101n:1117_9: bhikkhuno kathetvā asubhanimittadassane sañjātābhilāsena yathānāma khattiyo abhisekaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1117_10: yajamāno yaññasālaṃ, adhano vā pana nidhiṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajāto gacchati, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1117_11: pītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttena vidhinā gantabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:1118_0: “Uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya satiyā asammuṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n:1118_1: antogatehi indriyehi abahigatena mānasena gatāgatamaggaṃ paccavekkhamāno. Yasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1118_2: padese uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ padese pāsāṇaṃ vā vammikaṃ
anya-e0101n:1118_3: vā rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā sanimittaṃ karoti, sārammaṇaṃ karoti. Sanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1118_4: katvā sārammaṇaṃ katvā uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ sabhāvabhāvato upalakkheti, vaṇṇatopi
anya-e0101n:1118_5: liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopi sandhito vivarato ninnato
anya-e0101n:1118_6: thalato samantato. So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karoti, sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāreti, suvavatthitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1118_7: vavatthapeti. So taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1118_8: vavatthapetvā eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya satiyā asammuṭṭhāya antogatehi indriyehi
anya-e0101n:1118_9: abahigatena mānasena gatāgatamaggaṃ paccavekkhamāno. So caṅkamantopi tabbhāgiyaññeva
anya-e0101n:1118_10: caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Nisīdantopi tabbhāgiyaññeva āsanaṃ paññapeti.
anya-e0101n:1119_0: “Samantā nimittupalakkhaṇā kimatthiyā kimānisaṃsāti? Samantā nimittupalakkhaṇā asammohatthā
anya-e0101n:1119_1: asammohānisaṃsā. Ekādasavidhena nimittaggāho kimatthiyo kimānisaṃsoti? Ekādasavidhena
anya-e0101n:1120_0: “So ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno tasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1120_1: ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhati ‘addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī’ti.
anya-e0101n:1120_2: So vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. Tassādhigataṃ hoti
anya-e0101n:1120_3: rūpāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro bhāvanāmayañca puññakiriyavatthu”nti.
anya-e0101n:1121_0: 106. Tasmā yo cittasaññattatthāya sivathikadassanaṃ gacchati, so ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā
anya-e0101n:1121_1: gaṇaṃ sannipātetvāpi gacchatu. Kammaṭṭhānasīsena pana gacchantena ekakena adutiyena
anya-e0101n:1121_2: mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvā taṃ manasikaronteneva susāne soṇādiparissayavinodanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1121_3: kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā yaṭṭhiṃ vā gahetvā, sūpaṭṭhita bhāvasampādanena asammuṭṭhaṃ satiṃ
anya-e0101n:1121_4: katvā, manacchaṭṭhānañca indriyānaṃ antogatabhāvasampādanato abahigatamanena hutvā gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1122_0: Vihārato nikkhamanteneva asukadisāya asukadvārena nikkhantomhīti dvāraṃ sallakkhetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1122_1: Tato yena maggena gacchati, so maggo vavatthapetabbo, ayaṃ maggo pācinadisābhimukho
anya-e0101n:1122_2: vā gacchati, pacchimauttaradakkhiṇadisābhimukho vā vidisābhimukhovāti. Imasmiṃ pana
anya-e0101n:1122_3: ṭhāne vāmato gacchati, imasmiṃ ṭhāne dakkhiṇato, imasmiṃ cassa ṭhāne pāsāṇo, imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1122_4: vammiko, imasmiṃ rukkho, imasmiṃ gaccho, imasmiṃ latāti. Evaṃ gamanamaggaṃ vavatthapentena
anya-e0101n:1122_5: nimittaṭṭhānaṃ gantabbaṃ. No ca kho paṭivātaṃ. Paṭivātaṃ gacchantassa hi kuṇapagandho
anya-e0101n:1122_6: ghānaṃ paharitvā matthaluṅgaṃ vā saṅkhobheyya, āhāraṃ vā chaḍḍāpeyya, vippaṭisāraṃ
anya-e0101n:1122_7: vā janeyya “īdisaṃ nāma kuṇapaṭṭhānaṃ āgatomhī”ti. Tasmā paṭivātaṃ vajjetvā anuvātaṃ
anya-e0101n:1122_8: gantabbaṃ. Sace anuvātamaggena na sakkā hoti gantuṃ, antarā pabbato vā papāto vā
anya-e0101n:1122_9: pāsāṇo vā vati vā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṃ vā udakaṃ vā cikkhallaṃ vā hoti, cīvarakaṇṇena nāsaṃ
anya-e0101n:1123_0: 107. Evaṃ gatena pana na tāva asubhanimittaṃ oloketabbaṃ. Disā vavatthapetabbā. Ekasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1123_1: hi disābhāge ṭhitassa ārammaṇañca na vibhūtaṃ hutvā khāyati, cittañca na kammaniyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1123_2: hoti. Tasmā taṃ vajjetvā yattha ṭhitassa ārammaṇañca vibhūtaṃ hutvā khāyati, cittañca
anya-e0101n:1123_3: kammaniyaṃ hoti, tattha ṭhātabbaṃ. Paṭivātānuvātañca pahātabbaṃ. Paṭivāte ṭhitassa
anya-e0101n:1123_4: hi kuṇapagandhena ubbāḷhassa cittaṃ vidhāvati. Anuvāte ṭhitassa sace tattha adhivatthā
anya-e0101n:1123_5: amanussā honti, te kujjhitvā anatthaṃ karonti. Tasmā īsakaṃ ukkamma nātianuvāte ṭhātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1123_6: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānenāpi nātidūre nāccāsanne nānupādaṃ nānusīsaṃ ṭhātabbaṃ. Atidūre ṭhitassa
anya-e0101n:1123_7: hi ārammaṇaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti. Accāsanne bhayamuppajjati. Anupādaṃ vā anusīsaṃ vā ṭhitassa
anya-e0101n:1123_8: sabbaṃ asubhaṃ samaṃ na paññāyati. Tasmā nātidūre nāccāsanne olokentassa phāsukaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1124_0: 108. Evaṃ ṭhitena “tasmiṃ padese pāsāṇaṃ vā…pe… lataṃ vā sanimittaṃ karotī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1124_1: vuttāni samantā nimittāni upalakkhetabbāni. Tatridaṃ upalakkhaṇavidhānaṃ, sace tassa
anya-e0101n:1124_2: nimittassa samantā cakkhupathe pāsāṇo hoti, so “ayaṃ pāsāṇo ucco vā nīco vā khuddako
anya-e0101n:1124_3: vā mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā dīgho vā parimaṇḍalo vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1124_4: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ pāsāṇo idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ, idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1124_5: pāsāṇo”ti sallakkhetabbaṃ. Sace vammiko hoti, sopi “ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto
anya-e0101n:1124_6: vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā dīgho vā parimaṇḍalo vā”ti vavatthapetabbo. Tato “imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1124_7: nāma okāse ayaṃ vammiko idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ. Sace rukkho hoti,
anya-e0101n:1124_8: sopi “assattho vā nigrodho vā kacchako vā kapītano vā ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā
anya-e0101n:1124_9: mahanto vā tambo vā kāḷo vā seto vā”ti vavatthapetabbo. Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse
anya-e0101n:1124_10: ayaṃ rukkho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ. Sace gaccho hoti, sopi “sindivā
anya-e0101n:1124_11: karamando vā kaṇavīro vā kuraṇḍako vā ucco vā nīco vā khuddako vā mahanto vā”ti vavatthapetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1124_12: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ gaccho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ. Sace
anya-e0101n:1124_13: latā hoti, sāpi “lābu vā kumbhaṇḍī vā sāmā vā kāḷavalli vā pūtilatā vā”ti vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1124_14: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ latā idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ, idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1125_0: 109. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ sanimittaṃ karoti sārammaṇaṃ karotīti, taṃ idheva antogadhaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1125_1: Punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karoti nāma. Ayaṃ pāsāṇo idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1125_2: idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ pāsāṇoti evaṃ dve dve samāsetvā samāsetvā vavatthapento
anya-e0101n:1126_0: Evaṃ sanimittaṃ sārammaṇañca katvā pana sabhāvabhāvato vavatthapetīti vuttattā yvāssa
anya-e0101n:1126_1: sabhāvabhāvo anaññasādhāraṇo attaniyo uddhumātakabhāvo, tena manasikātabbaṃ. Vaṇitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1126_2: uddhumātakanti evaṃ sabhāvena sarasena vavatthapetabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n:1127_0: 110. Evaṃ vavatthapetvā vaṇṇatopi liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopīti
anya-e0101n:1127_1: chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tena hi yoginā idaṃ sarīraṃ kāḷassa vā odātassa
anya-e0101n:1127_2: vā maṅguracchavino vāti vaṇṇato vavatthapetabbaṃ. Liṅgato pana itthiliṅgaṃ vā purisaliṅgaṃ
anya-e0101n:1127_3: vāti avavatthapetvā paṭhamavaye vā majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā ṭhitassa idaṃ
anya-e0101n:1127_4: sarīranti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Saṇṭhānato uddhumātakassa saṇṭhānavaseneva idamassa sīsasaṇṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1127_5: idaṃ gīvāsaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ hatthasaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ udarasaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ nābhisaṇṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1127_6: idaṃ kaṭisaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ ūrusaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ jaṅghāsaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ pādasaṇṭhānanti
anya-e0101n:1127_7: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Disato pana imasmiṃ sarīre dve disā nābhiyā adho heṭṭhimadisā uddhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1127_8: uparimadisāti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ahaṃ imissā disāya ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ imissāti
anya-e0101n:1127_9: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Okāsato pana imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthā, imasmiṃ pādā, imasmiṃ sīsaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1127_10: imasmiṃ majjhimakāyo ṭhitoti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ahaṃ imasmiṃ okāse ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1127_11: imasminti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Paricchedato idaṃ sarīraṃ adho pādatalena upari kesamatthakena
anya-e0101n:1127_12: tiriyaṃ tacena paricchinnaṃ, yathāparicchinne ca ṭhāne dvattiṃsakuṇapabharitamevāti
anya-e0101n:1127_13: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ayamassa hatthaparicchedo, ayaṃ pādaparicchedo, ayaṃ sīsaparicchedo,
anya-e0101n:1127_14: ayaṃ majjhimakāyaparicchedoti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Yattakaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ gaṇhati,
anya-e0101n:1127_15: tattakameva idaṃ īdisaṃ uddhumātakanti paricchinditabbaṃ. Purisassa pana itthisarīraṃ
anya-e0101n:1127_16: itthiyā vā purisasarīraṃ na vaṭṭati. Visabhāge sarīre ārammaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, vipphandanasseva
anya-e0101n:1127_17: paccayo hoti. “Ugghāṭitāpi hi itthī purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1127_18: vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabhāgasarīreyeva evaṃ chabbidhena nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1128_0: 111. Yo pana purimabuddhānaṃ santike āsevitakammaṭṭhāno parihatadhutaṅgo parimadditamahābhūto
anya-e0101n:1128_2: bhāvitabhāvano sabījo ñāṇuttaro appakileso kulaputto, tassa olokitolokitaṭṭhāneyeva
anya-e0101n:1128_3: paṭibhāganimittaṃ upaṭṭhāti. No ce evaṃ upaṭṭhāti, athevaṃ chabbidhena nimittaṃ gaṇhato
anya-e0101n:1128_4: upaṭṭhāti. Yassa pana evampi na upaṭṭhāti, tena sandhito vivarato ninnato thalato
anya-e0101n:1129_0: 112. Tattha sandhitoti asītisatasandhito. Uddhumātake pana kathaṃ asītisatasandhayo
anya-e0101n:1129_1: vavatthapessati. Tasmānena tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhī, tayo vāmahatthasandhī, tayo
anya-e0101n:1129_2: dakkhiṇapādasandhī, tayo vāmapādasandhī, eko gīvasandhi, eko kaṭisandhīti evaṃ cuddasamahāsandhivasena
anya-e0101n:1129_3: sandhito vavatthapetabbaṃ. Vivaratoti vivaraṃ nāma hatthantaraṃ pādantaraṃ udarantaraṃ
anya-e0101n:1129_4: kaṇṇantaranti evaṃ vivarato vavatthapetabbaṃ. Akkhīnampi nimmīlitabhāvo vā ummīlitabhāvo
anya-e0101n:1129_5: vā mukhassa ca pihitabhāvo vā vivaṭabhāvo vā vavatthapetabbo. Ninnatoti yaṃ sarīre
anya-e0101n:1129_6: ninnaṭṭhānaṃ akkhikūpo vā antomukhaṃ vā galavāṭako vā, taṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha
anya-e0101n:1129_7: vā ahaṃ ninne ṭhito sarīraṃ unnateti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Thalatoti yaṃ sarīre unnataṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1129_8: jaṇṇukaṃ vā uro vā nalāṭaṃ vā, taṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ahaṃ thale ṭhito sarīraṃ
anya-e0101n:1129_9: ninneti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Samantatoti sabbaṃ sarīraṃ samantato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1129_10: Sakalasarīre ñāṇaṃ cāretvā yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tattha “uddhumātakaṃ
anya-e0101n:1129_11: uddhumātaka”nti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Sace evampi na upaṭṭhāti, udarapariyosānaṃ atirekaṃ
anya-e0101n:1129_12: uddhumātakaṃ hoti, tattha “uddhumātakaṃ uddhumātaka”nti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1130: 113. Idāni “so taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotī”tiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayakathā –
anya-e0101n:1131_0: Tena yoginā tasmiṃ sarīre yathāvuttanimittaggāhavasena suṭṭhu nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1131_1: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontena sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva
anya-e0101n:1131_2: vavatthapetabbañca. Sarīrato nātidūre nāccāsanne padese ṭhitena vā nisinnena vā cakkhuṃ
anya-e0101n:1131_4: satakkhattuṃ sahassakkhattuṃ ummīletvā oloketabbaṃ, nimmīletvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1131_5: punappunaṃ karontassa uggahanimittaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti. Kadā suggahitaṃ hoti? Yadā
anya-e0101n:1131_6: ummīletvā olokentassa nimmīletvā āvajjentassa ca ekasadisaṃ hutvā āpāthamāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:1132_0: So taṃ nimittaṃ evaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā sūpadhāritaṃ upadhāretvā suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetvā
anya-e0101n:1132_1: sace tattheva bhāvanāpariyosānaṃ pattuṃ na sakkoti, athānena āgamanakāle vuttanayeneva
anya-e0101n:1132_2: ekakena adutiyena tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontena sūpaṭṭhitaṃ satiṃ katvā antogatehi
anya-e0101n:1132_3: indriyehi abahigatena mānasena attano senāsanameva gantabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1133_0: Susānā nikkhamanteneva ca āgamanamaggo vavatthapetabbo, yena maggena nikkhantosmi,
anya-e0101n:1133_1: ayaṃ maggo pācīnadisābhimukho vā gacchati, pacchimauttaradakkhiṇadisābhimukho vā
anya-e0101n:1133_2: gacchati, vidisābhimukho vā gacchati. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne vāmato gacchati, imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1133_3: dakkhiṇato, imasmiṃ cassa ṭhāne pāsāṇo, imasmiṃ vammiko, imasmiṃ rukkho, imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1133_4: gaccho, imasmiṃ latāti evaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ vavatthapetvā āgatena caṅkamantenāpi tabbhāgiyova
anya-e0101n:1133_5: caṅkamo adhiṭṭhātabbo, asubhanimittadisābhimukhe bhūmippadese caṅkamitabbanti attho.
anya-e0101n:1133_6: Nisīdantena āsanampi tabbhāgiyameva paññapetabbaṃ. Sace pana tassaṃ disāyaṃ sobbho
anya-e0101n:1133_7: vā papāto vā rukkho vā vati vā kalalaṃ vā hoti, na sakkā taṃdisābhimukhe bhūmippadese
anya-e0101n:1133_8: caṅkamituṃ, āsanampi anokāsattā na sakkā paññapetuṃ. Taṃ disaṃ anapalokentenāpi okāsānurūpe
anya-e0101n:1133_9: ṭhāne caṅkamitabbañceva nisīditabbañca. Cittaṃ pana taṃdisābhimukhaṃyeva kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1134_1: ayaṃ adhippāyo. Yassa hi avelāyaṃ uddhumātakanimittaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samantā nimittupalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_2: katvā nimittaggahaṇatthaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokentasseva taṃ matasarīraṃ uṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0101n:1134_3: ṭhitaṃ viya ajjhottharamānaṃ viya anubandhamānaṃ viya ca hutvā upaṭṭhāti, so taṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_4: bībhacchaṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ disvā vikkhittacitto ummattako viya hoti, bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_5: lomahaṃsaṃ pāpuṇāti. Pāḷiyaṃ hi vibhattaaṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇesu aññaṃ evarūpaṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_6: nāma natthi. Imasmiṃ hi kammaṭṭhāne jhānavibbhantako nāma hoti. Kasmā? Atibheravattā
anya-e0101n:1134_7: kammaṭṭhānassa. Tasmā tena yoginā santhambhetvā satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā matasarīraṃ
anya-e0101n:1134_8: uṭṭhahitvā anubandhanakaṃ nāma natthi. Sace hi so “etassa samīpe ṭhito pāsāṇo vā
anya-e0101n:1134_9: latā vā āgaccheyya, sarīrampi āgaccheyya. Yathā pana so pāsāṇo vā latā vā nāgacchati,
anya-e0101n:1134_10: evaṃ sarīrampi nāgacchati. Ayaṃ pana tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhānākāro saññajo saññāsambhavo,
anya-e0101n:1134_11: kammaṭṭhānaṃ te ajja upaṭṭhitaṃ, mā bhāyi bhikkhū”ti tāsaṃ vinodetvā hāsaṃ uppādetvā
anya-e0101n:1134_12: tasmiṃ nimitte cittaṃ sañcarāpetabbaṃ. Evaṃ visesamadhigacchati. Idametaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0101n:1135_0: Ekādasavidhena pana nimittaggāhaṃ sampādento kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanibandhati. Tassa hi
anya-e0101n:1135_1: cakkhūni ummīletvā olokanapaccayā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati. Tasmiṃ mānasaṃ cārentassa
anya-e0101n:1135_2: paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppajjati. Tattha mānasaṃ cārento appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Appanāyaṃ ṭhatvā
anya-e0101n:1135_3: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento arahattaṃ sacchikaroti. Tena vuttaṃ “ekādasavidhena nimittaggāho
anya-e0101n:1136_0: 115. Gatāgatamaggapaccavekkhaṇā vīthisampaṭipādanatthāti ettha pana yā gatamaggassa
anya-e0101n:1136_1: ca āgatamaggassa ca paccavekkhaṇā vuttā, sā kammaṭṭhānavīthiyā sampaṭipādanatthāti
anya-e0101n:1136_2: attho. Sace hi imaṃ bhikkhuṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āgacchantaṃ antarāmagge keci ajja,
anya-e0101n:1136_3: bhante, katimīti divasaṃ vā pucchanti, pañhaṃ vā pucchanti, paṭisanthāraṃ vā karonti,
anya-e0101n:1136_4: ahaṃ kammaṭṭhānikoti tuṇhībhūtena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Divaso kathetabbo, pañho vissajjetabbo.
anya-e0101n:1136_5: Sace na jānāti, na jānāmīti vattabbaṃ. Dhammiko paṭisanthāro kātabbo. Tassevaṃ karontassa
anya-e0101n:1136_6: uggahitaṃ taruṇanimittaṃ nassati. Tasmiṃ nassantepi divasaṃ puṭṭhena kathetabbameva.
anya-e0101n:1136_7: Pañhaṃ ajānantena na jānāmīti vattabbaṃ. Jānantena ekadesena kathetumpi vaṭṭati,
anya-e0101n:1136_8: paṭisanthāropi kātabbo. Āgantukaṃ pana bhikkhuṃ disvā āgantukapaṭisanthāro kātabbova.
anya-e0101n:1136_10: sabbāni khandhakavattāni pūretabbāneva. Tassa tāni pūrentassāpi taṃ taruṇanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1136_11: nassati, puna gantvā nimittaṃ gaṇhissāmīti gantukāmassāpi amanussehi vā vāḷamigehi
anya-e0101n:1136_12: vā adhiṭṭhitattā susānampi gantuṃ na sakkā hoti, nimittaṃ vā antaradhāyati. Uddhumātakaṃ
anya-e0101n:1136_13: hi ekameva vā dve vā divase ṭhatvā vinīlakādibhāvaṃ gacchati. Sabbakammaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0101n:1136_14: etena samaṃ dullabhaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā evaṃ naṭṭhe nimitte tena bhikkhunā
anya-e0101n:1136_15: rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭhāne vā nisīditvā ahaṃ iminā nāma dvārena vihārā nikkhamitvā
anya-e0101n:1136_16: asukadisābhimukhaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne vāmaṃ gaṇhi, asukasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1136_17: dakkhiṇaṃ. Tassa asukasmiṃ ṭhāne pāsāṇo, asukasmiṃ vammikarukkhagacchalatānamaññataraṃ.
