anya-e0101n:1136_18: Sohaṃ tena maggena gantvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne asubhaṃ addasaṃ. Tattha asukadisābhimukho
anya-e0101n:1136_19: ṭhatvā evañcevañca samantā nimittāni sallakkhetvā evaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggahetvā asukadisāya
anya-e0101n:1136_20: susānato nikkhamitvā evarūpena nāma maggena idañcidañca karonto āgantvā idha nisinnoti
anya-e0101n:1136_21: evaṃ yāva pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ, tāva gatāgatamaggo paccavekkhitabbo.
anya-e0101n:1136_22: Tassevaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ nimittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, purato nikkhittaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1136_23: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ purimākāreneva vīthiṃ paṭipajjati. Tena vuttaṃ “gatāgatamaggapaccavekkhaṇā
anya-e0101n:1137_0: 116. Idāni ānisaṃsadassāvī ratanasaññī hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno
anya-e0101n:1137_1: tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ upanibandhatīti ettha uddhumātakapaṭikkūle mānasaṃ cāretvā
anya-e0101n:1137_2: jhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento “addhā imāya paṭipadāya
anya-e0101n:1138_0: Yathā pana duggato puriso mahagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ labhitvā dullabhaṃ vata me laddhanti
anya-e0101n:1138_1: tasmiṃ ratanasaññī hutvā gāravaṃ janetvā vipulena pemena sampiyāyamāno taṃ rakkheyya,
anya-e0101n:1138_2: evameva “dullabhaṃ me idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ duggatassa mahagghamaṇiratanasadisaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1138_3: Catudhātukammaṭṭhāniko hi attano cattāro mahābhūte pariggaṇhāti, ānāpānakammaṭṭhāniko
anya-e0101n:1138_4: attano nāsikavātaṃ pariggaṇhāti, kasiṇakammaṭṭhāniko kasiṇaṃ katvā yathāsukhaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0101n:1138_5: evaṃ itarāni kammaṭṭhānāni sulabhāni. ‘Idaṃ pana ekameva vā dve vā divase tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0101n:1138_6: tato paraṃ vinīlakādibhāvaṃ pāpuṇātī’ti natthi ito dullabhatara”nti tasmiṃ ratanasaññinā
anya-e0101n:1138_7: hutvā cittīkāraṃ upaṭṭhapetvā sampiyāyamānena taṃ nimittaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ. Rattiṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1138_8: ca divāṭhāne ca “uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ uddhumātakapaṭikkūla”nti tattha punappunaṃ
anya-e0101n:1138_9: cittaṃ upanibandhitabbaṃ. Punappunaṃ taṃ nimittaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ, manasikātabbaṃ. Takkāhataṃ
anya-e0101n:1139_0: 117. Tassevaṃ karoto paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppajjati. Tatridaṃ nimittadvayassa nānākaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1139_1: uggahanimittaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ bheravadassanaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1139_2: pana yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā nipanno thūlaṅgapaccaṅgapuriso viya. Tassa paṭibhāganimittapaṭilābhasamakālameva
anya-e0101n:1139_3: bahiddhā kāmānaṃ amanasikārā vikkhambhanavasena kāmacchando pahīyati. Anunayappahāneneva
anya-e0101n:1139_4: cassa lohitappahānena pubbo viya byāpādopi pahīyati. Tathā āraddhavīriyatāya thinamiddhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1139_6: paṭipattidesake satthari paṭipattiyaṃ paṭipattiphale ca vicikicchā pahīyatīti pañca
anya-e0101n:1139_7: nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti. Tasmiññeva ca nimitte cetaso abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko,
anya-e0101n:1139_8: nimittānumajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamāno vicāro, paṭiladdhavisesādhigamapaccayā pīti, pītimanassa
anya-e0101n:1139_9: passaddhisambhavato passaddhi, tannimittaṃ sukhaṃ, sukhitassa cittasamādhisambhavato
anya-e0101n:1139_10: sukhanimittā ekaggatā cāti jhānaṅgāni pātubhavanti. Evamassa paṭhamajjhānapaṭibimbabhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:1139_11: upacārajjhānampi taṅkhaṇaññeva nibbattati. Ito paraṃ yāva paṭhamajjhānassa appanā
anya-e0101n:1139_12: ceva vasippatti ca, tāva sabbaṃ pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1141_0: 118. Ito paresu pana vinīlakādīsupi yaṃ taṃ “uddhumātakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto
anya-e0101n:1141_1: eko adutiyo gacchati upaṭṭhitāya satiyā”tiādinā nayena gamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1141_2: vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ “vinīlakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ uggaṇhanto, vipubbakaṃ asubhanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1141_3: uggaṇhanto”ti evaṃ tassa tassa vasena tattha tattha uddhumātakapadamattaṃ parivattetvā
anya-e0101n:1142_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – vinīlake “vinīlakapaṭikkūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro
anya-e0101n:1142_1: pavattetabbo. Uggahanimittañcettha kabarakabaravaṇṇaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1143_1: panettha paggharantamiva upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ niccalaṃ sannisinnaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1144_0: Vicchiddakaṃ yuddhamaṇḍale vā corāṭaviyaṃ vā susāne vā yattha rājāno core chindāpenti.
anya-e0101n:1144_1: Araññe vā pana sīhabyagghehi chinnapurisaṭṭhāne labbhati. Tasmā tathārūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1144_2: gantvā sace nānādisāyaṃ patitampi ekāvajjanena āpāthamāgacchati iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1144_3: No ce āgacchati, sayaṃ hatthena na parāmasitabbaṃ. Parāmasanto hi vissāsaṃ āpajjati.
anya-e0101n:1144_4: Tasmā ārāmikena vā samaṇuddesena vā aññena vā kenaci ekaṭṭhāne kāretabbaṃ. Alabhantena
anya-e0101n:1144_5: kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā daṇḍakena vā ekaṅgulantaraṃ katvā upanāmetabbaṃ. Evaṃ upanāmetvā
anya-e0101n:1144_7: majjhe chiddaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana paripuṇṇaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1145_1: Uggahanimittaṃ panettha tahiṃ tahiṃ khāyitasadisameva upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1146_0: Vikkhittakampi vicchiddake vuttanayeneva aṅgulaṅgulantaraṃ kāretvā vā katvā vā “vikkhittakapaṭikkūlaṃ
anya-e0101n:1146_1: vikkhittakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo. Ettha uggahanimittaṃ pākaṭantaraṃ
anya-e0101n:1146_2: hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana paripuṇṇaṃva hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1147_0: Hatavikkhittakampi vicchiddake vuttappakāresuyeva ṭhānesu labbhati. Tasmā tattha
anya-e0101n:1147_1: gantvā vuttanayeneva aṅgulaṅgulantaraṃ kāretvā vā katvā vā “hatavikkhittakapaṭikkūlaṃ
anya-e0101n:1147_2: hatavikkhittakapaṭikkūla”nti manasikāro pavattetabbo. Uggahanimittaṃ panettha paññāyamānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1147_3: pahāramukhaṃ viya hoti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ paripuṇṇameva hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1148_0: Lohitakaṃ yuddhamaṇḍalādīsu laddhappahārānaṃ hatthapādādīsu vā chinnesu bhinnagaṇḍapīḷakādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1148_1: vā mukhato paggharamānakāle labbhati. Tasmā taṃ disvā “lohitakapaṭikkūlaṃ lohitakapaṭikkūla”nti
anya-e0101n:1148_2: manasikāro pavattetabbo. Ettha uggahanimittaṃ vātappahatā viya rattapaṭākā calamānākāraṃ
anya-e0101n:1148_3: upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana sannisinnaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0101n:1149_0: Puḷavakaṃ dvīhatīhaccayena kuṇapassa navahi vaṇamukhehi kimirāsipaggharaṇakāle hoti.
anya-e0101n:1149_2: sālibhattarāsi viya tiṭṭhati. Tesu yattha katthaci “puḷavakapaṭikkūlaṃ puḷavakapaṭikkūla”nti
anya-e0101n:1149_3: manasikāro pavattetabbo. Cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattherassa hi kāḷadīghavāpiyā anto hatthikuṇape
anya-e0101n:1149_4: nimittaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. Uggahanimittaṃ panettha calamānaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1150_0: Aṭṭhikaṃ “seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ aṭṭhisaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsalohitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1150_1: nahārusambandha”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato vuttaṃ. Tattha yattha taṃ nikkhittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1150_2: hoti, tattha purimanayeneva gantvā samantā pāsāṇādīnaṃ vasena sanimittaṃ sārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1150_3: katvā idaṃ aṭṭhikanti sabhāvabhāvato upalakkhetvā vaṇṇādivasena ekādasahākārehi nimittaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1151_0: 119. Taṃ pana vaṇṇato setanti olokentassa na upaṭṭhāti, odātakasiṇasambhedo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1151_1: Tasmā aṭṭhikanti paṭikkūlavaseneva oloketabbaṃ. Liṅganti idha hatthādīnaṃ nāmaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1151_3: pana saṇṭhānato vavatthapetabbaṃ. Disokāsā vuttanayā eva. Tassa tassa aṭṭhino pariyantavasena
anya-e0101n:1151_4: paricchedato vavatthapetvā yadevettha pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, taṃ gahetvā appanā
anya-e0101n:1151_5: pāpuṇitabbā. Tassa tassa aṭṭhino ninnaṭṭhānathalaṭṭhānavasena pana ninnato ca thalato
anya-e0101n:1151_6: ca vavatthapetabbaṃ. Padesavasenāpi ahaṃ ninne ṭhito, aṭṭhi thale, ahaṃ thale, aṭṭhi
anya-e0101n:1151_7: ninnetipi vavatthapetabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ pana aṭṭhikānaṃ ghaṭitaghaṭitaṭṭhānavasena sandhito
anya-e0101n:1151_8: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Aṭṭhikānaṃyeva antaravasena vivarato vavatthapetabbaṃ. Sabbattheva
anya-e0101n:1151_9: pana ñāṇaṃ cāretvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne idamaṭṭhīti samantato vavatthapetabbaṃ. Evampi nimitte
anya-e0101n:1152_0: 120. Yathā cettha, evaṃ idaṃ ekādasavidhena nimittaggahaṇaṃ ito purimesu puḷavakādīsupi
anya-e0101n:1152_1: yujjamānavasena sallakkhetabbaṃ. Idañca pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ sakalāyapi aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāya
anya-e0101n:1152_2: ekasmimpi aṭṭhike sampajjati. Tasmā tesu yatthakatthaci ekādasavidhena nimittaṃ uggahetvā
anya-e0101n:1152_4: paṭibhāganimittampi ekasadisameva hotīti vuttaṃ, taṃ ekasmiṃ aṭṭhike yuttaṃ. Aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikāya
anya-e0101n:1152_5: pana uggahanimitte paññāyamāne vivaratā. Paṭibhāganimitte paripuṇṇabhāvo yujjati.
anya-e0101n:1152_6: Ekaṭṭhikepi ca uggahanimittena bībhacchena bhayānakena bhavitabbaṃ. Paṭibhāganimittena
anya-e0101n:1153_0: Imasmiṃ hi okāse yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, taṃ dvāraṃ datvāva vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tattha
anya-e0101n:1153_1: “catūsu brahmavihāresu dasasu ca asubhesu paṭibhāganimittaṃ natthi. Brahmavihāresu
anya-e0101n:1153_2: hi sīmasambhedoyeva nimittaṃ. Dasasu ca asubhesu nibbikappaṃ katvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva
anya-e0101n:1153_3: diṭṭhe nimittaṃ nāma hotī”ti vatvāpi puna anantarameva “duvidhaṃ idha nimittaṃ uggahanimittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1153_4: paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Uggahanimittaṃ virūpaṃ bībhacchaṃ bhayānakaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātī”tiādi
anya-e0101n:1153_5: vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ vicāretvā avocumha, idamevettha yuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1154: Apica mahātissattherassa dantaṭṭhikamattāvalokanena sakalitthisarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni cettha nidassanānīti.
anya-e0101n:1157: Evaṃ tāni ca tesañca, bhāvanānayamimaṃ viditvāna;
anya-e0101n:1160_0: 121. Etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigatajjhāno suvikkhambhitarāgattā vītarāgo viya
anya-e0101n:1160_1: nilloluppacāro hoti. Evaṃ santepi yvāyaṃ asubhappabhedo vutto, so sarīrasabhāvappattivasena
anya-e0101n:1160_2: ca rāgacaritabhedavasena cāti veditabbo. Chavasarīraṃ hi paṭikkūlabhāvaṃ āpajjamānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1160_3: uddhumātakasabhāvappattaṃ vā siyā, vinīlakādīnaṃ vā aññatarasabhāvappattaṃ. Iti yādisaṃ
anya-e0101n:1160_4: yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ, tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikkūlanti
anya-e0101n:1160_5: evaṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbamevāti sarīrasabhāvappattivasena dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1161_0: Visesato cettha uddhumātakaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato saṇṭhānarāgino sappāyaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1161_1: Vinīlakaṃ chavirāgavipattippakāsanato sarīravaṇṇarāgino sappāyaṃ. Vipubbakaṃ kāyavaṇapaṭibaddhassa
anya-e0101n:1161_3: Vicchiddakaṃ antosusirabhāvappakāsanato sarīre ghanabhāvarāgino sappāyaṃ. Vikkhāyitakaṃ
anya-e0101n:1161_8: sappāyaṃ. Puḷavakaṃ kāyassa anekakimikulasādhāraṇabhāvappakāsanato kāye mamattarāgino
anya-e0101n:1161_9: sappāyaṃ. Aṭṭhikaṃ sarīraṭṭhīnaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvappakāsanato dantasampattirāgino sappāyanti
anya-e0101n:1161_10: evaṃ rāgacaritabhedavasenāpi dasadhā asubhappabhedo vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1162_0: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya
anya-e0101n:1162_1: nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati, vinā arittena na sakkā ṭhapetuṃ, evameva dubbalattā
anya-e0101n:1162_2: ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, vinā vitakkena na sakkā
anya-e0101n:1162_3: ṭhapetuṃ, tasmā paṭhamajjhānamevettha hoti, na dutiyādīni.
anya-e0101n:1163_0: Paṭikkūlepi ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:1163_1: evamānisaṃsadassāvitāya ceva nīvaraṇasantāpappahānena ca pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0101n:1163_2: “bahuṃ dāni vetanaṃ labhissāmī”ti ānisaṃsadassāvino pupphachaḍḍakassa gūtharāsimhi
anya-e0101n:1163_3: viya, ussannabyādhidukkhassa rogino vamanavirecanappavattiyaṃ viya ca.
anya-e0101n:1164_0: 122. Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti. Dasavidhassāpi hetassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlabhāvo
anya-e0101n:1164_1: eva lakkhaṇaṃ. Tadetaṃ iminā lakkhaṇena na kevalaṃ matasarīre, dantaṭṭhikadassāvino
anya-e0101n:1164_2: pana cetiyapabbatavāsino mahātissattherassa viya, hatthikkhandhagataṃ rājānaṃ olokentassa
anya-e0101n:1164_3: saṅgharakkhitattherūpaṭṭhākasāmaṇerassa viya ca jīvamānakasarīrepi upaṭṭhāti. Yatheva
anya-e0101n:1164_4: hi matasarīraṃ, evaṃ jīvamānakampi asubhameva. Asubhalakkhaṇaṃ panettha āgantukena
anya-e0101n:1164_5: alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā na paññāyati. Pakatiyā pana idaṃ sarīraṃ nāma atirekatisataaṭṭhikasamussayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1164_7: chaviyā paṭicchannaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ medakathālikā viya niccuggharitapaggharitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1164_8: kimisaṅghanisevitaṃ rogānaṃ āyatanaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ vatthu paribhinnapurāṇagaṇḍo
anya-e0101n:1164_9: viya navahi vaṇamukhehi satatavissandanaṃ. Yassa ubhohi akkhīhi akkhigūthako paggharati,
anya-e0101n:1164_10: kaṇṇabilehi kaṇṇagūthako, nāsāpuṭehi siṅghāṇikā, mukhato āhārapittasemharudhirāni,
anya-e0101n:1164_11: adhodvārehi uccārapassāvā, navanavutiyā lomakūpasahassehi asucisedayūso paggharati.
anya-e0101n:1164_13: appaṭijaggitvā yathājātova pharusavippakiṇṇakeso hutvā gāmena gāmaṃ vicaranto rājāpi
anya-e0101n:1164_14: pupphachaḍḍakacaṇḍālādīsu aññataropi samasarīrapaṭikkūlatāya nibbiseso hoti, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1164_15: asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlatāya rañño vā caṇḍālassa vā sarīre vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0101n:1164_16: Dantakaṭṭhamukhadhovanādīhi panettha dantamalādīni pamajjitvā nānāvatthehi hirikopīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1164_17: paṭicchādetvā nānāvaṇṇena surabhivilepanena vilimpitvā pupphābharaṇādīhi alaṅkaritvā
anya-e0101n:1164_18: “ahaṃ mama”nti gahetabbākārappattaṃ karonti. Tato iminā āgantukena alaṅkārena paṭicchannattā
anya-e0101n:1164_19: tadassa yāthāvasarasaṃ asubhalakkhaṇaṃ asañjānantā purisā itthīsu, itthiyo ca purisesu
anya-e0101n:1164_20: ratiṃ karonti. Paramatthato panettha rajjitabbakayuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aṇumattampi natthi.
anya-e0101n:1164_22: bahi patitaṃ sattā hatthena chupitumpi na icchanti, aṭṭīyanti harāyanti jigucchanti.
anya-e0101n:1164_23: Yaṃ yaṃ panettha avasesaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ evaṃ paṭikkūlampi samānaṃ avijjandhakārapariyonaddhā
anya-e0101n:1164_24: attasineharāgarattā “iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti gaṇhanti. Te evaṃ gaṇhantā
anya-e0101n:1164_25: aṭaviyaṃ kiṃsukarukkhaṃ disvā rukkhato apatitapupphaṃ “ayaṃ maṃsapesī”ti vihaññamānena
anya-e0101n:1165: Yathāpi pupphitaṃ disvā, siṅgālo kiṃsukaṃ vane;
anya-e0101n:1166: Maṃsarukkho mayā laddho, iti gantvāna vegasā.
anya-e0101n:1168: Nayidaṃ maṃsaṃ aduṃ maṃsaṃ, yaṃ rukkhasminti gaṇhati.
anya-e0101n:1171: Imañhi subhato kāyaṃ, gahetvā tattha mucchitā;
anya-e0101n:1172: Bālā karontā pāpāni, dukkhā na parimuccare.
anya-e0101n:1173: Tasmā passeyya medhāvī, jīvato vā matassa vā;
anya-e0101n:1180: Sace imassa kāyassa, anto bāhirako siyā;
anya-e0101n:1181: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe nivārayeti.
anya-e0101n:1182: Tasmā dabbajātikena bhikkhunā jīvamānasarīraṃ vā hotu
anya-e0101n:1183: Matasarīraṃ vā yattha yattha asubhākāro paññāyati, tattha tattheva nimittaṃ gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ appanaṃ pāpetabbanti.
anya-e0101n:1190_0: 123. Asubhānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāsu pana dasasu anussatīsu punappunaṃ uppajjanato satiyeva
anya-e0101n:1190_1: anussati, pavattitabbaṭṭhānamhiyeva vā pavattattā saddhāpabbajitassa kulaputtassa
anya-e0101n:1190_2: anurūpā satītipi anussati, buddhaṃ ārabbha uppannā anussati buddhānussati, buddhaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1190_3: satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Dhammaṃ ārabbha uppannā anussati dhammānussati, svākkhātatādidhammaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1190_4: satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Saṅghaṃ ārabbha uppannā anussati saṅghānussati, suppaṭipannatādisaṅghaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1190_5: satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Sīlaṃ ārabbha uppannā anussati sīlānussati, akhaṇḍatādisīlaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1190_6: satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Cāgaṃ ārabbha uppannā anussati cāgānussati, muttacāgatādicāgaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1190_7: satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Devatā ārabbha uppannā anussati devatānussati, devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1190_8: ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇārammaṇāya satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Maraṇaṃ ārabbha uppannā
anya-e0101n:1190_9: anussati maraṇānussati, jīvitindriyupacchedārammaṇāya satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Kesādibhedaṃ
anya-e0101n:1190_10: rūpakāyaṃ gatā, kāye vā gatāti kāyagatā, kāyagatā ca sā sati cāti kāyagatasatīti
anya-e0101n:1190_11: vattabbe rassaṃ akatvā kāyagatāsatīti vuttā, kesādikāyakoṭṭhāsanimittārammaṇāya satiyā
anya-e0101n:1190_12: etamadhivacanaṃ. Ānāpāne ārabbha uppannā sati ānāpānassati, assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1190_13: satiyā etamadhivacanaṃ. Upasamaṃ ārabbha uppannā anussati upasamānussati, sabbadukkhūpasamārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n:1191_0: 124. Iti imāsu dasasu anussatīsu buddhānussatiṃ tāva bhāvetukāmena aveccappasādasamannāgatena
anya-e0101n:1191_1: yoginā patirūpasenāsane rahogatena paṭisallīnena “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho
anya-e0101n:1191_2: vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1191_3: buddho bhagavā”ti evaṃ buddhassa bhagavato guṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n:1192: Tatrāyaṃ anussaraṇanayo – so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho…pe… itipi bhagavāti anussarati. Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1193_0: 125. Tattha ārakattā arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā paccayādīnaṃ arahattā pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti
anya-e0101n:1193_1: imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti anussarati. Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre
anya-e0101n:1193_2: ṭhito maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1194: So tato ārakā nāma, yassa yenāsamaṅgitā;
anya-e0101n:1195: Asamaṅgī ca dosehi, nātho tenārahaṃ matoti.
anya-e0101n:1196: 126. Te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1199_1: akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālappavattaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassānena
anya-e0101n:1199_2: bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ
anya-e0101n:1199_3: ñāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1200_0: 128. Atha vā saṃsāracakkanti anamataggaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ vuccati. Tassa ca avijjā nābhi,
anya-e0101n:1200_1: mūlattā. Jarāmaraṇaṃ nemi, pariyosānattā. Sesā dasa dhammā arā, avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā
anya-e0101n:1200_2: ca, tattha dukkhādīsu aññāṇaṃ avijjā. Kāmabhave ca avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo
anya-e0101n:1200_3: hoti, rūpabhave avijjā rūpabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti, arūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave
anya-e0101n:1200_4: saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave saṅkhārā kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayā
anya-e0101n:1200_5: honti, esa nayo itaresu. Kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ kāmabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo
anya-e0101n:1200_6: hoti, tathā rūpabhave. Arūpabhave nāmasseva paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave nāmarūpaṃ kāmabhave
anya-e0101n:1200_7: saḷāyatanassa paccayo hoti, rūpabhave nāmarūpaṃ rūpabhave tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānaṃ paccayo
anya-e0101n:1200_8: hoti, arūpabhave nāmaṃ arūpabhave ekassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave saḷāyatanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1200_9: kāmabhave chabbidhassa phassassa paccayo hoti, rūpabhave tīṇi āyatanāni rūpabhave
anya-e0101n:1200_10: tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ paccayā honti, arūpabhave ekaṃ āyatanaṃ arūpabhave ekassa phassassa
anya-e0101n:1200_11: paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave cha phassā kāmabhave channaṃ vedanānaṃ paccayā honti, rūpabhave
anya-e0101n:1200_12: tayo phassā tattheva tissannaṃ, arūpabhave eko tattheva ekissā vedanāya paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_13: Kāmabhave cha vedanā kāmabhave channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ paccayā honti, rūpabhave tisso
anya-e0101n:1200_14: tattheva tiṇṇaṃ, arūpabhave ekā vedanā arūpabhave ekassa taṇhākāyassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1200_15: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā tassa tassa upādānassa, upādānādayo bhavādīnaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1201_0: Kathaṃ? Idhekacco kāme paribhuñjissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ carati,
anya-e0101n:1201_1: vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā duccaritaṃ carati, duccaritapāripūriyā apāye upapajjati.
anya-e0101n:1201_2: Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo,
anya-e0101n:1201_3: khandhānaṃ nibbatti jāti, paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1202: Aparo saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti tatheva sucaritaṃ carati, sucaritapāripūriyā sagge upapajjati. Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
anya-e0101n:1203_0: Aparo pana brahmalokasampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayāeva mettaṃ bhāveti,
anya-e0101n:1203_1: karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ, upekkhaṃ bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā brahmaloke nibbattati. Tatthassa
anya-e0101n:1203_2: nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
anya-e0101n:1204_0: Aparo arūpabhave sampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti tatheva ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattiyo
anya-e0101n:1204_1: bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā tattha tattha nibbattati. Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:1204_2: kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo, khandhānaṃ nibbatti jāti,
anya-e0101n:1204_3: paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇanti. Esa nayo sesupādānamūlikāsupi yojanāsu.
anya-e0101n:1205_0: Evaṃ ayaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe
anya-e0101n:1205_1: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Atītampi addhānaṃ anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā
anya-e0101n:1205_2: hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti
anya-e0101n:1206_0: Tattha avijjāsaṅkhārā eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā eko, taṇhupādānabhavā
anya-e0101n:1206_1: eko, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ eko. Purimasaṅkhepo cettha atīto addhā, dve majjhimā paccuppanno,
anya-e0101n:1206_2: jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato. Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena cettha taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva
anya-e0101n:1206_3: hontīti ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭaṃ, viññāṇādayo pañca etarahi vipākavaṭṭaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1206_4: taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā etarahi
anya-e0101n:1206_5: kammavaṭṭaṃ, jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā ime pañca dhammā āyatiṃ
anya-e0101n:1206_6: vipākavaṭṭaṃ. Te ākārato vīsatividhā honti. Saṅkhāraviññāṇānañcettha antarā eko sandhi,
anya-e0101n:1206_7: vedanātaṇhānamantarā eko, bhavajātīnamantarā ekoti, iti bhagavā etaṃ catusaṅkhepaṃ
anya-e0101n:1206_8: tiyaddhaṃ vīsatākāraṃ tisandhiṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ sabbākārato jānāti passati aññāti
anya-e0101n:1206_9: paṭivijjhati. Taṃ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṃ, pajānanaṭṭhena paññā, tena vuccati paccayapariggahe
anya-e0101n:1206_10: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti. Iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena bhagavā te dhamme yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0101n:1206_11: ñatvā tesu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto vuttappakārassa imassa saṃsāracakkassa
anya-e0101n:1206_12: are hani vihani viddhaṃsesi. Evampi arānaṃ hatattā arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1209_0: 129. Aggadakkhiṇeyyattā ca cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañca. Teneva ca uppanne
anya-e0101n:1209_1: tathāgate yekeci mahesakkhā devamanussā, na te aññattha pūjaṃ karonti. Tathā hi brahmā
anya-e0101n:1209_2: sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena tathāgataṃ pūjesi. Yathābalañca aññe devā manussā
anya-e0101n:1209_3: ca bimbisārakosalarājādayo. Parinibbutampi ca bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1209_5: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1214: 130. Yathā ca loke yekeci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti, evamesa na kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1215: Yasmā natthi raho nāma, pāpakammesu tādino;
anya-e0101n:1218: Ārakattā hatattā ca, kilesārīna so muni;
anya-e0101n:1220: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatīti.
anya-e0101n:1221_0: 131. Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddho. Tathāhi esa sabbadhamme
anya-e0101n:1221_1: sammā sāmañca buddho, abhiññeyye dhamme abhiññeyyato buddho, pariññeyye dhamme pariññeyyato,
anya-e0101n:1221_2: pahātabbe dhamme pahātabbato, sacchikātabbe dhamme sacchikātabbato, bhāvetabbe dhamme
anya-e0101n:1223: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇāti. ;
anya-e0101n:1224_0: 132. Apica cakkhuṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā
anya-e0101n:1224_1: samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti
anya-e0101n:1224_2: evaṃ ekekapaduddhārenāpi sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho, esa nayo sotaghānajivhākāyamanesu.
anya-e0101n:1224_3: Eteneva nayena rūpādīni cha āyatanāni, cakkhuviññāṇādayo chaviññāṇakāyā, cakkhusamphassādayo
anya-e0101n:1224_4: cha phassā, cakkhusamphassajādayo cha vedanā, rūpasaññādayo cha saññā, rūpasañcetanādayo
anya-e0101n:1224_5: cha cetanā, rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā, rūpavitakkādayo cha vitakkā, rūpavicārādayo
anya-e0101n:1224_6: cha vicārā, rūpakkhandhādayo pañcakkhandhā, dasa kasiṇāni, dasa anussatiyo, uddhumātakasaññādivasena
anya-e0101n:1224_7: dasa saññā, kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kāmabhavādayo
anya-e0101n:1224_8: nava bhavā, paṭhamādīni cattāri jhānāni, mettābhāvanādayo catasso appamaññā, catasso
anya-e0101n:1224_9: arūpasamāpattiyo, paṭilomato jarāmaraṇādīni, anulomato avijjādīni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0101n:1225_0: Tatrāyaṃ ekapadayojanā, jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, jāti samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnampi
anya-e0101n:1225_1: nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evamekekapaduddhārena
anya-e0101n:1225_2: sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho anubuddho paṭibuddho. Tena vuttaṃ – “sammā sāmañca
anya-e0101n:1226_0: 133. Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno. Tattha vijjāti tissopi
anya-e0101n:1226_1: vijjā aṭṭhapi vijjā. Tisso vijjā bhayabheravasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā, aṭṭha
anya-e0101n:1226_2: ambaṭṭhasutte. Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā
anya-e0101n:1226_3: aṭṭha vijjā vuttā. Caraṇanti sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā,
anya-e0101n:1226_4: jāgariyānuyogo, satta saddhammā, cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā
anya-e0101n:1226_5: veditabbā. Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ
anya-e0101n:1226_6: disaṃ, tasmā caraṇanti vuttā. Yathāha – “idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlavā hotī”ti
anya-e0101n:1226_7: sabbaṃ majjhimapaṇṇāsake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca
anya-e0101n:1227_0: Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā. Caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṃ.
anya-e0101n:1227_1: So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṃ atthānatthaṃ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya anatthaṃ parivajjetvā
anya-e0101n:1227_2: atthe niyojeti. Yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampanno. Tenassa sāvakā suppaṭipannā honti,
anya-e0101n:1227_3: no duppaṭipannā vijjācaraṇavipannānaṃ sāvakā attantapādayo viya.
anya-e0101n:1228_0: 134. Sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugato.
anya-e0101n:1228_1: Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati. Tañca bhagavato sobhanaṃ parisuddhamanavajjaṃ. Kiṃ
anya-e0101n:1228_2: pana tanti? Ariyamaggo. Tena hesa gamanena khemaṃ disaṃ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā
anya-e0101n:1228_3: sugato. Sundarañcesa ṭhānaṃ gato amataṃ nibbānanti sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattāpi sugato.
anya-e0101n:1228_4: Sammā ca gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:1228_5: “sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti
anya-e0101n:1228_6: sugato…pe… arahattamaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti
anya-e0101n:1228_7: sugato”ti, sammā vā gato dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṃsapāramīpūrikāya
anya-e0101n:1228_8: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto sassataṃ, ucchedaṃ, kāmasukhaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1228_9: attakilamathanti ime ca ante anupagacchanto gatoti sammā gatattāpi sugato. Sammā
anya-e0101n:1228_10: cesa gadati yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṃ bhāsatīti sammā gadattāpi sugato. Tatridaṃ
anya-e0101n:1228_11: sādhakasuttaṃ “yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, sā ca
anya-e0101n:1228_12: paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsati. Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti
anya-e0101n:1228_13: bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, tampi tathāgato vācaṃ
anya-e0101n:1228_14: na bhāsati. Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ, sā ca
anya-e0101n:1228_15: paresaṃ appiyā amanāpā, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya.
anya-e0101n:1228_16: Yaṃ tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā,
anya-e0101n:1228_17: na taṃ tathāgato vācaṃ bhāsati. Yampi tathāgato vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1228_18: sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā, tampi tathāgato vācaṃ na bhāsati. Yañca kho tathāgato
anya-e0101n:1228_19: vācaṃ jānāti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ, sā ca paresaṃ piyā manāpā, tatra kālaññū
anya-e0101n:1228_20: tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti. Evaṃ sammā gadattāpi sugatoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1229_0: 135. Sabbathāpi viditalokattā pana lokavidū. So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato
anya-e0101n:1229_1: nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha – “yattha kho, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:1229_2: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa
anya-e0101n:1229_3: antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ daṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmi, na cāhaṃ, āvuso, apatvāva lokassa antaṃ
anya-e0101n:1229_4: dukkhassa antakiriyaṃ vadāmi. Api cāhaṃ, āvuso, imasmiññeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi
anya-e0101n:1229_5: samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1231: Na ca apatvā lokantaṃ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1236_0: 136. Apica tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha eko loko sabbe sattā
anya-e0101n:1236_1: āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo. Sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti
anya-e0101n:1237: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharanti, disā bhanti virocamānā;
anya-e0101n:1238: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattatī vasoti. –
anya-e0101n:1239_0: Āgataṭṭhāne okāsaloko. Tampi bhagavā sabbathā avedi. Tathā hissa “eko loko sabbe
anya-e0101n:1239_1: sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Dve lokā nāmañca rūpañca. Tayo lokā tisso vedanā. Cattāro lokā
anya-e0101n:1239_2: cattāro āhārā. Pañca lokā pañcupādānakkhandhā. Cha lokā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni.
anya-e0101n:1239_3: Satta lokā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Aṭṭha lokā aṭṭha lokadhammā. Nava lokā nava sattāvāsā.
anya-e0101n:1239_4: Dasa lokā dasāyatanāni. Dvādasa lokā dvādasāyatanāni. Aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti
anya-e0101n:1240_0: Yasmā panesa sabbesampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0101n:1240_1: adhimuttiṃ jānāti, apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe, tikkhindriye mudindriye, svākāre dvākāre,
anya-e0101n:1240_2: suviññāpaye duviññāpaye, bhabbe abhabbe satte jānāti. Tasmāssa sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
anya-e0101n:1241_0: 137. Yathā ca sattaloko, evaṃ okāsalokopi. Tathā hesa ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca
anya-e0101n:1241_1: vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasasatasahassāni catutiṃsasatāni ca paññāsañca yojanāni. Parikkhepato pana –
anya-e0101n:1243: Dasa ceva sahassāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni ca.
anya-e0101n:1269_0: Yañcetaṃ jambuyā pamāṇaṃ, etadeva asurānaṃ citrapāṭaliyā, garuḷānaṃ simbalirukkhassa,
anya-e0101n:1269_1: aparagoyāne kadambassa, uttarakurūsu kapparukkhassa, pubbavidehe sirīsassa, tāvatiṃsesu
anya-e0101n:1271: Kadambo kapparukkho ca, sirīsena bhavati sattamanti.
anya-e0101n:1275_0: Tattha candamaṇḍalaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ. Sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāsayojanaṃ. Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1275_1: dasasahassayojanaṃ. Tathā asurabhavanaṃ avīcimahānirayo jambudīpo ca. Aparagoyānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1275_2: sattasahassayojanaṃ. Tathā pubbavidehaṃ. Uttarakuru aṭṭhasahassayojanaṃ. Ekameko
anya-e0101n:1275_3: cettha mahādīpo pañcasatapañcasataparittadīpaparivāro. Taṃ sabbampi ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ
anya-e0101n:1276: Evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Evamassa okāsalokopi sabbathā vidito. Evampi sabbathā viditalokattā lokavidū.
anya-e0101n:1277_0: 138. Attanā pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
anya-e0101n:1277_2: Sīlaguṇenāpi asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo…pe… vimuttiñāṇadassanaguṇenāpi.
anya-e0101n:1277_3: Yathāha – “na kho panāhaṃ samanupassāmi sadevake loke samārake…pe… sadevamanussāya
anya-e0101n:1277_4: pajāya attanā sīlasampannatara”nti vitthāro. Evaṃ aggapasādasuttādīni “na me ācariyo
anya-e0101n:1278_0: 139. Purisadamme sāretīti purisadammasārathi. Dameti vinetīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha
anya-e0101n:1278_1: purisadammāti adantā dametuṃ yuttā tiracchānapurisāpi manussapurisāpi amanussapurisāpi.
anya-e0101n:1278_2: Tathā hi bhagavatā tiracchānapurisāpi apalālo nāgarājā, cūḷodaro, mahodaro, aggisikho,
anya-e0101n:1278_3: dhūmasikho, aravāḷo nāgarājā, dhanapālako hatthīti evamādayo damitā nibbisā katā
anya-e0101n:1278_4: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpitā, manussapurisāpi saccakanigaṇṭhaputtaambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasāti
anya-e0101n:1278_6: damitā vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehi. “Ahaṃ kho, kesi, purisadamme saṇhenapi vinemi,
anya-e0101n:1278_7: pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemī”ti idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1279: Apica bhagavā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttari maggapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanto dantepi dametiyeva.
anya-e0101n:1280_0: Atha vā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti ekamevidaṃ atthapadaṃ. Bhagavā hi tathā purisadamme
anya-e0101n:1280_1: sāreti, yathā ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā aṭṭha disā asajjamānā dhāvanti. Tasmā anuttaro
anya-e0101n:1280_2: purisadammasārathīti vuccati. “Hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva
anya-e0101n:1281_0: 140. Diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti satthā. Apica satthā
anya-e0101n:1281_1: viyāti satthā, bhagavā satthavāho. Yathā satthavāho satthe kantāraṃ tāreti corakantāraṃ
anya-e0101n:1281_2: tāreti vāḷakantāraṃ tāreti dubbhikkhakantāraṃ tāreti nirudakakantāraṃ tāreti uttāreti
anya-e0101n:1281_3: nittāreti patāreti khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpeti, evameva bhagavā satthā satthavāho satte
anya-e0101n:1281_4: kantāraṃ tāreti, jātikantāraṃ tāretītiādinā niddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1281_6: cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhagavā pana tiracchānagatānampi anusāsanippadānena satthāyeva. Tepi
anya-e0101n:1281_7: hi bhagavato dhammassavanena upanissayasampattiṃ patvā tāya eva upanissayasampattiyā
anya-e0101n:1281_8: dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve maggaphalabhāgino honti. Maṇḍūkadevaputtādayo cettha nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1282_0: Bhagavati kira gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre campānagaravāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desiyamāne
anya-e0101n:1282_1: eko maṇḍūko bhagavato sare nimittaṃ aggahesi, taṃ eko vacchapālako daṇḍaṃ olubbha
anya-e0101n:1282_2: tiṭṭhanto sīse sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi. So tāvadeva kālaṅkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane dvādasayojanike
anya-e0101n:1282_3: kanakavimāne nibbatti. Suttappabuddho viya ca tattha accharāsaṅghaparivutaṃ attānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1282_4: disvā “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto, kiṃ nu kho kammamakāsi”nti āvajjento na aññaṃ
anya-e0101n:1282_5: kiñci addasa aññatra bhagavato sare nimittaggāhā. So tāvadeva saha vimānena āgantvā
anya-e0101n:1282_6: bhagavato pāde sirasā vandi. Bhagavā jānantova pucchi –
anya-e0101n:1283: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
anya-e0101n:1287: Bhagavā tassa dhammaṃ desesi. Caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Devaputtopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya sitaṃ katvā pakkamīti.
anya-e0101n:1288_0: 141. Yaṃ pana kiñci atthi ñeyyaṃ nāma, sabbasseva buddhattā vimokkhantikaññāṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1288_1: buddho. Yasmā vā cattāri saccāni attanāpi bujjhi, aññepi satte bodhesi, tasmā evamādīhipi
anya-e0101n:1288_2: kāraṇehi buddho. Imassa ca panatthassa viññāpanatthaṃ “bujjhitā saccānīti buddho.
anya-e0101n:1288_3: Bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”ti evaṃ pavatto sabbopi niddesanayo paṭisambhidānayo vā vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0101n:1292_0: Catubbidhaṃ vā nāmaṃ āvatthikaṃ liṅgikaṃ nemittikaṃ adhiccasamuppannanti. Adhiccasamuppannaṃ
anya-e0101n:1292_1: nāma lokiyavohārena yadicchakanti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha vaccho dammo balībaddoti evamādi
anya-e0101n:1292_2: āvatthikaṃ. Daṇḍī chattī sikhī karīti evamādi liṅgikaṃ. Tevijjo chaḷabhiññoti evamādi
anya-e0101n:1292_3: nemittikaṃ. Sirivaḍḍhako dhanavaḍḍhakoti evamādi vacanatthaṃ anapekkhitvā pavattaṃ
anya-e0101n:1292_4: adhiccasamuppannaṃ. Idaṃ pana bhagavāti nāmaṃ nemittikaṃ, na mahāmāyāya, na suddhodanamahārājena,
anya-e0101n:1292_5: na asītiyā ñātisahassehi kataṃ, na sakkasantusitādīhi devatāvisesehi. Vuttampi cetaṃ
anya-e0101n:1292_6: dhammasenāpatinā “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ…pe… vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1292_7: bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0101n:1293: 143. Yaṃguṇanemittikañcetaṃ nāmaṃ, tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanti –
anya-e0101n:1298: Niddese vuttanayeneva cettha tesaṃ tesaṃ padānaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:1300: Bhāgyavā bhaggavā yutto, bhagehi ca vibhattavā;
anya-e0101n:1302_0: Tattha vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyayotiādikaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā saddanayena vā
anya-e0101n:1302_2: bhāgyamassa atthi, tasmā bhāgyavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccatīti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1303_5: vā pañca kilesakhandhaabhisaṅkhāradevaputtamaccumāre abhañji. Tasmā bhaggattā etesaṃ
anya-e0101n:1303_6: parissayānaṃ bhaggavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati. Āha cettha –
anya-e0101n:1305: Bhaggāssa pāpakā dhammā, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:1306_0: Bhāgyavatāya cassa satapuññalakkhaṇadharassa rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti. Bhaggadosatāya
anya-e0101n:1306_2: abhigamanīyatā, abhigatānañca nesaṃ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo, āmisadānadhammadānehi
anya-e0101n:1306_3: upakāritā, lokiyalokuttarasukhehi ca saṃyojanasamatthatā dīpitā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1307_0: Yasmā ca loke issariyadhammayasasirikāmapayattesu chasu dhammesu bhagasaddo pavattati,
anya-e0101n:1307_1: paramañcassa sakacitte issariyaṃ, aṇimālaṅghimādikaṃ vā lokiyasammataṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ
anya-e0101n:1307_2: atthi. Tathā lokuttaro dhammo. Lokattayabyāpako yathābhuccaguṇādhigato ativiya parisuddho
anya-e0101n:1307_4: Yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitaṃ attahitaṃ parahitaṃ vā, tassa tassa tatheva abhinipphannattā
anya-e0101n:1307_6: payatto ca atthi. Tasmā imehi bhagehi yuttattāpi bhagā assa santīti iminā atthena bhagavāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1308_1: vā kusalādidhamme, pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1308_3: nirodhaṃ, niyyānikahetudassanādhipateyyaṭṭhena maggaṃ vibhattavā, vibhajitvā vivaritvā
anya-e0101n:1308_4: desitavāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā vibhattavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1309_0: Yasmā ca esa dibbabrahmaariyavihāre kāyacittaupadhiviveke suññatappaṇihitānimittavimokkhe
anya-e0101n:1309_1: aññe ca lokiyalokuttare uttarimanussadhamme bhaji sevi bahulaṃ akāsi, tasmā bhattavāti
anya-e0101n:1310_0: Yasmā pana tīsu bhavesu taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamanaṃ anena vantaṃ, tasmā bhavesu vantagamanoti
anya-e0101n:1310_1: vattabbe bhavasaddato bhakāraṃ gamanasaddato gakāraṃ vantasaddato vakārañca dīghaṃ
anya-e0101n:1310_2: katvā ādāya bhagavāti vuccati yathā loke mehanassa khassa mālāti vattabbe mekhalāti.
anya-e0101n:1311_0: 145. Tassevaṃ iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇena so bhagavā arahaṃ…pe… iminā ca iminā ca
anya-e0101n:1311_1: kāraṇena bhagavāti buddhaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1311_2: hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ, na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1311_3: samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgatamārabbha. Iccassa evaṃ rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa
anya-e0101n:1311_5: Buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato pīti uppajjati. Pītimanassa pītipadaṭṭhānāya
anya-e0101n:1311_6: passaddhiyā kāyacittadarathā paṭippassambhanti. Passaddhadarathassa kāyikampi cetasikampi
anya-e0101n:1311_7: sukhaṃ uppajjati. Sukhino buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā cittaṃ samādhiyatīti anukkamena
anya-e0101n:1311_8: ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n:1311_9: vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetaṃ buddhaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1312_0: Imañca pana buddhānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso, saddhāvepullaṃ
anya-e0101n:1312_1: sativepullaṃ paññāvepullaṃ puññavepullañca adhigacchati, pītipāmojjabahulo hoti,
anya-e0101n:1312_2: bhayabheravasaho dukkhādhivāsanasamattho, satthārā saṃvāsasaññaṃ paṭilabhati. Buddhaguṇānussatiyā
anya-e0101n:1312_3: ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṃ hoti. Buddhabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1312_4: namati. Vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viya hirottappaṃ
anya-e0101n:1312_5: paccupaṭṭhāti. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n:1317_1: dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1317_2: pariyattidhammassa ceva navavidhassa ca lokuttaradhammassa guṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n:1318_0: 147. Svākkhātoti imasmiṃ hi pade pariyattidhammopi saṅgahaṃ gacchati, itaresu lokuttaradhammova.
anya-e0101n:1318_2: ca. Yañhi bhagavā ekagāthampi deseti, sā samantabhaddakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena
anya-e0101n:1318_3: ādikalyāṇā, dutiyatatiyapādehi majjhekalyāṇā, pacchimapādena pariyosānakalyāṇā. Ekānusandhikaṃ
anya-e0101n:1318_4: suttaṃ nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesena majjhekalyāṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1318_5: Nānānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ paṭhamānusandhinā ādikalyāṇaṃ, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1318_6: sesehi majjhekalyāṇaṃ. Apica sanidānasauppattikattā ādikalyāṇaṃ, veneyyānaṃ anurūpato
anya-e0101n:1318_7: atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ, sotūnaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhajananena
anya-e0101n:1319_0: Sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo, samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi
anya-e0101n:1319_1: majjhekalyāṇo, nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo. Sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo, vipassanāmaggehi
anya-e0101n:1319_2: majjhekalyāṇo, phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo. Buddhasubodhitāya vā ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1319_3: dhammasudhammatāya majjhekalyāṇo, saṅghasuppaṭippattiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. Taṃ sutvā
anya-e0101n:1319_4: tathatthāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo, paccekabodhiyā
anya-e0101n:1320_0: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1320_1: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇaṃ āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
anya-e0101n:1320_2: tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1321_0: Yaṃ panesa bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti
anya-e0101n:1321_1: nānānayehi dīpeti, taṃ yathānurūpaṃ atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1321_6: sātthaṃ, saddheyyato lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjanaṃ. Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1321_7: uttānapadato sabyañjanaṃ. Upanetabbassa abhāvato sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvena kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1322_0: Apica paṭipattiyā adhigamabyattito sātthaṃ, pariyattiyā āgamabyattito sabyañjanaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1322_2: pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhanti evaṃ sātthasabyañjanakevalaparipuṇṇaparisuddhabrahmacariyappakāsanato svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n:1323_0: Atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto. Yathā hi aññatitthiyānaṃ dhammassa
anya-e0101n:1323_1: attho vipallāsamāpajjati, antarāyikāti vuttadhammānaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato, niyyānikāti
anya-e0101n:1323_2: vuttadhammānaṃ niyyānikattābhāvato. Tena te durakkhātadhammāyeva honti, na tathā
anya-e0101n:1323_3: bhagavato dhammassa attho vipallāsamāpajjati. Ime dhammā antarāyikā, ime dhammā niyyānikāti
anya-e0101n:1323_4: evaṃ vuttadhammānaṃ tathābhāvānatikkamanatoti. Evaṃ tāva pariyattidhammo svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n:1324_0: Lokuttaradhammo pana nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā paṭipadānurūpassa ca nibbānassa
anya-e0101n:1324_1: akkhātattā svākkhāto. Yathāha – “supaññattā kho pana tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī
anya-e0101n:1324_2: paṭipadā saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā ca. Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena
anya-e0101n:1324_3: saṃsandati sameti, evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā
anya-e0101n:1324_4: saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti. Ariyamaggo cettha antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimā
anya-e0101n:1324_5: paṭipadābhūtova “majjhimā paṭipadā”ti akkhātattā svākkhāto. Sāmaññaphalāni paṭipassaddhakilesāneva
anya-e0101n:1324_7: sassatādisabhāvavasena akkhātattā svākkhātanti evaṃ lokuttaradhammopi svākkhāto.
anya-e0101n:1325_0: 148. Sandiṭṭhikoti ettha pana ariyamaggo tāva attano santāne rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena
anya-e0101n:1325_1: ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko. Yathāha –“ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena
anya-e0101n:1325_2: abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi
anya-e0101n:1325_3: ceteti. Cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Rāge pahīne neva attabyābādhāya
anya-e0101n:1325_4: ceteti, na parabyābādhāya ceteti, na ubhayabyābādhāya ceteti, na cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1325_5: domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotī”ti. Apica
anya-e0101n:1325_6: navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti, tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ
anya-e0101n:1325_7: hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko. Atha vā pasatthā diṭṭhi
anya-e0101n:1325_8: sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Tathā hettha ariyamaggo sampayuttāya,
anya-e0101n:1325_9: ariyaphalaṃ kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṃ visayibhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:1325_10: yathā rathena jayatīti rathiko, evaṃ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n:1326_0: Atha vā diṭṭhanti dassanaṃ vuccati. Diṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhaṃ, dassananti attho. Sandiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1326_1: arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
anya-e0101n:1326_2: ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti. Tasmā yathā vatthaṃ arahatīti vatthiko, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1327_0: 149. Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo. Akāloyeva akāliko. Na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṃ
anya-e0101n:1327_1: kālaṃ khepetvā phalaṃ deti, attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1327_2: Atha vā attano phaladāne pakaṭṭho kālo patto assāti kāliko. Ko so? Lokiyo kusaladhammo.
anya-e0101n:1327_3: Ayaṃ pana samanantaraphalattā na kālikoti akāliko. Idaṃ maggameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1328_0: 150. “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n:1328_1: Kasmā panesa taṃ vidhiṃ arahatīti? Vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca. Rittamuṭṭhiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1328_2: hi hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n:1328_3: Avijjamānattā. Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1328_4: “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Apica kho pana tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva
anya-e0101n:1328_5: hoti. Kasmā? Aparisuddhattā. Ayaṃ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvatova vijjamāno
anya-e0101n:1328_6: vigatavalāhake ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya
anya-e0101n:1328_7: ca parisuddho. Tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n:1329_0: 151. Upanetabboti opaneyyiko. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo, upanayanaṃ upanayo, ādittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1329_1: celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṃ arahatīti
anya-e0101n:1329_2: opanayiko. Opanayikova opaneyyiko. Idaṃ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjati. Asaṅkhate
anya-e0101n:1329_3: pana attano cittena upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko. Sacchikiriyāvasena allīyanaṃ arahatīti attho.
anya-e0101n:1330: Atha vā nibbānaṃ upanetīti ariyamaggo upaneyyo. Sacchikātabbataṃ upanetabboti phalanibbānadhammo upaneyyo. Upaneyyo eva opaneyyiko.
anya-e0101n:1331_0: 152. Paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti sabbehipi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi viññūhi attani attani
anya-e0101n:1331_1: veditabbo “bhāvito me maggo, adhigataṃ phalaṃ, sacchikato nirodho”ti. Na hi upajjhāyena
anya-e0101n:1331_2: bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti, na so tassa phalasamāpattiyā
anya-e0101n:1331_3: phāsuviharati, na tena sacchikataṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti. Tasmā na esa parassa sīse
anya-e0101n:1331_4: ābharaṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo, attano pana citteyeva daṭṭhabbo, anubhavitabbo viññūhīti
anya-e0101n:1331_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Bālānaṃ pana avisayo cesa.
anya-e0101n:1332: Apica svākkhāto ayaṃ dhammo. Kasmā? Sandiṭṭhikattā. Sandiṭṭhiko, akālikattā. Akāliko, ehipassikattā. Yo ca ehipassiko, so nāma opaneyyiko hotīti.
anya-e0101n:1333_0: 153. Tassevaṃ svākkhātatādibhede dhammaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1333_1: cittaṃ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1333_2: samaye cittaṃ hoti dhammaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe
anya-e0101n:1333_3: jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Dhammaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n:1333_4: vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetaṃ dhammaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1334_0: Imañca pana dhammānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu evaṃ opaneyyikassa dhammassa desetāraṃ
anya-e0101n:1334_1: imināpaṅgena samannāgataṃ satthāraṃ neva atītaṃse samanupassāmi, na panetarahi aññatra
anya-e0101n:1334_2: tena bhagavatāti evaṃ dhammaguṇadassaneneva satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso. Dhamme
anya-e0101n:1334_3: garucittīkāro saddhādivepullaṃ adhigacchati, pītipāmojjabahulo hoti, bhayabheravasaho,
anya-e0101n:1334_5: ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṃ hoti, anuttaradhammādhigamāya
anya-e0101n:1334_6: cittaṃ namati, vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa dhammasudhammataṃ samanussarato
anya-e0101n:1334_7: hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāti. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n:1339_1: sāvakasaṅgho, ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho,
anya-e0101n:1339_2: sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā,
anya-e0101n:1339_3: esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo, dakkhiṇeyyo, añjalikaraṇīyo, anuttaraṃ
anya-e0101n:1340_0: 155. Tattha suppaṭipannoti suṭṭhu paṭipanno, sammāpaṭipadaṃ anivattipaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ
anya-e0101n:1340_1: apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannoti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhagavato ovādānusāsaniṃ
anya-e0101n:1340_2: sakkaccaṃ suṇantīti sāvakā. Sāvakānaṃ saṅgho sāvakasaṅgho, sīladiṭṭhisāmaññatāya
anya-e0101n:1340_3: saṅghātabhāvamāpanno sāvakasamūhoti attho. Yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā uju avaṅkā
anya-e0101n:1340_4: akuṭilā ajimhā, ariyo ca ñāyotipi vuccati, anucchavikattā ca sāmīcītipi saṅkhaṃ gatā.
anya-e0101n:1340_5: Tasmā tampaṭipanno ariyasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno ñāyappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipannotipi vutto.
anya-e0101n:1341: Ettha ca ye maggaṭṭhā, te sammāpaṭipattisamaṅgitāya suppaṭipannā. Ye phalaṭṭhā, te sammāpaṭipadāya adhigantabbassa adhigatattā atītaṃ paṭipadaṃ sandhāya suppaṭipannāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1342: Apica svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattāpi apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāpi suppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n:1343: Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayamanupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya paṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n:1344: Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṃ. Tadatthāya paṭipannattā ñāyappaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n:1345: Yathā paṭipannā sāmīcippaṭipannārahā honti, tathā paṭipannattā sāmīcippaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n:1346_0: 156. Yadidanti yāni imāni. Cattāri purisayugānīti yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti
anya-e0101n:1346_1: idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugaḷāni honti. Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti purisapuggalavasena
anya-e0101n:1346_2: eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti. Ettha
anya-e0101n:1346_3: ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni. Veneyyavasena panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1346_4: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni, pāṭiekkato
anya-e0101n:1346_5: aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, āhuneyyotiādīsu ānetvā hunitabbanti
anya-e0101n:1346_6: āhunaṃ, dūratopi ānetvā sīlavantesu dātabbanti attho. Catunnaṃ paccayānametamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1346_7: Taṃ āhunaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto tassa mahapphalakaraṇatoti āhuneyyo. Atha vā dūratopi
anya-e0101n:1346_8: āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti āhavanīyo. Sakkādīnampi vā āhavanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1346_9: arahatīti āhavanīyo. Yo cāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ āhavanīyo nāma aggi, yattha hutaṃ mahapphalanti
anya-e0101n:1346_10: tesaṃ laddhi. Sace hutassa mahapphalatāya āhavanīyo, saṅghova āhavanīyo. Saṅghe hutañhi
anya-e0101n:1347: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
anya-e0101n:1349: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti. ;
anya-e0101n:1350: Tadetaṃ nikāyantare āhavanīyoti padaṃ idha āhuneyyoti iminā padena atthato ekaṃ. Byañjanato panettha kiñcimattameva nānaṃ. Iti āhuneyyo.
anya-e0101n:1351_0: Pāhuneyyoti ettha pana pāhunaṃ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ ñātimittānamatthāya
anya-e0101n:1351_1: sakkārena paṭiyattaṃ āgantukadānaṃ. Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva
anya-e0101n:1351_2: dātuṃ yuttaṃ, saṅghova taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yutto. Saṅghasadiso hi pāhunako natthi. Tathā
anya-e0101n:1351_3: hesa ekabuddhantare ca dissati, abbokiṇṇañca piyamanāpattakarehi dhammehi samannāgatoti.
anya-e0101n:1351_4: Evaṃ pāhunamassa dātuṃ yuttaṃ pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti pāhuneyyo. Yesaṃ pana
anya-e0101n:1351_5: pāhavanīyoti pāḷi, tesaṃ yasmā saṅgho pubbakāramarahati, tasmā sabbapaṭhamaṃ ānetvā
anya-e0101n:1351_6: ettha hunitabbanti pāhavanīyo. Sabbappakārena vā āhavanamarahatīti pāhavanīyo. Svāyamidha
anya-e0101n:1352: Dakkhiṇāti pana paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ vuccati. Taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ arahati, dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṃ mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0101n:1353: Ubho hatthe sirasmiṃ patiṭṭhapetvā sabbalokena kayiramānaṃ añjalikammaṃ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo.
anya-e0101n:1354_0: Anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā
anya-e0101n:1354_1: hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño sālikkhettaṃ
anya-e0101n:1354_2: rañño yavakkhettanti vuccati, evaṃ saṅgho sabbalokassa puññānaṃ virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1354_3: Saṅghaṃ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṃvattanikāni puññāni virūhanti.
anya-e0101n:1355_0: 157. Evaṃ suppaṭipannatādibhede saṅghaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1355_1: cittaṃ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1355_2: samaye cittaṃ hoti saṅghaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe
anya-e0101n:1355_3: jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Saṅghaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n:1355_4: vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetaṃ saṅghaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1356_0: Imañca pana saṅghānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu saṅghe sagāravo hoti sappatisso. Saddhādivepullaṃ
anya-e0101n:1356_2: saṅghena saṃvāsasaññaṃ paṭilabhati. Saṅghaguṇānussatiyā ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīraṃ
anya-e0101n:1356_3: sannipatitasaṅghamiva uposathāgāraṃ pūjārahaṃ hoti, saṅghaguṇādhigamāya cittaṃ namati,
anya-e0101n:1356_4: vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa sammukhā saṅghaṃ passato viya hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāti,
anya-e0101n:1361_0: 158. Sīlānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena pana rahogatena paṭisallīnena “aho vata me sīlāni
anya-e0101n:1361_1: akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni
anya-e0101n:1361_2: samādhisaṃvattanikānī”ti evaṃ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlāni anussaritabbāni.
anya-e0101n:1361_3: Tāni ca gahaṭṭhena gahaṭṭhasīlāni, pabbajitena pabbajitasīlāni.
anya-e0101n:1362_0: Gahaṭṭhasīlāni vā hontu pabbajitasīlāni vā, yesaṃ ādimhi vā ante vā ekampi na bhinnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1362_1: tāni pariyante chinnasāṭako viya na khaṇḍānīti akhaṇḍāni. Yesaṃ vemajjhe ekampi na
anya-e0101n:1362_2: bhinnaṃ, tāni majjhe vinividdhasāṭako viya na chiddānīti acchiddāni. Yesaṃ paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0101n:1362_3: dve vā tīṇi vā na bhinnāni, tāni piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena dīghavaṭṭādisaṇṭhānena
anya-e0101n:1362_4: visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya na sabalānīti asabalāni.
anya-e0101n:1362_5: Yāni antarantarā na bhinnāni, tāni visabhāgabinduvicitrā gāvī viya na kammāsānīti
anya-e0101n:1362_6: akammāsāni. Avisesena vā sabbānipi sattavidhena methunasaṃyogena kodhupanāhādīhi
anya-e0101n:1362_7: ca pāpadhammehi anupahatattā akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni. Tāniyeva
anya-e0101n:1362_8: taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇena bhujissāni. Buddhādīhi viññūhi pasatthattā
anya-e0101n:1362_9: viññuppasatthāni. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhatāya kenaci vā ayaṃ te sīlesu dosoti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1362_10: parāmaṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya aparāmaṭṭhāni. Upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiṃ vā, atha
anya-e0101n:1362_11: vā pana maggasamādhiṃ phalasamādhiñcāpi saṃvattentīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni.
anya-e0101n:1363_0: 159. Evaṃ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlāni anussarato nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1363_1: cittaṃ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1363_2: samaye cittaṃ hoti, sīlaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe
anya-e0101n:1363_3: jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Sīlaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n:1363_4: vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetaṃ sīlaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1364_0: Imañca pana sīlānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu sikkhāya sagāravo hoti sabhāgavutti, paṭisanthāre
anya-e0101n:1364_1: appamatto, attānuvādādibhayavirahito, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, saddhādivepullaṃ
anya-e0101n:1364_2: adhigacchati, pītipāmojjabahulo hoti. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n:1369_0: 160. Cāgānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena pana pakatiyā cāgādhimuttena niccappavattadānasaṃvibhāgena
anya-e0101n:1369_1: bhavitabbaṃ. Atha vā pana bhāvanaṃ ārabhantena ito dāni pabhuti sati paṭiggāhake
anya-e0101n:1369_2: antamaso ekālopamattampi dānaṃ adatvā na bhuñjissāmīti samādānaṃ katvā taṃdivasaṃ
anya-e0101n:1369_3: guṇavisiṭṭhesu paṭiggāhakesu yathāsatti yathābalaṃ dānaṃ datvā tattha nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā
anya-e0101n:1369_4: rahogatena paṭisallīnena “lābhā vata me suladdhaṃ vata me, yohaṃ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya
anya-e0101n:1369_5: pajāya vigatamalamaccherena cetasā viharāmi muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo
anya-e0101n:1369_6: dānasaṃvibhāgarato”ti evaṃ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgo anussaritabbo.
anya-e0101n:1370_0: Tattha lābhā vata meti mayhaṃ vata lābhā, ye ime “āyuṃ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī
anya-e0101n:1370_1: hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā” iti ca, “dadaṃ piyo hoti bhajanti naṃ bahū” iti ca,
anya-e0101n:1370_2: “dadamāno piyo hoti, sataṃ dhammaṃ anukkamaṃ” iti ca evamādīhi nayehi bhagavatā dāyakassa
anya-e0101n:1370_3: lābhā saṃvaṇṇitā, te mayhaṃ avassaṃ bhāginoti adhippāyo. Suladdhaṃ vata meti yaṃ
anya-e0101n:1370_4: mayā idaṃ sāsanaṃ manussattaṃ vā laddhaṃ, taṃ suladdhaṃ vata me. Kasmā? Yohaṃ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya
anya-e0101n:1371_0: Tattha maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāyāti maccheramalena abhibhūtāya. Pajāyāti pajāyanavasena
anya-e0101n:1371_1: sattā vuccanti. Tasmā attano sampattīnaṃ parasādhāraṇabhāvamasahanalakkhaṇena cittassa
anya-e0101n:1371_2: pabhassarabhāvadūsakānaṃ kaṇhadhammānaṃ aññatarena maccheramalena abhibhūtesu sattesūti
anya-e0101n:1371_3: ayamettha attho. Vigatamalamaccherenāti aññesampi rāgadosādimalānañceva maccherassa
anya-e0101n:1371_4: ca vigatattā vigatamalamaccherena. Cetasā viharāmīti yathāvuttappakāracitto hutvā
anya-e0101n:1371_5: vasāmīti attho. Suttesu pana mahānāmasakkassa sotāpannassa sato nissayavihāraṃ pucchato
anya-e0101n:1371_6: nissayavihāravasena desitattā agāraṃ ajjhāvasāmīti vuttaṃ. Tattha abhibhavitvā vasāmīti attho.
anya-e0101n:1372_0: Muttacāgoti vissaṭṭhacāgo. Payatapāṇīti parisuddhahattho. Sakkaccaṃ sahatthā deyyadhammaṃ
anya-e0101n:1372_1: dātuṃ sadā dhotahatthoyevāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vossaggaratoti vossajjanaṃ vossaggo, pariccāgoti
anya-e0101n:1372_2: attho. Tasmiṃ vossagge satatābhiyogavasena ratoti vossaggarato. Yācayogoti yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0101n:1372_3: pare yācanti, tassa tassa dānato yācanayogoti attho. Yājayogotipi pāṭho. Yajanasaṅkhātena
anya-e0101n:1372_4: yājena yuttoti attho. Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dāne ca saṃvibhāge ca rato. Ahañhi dānañca
anya-e0101n:1372_5: demi, attanā paribhuñjitabbatopi ca saṃvibhāgaṃ karomi, ettheva casmi ubhaye ratoti
anya-e0101n:1373_0: 161. Tassevaṃ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgaṃ anussarato neva tasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:1373_1: samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1373_2: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti cāgaṃ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa
anya-e0101n:1373_3: ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Cāgaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāracāgaguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n:1373_4: vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetaṃ cāgaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1374_0: Imañca pana cāgānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu bhiyyoso mattāya cāgādhimutto hoti, alobhajjhāsayo,
anya-e0101n:1374_1: mettāya anulomakārī, visārado, pītipāmojjabahulo, uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n:1379_0: 162. Devatānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena pana ariyamaggavasena samudāgatehi saddhādīhi guṇehi
anya-e0101n:1379_1: samannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ. Tato rahogatena paṭisallīnena “santi devā cātumahārājikā,
anya-e0101n:1379_2: santi devā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā, tusitā, nimmānaratino, paranimmitavasavattino, santi
anya-e0101n:1379_3: devā brahmakāyikā, santi devā tatuttari, yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā
anya-e0101n:1379_4: ito cutā tattha upapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṃvijjati. Yathārūpena sīlena.
anya-e0101n:1379_5: Yathārūpena sutena. Yathārūpena cāgena. Yathārūpāya paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā
anya-e0101n:1379_6: ito cutā tattha upapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī”ti evaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:1380_0: Sutte pana yasmiṃ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṃ saddhañca
anya-e0101n:1380_1: sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1380_2: cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṃ, atha kho taṃ sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadevatānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1380_3: attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi devatā
anya-e0101n:1380_4: sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇe anussaratīti daḷhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1381_0: 163. Tasmā pubbabhāge devatānaṃ guṇe anussaritvā aparabhāge attano saṃvijjamāne saddhādiguṇe
anya-e0101n:1381_1: anussarato cassa neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na
anya-e0101n:1381_2: mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti devatā ārabbhāti
anya-e0101n:1381_3: purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Saddhādiguṇānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1381_4: pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva
anya-e0101n:1381_5: jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetaṃ devatānaṃ guṇasadisasaddhādiguṇānussaraṇavasena devatānussaticceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:1382_0: Imañca pana devatānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu devatānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo, bhiyyoso
anya-e0101n:1382_1: mattāya saddhādivepullaṃ adhigacchati, pītipāmojjabahulo viharati. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto
anya-e0101n:1387_0: 164. Yaṃ pana etāsaṃ vitthāradesanāyaṃ “ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti
anya-e0101n:1387_1: tathāgataṃ ārabbhā”tiādīni vatvā “ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati
anya-e0101n:1387_2: atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pamuditassa pīti
anya-e0101n:1387_3: jāyatī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha itipi so bhagavātiādīnaṃ atthaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0101n:1387_4: sandhāya labhati atthavedanti vuttaṃ. Pāḷiṃ nissāya uppannaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ sandhāya labhati
anya-e0101n:1387_5: dhammavedaṃ. Ubhayavasena labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojjanti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1388_0: Yañca devatānussatiyaṃ devatā ārabbhāti vuttaṃ, taṃ pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasena
anya-e0101n:1388_1: devatāguṇasadise vā devatābhāvanipphādake guṇe ārabbha pavattacittavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1389_0: 165. Imā pana cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaññeva ijjhanti. Tesaṃ hi buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇā
anya-e0101n:1389_1: pākaṭā honti. Te ca akhaṇḍatādiguṇehi sīlehi, vigatamalamaccherena cāgena, mahānubhāvānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1389_2: devatānaṃ guṇasadisehi saddhādiguṇehi samannāgatā. Mahānāmasutte ca sotāpannassa
anya-e0101n:1389_3: nissayavihāraṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā sotāpannassa nissayavihāradassanatthameva etā vitthārato kathitā.
anya-e0101n:1390_0: Gedhasuttepi “idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, itipi so bhagavā…pe…
anya-e0101n:1390_1: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti nikkhantaṃ muttaṃ vuṭṭhitaṃ gedhamhā. Gedhoti
anya-e0101n:1390_2: kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ kāmaguṇānamadhivacanaṃ. Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1390_3: karitvā evamidhekacce sattā visujjhantī”ti evaṃ ariyasāvakassa anussativasena cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1391_0: Āyasmatā mahākaccānena desite sambādhokāsasuttepi “acchariyaṃ, āvuso, abbhutaṃ, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:1391_1: yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo
anya-e0101n:1391_2: anubuddho sattānaṃ visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṃ cha anussatiṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0101n:1391_3: Katamāni cha? Idhāvuso, ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati…pe… evamidhekacce sattā
anya-e0101n:1391_4: visuddhidhammā bhavantī”ti evaṃ ariyasāvakasseva paramatthavisuddhidhammatāya okāsādhigamavasena kathitā.
anya-e0101n:1392_0: Uposathasuttepi “kathañca, visākhe, ariyūposatho hoti? Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe,
anya-e0101n:1392_1: cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa
anya-e0101n:1392_2: upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti? Idha, visākhe, ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussaratī”ti
anya-e0101n:1392_3: evaṃ ariyasāvakasseva uposathaṃ upavasato cittavisodhanakammaṭṭhānavasena uposathassa
anya-e0101n:1393_0: Ekādasanipātepi “saddho kho, mahānāma, ārādhako hoti, no assaddho. Āraddhavīriyo,
anya-e0101n:1393_1: upaṭṭhitasati, samāhito, paññavā, mahānāma, ārādhako hoti, no duppañño. Imesu kho
anya-e0101n:1393_2: tvaṃ, mahānāma, pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cha dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi. Idha tvaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1393_3: mahānāma, tathāgataṃ anussareyyāsi itipi so bhagavā”ti evaṃ ariyasāvakasseva “tesaṃ
anya-e0101n:1393_4: no, bhante, nānāvihārena viharataṃ kenassa vihārena viharitabba”nti pucchato vihāradassanatthaṃ kathitā.
anya-e0101n:1394_0: 166. Evaṃ santepi parisuddhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatena puthujjanenāpi manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0101n:1394_1: Anussavavasenāpi hi buddhādīnaṃ guṇe anussarato cittaṃ pasīdatiyeva. Yassānubhāvena
anya-e0101n:1394_2: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā uḷārapāmojjo vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃyeva sacchikareyya
anya-e0101n:1395_0: So kirāyasmā mārena nimmitaṃ buddharūpaṃ disvā “ayaṃ tāva sarāgadosamoho evaṃ sobhati,
anya-e0101n:1395_1: kathaṃ nu kho bhagavā na sobhati, so hi sabbaso vītarāgadosamoho”ti buddhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1395_2: pītiṃ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
anya-e0101n:1402_0: 167. Idāni ito anantarāya maraṇassatiyā bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto. Tattha maraṇanti
anya-e0101n:1402_1: ekabhavapariyāpannassa jīvitindriyassa upacchedo. Yaṃ panetaṃ arahantānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0101n:1402_2: samucchedamaraṇaṃ, saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ khaṇikamaraṇaṃ, rukkho mato lohaṃ
anya-e0101n:1402_3: matantiādīsu sammutimaraṇañca, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1403_0: Yampi cetaṃ adhippetaṃ, taṃ kālamaraṇaṃ akālamaraṇanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha kālamaraṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1403_1: puññakkhayena vā āyukkhayena vā ubhayakkhayena vā hoti. Akālamaraṇaṃ kammupacchedakakammavasena.
anya-e0101n:1404_0: Tattha yaṃ vijjamānāyapi āyusantānajanakapaccayasampattiyā kevalaṃ paṭisandhijanakassa
anya-e0101n:1404_1: kammassa vipakkavipākattā maraṇaṃ hoti, idaṃ puññakkhayena maraṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ gatikālāhārādisampattiyā
anya-e0101n:1404_2: abhāvena ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ viya vassasatamattaparimāṇassa āyuno khayavasena maraṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1404_3: hoti, idaṃ āyukkhayena maraṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana dūsīmārakalāburājādīnaṃ viya taṅkhaṇaññeva
anya-e0101n:1404_4: ṭhānācāvanasamatthena kammunā upacchinnasantānānaṃ, purimakammavasena vā satthaharaṇādīhi
anya-e0101n:1404_5: upakkamehi upacchijjamānasantānānaṃ maraṇaṃ hoti, idaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ nāma. Taṃ sabbampi
anya-e0101n:1405_0: 168. Taṃ bhāvetukāmena rahogatena paṭisallīnena “maraṇaṃ bhavissati, jīvitindriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1405_1: upacchijjissatī”ti vā, “maraṇaṃ maraṇa”nti vā yoniso manasikāro pavattetabbo. Ayoniso
anya-e0101n:1405_2: pavattayato hi iṭṭhajanamaraṇānussaraṇe soko uppajjati vijātamātuyā piyaputtamaraṇānussaraṇe
anya-e0101n:1405_3: viya. Aniṭṭhajanamaraṇānussaraṇe pāmojjaṃ uppajjati verīnaṃ verimaraṇānussaraṇe viya.
anya-e0101n:1405_4: Majjhattajanamaraṇānussaraṇe saṃvego na uppajjati matakaḷevaradassane chavaḍāhakassa
anya-e0101n:1405_5: viya. Attano maraṇānussaraṇe santāso uppajjati ukkhittāsikaṃ vadhakaṃ disvā bhīrukajātikassa
anya-e0101n:1405_6: viya. Tadetaṃ sabbampi satisaṃvegañāṇavirahato hoti. Tasmā tattha tattha hatamatasatte
anya-e0101n:1405_7: oloketvā diṭṭhapubbasampattīnaṃ sattānaṃ matānaṃ maraṇaṃ āvajjetvā satiñca saṃvegañca
anya-e0101n:1405_8: ñāṇañca yojetvā “maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā nayena manasikāro pavattetabbo. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1405_9: pavattento hi yoniso pavatteti, upāyena pavattetīti attho. Evaṃ pavattayatoyeva hi
anya-e0101n:1405_10: ekaccassa nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti, maraṇārammaṇā sati saṇṭhāti, upacārappattameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:1406_0: 169. Yassa pana ettāvatā na hoti, tena vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānato, sampattivipattito,
anya-e0101n:1407_0: Tattha vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānatoti vadhakassa viya paccupaṭṭhānato. Yathā hi imassa
anya-e0101n:1407_1: sīsaṃ chindissāmīti asiṃ gahetvā gīvāya cārayamāno vadhako paccupaṭṭhitova hoti,
anya-e0101n:1407_2: evaṃ maraṇampi paccupaṭṭhitamevāti anussaritabbaṃ. Kasmā? Saha jātiyā āgatato, jīvitaharaṇato
anya-e0101n:1407_3: ca. Yathā hi ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ matthakena paṃsuṃ gahetvāva uggacchati, evaṃ sattā
anya-e0101n:1407_4: jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti. Tathā hi nesaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ uppādānantarameva
anya-e0101n:1407_5: jaraṃ patvā pabbatasikharato patitasilā viya bhijjati saddhiṃ sampayuttakhandhehi.
anya-e0101n:1407_6: Evaṃ khaṇikamaraṇaṃ tāva saha jātiyā āgataṃ. Jātassa pana avassaṃ maraṇato idhādhippetamaraṇampi
anya-e0101n:1407_7: saha jātiyā āgataṃ. Tasmā esa satto jātakālato paṭṭhāya yathā nāma uṭṭhito sūriyo
anya-e0101n:1407_8: atthābhimukho gacchateva, gatagataṭṭhānato īsakampi na nivattati. Yathā vā nadī pabbateyyā
anya-e0101n:1407_9: sīghasotā hārahārinī sandateva vattateva īsakampi na nivattati, evaṃ īsakampi anivattamāno
anya-e0101n:1409: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:1410_0: Evaṃ gacchato cassa gimhābhitattānaṃ kunnadīnaṃ khayo viya, pāto āporasānugatabandhanānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1410_1: dumapphalānaṃ patanaṃ viya, muggarābhitāḷitānaṃ mattikabhājanānaṃ bhedo viya, sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1410_2: ussāvabindūnaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ viya ca maraṇameva āsannaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
anya-e0101n:1414: Evaṃ jātāna maccānaṃ, niccaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1416: Khuddakañca mahantañca, yaṃ pakkaṃ yañca āmakaṃ;
anya-e0101n:1419: Evamāyu manussānaṃ, mā maṃ amma nivārayā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:1420_0: Evaṃ ukkhittāsiko vadhako viya saha jātiyā āgataṃ panetaṃ maraṇaṃ gīvāya asiṃ cārayamāno
anya-e0101n:1420_1: so vadhako viya jīvitaṃ haratiyeva, na aharitvā nivattati. Tasmā saha jātiyā āgatato,
anya-e0101n:1420_2: jīvitaharaṇato ca ukkhittāsiko vadhako viya maraṇampi paccupaṭṭhitamevāti evaṃ vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānato
anya-e0101n:1421: 170. Sampattivipattitoti idha sampatti nāma tāvadeva sobhati, yāva naṃ vipatti nābhibhavati, na ca sā sampatti nāma atthi, yā vipattiṃ atikkamma tiṭṭheyya. Tathā hi –
anya-e0101n:1426_0: Apica sabbaṃ ārogyaṃ byādhipariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ yobbanaṃ jarāpariyosānaṃ, sabbaṃ jīvitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1426_1: maraṇapariyosānaṃ, sabboyeva lokasannivāso jātiyā anugato, jarāya anusaṭo, byādhinā
anya-e0101n:1429: “Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine;
anya-e0101n:1432: “Na tattha hatthīnaṃ bhūmi, na rathānaṃ na pattiyā;
anya-e0101n:1433: Na cāpi mantayuddhena, sakkā jetuṃ dhanena vā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:1434: Evaṃ jīvitasampattiyā maraṇavipattipariyosānataṃ vavatthapentena sampattivipattito maraṇaṃ anussaritabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1435_0: 171. Upasaṃharaṇatoti parehi saddhiṃ attano upasaṃharaṇato. Tattha sattahākārehi
anya-e0101n:1435_1: upasaṃharaṇato maraṇaṃ anussaritabbaṃ, yasamahattato, puññamahattato, thāmamahattato,
anya-e0101n:1435_2: iddhimahattato, paññāmahattato, paccekabuddhato, sammāsambuddhatoti. Kathaṃ? Idaṃ
anya-e0101n:1435_3: maraṇaṃ nāma mahāyasānaṃ mahāparivārānaṃ sampannadhanavāhanānaṃ mahāsammatamandhātumahāsudassana
anya-e0101n:1435_4: daḷhanemi nimippabhutīnampi upari nirāsaṅkameva patitaṃ, kimaṅgaṃ pana mayhaṃ upari na patissati?
anya-e0101n:1437: Tepi maccuvasaṃ pattā, mādisesu kathāva kāti.
anya-e0101n:1440: Jotiko jaṭilo uggo, meṇḍako atha puṇṇako;
anya-e0101n:1441: Ete caññe ca ye loke, mahāpuññāti vissutā;
anya-e0101n:1446: Cānuro yo mahāmallo, antakassa vasaṃ gatā.
anya-e0101n:1448: Etepi maraṇaṃ yātā, mādisesu kathāva kāti.
anya-e0101n:1453: Sopi maccumukhaṃ ghoraṃ, migo sīhamukhaṃ viya;
anya-e0101n:1454: Paviṭṭho saha iddhīhi, mādisesu kathāva kāti.
anya-e0101n:1457: Lokanāthaṃ ṭhapetvāna, ye caññe atthi pāṇino;
anya-e0101n:1460: Maraṇassa vasaṃ patto, mādisesu kathāva kāti.
anya-e0101n:1462_0: Kathaṃ paccekabuddhato? Yepi te attano ñāṇavīriyabalena sabbakilesasattunimmathanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1462_1: katvā paccekabodhiṃ pattā khaggavisāṇakappā sayambhuno, tepi maraṇato na muttā, kuto
anya-e0101n:1466: Tepi nātigatā maccuṃ, mādisesu kathāva kāti.
anya-e0101n:1468_2: pāraṃ gato asamo asamasamo appaṭipuggalo arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, sopi salilavuṭṭhinipātena
anya-e0101n:1470: Na bhayena na lajjāya, maraṇaṃ vasamāgataṃ.
anya-e0101n:1474_0: Tassevaṃ yasamahattatādisampannehi parehi saddhiṃ maraṇasāmaññatāya attānaṃ upasaṃharitvā
anya-e0101n:1474_1: tesaṃ viya sattavisesānaṃ mayhampi maraṇaṃ bhavissatīti anussarato upacārappattaṃ
anya-e0101n:1474_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ upasaṃharaṇato maraṇaṃ anussaritabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1475_0: 172. Kāyabahusādhāraṇatoti ayaṃ kāyo bahusādhāraṇo. Asītiyā tāva kimikulānaṃ sādhāraṇo,
anya-e0101n:1475_1: tattha chavinissitā pāṇā chaviṃ khādanti, cammanissitā cammaṃ khādanti, maṃsanissitā
anya-e0101n:1475_2: maṃsaṃ khādanti, nhārunissitā nhāruṃ khādanti, aṭṭhinissitā aṭṭhiṃ khādanti, miñjanissitā
anya-e0101n:1475_3: miñjaṃ khādanti. Tattheva jāyanti jīyanti mīyanti, uccārapassāvaṃ karonti. Kāyova
anya-e0101n:1475_4: nesaṃ sūtigharañceva gilānasālā ca susānañca vaccakuṭi ca passāvadoṇikā ca. Svāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1475_5: tesampi kimikulānaṃ pakopena maraṇaṃ nigacchatiyeva. Yathā ca asītiyā kimikulānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1475_6: evaṃ ajjhattikānaṃyeva anekasatānaṃ rogānaṃ bāhirānañca ahivicchikādīnaṃ maraṇassa
anya-e0101n:1476_0: Yathā hi catumahāpathe ṭhapite lakkhamhi sabbadisāhi āgatā sarasattitomarapāsāṇādayo
anya-e0101n:1476_1: nipatanti, evaṃ kāyepi sabbupaddavā nipatanti. Svāyaṃ tesampi upaddavānaṃ nipātena
anya-e0101n:1476_2: maraṇaṃ nigacchatiyeva. Tenāha bhagavā – “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divase nikkhante
anya-e0101n:1476_3: rattiyā paṭihitāya iti paṭisañcikkhati, bahukā kho me paccayā maraṇassa, ahi vā maṃ
anya-e0101n:1476_4: ḍaṃseyya, vicchiko vā maṃ ḍaṃseyya, satapadī vā maṃ ḍaṃseyya, tena me assa kālaṅkiriyā,
anya-e0101n:1476_5: so mamassa antarāyo, upakkhalitvā vā papateyyaṃ, bhattaṃ vā me bhuttaṃ byāpajjeyya,
anya-e0101n:1476_6: pittaṃ vā me kuppeyya, semhaṃ vā me kuppeyya, satthakā vā me vātā kuppeyyuṃ, tena
anya-e0101n:1476_7: me assa kālaṅkiriyā, so mamassa antarāyo”ti. Evaṃ kāyabahusādhāraṇato maraṇaṃ anussaritabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1477_0: 173. Āyudubbalatoti āyu nāmetaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ. Tathā hi sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsūpanibaddhañceva
anya-e0101n:1477_2: Tadetaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva pavattati. Bahi nikkhantanāsikavāte
anya-e0101n:1477_3: pana anto apavisante, paviṭṭhe vā anikkhamante mato nāma hoti. Catunnaṃ iriyāpathānampi
anya-e0101n:1477_4: samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva pavattati. Aññataraññatarassa pana adhimattatāya āyusaṅkhārā
anya-e0101n:1477_5: upacchijjanti. Sītuṇhānampi samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva pavattati. Atisītena pana
anya-e0101n:1477_6: atiuṇhena vā abhibhūtassa vipajjati. Mahābhūtānampi samavuttitaṃ labhamānameva pavattati.
anya-e0101n:1477_7: Pathavīdhātuyā pana āpodhātuādīnaṃ vā aññataraññatarassa pakopena balasampannopi
anya-e0101n:1477_8: puggalo patthaddhakāyo vā atisārādivasena kilinnapūtikāyo vā mahāḍāhapareto vā sambhijjamānasandhibandhano
anya-e0101n:1477_9: vā hutvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇāti. Kabaḷīkārāhārampi yuttakāle labhantasseva jīvitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1477_10: pavattati, āhāraṃ alabhamānassa pana parikkhayaṃ gacchatīti. Evaṃ āyudubbalato maraṇaṃ anussaritabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1478: 174. Animittatoti avavatthānato, paricchedābhāvatoti attho. Sattānaṃ hi –
anya-e0101n:1479: Jīvitaṃ byādhi kālo ca, dehanikkhepanaṃ gati;
anya-e0101n:1481_0: Tattha jīvitaṃ tāva “ettakameva jīvitabbaṃ, na ito para”nti vavatthānābhāvato animittaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1481_2: Kucchito nikkhantasamayepi. Tato paraṃ vassasatassa antopi bahipi marantiyeva. Byādhipi
anya-e0101n:1481_3: “imināva byādhinā sattā maranti, nāññenā”ti vavatthānābhāvato animitto. Cakkhurogenāpi
anya-e0101n:1481_4: hi sattā maranti, sotarogādīnaṃ aññatarenāpi. Kālopi “imasmiṃyeva kāle maritabbaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1481_5: nāññasmi”nti evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato animitto. Pubbaṇhepi hi sattā maranti, majjhanhikādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1481_6: aññatarasmimpi. Dehanikkhepanampi “idheva mīyamānānaṃ dehena patitabbaṃ, nāññatrā”ti
anya-e0101n:1481_7: evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato animittaṃ. Antogāme jātānaṃ hi bahigāmepi attabhāvo patati.
anya-e0101n:1481_8: Bahigāme jātānampi antogāme. Tathā thalajānaṃ vā jale, jalajānaṃ vā thaleti anekappakārato
anya-e0101n:1481_9: vitthāretabbaṃ. Gatipi “ito cutena idha nibbattitabba”nti evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato
anya-e0101n:1481_10: animittā. Devalokato hi cutā manussesupi nibbattanti, manussalokato cutā devalokādīnampi
anya-e0101n:1481_11: yattha katthaci nibbattantīti evaṃ yantayuttagoṇo viya gatipañcake loko samparivattatīti
anya-e0101n:1482_0: 175. Addhānaparicchedatoti manussānaṃ jīvitassa nāma etarahi paritto addhā. Yo ciraṃ
anya-e0101n:1482_1: jīvati, so vassasataṃ, appaṃ vā bhiyyo. Tenāha bhagavā – “appamidaṃ, bhikkhave, manussānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1482_2: āyu, gamanīyo samparāyo, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, natthi jātassa
anya-e0101n:1482_3: amaraṇaṃ. Yo, bhikkhave, ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasataṃ, appaṃ vā bhiyyoti.
anya-e0101n:1485: Aparampi āha – “bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, arako nāma satthā ahosī”ti sabbampi sattahi upamāhi alaṅkataṃ suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1486_0: Aparampi āha – “yocāyaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāveti, aho vatāhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1486_1: rattindivaṃ jīveyyaṃ, bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasikareyyaṃ, bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti.
anya-e0101n:1486_2: Yocāyaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāveti, aho vatāhaṃ divasaṃ jīveyyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1486_3: bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasikareyyaṃ, bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti. Yo cāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:1486_4: bhikkhu evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāveti, aho vatāhaṃ tadantaraṃ jīveyyaṃ, yadantaraṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0101n:1486_5: piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasikareyyaṃ, bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti.
anya-e0101n:1486_6: Yo cāyaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāveti, aho vatāhaṃ tadantaraṃ jīveyyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1486_7: yadantaraṃ cattāro pañca ālope saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi, bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasikareyyaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1486_8: bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti. Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū pamattā viharanti, dandhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1486_9: maraṇassatiṃ bhāventi āsavānaṃ khayāya. Yo ca khvāyaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ
anya-e0101n:1486_10: bhāveti, aho vatāhaṃ tadantaraṃ jīveyyaṃ, yadantaraṃ ekaṃ ālopaṃ saṅkhāditvā ajjhoharāmi,
anya-e0101n:1486_11: bhagavato sāsanaṃ manasikareyyaṃ, bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assāti. Yo cāyaṃ, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:1486_12: bhikkhu evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāveti, aho vatāhaṃ tadantaraṃ jīveyyaṃ, yadantaraṃ assasitvā
