anya-e0101n:1665_4: satiyā anubandhanto, appanāvasena ca cittaṃ ṭhapento anubandhanāya ca phusanāya ca
anya-e0101n:1665_5: ṭhapanāya ca manasi karotīti vuccati. Svāyamattho aṭṭhakathāsu vuttapaṅguḷadovārikūpamāhi
anya-e0101n:1666_0: 225. Tatrāyaṃ paṅguḷopamā – seyyathāpi paṅguḷo dolāya kīḷataṃ mātāputtānaṃ dolaṃ
anya-e0101n:1666_1: khipitvā tattheva dolāthambhamūle nisinno kamena āgacchantassa ca gacchantassa ca
anya-e0101n:1666_2: dolāphalakassa ubho koṭiyo majjhañca passati, na ca ubhokoṭimajjhānaṃ dassanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1666_3: byāvaṭo hoti, evamevāyaṃ bhikkhu sativasena upanibandhanathambhamūle ṭhatvā assāsapassāsadolaṃ
anya-e0101n:1666_4: khipitvā tattheva nimitte satiyā nisīdanto kamena āgacchantānañca gacchantānañca
anya-e0101n:1666_5: phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne assāsapassāsānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchanto tattha ca
anya-e0101n:1666_6: cittaṃ ṭhapento passati, na ca tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ byāvaṭo hoti, ayaṃ paṅguḷopamā.
anya-e0101n:1667_0: 226. Ayaṃ pana dovārikūpamā – seyyathāpi dovāriko nagarassa anto ca bahi ca purise
anya-e0101n:1667_1: “ko tvaṃ, kuto vā āgato, kuhiṃ vā gacchasi, kiṃ vā te hatthe”ti na vīmaṃsati. Na
anya-e0101n:1667_2: hi tassa te bhārā, dvārappattaṃ dvārappattaṃyeva pana vīmaṃsati, evameva imassa bhikkhuno
anya-e0101n:1667_3: antopaviṭṭhavātā ca bahinikkhantavātā ca na bhārā honti, dvārappattā dvārappattāyeva
anya-e0101n:1668: 227. Kakacūpamā pana ādito paṭṭhāya evaṃ veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:1670: Ajānato ca tayo dhamme, bhāvanā nupalabbhati.
anya-e0101n:1672: Jānato ca tayo dhamme, bhāvanā upalabbhatī”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:1673_0: “Kathaṃ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇā na honti, na cime tayo dhammā aviditā
anya-e0101n:1673_1: honti, na ca cittaṃ vikkhepaṃ gacchati, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti,
anya-e0101n:1673_2: visesamadhi gacchati? Seyyathāpi rukkho same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto, tamenaṃ puriso
anya-e0101n:1673_3: kakacena chindeyya. Rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā
anya-e0101n:1673_4: hoti, na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti, na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā
anya-e0101n:1673_5: aviditā honti, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti, visesamadhigacchati.
anya-e0101n:1674_0: “Yathā rukkho same bhūmibhāge nikkhitto, evaṃ upanibandhanānimittaṃ. Yathā kakacadantā,
anya-e0101n:1674_1: evaṃ assāsapassāsā. Yathā rukkhe phuṭṭhakakacadantānaṃ vasena purisassa sati upaṭṭhitā
anya-e0101n:1674_2: hoti, na āgate vā gate vā kakacadante manasi karoti, na āgatā vā gatā vā kakacadantā
anya-e0101n:1674_3: aviditā honti, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti, visesamadhigacchati, evameva
anya-e0101n:1674_4: bhikkhu nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisinno hoti, na āgate vā
anya-e0101n:1674_5: gate vā assāsapassāse manasi karoti, na ca āgatā vā gatā vā assāsapassāsā aviditā
anya-e0101n:1674_6: honti, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca sādheti, visesamadhigacchati.
anya-e0101n:1675_0: “Padhānanti katamaṃ padhānaṃ? Āraddhavīriyassa kāyopi cittampi kammaniyaṃ hoti, idaṃ
anya-e0101n:1675_1: padhānaṃ. Katamo payogo? Āraddhavīriyassa upakkilesā pahīyanti, vitakkā vūpasamanti,
anya-e0101n:1675_2: ayaṃ payogo. Katamo viseso? Āraddhavīriyassa saṃyojanā pahīyanti, anusayā byantī
anya-e0101n:1675_3: honti, ayaṃ viseso. Evaṃ ime tayo dhammā ekacittassa ārammaṇā na honti, na cime tayo
anya-e0101n:1675_4: dhammā aviditā honti, na ca cittaṃ vikkhepaṃ gacchati, padhānañca paññāyati, payogañca
anya-e0101n:1678: So imaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. ;
anya-e0101n:1679: Ayaṃ kakacūpamā. Idha panassa āgatāgatavasena amanasikāramattameva payojananti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1680_0: 228. Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaroto kassaci na cireneva nimittañca uppajjati, avasesajhānaṅgapaṭimaṇḍitā
anya-e0101n:1680_1: appanāsaṅkhātā ṭhapanā ca sampajjati. Kassaci pana gaṇanāvaseneva manasikārakālato
anya-e0101n:1680_2: pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi
anya-e0101n:1680_3: cittampi lahukaṃ hoti, sarīraṃ ākāse laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hoti. Yathā sāraddhakāyassa
anya-e0101n:1680_4: mañce vā pīṭhe vā nisīdato mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati, vikūjati, paccattharaṇaṃ valiṃ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0101n:1680_5: Asāraddhakāyassa pana nisīdato neva mañcapīṭhaṃ onamati, na vikūjati, na paccattharaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1680_6: valiṃ gaṇhāti, tūlapicupūritaṃ viya mañcapīṭhaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā asāraddho kāyo
anya-e0101n:1680_7: lahuko hoti. Evameva gaṇanāvasena manasikārakālato pabhuti anukkamato oḷārikaassāsapassāsanirodhavasena
anya-e0101n:1680_8: kāyadarathe vūpasante kāyopi cittampi lahukaṃ hoti, sarīraṃ ākāse laṅghanākārappattaṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0101n:1681_0: Tassa oḷārike assāsapassāse niruddhe sukhumassāsapassāsanimittārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavattati.
anya-e0101n:1681_1: Tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ sukhumataraṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0101n:1681_2: Kathaṃ? Yathā puriso mahatiyā lohasalākāya kaṃsathālaṃ ākoṭeyya, ekappahārena mahāsaddo
anya-e0101n:1681_3: uppajjeyya, tassa oḷārikasaddārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pavatteyya. Niruddhe oḷārike sadde
anya-e0101n:1681_4: atha pacchā sukhumasaddanimittārammaṇaṃ, tasmimpi niruddhe aparāparaṃ tato sukhumataraṃ
anya-e0101n:1681_5: sukhumataraṃ saddanimittārammaṇaṃ pavattateva, evanti veditabbaṃ. Vuttampicetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:1682_0: 229. Yathā hi aññāni kammaṭṭhānāni uparūpari vibhūtāni honti, na tathā idaṃ. Idaṃ
anya-e0101n:1682_1: pana uparūpari bhāventassa sukhumattaṃ gacchati, upaṭṭhānampi na upagacchati, evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1682_2: anupaṭṭhahante pana tasmiṃ tena bhikkhunā uṭṭhāyāsanā cammakhaṇḍaṃ papphoṭetvā na
anya-e0101n:1682_3: gantabbaṃ. Kiṃ kātabbaṃ? “Ācariyaṃ pucchissāmī”ti vā, “naṭṭhaṃ dāni me kammaṭṭhāna”nti
anya-e0101n:1682_4: vā na vuṭṭhātabbaṃ. Iriyāpathaṃ vikopetvā gacchato hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ navanavameva hoti.
anya-e0101n:1683_0: Tatrāyaṃ āharaṇūpāyo, tena hi bhikkhunā kammaṭṭhānassa anupaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ñatvā iti
anya-e0101n:1683_1: paṭisañcikkhitabbaṃ, ime assāsapassāsā nāma kattha atthi, kattha natthi. Kassa vā
anya-e0101n:1683_2: atthi, kassa vā natthīti. Athevaṃ paṭisañcikkhatā ime antomātukucchiyaṃ natthi, udake
anya-e0101n:1683_3: nimuggānaṃ natthi, tathā asaññībhūtānaṃ, matānaṃ, catutthajjhānasamāpannānaṃ, rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgīnaṃ,
anya-e0101n:1683_4: nirodhasamāpannānanti ñatvā evaṃ attanāva attā paṭicodetabbo “nanu tvaṃ, paṇḍita,
anya-e0101n:1683_5: neva mātukucchigato, na udake nimuggo, na asaññībhūto, na mato, na catutthajjhānasamāpanno,
anya-e0101n:1683_6: na rūpārūpabhavasamaṅgī, na nirodhasamāpanno. Atthiyeva te assāsapassāsā, mandapaññatāya
anya-e0101n:1683_7: pana pariggahetuṃ na sakkosī”ti. Athānena pakatiphuṭṭhavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetvā manasikāro
anya-e0101n:1683_8: pavattetabbo. Ime hi dīghanāsikassa nāsāpuṭaṃ ghaṭṭentā pavattanti. Rassanāsikassa
anya-e0101n:1683_9: uttaroṭṭhaṃ. Tasmānena imaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ ghaṭṭentīti nimittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Imameva
anya-e0101n:1683_10: hi atthavasaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, muṭṭhasatissa asampajānassa
anya-e0101n:1684_0: 230. Kiñcāpi hi yaṃkiñci kammaṭṭhānaṃ satassa sampajānasseva sampajjati. Ito aññaṃ
anya-e0101n:1684_1: pana manasikarontassa pākaṭaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pana ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ garukaṃ garukabhāvanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1684_3: ittaraṃ, na ca ittarasattasamāsevitaṃ. Yathā yathā manasi karīyati, tathā tathā santañceva
anya-e0101n:1684_4: hoti sukhumañca. Tasmā ettha balavatī sati ca paññā ca icchitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1685_0: Yathā hi maṭṭhasāṭakassa tunnakaraṇakāle sūcipi sukhumā icchitabbā. Sūcipāsavedhanampi
anya-e0101n:1685_1: tato sukhumataraṃ, evameva maṭṭhasāṭakasadisassa imassa kammaṭṭhānassa bhāvanākāle
anya-e0101n:1685_2: sūcipaṭibhāgā satipi, sūcipāsavedhanapaṭibhāgā taṃsampayuttā paññāpi balavatī icchitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1685_3: Tāhi ca pana satipaññāhi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0101n:1686_0: Yathā pana kassako kasiṃ kasitvā balībadde muñcitvā gocaramukhe katvā chāyāya nisinno
anya-e0101n:1686_1: vissameyya, athassa te balībaddā vegena aṭaviṃ paviseyyuṃ. Yo hoti cheko kassako,
anya-e0101n:1686_2: so puna te gahetvā yojetukāmo na tesaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā aṭaviṃ āhiṇḍahi, atha kho
anya-e0101n:1686_3: rasmiñca patodañca gahetvā ujukameva tesaṃ nipātanatitthaṃ gantvā nisīdati vā nipajjati
anya-e0101n:1686_4: vā, atha te goṇe divasabhāgaṃ caritvā nipātanatitthaṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā
anya-e0101n:1686_5: ca paccuttaritvā ṭhite disvā rasmiyā bandhitvā patodena vijjhanto ānetvā yojetvā
anya-e0101n:1686_6: puna kammaṃ karoti, evameva tena bhikkhunā na te assāsapassāsā aññatra pakatiphuṭṭhokāsā
anya-e0101n:1686_7: pariyesitabbā. Satirasmiṃ pana paññāpatodañca gahetvā pakatiphuṭṭhokāse cittaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0101n:1686_8: manasikāro pavattetabbo. Evañhissa manasikaroto na cirasseva te upaṭṭhahanti nipātanatitthe
anya-e0101n:1686_9: viya goṇā. Tatonena satirasmiyā bandhitvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne yojetvā paññāpatodena
anya-e0101n:1687_0: 231. Tassevamanuyuñjato na cirasseva nimittaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Taṃ panetaṃ na sabbesaṃ
anya-e0101n:1687_1: ekasadisaṃ hoti. Apica kho kassaci sukhasamphassaṃ uppādayamāno tūlapicu viya kappāsapicu
anya-e0101n:1687_2: viya vātadhārā viya ca upaṭṭhātīti ekacce āhu.
anya-e0101n:1688_0: Ayaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsu vinicchayo, idañhi kassaci tārakarūpaṃ viya maṇiguḷikā viya
anya-e0101n:1688_1: muttāguḷikā viya ca, kassaci kharasamphassaṃ hutvā kappāsaṭṭhi viya dārusārasūci
anya-e0101n:1688_2: viya ca, kassaci dīghapāmaṅgasuttaṃ viya kusumadāmaṃ viya dhūmasikhā viya ca, kassaci
anya-e0101n:1688_3: vitthataṃ makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya valāhakapaṭalaṃ viya padumapupphaṃ viya rathacakkaṃ
anya-e0101n:1688_4: viya candamaṇḍalaṃ viya sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhāti. Tañca panetaṃ yathā sambahulesu
anya-e0101n:1688_5: bhikkhūsu suttantaṃ sajjhāyitvā nisinnesu ekena bhikkhunā “tumhākaṃ kīdisaṃ hutvā
anya-e0101n:1688_6: idaṃ suttaṃ upaṭṭhātī”ti vutte eko “mayhaṃ mahatī pabbateyyā nadī viya hutvā upaṭṭhātī”ti
anya-e0101n:1688_7: āha. Aparo “mayhaṃ ekā vanarāji viya”. Añño “mayhaṃ eko sītacchāyo sākhāsampanno
anya-e0101n:1688_8: phalabhārabharitarukkho viyā”ti. Tesaṃ hi taṃ ekameva suttaṃ saññānānatāya nānato
anya-e0101n:1688_9: upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ekameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhāti. Saññajañhi etaṃ
anya-e0101n:1688_10: saññānidānaṃ saññāpabhavaṃ. Tasmā saññānānatāya nānato upaṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1689_0: Ettha ca aññameva assāsārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ, aññaṃ passāsārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1689_1: Yassa hi ime tayo dhammā natthi, tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ neva appanaṃ, na upacāraṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:1689_2: Yassa pana ime tayo dhammā atthi, tasseva kammaṭṭhānaṃ upacārañca appanañca pāpuṇāti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
anya-e0101n:1694_0: 232. Evaṃ upaṭṭhite pana nimitte tena bhikkhunā ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocetabbaṃ
anya-e0101n:1694_1: “mayhaṃ, bhante, evarūpaṃ nāma upaṭṭhātī”ti. Ācariyena pana etaṃ nimittanti vā na
anya-e0101n:1694_2: vā nimittanti na vattabbaṃ. “Evaṃ hoti, āvuso”ti vatvā punappunaṃ manasi karohīti
anya-e0101n:1694_3: vattabbo. Nimittanti hi vutte vosānaṃ āpajjeyya. Na nimittanti vutte nirāso visīdeyya.
anya-e0101n:1694_4: Tasmā tadubhayampi avatvā manasikāreyeva niyojetabboti. Evaṃ tāva dīghabhāṇakā.
anya-e0101n:1695_0: Majjhimabhāṇakā panāhu “nimittamidaṃ, āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṃ punappunaṃ manasi karohi
anya-e0101n:1695_1: sappurisāti vattabbo”ti. Athānena nimitteyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Evamassāyaṃ ito
anya-e0101n:1695_2: pabhuti ṭhapanāvasena bhāvanā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi –
anya-e0101n:1698_0: Tassevaṃ nimittupaṭṭhānato pabhuti nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva.
anya-e0101n:1698_1: Sati upaṭṭhitāyeva. Cittaṃ upacārasamādhinā samāhitameva. Athānena taṃ nimittaṃ neva
anya-e0101n:1698_2: vaṇṇato manasi kātabbaṃ, na lakkhaṇato paccavekkhitabbaṃ. Apica kho khattiyamahesiyā
anya-e0101n:1698_3: cakkavattigabbho viya kassakena sāliyavagabbho viya ca āvāsādīni satta asappāyāni
anya-e0101n:1698_4: vajjetvā tāneva satta sappāyāni sevantena sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ. Atha naṃ evaṃ rakkhitvā
anya-e0101n:1698_5: punappunaṃ manasikāravasena vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ gamayitvā dasavidhaṃ appanākosallaṃ
anya-e0101n:1698_6: sampādetabbaṃ, vīriyasamatā yojetabbā. Tassevaṃ ghaṭentassa pathavīkasiṇe vuttānukkameneva
anya-e0101n:1699_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pārisuddhiṃ pattukāmo tadeva jhānaṃ pañcahākārehi vasippattaṃ
anya-e0101n:1699_2: paguṇaṃ katvā nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapeti. Kathaṃ? So hi samāpattito
anya-e0101n:1699_3: vuṭṭhāya assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti passati. Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā
anya-e0101n:1699_4: dhamamānāya bhastañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca vāto sañcarati, evameva
anya-e0101n:1699_5: kāyañca cittañca paṭicca assāsapassāsāti. Tato assāsapassāse ca kāyañca rūpanti cittañca
anya-e0101n:1699_6: taṃsampayuttadhamme ca arūpanti vavatthapeti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana
anya-e0101n:1700_0: Evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā tassa paccayaṃ pariyesati. Pariyesanto ca naṃ disvā
anya-e0101n:1700_1: tīsupi addhāsu nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ ārabbha kaṅkhaṃ vitarati. Vitiṇṇakaṅkho kalāpasammasanavasena
anya-e0101n:1700_2: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā udayabbayānupassanāya pubbabhāge uppanne obhāsādayo dasa vipassanupakkilese
anya-e0101n:1700_3: pahāya upakkilesavimuttaṃ paṭipadāñāṇaṃ maggoti vavatthapetvā udayaṃ pahāya bhaṅgānupassanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1700_4: patvā nirantaraṃ bhaṅgānupassanena vayato upaṭṭhitesu sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindanto
anya-e0101n:1700_5: virajjanto vimuccanto yathākkamena cattāro ariyamagge pāpuṇitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhāya
anya-e0101n:1700_6: ekūnavīsatibhedassa paccavekkhaṇāñāṇassa pariyantaṃ patto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
anya-e0101n:1701: Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā samattā hotīti ayaṃ sabbākārato paṭhamacatukkavaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:1702: 234. Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi. Tasmā anupadavaṇṇanānayeneva tesaṃ evaṃ attho veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1703: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati. Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
anya-e0101n:1704_0: Kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati. Tassa
anya-e0101n:1704_1: samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, ārammaṇassa
anya-e0101n:1704_2: paṭisaṃviditattā. Kathaṃ asammohato? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0101n:1704_3: pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati. Tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena asammohato
anya-e0101n:1705_0: “Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.
anya-e0101n:1705_1: Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Dīghaṃ passāsavasena… rassaṃ
anya-e0101n:1705_2: assāsavasena… rassaṃ passāsavasena… sabbakāyapaṭisaṃvedī assāsapassāsavasena… passambhayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1705_3: kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assāsapassāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā
anya-e0101n:1705_4: hoti. Tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Āvajjato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā
anya-e0101n:1705_5: hoti. Jānato passato paccavekkhato cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahato saddhāya adhimuccato vīriyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1705_6: paggaṇhato satiṃ upaṭṭhāpayato cittaṃ samādahato paññāya pajānato abhiññeyyaṃ pariññeyyaṃ
anya-e0101n:1705_7: pahātabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaroto sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1706_0: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbāni. Idampanettha visesamattaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:1706_1: jhānānaṃ vasena sukhapaṭisaṃveditā, catunnampi vasena cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā
anya-e0101n:1706_2: veditabbā. Cittasaṅkhāroti vedanādayo dve khandhā. Sukhapaṭisaṃvedīpade cettha vipassanābhūmidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1706_3: “sukhanti dve sukhāni kāyikañca sukhaṃ cetasikañcā”ti paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Passambhayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1706_4: cittasaṅkhāranti oḷārikaṃ oḷārikaṃ cittasaṅkhāraṃ passambhento, nirodhentoti attho.
anya-e0101n:1707_0: Apicettha pītipade pītisīsena vedanā vuttā. Sukhapade sarūpeneva vedanā. Dvīsu cittasaṅkhārapadesu
anya-e0101n:1707_1: “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato
anya-e0101n:1707_2: saññāsampayuttā vedanāti evaṃ vedanānupassanānayena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1708_0: 235. Tatiyacatukkepi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena cittapaṭisaṃveditā veditabbā. Abhippamodayaṃ
anya-e0101n:1708_1: cittanti cittaṃ modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati.
anya-e0101n:1708_2: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
anya-e0101n:1709_0: Kathaṃ samādhivasena? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati. So samāpattikkhaṇe sampayuttapītiyā
anya-e0101n:1709_1: cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti. Kathaṃ vipassanāvasena? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā
anya-e0101n:1709_2: vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttapītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati. Evaṃ vipassanākkhaṇe jhānasampayuttaṃ
anya-e0101n:1709_3: pītiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittaṃ āmodeti pamodeti. Evaṃ paṭipanno “abhippamodayaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0101n:1710_0: Samādahaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānādivasena ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento.
anya-e0101n:1710_1: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato
anya-e0101n:1710_2: sampassato vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena uppajjati khaṇikacittekaggatā. Evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1710_3: uppannāya khaṇikacittekaggatāya vasenapi ārammaṇe cittaṃ samaṃ ādahanto samaṃ ṭhapento
anya-e0101n:1711_0: Vimocayaṃ cittanti paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento, dutiyena
anya-e0101n:1711_1: vitakkavicārehi, tatiyena pītiyā, catutthena sukhadukkhehi cittaṃ mocento vimocento.
anya-e0101n:1711_2: Tāni vā pana jhānāni samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ khayato vayato
anya-e0101n:1711_3: sammasati. So vipassanākkhaṇe aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāto cittaṃ mocento, dukkhānupassanāya
anya-e0101n:1711_4: sukhasaññāto, anattānupassanāya attasaññāto, nibbidānupassanāya nandito, virāgānupassanāya
anya-e0101n:1711_5: rāgato, nirodhānupassanāya samudayato, paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādānato cittaṃ mocento
anya-e0101n:1711_6: assasati ceva passasati ca. Tena vuccati “vimocayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmi passasissāmīti
anya-e0101n:1711_7: sikkhatī”ti. Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1712: 236. Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ. Aniccatā veditabbā. Aniccānupassanā veditabbā. Aniccānupassī veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1713_0: Tattha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā. Aniccatāti tesaṃyeva
anya-e0101n:1713_1: uppādavayaññathattaṃ, hutvā abhāvo vā, nibbattānaṃ tenevākārena aṭṭhatvā khaṇabhaṅgena
anya-e0101n:1713_2: bhedoti attho. Aniccānupassanāti tassā aniccatāya vasena rūpādīsu aniccanti anupassanā.
anya-e0101n:1713_3: Aniccānupassīti tāya anupassanāya samannāgato. Tasmā evaṃbhūto assasanto passasanto
anya-e0101n:1713_4: ca idha “aniccānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1714_0: Virāgānupassīti ettha pana dve virāgā khayavirāgo ca accantavirāgo ca. Tattha khayavirāgoti
anya-e0101n:1714_1: saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgo. Accantavirāgoti nibbānaṃ. Virāgānupassanāti tadubhayadassanavasena
anya-e0101n:1714_2: pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca. Tāya duvidhāyapi anupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto
anya-e0101n:1714_3: passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo. Nirodhānupassīpadepi eseva nayo.
anya-e0101n:1715_0: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo
anya-e0101n:1715_1: ca. Paṭinissaggoyeva anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Vipassanāmaggānaṃ etamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1716_0: Vipassanā hi tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati, saṅkhatadosadassanena
anya-e0101n:1716_1: ca tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggoti
anya-e0101n:1716_2: ca vuccati. Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
anya-e0101n:1716_3: ārammaṇakaraṇena ca nibbāne pakkhandatīti pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggoti
anya-e0101n:1716_4: ca vuccati. Ubhayampi pana purimapurimaññāṇānaṃ anuanupassanato anupassanāti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1716_5: Tāya duvidhāyapi paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto passasanto ca
anya-e0101n:1717_0: Idaṃ catutthacatukkaṃ suddhavipassanāvaseneva vuttaṃ. Purimāni pana tīṇi samathavipassanāvasena.
anya-e0101n:1717_1: Evaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasavatthukāya ānāpānassatiyā bhāvanā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1717_2: Evaṃ soḷasavatthuvasena ca pana ayaṃ ānāpānassati mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā.
anya-e0101n:1718_0: 237. Tatrassa “ayampi kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato santo
anya-e0101n:1718_1: ceva paṇīto cā”tiādivacanato santabhāvādivasenāpi mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā, vitakkupacchedasamatthatāyapi.
anya-e0101n:1718_3: ito cito ca cittassa vidhāvanaṃ vicchinditvā ānāpānārammaṇābhimukhameva cittaṃ karoti.
anya-e0101n:1719_0: Vijjāvimuttipāripūriyā mūlabhāvenāpi cassā mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0101n:1719_1: – “ānāpānassati, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūreti, cattāro
anya-e0101n:1719_2: satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti, satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā
anya-e0101n:1720_0: Apica carimakānaṃ assāsapassāsānaṃ viditabhāvakaraṇatopissā mahānisaṃsatā veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:1720_1: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “evaṃ bhāvitāya kho, rāhula, ānāpānassatiyā evaṃ bahulīkatāya
anya-e0101n:1720_2: yepi te carimakā assāsapassāsā, tepi viditāva nirujjhanti, no aviditā”ti.
anya-e0101n:1721_0: 238. Tattha nirodhavasena tayo carimakā bhavacarimakā, jhānacarimakā, cuticarimakāti.
anya-e0101n:1721_1: Bhavesu hi kāmabhave assāsapassāsā pavattanti, rūpārūpabhavesu nappavattanti, tasmā
anya-e0101n:1721_2: te bhavacarimakā. Jhānesu purime jhānattaye pavattanti, catutthe nappavattanti, tasmā
anya-e0101n:1721_3: te jhānacarimakā. Ye pana cuticittassa purato soḷasamena cittena saddhiṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0101n:1721_4: cuticittena saha nirujjhanti, ime cuticarimakā nāma. Ime idha “carimakā”ti adhippetā.
anya-e0101n:1722_0: Imaṃ kira kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno ānāpānārammaṇassa suṭṭhu pariggahitattā
anya-e0101n:1722_1: cuticittassa purato soḷasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppādaṃ āvajjayato uppādopi
anya-e0101n:1722_2: nesaṃ pākaṭo hoti. Ṭhitiṃ āvajjayato ṭhitipi nesaṃ pākaṭā hoti. Bhaṅgaṃ āvajjayato
anya-e0101n:1723_0: Ito aññaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ pattassa bhikkhuno hi āyuantaraṃ paricchinnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1723_1: vā hoti aparicchinnaṃ vā. Idaṃ pana soḷasavatthukaṃ ānāpānassatiṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ
anya-e0101n:1723_2: pattassa āyuantaraṃ paricchinnameva hoti. So “ettakaṃ dāni me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissanti,
anya-e0101n:1723_3: na ito para”nti ñatvā attano dhammatāya eva sarīrapaṭijaggananivāsanapārupanādīni
anya-e0101n:1723_4: sabbakiccāni katvā akkhīni nimīleti koṭapabbatavihāravāsītissatthero viya mahākarañjiyavihāravāsīmahātissatthero
anya-e0101n:1723_5: viya devaputtamahāraṭṭhe piṇḍapātikatissatthero viya cittalapabbatavihāravāsino dve
anya-e0101n:1724_0: Tatridaṃ ekavatthuparidīpanaṃ. Dvebhātiyattherānaṃ kireko puṇṇamuposathadivase pātimokkhaṃ
anya-e0101n:1724_1: osāretvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā caṅkame ṭhito candālokaṃ
anya-e0101n:1724_2: oloketvā attano āyusaṅkhāre upadhāretvā bhikkhusaṅghamāha – “tumhehi kathaṃ parinibbāyantā
anya-e0101n:1724_3: bhikkhū diṭṭhapubbā”ti. Tatra keci āhaṃsu “amhehi āsane nisinnakāva parinibbāyantā
anya-e0101n:1724_4: diṭṭhapubbā”ti. Keci “amhehi ākāse pallaṅkamābhujitvā nisinnakā”ti. Thero āha – “ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:1724_5: dāni vo caṅkamantameva parinibbāyamānaṃ dassessāmī”ti tato caṅkame lekhaṃ katvā “ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:1724_6: ito caṅkamakoṭito parakoṭiṃ gantvā nivattamāno imaṃ lekhaṃ patvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:1724_7: vatvā caṅkamaṃ oruyha parabhāgaṃ gantvā nivattamāno ekena pādena lekhaṃ akkantakkhaṇeyeva parinibbāyi.
anya-e0101n:1729_0: 239. Ānāpānassatiyā anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ pana upasamānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmena rahogatena
anya-e0101n:1729_1: paṭisallīnena – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā virāgo tesaṃ
anya-e0101n:1729_2: dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ madanimmadano pipāsavinayo ālayasamugghāto vaṭṭupacchedo
anya-e0101n:1729_3: taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna”nti evaṃ sabbadukkhūpasamasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa guṇā anussaritabbā.
anya-e0101n:1730_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakā. Dhammāti sabhāvā. Saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vāti saṅgamma samāgamma
anya-e0101n:1730_1: paccayehi katā vā akatā vā. Virāgo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatīti tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1730_2: virāgo aggamakkhāyati seṭṭho uttamoti vuccati. Tattha virāgoti na rāgābhāvamattameva,
anya-e0101n:1730_3: atha kho yadidaṃ madanimmadano…pe… nibbānanti yo so madanimmadanotiādīni nāmāni asaṅkhatadhammo
anya-e0101n:1730_4: labhati, so virāgoti paccetabbo. So hi yasmā tamāgamma sabbepi mānamadapurisamadādayo
anya-e0101n:1730_5: madā nimmadā amadā honti vinassanti, tasmā madanimmadanoti vuccati. Yasmā ca tamāgamma
anya-e0101n:1730_6: sabbāpi kāmapipāsā vinayaṃ abbhatthaṃ yāti, tasmā pipāsavinayoti vuccati. Yasmā pana
anya-e0101n:1730_7: tamāgamma pañcakāmaguṇālayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti, tasmā ālayasamugghātoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1730_8: Yasmā ca tamāgamma tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ upacchijjati, tasmā vaṭṭupacchedoti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:1730_9: Yasmā pana tamāgamma sabbaso taṇhā khayaṃ gacchati virajjati nirujjhati ca, tasmā
anya-e0101n:1730_10: taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodhoti vuccati. Yasmā panesa catasso yoniyo pañca gatiyo satta
anya-e0101n:1730_11: viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nava ca sattāvāse aparāparabhāvāya vinanato ābandhanato saṃsibbanato
anya-e0101n:1730_12: vānanti laddhavohārāya taṇhāya nikkhanto nissaṭo visaṃyutto, tasmā nibbānanti vuccatīti.
anya-e0101n:1731_0: Evametesaṃ madanimmadanatādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ vasena nibbānasaṅkhāto upasamo anussaritabbo.
anya-e0101n:1731_1: Ye vā panaññepi bhagavatā – “asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi… saccañca… pārañca…
anya-e0101n:1731_2: sududdasañca… ajarañca… dhuvañca… nippapañcañca… amatañca… sivañca… khemañca… abbhutañca…
anya-e0101n:1731_3: anītikañca… abyābajjhañca… visuddhiñca… dīpañca… tāṇañca … leṇañca vo, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:1731_4: desessāmī”tiādīsu suttesu upasamaguṇā vuttā, tesampi vasena anussaritabboyeva.
anya-e0101n:1732_0: Tassevaṃ madanimmadanatādiguṇavasena upasamaṃ anussarato neva tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:1732_1: cittaṃ hoti, na dosa… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0101n:1732_2: cittaṃ hoti upasamaṃ ārabbhāti buddhānussatiādīsu vuttanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa
anya-e0101n:1732_3: ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Upasamaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n:1732_4: vā appanaṃ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṃ hoti. Tadetamupasamaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n:1733_0: Cha anussatiyo viya ca ayampi ariyasāvakasseva ijjhati, evaṃ santepi upasamagarukena
anya-e0101n:1733_1: puthujjanenāpi manasi kātabbā. Sutavasenāpi hi upasame cittaṃ pasīdati. Imañca pana
anya-e0101n:1733_2: upasamānussatiṃ anuyutto bhikkhu sukhaṃ supati, sukhaṃ paṭibujjhati, santindriyo
anya-e0101n:1733_3: hoti santamānaso hirottappasamannāgato pāsādiko paṇītādhimuttiko sabrahmacārīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:1733_4: garu ca bhāvanīyo ca. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n:1743_0: 240. Anussatikammaṭṭhānānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhesu pana mettā, karuṇā, muditā, upekkhāti
anya-e0101n:1743_1: imesu catūsu brahmavihāresu mettaṃ bhāvetukāmena tāva ādikammikena yogāvacarena upacchinnapalibodhena
anya-e0101n:1743_2: gahitakammaṭṭhānena bhattakiccaṃ katvā bhattasammadaṃ paṭivinodetvā vivitte padese
anya-e0101n:1743_3: supaññatte āsane sukhanisinnena ādito tāva dose ādīnavo, khantiyañca ānisaṃso paccavekkhitabbo.
anya-e0101n:1744_0: Kasmā? Imāya hi bhāvanāya doso pahātabbo, khanti adhigantabbā. Na ca sakkā kiñci
anya-e0101n:1744_1: adiṭṭhādīnavaṃ pahātuṃ, aviditānisaṃsaṃ vā adhigantuṃ. Tasmā “duṭṭho kho, āvuso,
anya-e0101n:1744_2: dosena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto pāṇampi hanatī”tiādīnaṃ vasena dose ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0101n:1745: “Khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā”; ;
anya-e0101n:1747: “Khantā bhiyyo na vijjatī”tiādīnaṃ vasena khantiyaṃ ānisaṃso veditabbo.
anya-e0101n:1748_0: Athevaṃ diṭṭhādīnavato dosato cittaṃ vivecanatthāya, viditānisaṃsāya ca khantiyā
anya-e0101n:1748_1: saṃyojanatthāya mettābhāvanā ārabhitabbā. Ārabhantena ca āditova puggalabhedo jānitabbo
anya-e0101n:1748_2: “imesu puggalesu mettā paṭhamaṃ na bhāvetabbā, imesu neva bhāvetabbā”ti.
anya-e0101n:1749_0: Ayañhi mettā appiyapuggale, atippiyasahāyake, majjhatte, verīpuggaleti imesu catūsu
anya-e0101n:1749_1: paṭhamaṃ na bhāvetabbā. Liṅgavisabhāge odhiso na bhāvetabbā. Kālakate na bhāvetabbāva.
anya-e0101n:1749_2: Kiṃkāraṇā appiyādīsu paṭhamaṃ na bhāvetabbā? Appiyaṃ hi piyaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamati.
anya-e0101n:1749_3: Atippiyasahāyakaṃ majjhattaṭṭhāne ṭhapento kilamati, appamattakepi cassa dukkhe uppanne
anya-e0101n:1749_4: ārodanākārappatto viya hoti. Majjhattaṃ garuṭṭhāne ca piyaṭṭhāne ca ṭhapento kilamati.
anya-e0101n:1749_5: Verimanussarato kodho uppajjati, tasmā appiyādīsu paṭhamaṃ na bhāvetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1750_0: Liṅgavisabhāge pana tameva ārabbha odhiso bhāventassa rāgo uppajjati. Aññataro kira
anya-e0101n:1750_1: amaccaputto kulūpakattheraṃ pucchi “bhante, kassa mettā bhāvetabbā”ti? Thero “piyapuggale”ti
anya-e0101n:1750_2: āha. Tassa attano bhariyā piyā hoti. So tassā mettaṃ bhāvento sabbarattiṃ bhittiyuddhamakāsi.
anya-e0101n:1751_0: Kālakate pana bhāvento neva appanaṃ, na upacāraṃ pāpuṇāti. Aññataro kira daharabhikkhu
anya-e0101n:1751_1: ācariyaṃ ārabbha mettaṃ ārabhi. Tassa mettā nappavattati. So mahātherassa santikaṃ
anya-e0101n:1751_2: gantvā “bhante, paguṇāva me mettājhānasamāpatti, na ca naṃ samāpajjituṃ sakkomi,
anya-e0101n:1751_3: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āha. Thero “nimittaṃ, āvuso, gavesāhī”ti āha. So gavesanto
anya-e0101n:1751_4: ācariyassa matabhāvaṃ ñatvā aññaṃ ārabbha mettāyanto samāpattiṃ appesi. Tasmā kālakate na bhāvetabbāva.
anya-e0101n:1752: 241. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ pana “ahaṃ sukhito homi niddukkho”ti vā, “avero abyāpajjo anīgho sukhī attānaṃ pariharāmī”ti vā evaṃ punappunaṃ attaniyeva bhāvetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1754: “Kathañca bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati? Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṃ puggalaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ disvā mettāyeyya, evameva sabbe satte mettāya pharatī”ti.
anya-e0101n:1756_0: “Katamehi pañcahākārehi anodhisopharaṇā mettā cetovimutti bhāvetabbā, sabbe sattā
anya-e0101n:1756_1: averā hontu” abyāpajjā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantu. Sabbe pāṇā… sabbe bhūtā…
anya-e0101n:1756_2: sabbe puggalā… sabbe attabhāvapariyāpannā averā abyāpajjā anīghā sukhī attānaṃ pariharantū”tiādi –
anya-e0101n:1760: Vuttaṃ, taṃ virujjhati. Na hi tattha attani bhāvanā vuttāti ce. Tañca na virujjhati. Kasmā? Tañhi appanāvasena vuttaṃ. Idaṃ sakkhibhāvavasena.
anya-e0101n:1761_0: Sacepi hi vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ vā “ahaṃ sukhito homī”tiādinā nayena attani mettaṃ
anya-e0101n:1761_1: bhāveti, nevassa appanā uppajjati. “Ahaṃ sukhito homī”ti bhāvayato pana yathā ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:1761_2: sukhakāmo dukkhapaṭikkūlo jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo ca, evaṃ aññepi sattāti attānaṃ
anya-e0101n:1761_3: sakkhiṃ katvā aññasattesu hitasukhakāmatā uppajjati. Bhagavatāpi –
anya-e0101n:1767_0: 242. Tasmā sakkhibhāvatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ attānaṃ mettāya pharitvā tadanantaraṃ sukhappavattanatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1767_1: yvāyaṃ piyo manāpo garu bhāvanīyo ācariyo vā ācariyamatto vā upajjhāyo vā upajjhāyamatto
anya-e0101n:1767_2: vā tassa dānapiyavacanādīni piyamanāpattakāraṇāni sīlasutādīni garubhāvanīyattakāraṇāni
anya-e0101n:1767_3: ca anussaritvā “esa sappuriso sukhī hotu niddukkho”tiādinā nayena mettā bhāvetabbā.
anya-e0101n:1768_0: Evarūpe ca puggale kāmaṃ appanā sampajjati, iminā pana bhikkhunā tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0101n:1768_1: anāpajjitvā sīmāsambhedaṃ kattukāmena tadanantaraṃ atippiyasahāyake, atippiyasahāyakato
anya-e0101n:1768_2: majjhatte, majjhattato verīpuggale mettā bhāvetabbā. Bhāventena ca ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse
anya-e0101n:1768_3: muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1769_0: Yassa pana verīpuggalo vā natthi, mahāpurisajātikattā vā anatthaṃ karontepi pare
anya-e0101n:1769_1: verīsaññāva nuppajjati, tena “majjhatte me mettacittaṃ kammaniyaṃ jātaṃ, idāni naṃ
anya-e0101n:1769_2: verimhi upasaṃharāmī”ti byāpārova na kātabbo. Yassa pana atthi, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
anya-e0101n:1770_0: 243. Sace panassa verimhi cittamupasaṃharato tena katāparādhānussaraṇena paṭighamuppajjati,
anya-e0101n:1770_1: athānena purimapuggalesu yattha katthaci punappunaṃ mettaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahitvā
anya-e0101n:1770_2: punappunaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ mettāyantena paṭighaṃ vinodetabbaṃ. Sace evampi vāyamato na nibbāti, atha –
anya-e0101n:1773: Tañca kho iminā ākārena attānaṃ ovadanteneva “are kujjhanapurisa, nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
anya-e0101n:1774: ‘Ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatrāpi yo mano padoseyya. Na me so tena sāsanakaro’ti ca,
anya-e0101n:1778: Paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammatī’ti ca. ; –
anya-e0101n:1779_0: “‘Sattime, bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṃ āgacchanti itthiṃ
anya-e0101n:1779_1: vā purisaṃ vā. Katame satta? Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati aho
anya-e0101n:1779_2: vatāyaṃ dubbaṇṇo assāti. Taṃ kissahetu? Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya
anya-e0101n:1779_3: nandati. Kodhanāyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kiñcāpi so
anya-e0101n:1779_4: hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano, atha kho so dubbaṇṇova
anya-e0101n:1779_5: hoti kodhābhibhūto. Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ
anya-e0101n:1779_6: āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ
anya-e0101n:1779_7: icchati ahovatāyaṃ dukkhaṃ sayeyyāti…pe… na pacurattho assāti…pe… na bhogavā assāti…pe…
anya-e0101n:1779_8: na yasavā assāti…pe… na mittavā assāti…pe… na kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ
anya-e0101n:1779_9: saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyāti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamanena
anya-e0101n:1779_10: nandati. Kodhanāyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṃ
anya-e0101n:1779_11: carati, vācāya manasā duccaritaṃ carati. So kāyena vācāya manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā
anya-e0101n:1779_12: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati kodhābhibhūto’ti ca,
anya-e0101n:1780_0: “‘Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, chavālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ neva gāme kaṭṭhatthaṃ
anya-e0101n:1780_1: pharati, na araññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati. Tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmī’ti ca,

anya-e0101n:1942: Brahmuttamena kathite, brahmavihāre ime iti viditvā;
anya-e0101n:1944_0: Etāsu hi mettākaruṇāmuditāupekkhāsu atthato tāva mejjatīti mettā, siniyhatīti attho.

anya-e0101n:1944_4: vā tanti muditā. “Averā hontū”tiādibyāpārappahānena majjhattabhāvūpagamanena ca upekkhatīti upekkhā.
anya-e0101n:1945_0: 263. Lakkhaṇādito panettha hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā mettā, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā,

anya-e0101n:1945_5: sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā. Arativūpasamo tassā sampatti, pahāsasambhavo vipatti.
anya-e0101n:1945_6: Sattesu majjhattākārappavattilakkhaṇā upekkhā, sattesu samabhāvadassanarasā, paṭighānunayavūpasamapaccupaṭṭhānā,

anya-e0101n:1945_9: Paṭighānunayavūpasamo tassā sampatti, gehasitāya aññāṇupekkhāya sambhavo vipatti.

anya-e0101n:1956: 269. Kasmā ca catassovātiādi pañhassa pana idaṃ vissajjanaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1961_0: Etāsu hi yasmā mettā byāpādabahulassa, karuṇā vihesābahulassa, muditā aratibahulassa,

anya-e0101n:1961_4: yobbanasampattiyā ciraṭṭhitikāmā, sakakiccapasutassa kismiñci pariyāye abyāvaṭā hoti,

anya-e0101n:1962_0: Yasmā catassopetā bhāvetukāmena paṭhamaṃ hitākārappavattivasena sattesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,

anya-e0101n:1962_2: disvā vā sutvā vā sambhāvetvā vā dukkhāpanayanākārappavattivasena, dukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā

anya-e0101n:1962_4: sampattipamodanavasena, pamodanalakkhaṇā ca muditā. Tato paraṃ pana kattabbābhāvato
anya-e0101n:1962_6: ca upekkhā. Tasmā ito hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ paṭhamaṃ mettā vuttā, atha karuṇā muditā

anya-e0101n:1969_0: 271. Yo panevaṃ vadeyya “yasmā bhagavatā aṭṭhakanipāte catūsupi appamaññāsu avisesena
anya-e0101n:1969_1: vuttaṃ ‘tato tvaṃ bhikkhu imaṃ samādhiṃ savitakkampi savicāraṃ bhāveyyāsi, avitakkampi
anya-e0101n:1969_2: vicāramattaṃ bhāveyyāsi, avitakkampi avicāraṃ bhāveyyāsi, sappītikampi bhāveyyāsi,

anya-e0101n:1971_0: Iminā panassa ovādena niyakajjhattavasena cittekaggatāmatto mūlasamādhi vutto. Tato
anya-e0101n:1971_1: “ettakeneva santuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā evaṃ so eva samādhi vaḍḍhetabbo”ti dassetuṃ “yato
anya-e0101n:1971_2: kho te bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ, na cuppannā pāpakā akusalā
anya-e0101n:1971_3: dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti. Tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ mettā me cetovimutti
anya-e0101n:1971_4: bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānikatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhāti.
anya-e0101n:1971_5: Evañhi te bhikkhu sikkhitabba”nti evamassa mettāvasena bhāvanaṃ vatvā puna “yato
anya-e0101n:1971_6: kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato, tato tvaṃ bhikkhu imaṃ
anya-e0101n:1971_7: mūlasamādhiṃ savitakkampi savicāraṃ bhāveyyāsi…pe… upekkhāsahagatampi bhāveyyāsī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0101n:1972_0: Tassattho – yadā te bhikkhu ayaṃ mūlasamādhi evaṃ mettāvasena bhāvito hoti, tadā
anya-e0101n:1972_1: tvaṃ tāvatakenāpi tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvāva imaṃ mūlasamādhiṃ aññesupi ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānāni

anya-e0101n:2027_0: Santato ce manasi karoti, kathaṃ samatikkamo hotīti? Asamāpajjitukāmatāya. So hi
anya-e0101n:2027_1: kiñcāpi taṃ santato manasi karoti, atha khvassa “ahametaṃ āvajjissāmi, samāpajjissāmi,
anya-e0101n:2027_2: adhiṭṭhahissāmi, vuṭṭhahissāmi, paccavekkhissāmī”ti esa ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro
anya-e0101n:2027_3: na hoti. Kasmā? Ākiñcaññāyatanato nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa santatarapaṇītataratāya.
anya-e0101n:2028_0: Yathā hi rājā mahacca rājānubhāvena hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaravīthiyaṃ vicaranto
anya-e0101n:2028_1: dantakārādayo sippike ekaṃ vatthaṃ daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā ekena sīsaṃ veṭhetvā dantacuṇṇādīhi
anya-e0101n:2028_2: samokiṇṇagatte anekāni dantavikatiādīni sippāni karonte disvā “aho vata re chekā
anya-e0101n:2028_3: ācariyā īdisānipi nāma sippāni karissantī”ti evaṃ tesaṃ chekatāya tussati, na cassa
anya-e0101n:2028_4: evaṃ hoti “aho vatāhaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya”nti. Taṃ kissa hetu?
anya-e0101n:2028_5: Rajjasiriyā mahānisaṃsatāya. So sippino samatikkamitvāva gacchati. Evameva esa kiñcāpi
anya-e0101n:2028_6: taṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasi karoti, atha khvassa “ahametaṃ samāpattiṃ āvajjissāmi,
anya-e0101n:2028_7: samāpajjissāmi, adhiṭṭhahissāmi, vuṭṭhahissāmi, paccavekkhissāmī”ti neva esa ābhogo
anya-e0101n:2029_0: So taṃ santato manasikaronto pubbe vuttanayena taṃ paramasukhumaṃ appanāppattaṃ saññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2029_1: pāpuṇāti, yāya nevasaññīnāsaññī nāma hoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ bhāvetīti vuccati.
anya-e0101n:2030_0: 287. Idāni yaṃ taṃ evamadhigatāya saññāya vasena nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti vuccati,

anya-e0101n:2030_3: idha samāpannassa cittacetasikā dhammā adhippetā. Vacanattho panettha oḷārikāya saññāya

anya-e0101n:2030_8: Nevasaññānāsaññā ca sā sesadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanañcāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ.
