anya-e0101n:2031_1: phassopi nevaphassonāphasso. Esa nayo sesasampayuttadhammesu. Saññāsīsena panāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:2031_2: desanā katāti veditabbā. Pattamakkhanatelappabhutīhi ca upamāhi esa attho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0101n:2032_0: Sāmaṇero kira telena pattaṃ makkhetvā ṭhapesi, taṃ yāgupānakāle thero pattamāharāti
anya-e0101n:2032_1: āha. So “patte telamatthi, bhante”ti āha. Tato “āhara, sāmaṇera, telaṃ, nāḷiṃ pūressāmī”ti
anya-e0101n:2032_2: vutte “natthi, bhante, tela”nti āha. Tattha yathā antovutthattā yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:2032_3: “telamatthī”ti hoti. Nāḷipūraṇādīnaṃ vasena “natthī”ti hoti. Evaṃ sāpi saññā paṭusaññākiccaṃ
anya-e0101n:2032_4: kātuṃ asamatthatāya nevasaññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā nāsaññā hoti.
anya-e0101n:2033_0: Kiṃ panettha saññākiccanti? Ārammaṇasañjānanañceva vipassanāya ca visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā
anya-e0101n:2033_1: nibbidājananaṃ. Dahanakiccamiva hi sukhodake tejodhātu sañjānanakiccaṃ pesā paṭuṃ
anya-e0101n:2033_2: kātuṃ na sakkoti. Sesasamāpattīsu saññā viya vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi
anya-e0101n:2033_3: kātuṃ na sakkoti. Aññesu hi khandhesu akatābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe
anya-e0101n:2033_4: sammasitvā nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi apica āyasmā sāriputto. Pakativipassako
anya-e0101n:2033_5: pana mahāpañño sāriputtasadisova sakkuṇeyya. Sopi “evaṃ kirime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
anya-e0101n:2033_6: hutvā paṭiventī”ti evaṃ kalāpasammasanavaseneva, no anupadadhammavipassanāvasena.
anya-e0101n:2034_0: Yathā ca pattamakkhanatelūpamāya, evaṃ maggudakūpamāyapi ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0101n:2034_1: Maggappaṭipannassa kira therassa purato gacchanto sāmaṇero thokaṃ udakaṃ disvā “udakaṃ,
anya-e0101n:2034_2: bhante, upāhanā omuñcathā”ti āha. Tato therena “sace udakamatthi, āhara nhānasāṭikaṃ,
anya-e0101n:2034_3: nhāyissāmā”ti vutte “natthi, bhante”ti āha. Tattha yathā upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:2034_4: “udakamatthī”ti hoti, nhāyanaṭṭhena “natthī”ti hoti. Evampi sā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ
anya-e0101n:2034_5: asamatthatāya nevasaññā, saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā nāsaññā hoti.
anya-e0101n:2035: Na kevalañca etāheva, aññāhipi anurūpāhi upamāhi esa attho vibhāvetabbo. Upasampajja viharatīti idaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
anya-e0101n:2038: 288. Asadisarūpo nātho, āruppaṃ yaṃ catubbidhaṃ āha.
anya-e0101n:2039: Taṃ iti ñatvā tasmiṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
anya-e0101n:2043_0: Etāsu hi rūpanimittātikkamato paṭhamā, ākāsātikkamato dutiyā, ākāse pavattitaviññāṇātikkamato
anya-e0101n:2043_1: tatiyā. Ākāse pavattitaviññāṇassa apagamātikkamato catutthīti sabbathā ārammaṇātikkamato
anya-e0101n:2043_2: catassopi bhavantimā āruppasamāpattiyoti veditabbā. Aṅgātikkamaṃ pana etāsaṃ na icchanti
anya-e0101n:2043_3: paṇḍitā. Na hi rūpāvacarasamāpattīsu viya etāsu aṅgātikkamo atthi. Sabbāsupi hi etāsu
anya-e0101n:2043_4: upekkhā, cittekaggatāti dve eva jhānaṅgāni honti.
anya-e0101n:2047_1: paṇītā pañcakāmaguṇā paccupaṭṭhitā assu. Dutiye tato paṇītatarā. Tatiye tato paṇītatarā.
anya-e0101n:2047_2: Catutthe sabbapaṇītatarā. Tattha kiñcāpi tāni cattāripi pāsādatalāneva, natthi nesaṃ
anya-e0101n:2047_3: pāsādatalabhāvena viseso. Pañcakāmaguṇasamiddhavisesena pana heṭṭhimato heṭṭhimato
anya-e0101n:2048_1: assu āyāmena ca vitthārena ca samappamāṇā. Tattha kiñcāpi tā sāṭikā catassopi āyāmato
anya-e0101n:2048_2: ca vitthārato ca samappamāṇā, natthi tāsaṃ pamāṇato viseso. Sukhasamphassasukhumabhāvamahagghabhāvehi
anya-e0101n:2048_3: pana purimāya purimāya pacchimā pacchimā paṇītatarā honti, evameva kiñcāpi catūsu
anya-e0101n:2048_4: etāsu upekkhā, cittekaggatāti etāni dveyeva aṅgāni honti, atha kho bhāvanāvisesena
anya-e0101n:2048_5: tesaṃ aṅgāni paṇītapaṇītatarabhāvena suppaṇītatarā honti pacchimā pacchimā idhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:2050: Asucimhi maṇḍape laggo, eko tannissito paro;
anya-e0101n:2051: Añño bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
anya-e0101n:2054_0: Tatrāyamatthayojanā – asucimhi kira dese eko maṇḍapo, atheko puriso āgantvā taṃ asuciṃ
anya-e0101n:2054_1: jigucchamāno taṃ maṇḍapaṃ hatthehi ālambitvā tattha laggo laggito viya aṭṭhāsi. Athāparo
anya-e0101n:2054_2: āgantvā taṃ maṇḍape laggaṃ purisaṃ nissito. Athañño āgantvā cintesi “yo esa maṇḍapalaggo,
anya-e0101n:2054_3: yo ca tannissito, ubhopete duṭṭhitā. Dhuvo ca nesaṃ maṇḍapapapāte pāto, handāhaṃ
anya-e0101n:2054_4: bahiyeva tiṭṭhāmī”ti. So tannissitaṃ anissāya bahiyeva aṭṭhāsi. Athāparo āgantvā
anya-e0101n:2054_5: maṇḍapalaggassa ca tannissitassa ca akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā bahiṭṭhitañca suṭṭhitoti
anya-e0101n:2054_6: mantvā taṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi. Tattha asucimhi dese maṇḍapo viya kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ
anya-e0101n:2054_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ, asucijigucchāya maṇḍapalaggo puriso viya rūpanimittajigucchāya ākāsārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2054_8: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, maṇḍapalaggaṃ purisaṃ nissito viya ākāsārammaṇaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
anya-e0101n:2054_9: ārabbha pavattaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, tesaṃ dvinnampi akhemabhāvaṃ cintetvā anissāya
anya-e0101n:2054_10: taṃ maṇḍapalaggaṃ bahiṭṭhito viya ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ akatvā tadabhāvārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2054_11: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, maṇḍapalaggassa tannissitassa ca akhemataṃ cintetvā bahiṭṭhitañca
anya-e0101n:2054_12: suṭṭhitoti mantvā taṃ nissāya ṭhito viya viññāṇābhāvasaṅkhāte bahipadese ṭhitaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e0101n:2058_1: evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ aññassa ārammaṇassa abhāvā ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
anya-e0101n:2058_2: Yathā kiṃ? Diṭṭhadosampi rājānaṃ vuttihetu yathā jano. Yathā hi asaṃyataṃ pharusakāyavacīmanosamācāraṃ
anya-e0101n:2058_3: kañci sabbadisampatiṃ rājānaṃ “pharusasamācāro aya”nti evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi aññattha
anya-e0101n:2058_4: vuttiṃ alabhamāno jano vuttihetu nissāya vattati, evaṃ diṭṭhadosampi taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
anya-e0101n:2058_5: aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ alabhamānamidaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoteva.
anya-e0101n:2070_0: 294. Idāni āruppānantaraṃ ekā saññāti evaṃ uddiṭṭhāya āhāre paṭikkūlasaññāya bhāvanāniddeso
anya-e0101n:2070_1: anuppatto. Tattha āharatīti āhāro. So catubbidho kabaḷīkārāhāro, phassāhāro, manosañcetanāhāro, viññāṇāhāroti.
anya-e0101n:2071_0: Ko panettha kimāharatīti? Kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharati. Phassāhāro tisso
anya-e0101n:2071_1: vedanā āharati. Manosañcetanāhāro tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ āharati. Viññāṇāhāro paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ āharati.
anya-e0101n:2072_0: Tesu kabaḷīkārāhāre nikantibhayaṃ. Phassāhāre upagamanabhayaṃ. Manosañcetanāhāre
anya-e0101n:2072_1: upapattibhayaṃ. Viññāṇāhāre paṭisandhibhayaṃ. Evaṃ sappaṭibhayesu ca tesu kabaḷīkārāhāro
anya-e0101n:2072_2: puttamaṃsūpamena dīpetabbo. Phassāhāro niccammagāvūpamena. Manosañcetanāhāro aṅgārakāsūpamena.
anya-e0101n:2072_3: Viññāṇāhāro sattisatūpamenāti. Imesu pana catūsu āhāresu asitapītakhāyitasāyitappabhedo
anya-e0101n:2072_4: kabaḷīkāro āhārova imasmiṃ atthe āhāroti adhippeto. Tasmiṃ āhāre paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena
anya-e0101n:2073_0: Taṃ āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ bhāvetukāmena kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā uggahato ekapadampi
anya-e0101n:2073_2: dasahākārehi paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā. Seyyathidaṃ, gamanato, pariyesanato, paribhogato,
anya-e0101n:2073_3: āsayato, nidhānato, aparipakkato, paripakkato, phalato, nissandato, sammakkhanatoti.
anya-e0101n:2074_0: 295. Tattha gamanatoti evaṃ mahānubhāve nāma sāsane pabbajitena sakalarattiṃ buddhavacanasajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:2074_1: vā samaṇadhammaṃ vā katvā kālasseva vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā
anya-e0101n:2074_2: pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā āsanamārūyha
anya-e0101n:2074_3: vīsatiṃsa vāre kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaritvā uṭṭhāya pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā nijanasambādhāni
anya-e0101n:2074_4: pavivekasukhāni chāyūdakasampannāni sucīni sītalāni ramaṇīyabhūmibhāgāni tapovanāni
anya-e0101n:2074_5: pahāya ariyaṃ vivekaratiṃ anapekkhitvā susānābhimukhena siṅgālena viya āhāratthāya
anya-e0101n:2075_0: Evaṃ gacchatā ca mañcamhā vā pīṭhamhā vā otaraṇato paṭṭhāya pādarajagharagolikavaccādisamparikiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2075_1: paccattharaṇaṃ akkamitabbaṃ hoti. Tato appekadā mūsikajatukavaccādīhi upahatattā
anya-e0101n:2075_2: antogabbhato paṭikkūlataraṃ pamukhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Tato ulūkapārāvatādivaccasammakkhitattā
anya-e0101n:2075_3: uparimatalato paṭikkūlataraṃ heṭṭhimatalaṃ. Tato kadāci kadāci vāteritehi purāṇatiṇapaṇṇehi
anya-e0101n:2075_4: gilānasāmaṇerānaṃ muttakarīsakheḷasiṅghāṇikāhi vassakāle udakacikkhallādīhi ca saṃkiliṭṭhattā
anya-e0101n:2075_5: heṭṭhimatalato paṭikkūlataraṃ pariveṇaṃ. Pariveṇato paṭikkūlatarā vihāraracchā daṭṭhabbā hoti.
anya-e0101n:2076_0: Anupubbena pana bodhiñca cetiyañca vanditvā vitakkamāḷake ṭhitena muttarāsisadisaṃ
anya-e0101n:2076_2: anapaloketvā evarūpaṃ nāma ramaṇīyaṃ padesaṃ piṭṭhito katvā āhārahetu gantabbaṃ bhavissatīti
anya-e0101n:2076_3: pakkamitvā gāmamaggaṃ paṭipannena khāṇukaṇṭakamaggopi udakavegabhinnavisamamaggopi daṭṭhabbo hoti.
anya-e0101n:2077_0: Tato gaṇḍaṃ paṭicchādentena viya nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā vaṇacoḷakaṃ bandhantena viya
anya-e0101n:2077_1: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ paṭicchādentena viya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā bhesajjakapālaṃ
anya-e0101n:2077_2: nīharantena viya pattaṃ nīharitvā gāmadvārasamīpaṃ pāpuṇantena hatthikuṇapaassakuṇapagokuṇapamahiṃsakuṇapamanussakuṇapaahikuṇapakukkurakuṇapānipi
anya-e0101n:2077_3: daṭṭhabbāni bhavanti. Na kevalañca daṭṭhabbāni, gandhopi nesaṃ ghānaṃ paṭihanamāno
anya-e0101n:2078_1: daṭṭhabbañca ghāyitabbañca hoti. Aho vata bho paṭikkūlo āhāroti evaṃ gamanato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:2079_0: 296. Kathaṃ pariyesanato? Evaṃ gamanapaṭikkūlaṃ adhivāsetvāpi gāmaṃ paviṭṭhena saṅghāṭipārutena
anya-e0101n:2079_1: kapaṇamanussena viya kapālahatthena gharapaṭipāṭiyā gāmavīthīsu caritabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:2079_2: Yattha vassakāle akkantaakkantaṭṭhāne yāva piṇḍikamaṃsāpi udakacikkhalle pādā pavisanti,
anya-e0101n:2079_3: ekena hatthena pattaṃ gahetabbaṃ hoti, ekena cīvaraṃ ukkhipitabbaṃ. Gimhakāle vātavegena
anya-e0101n:2079_4: samuṭṭhitehi paṃsutiṇarajehi okiṇṇasarīrena caritabbaṃ. Taṃ taṃ gehadvāraṃ patvā
anya-e0101n:2079_6: kimikulākulāni nīlamakkhikaparikiṇṇāni oḷigallāni ceva candanikaṭṭhānāni ca daṭṭhabbāni
anya-e0101n:2079_7: honti akkamitabbānipi. Yato tā makkhikā uṭṭhahitvā saṅghāṭiyampi pattepi sīsepi nilīyanti.
anya-e0101n:2080_0: Gharaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi keci denti, keci na denti. Dadamānāpi ekacce hiyyo pakkabhattampi
anya-e0101n:2080_2: bhante”ti vadanti, keci pana apassamānā viya tuṇhī honti, keci aññena mukhaṃ karonti,
anya-e0101n:2080_3: keci “gaccha, re muṇḍakā”tiādīhi pharusavācāhi samudācaranti. Evaṃ kapaṇamanussena
anya-e0101n:2081_0: Iccetaṃ gāmappavesanato paṭṭhāya yāva nikkhamanā udakacikkhallādipaṭikkūlaṃ āhārahetu
anya-e0101n:2081_1: akkamitabbañceva daṭṭhabbañca adhivāsetabbañca hoti. Aho vata bho paṭikkūlo āhāroti
anya-e0101n:2082_0: 297. Kathaṃ paribhogato? Evaṃ pariyiṭṭhāhārena pana bahigāme phāsukaṭṭhāne sukhanisinnena
anya-e0101n:2082_1: yāva tattha hatthaṃ na otāreti, tāva tathārūpaṃ garuṭṭhāniyaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā lajjimanussaṃ
anya-e0101n:2082_2: vā disvā nimantetumpi sakkā hoti. Bhuñjitukāmatāya panettha hatthe otāritamatte “gaṇhathā”ti
anya-e0101n:2082_3: vadantena lajjitabbaṃ hoti. Hatthaṃ pana otāretvā maddantassa pañcaṅgulianusārena
anya-e0101n:2082_4: sedo paggharamāno sukkhathaddhabhattampi temento muduṃ karoti.
anya-e0101n:2083_0: Atha tasmiṃ parimaddanamattenāpi sambhinnasobhe ālopaṃ katvā mukhe ṭhapite heṭṭhimadantā
anya-e0101n:2083_1: udukkhalakiccaṃ sādhenti, uparimā musalakiccaṃ, jivhā hatthakiccaṃ. Taṃ tattha suvānadoṇiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:2083_2: suvānapiṇḍamiva dantamusalehi koṭṭetvā jivhāya samparivattiyamānaṃ jivhāgge tanupasannakheḷo
anya-e0101n:2083_3: makkheti, vemajjhato paṭṭhāya bahalakheḷo makkheti, dantakaṭṭhena asampattaṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n:2083_4: dantagūthako makkheti. So evaṃ vicuṇṇitamakkhito taṅkhaṇaññeva antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāraviseso
anya-e0101n:2083_5: suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhitasuvānavamathu viya paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagacchati. Evarūpopi
anya-e0101n:2083_6: samāno cakkhussa āpāthaṃ atītattā ajjhoharitabbo hotīti evaṃ paribhogato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:2084_0: 298. Kathaṃ āsayato? Evaṃ paribhogaṃ upagato ca panesa anto pavisamāno yasmā buddhapaccekabuddhānampi
anya-e0101n:2084_1: raññopi cakkavattissa pittasemhapubbalohitāsayesu catūsu aññataro āsayo hotiyeva.
anya-e0101n:2084_2: Mandapuññānaṃ pana cattāro āsayā honti. Tasmā yassa pittāsayo adhiko hoti, tassa
anya-e0101n:2084_3: bahalamadhukatelamakkhito viya paramajeguccho hoti. Yassa semhāsayo adhiko hoti,
anya-e0101n:2084_4: tassa nāgabalapaṇṇarasamakkhito viya. Yassa pubbāsayo adhiko hoti, tassa pūtitakkamakkhito
anya-e0101n:2084_5: viya. Yassa lohitāsayo adhiko hoti, tassa rajanamakkhito viya paramajeguccho hotīti
anya-e0101n:2085_0: 299. Kathaṃ nidhānato? So imesu catūsu āsayesu aññatarena āsayena makkhito antoudaraṃ
anya-e0101n:2085_1: pavisitvā neva suvaṇṇabhājane na maṇirajatādibhājanesu nidhānaṃ gacchati. Sace pana
anya-e0101n:2085_2: dasavassikena ajjhohariyati dasa vassāni adhotavaccakūpasadise okāse patiṭṭhahati.
anya-e0101n:2085_3: Sace vīsa, tiṃsa, cattālīsa, paññāsa, saṭṭhi, sattati, asīti, navutivassikena, sace
anya-e0101n:2085_4: vassasatikena ajjhohariyati. Vassasataṃ adhotavaccakūpasadise okāse patiṭṭhahatīti
anya-e0101n:2086_0: 300. Kathaṃ aparipakkato? So panāyamāhāro evarūpe okāse nidhānamupagato yāva aparipakko
anya-e0101n:2086_1: hoti, tāva tasmiññeva yathāvuttappakāre paramandhakāratimise nānākuṇapagandhavāsitapavanavicarite
anya-e0101n:2086_2: atiduggandhajegucche padese yathā nāma nidāghe akālameghena abhivuṭṭhamhi caṇḍālagāmadvāraāvāṭe
anya-e0101n:2086_4: pheṇapupphuḷakācitāni tiṭṭhanti, evameva taṃdivasampi hiyyopi tato purime divasepi
anya-e0101n:2086_6: paramajegucchabhāvaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ aparipakkato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:2087_0: 301. Kathaṃ paripakkato? So tattakāyagginā paripakko samāno na suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo
anya-e0101n:2087_1: viya suvaṇṇarajatādibhāvaṃ upagacchati. Pheṇapupphuḷake pana muñcanto saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ
anya-e0101n:2087_2: pisitvā nāḷike pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā viya karīsabhāvaṃ upagantvā pakkāsayaṃ, muttabhāvaṃ
anya-e0101n:2087_3: upagantvā muttavatthiñca pūretīti evaṃ paripakkato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:2088_0: 302. Kathaṃ phalato? Sammā paripaccamāno ca panāyaṃ kesalomanakhadantādīni nānākuṇapāni
anya-e0101n:2088_2: rogasatāni, idamassa phalanti evaṃ phalato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:2089_0: 303. Kathaṃ nissandato? Ajjhohariyamāno cesa ekena dvārena pavisitvā nissandamāno
anya-e0101n:2089_1: akkhimhā akkhigūthako kaṇṇamhā kaṇṇagūthakotiādinā pakārena anekehi dvārehi nissandati.
anya-e0101n:2089_2: Ajjhoharaṇasamaye cesa mahāparivārenāpi ajjhohariyati. Nissandanasamaye pana uccārapassāvādibhāvaṃ
anya-e0101n:2089_3: upagato ekakeneva nīhariyati. Paṭhamadivase ca naṃ paribhuñjanto haṭṭhapahaṭṭhopi
anya-e0101n:2089_4: hoti udaggudaggo pītisomanassajāto. Dutiyadivase nissandento pihitanāsiko hoti vikuṇitamukho
anya-e0101n:2089_5: jegucchī maṅkubhūto. Paṭhamadivase ca naṃ ratto giddho gadhito mucchitopi ajjhoharitvā
anya-e0101n:2089_6: dutiyadivase ekarattivāsena viratto aṭṭīyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno nīharati. Tenāhu porāṇā –
anya-e0101n:2099_0: 304. Kathaṃ sammakkhanato? Paribhogakālepi cesa hatthaoṭṭhajivhātālūni sammakkheti.
anya-e0101n:2099_1: Tāni tena sammakkhitattā paṭikkūlāni honti, yāni dhotānipi gandhaharaṇatthaṃ punappunaṃ
anya-e0101n:2099_2: dhovitabbāni honti. Paribhutto samāno yathā nāma odane paccamāne thusakaṇakuṇḍakādīni
anya-e0101n:2099_3: uttaritvā ukkhalimukhavaṭṭipidhāniyo makkhanti, evameva sakalasarīrānugatena kāyagginā
anya-e0101n:2099_4: pheṇuddehakaṃ paccitvā uttaramāno dante dantamalabhāvena sammakkheti. Jivhātāluppabhutīni
anya-e0101n:2099_6: sammakkheti. Yena sammakkhitāni imāni dvārāni divase divase dhoviyamānānipi neva
anya-e0101n:2099_7: sucīni, na manoramāni honti. Yesu ekaccaṃ dhovitvā hattho puna udakena dhovitabbo
anya-e0101n:2099_8: hoti. Ekaccaṃ dhovitvā dvattikkhattuṃ gomayenapi mattikāyapi gandhacuṇṇenapi dhovato
anya-e0101n:2099_9: pāṭikulyatā vigacchatīti evaṃ sammakkhanato paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbā.
anya-e0101n:2100_0: 305. Tassevaṃ dasahākārehi paṭikkūlataṃ paccavekkhato takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karontassa
anya-e0101n:2100_1: paṭikkūlākāravasena kabaḷīkārāhāro pākaṭo hoti. So taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ āsevati
anya-e0101n:2100_2: bhāveti bahulīkaroti. Tassevaṃ karoto nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti. Kabaḷīkārāhārassa
anya-e0101n:2100_3: sabhāvadhammatāya gambhīrattā appanaṃ appattena upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati.
anya-e0101n:2100_4: Paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena panettha saññā pākaṭā hoti. Tasmā imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ āhāre
anya-e0101n:2101_0: Imañca pana āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ anuyuttassa bhikkhuno rasataṇhāya cittaṃ patilīyati
anya-e0101n:2101_1: patikuṭati pativaṭṭati. So kantāranittharaṇatthiko viya puttamaṃsaṃ vigatamado āhāraṃ
anya-e0101n:2101_2: āhāreti yāvadeva dukkhassa nittharaṇatthāya. Athassa appakasireneva kabaḷīkārāhārapariññāmukhena
anya-e0101n:2101_3: pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññaṃ gacchati. So pañcakāmaguṇapariññāmukhena rūpakkhandhaṃ
anya-e0101n:2101_5: gacchati, asubhasaññāya anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti. Imaṃ pana paṭipattiṃ nissāya
anya-e0101n:2101_6: diṭṭheva dhamme amatapariyosānataṃ anabhisambhuṇanto sugatiparāyano hotīti.
anya-e0101n:2104_0: 306. Idāni āhāre paṭikkūlasaññānantaraṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhassa catudhātuvavatthānassa
anya-e0101n:2104_1: bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto. Tattha vavatthānanti sabhāvūpalakkhaṇavasena sanniṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:2104_2: catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vavatthānaṃ catudhātuvavatthānaṃ. Dhātumanasikāro, dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0101n:2104_3: catudhātuvavatthānanti atthato ekaṃ. Tayidaṃ dvidhā āgataṃ saṅkhepato ca vitthārato
anya-e0101n:2104_4: ca. Saṅkhepato mahāsatipaṭṭhāne āgataṃ. Vitthārato mahāhatthipadūpame rāhulovāde
anya-e0101n:2105_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṃ vadhitvā catumahāpathe
anya-e0101n:2105_1: bilaso vibhajitvā nisinno assa, evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:2105_2: yathāpaṇihitaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati, atthi imasmiṃ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū”ti –
anya-e0101n:2106: Evaṃ tikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena mahāsatipaṭṭhāne saṅkhepato āgataṃ.
anya-e0101n:2107_0: Tassattho – yathā cheko goghātako vā tasseva vā bhattavetanabhato antevāsiko gāviṃ
anya-e0101n:2107_1: vadhitvā vinivijjhitvā catasso disā gatānaṃ mahāpathānaṃ vemajjhaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catumahāpathe
anya-e0101n:2107_2: koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā nisinno assa, evameva bhikkhu catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yena kenaci
anya-e0101n:2107_3: ākārena ṭhitattā yathāṭhitaṃ. Yathāṭhitattāva yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ atthi imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:2107_4: kāye pathavīdhātu…pe… vāyodhātūti evaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati.
anya-e0101n:2108_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yathā goghātakassa gāviṃ posentassapi āghātanaṃ āharantassapi āharitvā
anya-e0101n:2108_1: tattha bandhitvā ṭhapentassapi vadhantassapi vadhitaṃ mataṃ passantassapi tāvadeva
anya-e0101n:2108_2: gāvītisaññā na antaradhāyati, yāva naṃ padāletvā bilaso na vibhajati. Vibhajitvā
anya-e0101n:2108_3: nisinnassa pana gāvīsaññā antaradhāyati, maṃsasaññā pavattati. Nāssa evaṃ hoti “ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:2108_4: gāviṃ vikkiṇāmi, ime gāviṃ harantī”ti. Atha khvassa “ahaṃ maṃsaṃ vikkiṇāmi, imepi
anya-e0101n:2108_5: maṃsaṃ haranti”cceva hoti, evameva imassāpi bhikkhuno pubbe bālaputhujjanakāle gihibhūtassapi
anya-e0101n:2108_6: pabbajitassapi tāvadeva sattoti vā posoti vā puggaloti vā saññā na antaradhāyati,
anya-e0101n:2108_7: yāva imameva kāyaṃ yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā dhātuso na paccavekkhati.
anya-e0101n:2108_8: Dhātuso paccavekkhato pana sattasaññā antaradhāyati, dhātuvaseneva cittaṃ santiṭṭhati.
anya-e0101n:2108_9: Tenāha bhagavā “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dakkho goghātako vā…pe… nisinno assa, evameva
anya-e0101n:2109_0: 307. Mahāhatthipadūpame pana – “katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu? Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ
anya-e0101n:2109_1: paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigataṃ upādinnaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ, kesā lomā…pe… udariyaṃ karīsaṃ,
anya-e0101n:2109_2: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigataṃ upādinnaṃ, ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:2110_0: “Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā āpodhātu? Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ āpo āpogataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2110_1: Seyyathidaṃ, pittaṃ…pe… muttaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ āpo āpogataṃ
anya-e0101n:2110_2: upādinnaṃ, ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā āpodhātū”ti ca,
anya-e0101n:2111_0: “Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā tejodhātu? Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ tejo tejogataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2111_1: Seyyathidaṃ, yena ca santappati, yena ca jīrīyati, yena ca pariḍayhati, yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ
anya-e0101n:2111_2: sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ tejo tejogataṃ
anya-e0101n:2111_3: upādinnaṃ, ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā tejodhātū”ti ca,
anya-e0101n:2112_0: “Katamā cāvuso, ajjhattikā vāyodhātu? Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ vāyo vāyogataṃ upādinnaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2112_1: Seyyathidaṃ, uddhaṅgamā vātā, adhogamā vātā, kucchisayā vātā, koṭṭhāsayā vātā, aṅgamaṅgānusārino
anya-e0101n:2112_2: vātā, assāso passāso iti vā, yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ vāyo vāyogataṃ
anya-e0101n:2112_3: upādinnaṃ, ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā vāyodhātū”ti ca –
anya-e0101n:2113: Evaṃ nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena vitthārato āgataṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ rāhulovādadhātuvibhaṅgesupi.
anya-e0101n:2114_0: Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā, ajjhattaṃ paccattanti idaṃ tāva ubhayampi niyakassa
anya-e0101n:2114_1: adhivacanaṃ. Niyakaṃ nāma attani jātaṃ sasantānapariyāpannanti attho. Tayidaṃ yathā
anya-e0101n:2114_2: loke itthīsu kathā adhitthīti vuccati, evaṃ attani pavattattā ajjhattaṃ, attānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2114_3: paṭicca paṭicca pavattattā paccattantipi vuccati. Kakkhaḷanti thaddhaṃ. Kharigatanti
anya-e0101n:2114_4: pharusaṃ. Tattha paṭhamaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ, dutiyaṃ ākāravacanaṃ, kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā
anya-e0101n:2114_5: hi pathavīdhātu, sā pharusākārā hoti, tasmā kharigatanti vuttā. Upādinnanti daḷhaṃ
anya-e0101n:2114_6: ādinnaṃ, ahaṃ mamanti evaṃ daḷhaṃ ādinnaṃ, gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhanti attho. Seyyathidanti
anya-e0101n:2114_7: nipāto. Tassa taṃ katamanti ceti attho. Tato taṃ dassento “kesā lomā”tiādimāha. Ettha
anya-e0101n:2114_8: ca matthaluṅgaṃ pakkhipitvā vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n:2114_9: Yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātu saṅgahitā.
anya-e0101n:2115: Vissandanabhāvena taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ appotīti āpo. Kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena nānāvidhesu āpesu gatanti āpogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Āpodhātuyā ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2116_0: Tejanavasena tejo, vuttanayeneva tejesu gatanti tejogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2116_1: Yena cāti yena tejodhātugatena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo santappati, ekāhikajarādibhāvena
anya-e0101n:2116_2: usumajāto hoti. Yena ca jīrīyatīti yena ayaṃ kāyo jīrati, indriyavekallataṃ balaparikkhayaṃ
anya-e0101n:2116_3: valipalitādibhāvañca pāpuṇāti. Yena ca pariḍayhatīti yena kupitena ayaṃ kāyo ḍayhati.
anya-e0101n:2116_4: So ca puggalo “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti kandanto satadhotasappigosīsacandanādilepañceva
anya-e0101n:2116_5: tālavaṇṭavātañca paccāsīsati. Yena ca asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0101n:2116_6: yenetaṃ asitaṃ vā odanādi pītaṃ vā pānakādi khāyitaṃ vā piṭṭhakhajjakādi sāyitaṃ
anya-e0101n:2116_7: vā ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi sammā paripākaṃ gacchati, rasādibhāvena vivekaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0101n:2116_8: attho. Ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātusamuṭṭhānā. Pacchimo kammasamuṭṭhānova.
anya-e0101n:2117_0: Vāyanavasena vāyo, vuttanayeneva vāyesu gatanti vāyogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2117_1: Uddhaṅgamā vātāti uggārahikkādipavattakā uddhaṃ ārohaṇavātā. Adhogamā vātāti uccārapassāvādinīharaṇakā
anya-e0101n:2117_2: adho orohaṇavātā. Kucchisayā vātāti antānaṃ bahivātā. Koṭṭhāsayā vātāti antānaṃ antovātā.
anya-e0101n:2117_3: Aṅgamaṅgānusārino vātāti dhamanijālānusārena sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaṭā samiñjanapasāraṇādinibbattakā
anya-e0101n:2117_4: vātā. Assāsoti antopavisananāsikavāto. Passāsoti bahinikkhamananāsikavāto. Ettha
anya-e0101n:2117_5: ca purimā pañca catusamuṭṭhānā. Assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. Sabbattha yaṃ vā
anya-e0101n:2117_6: panaññampi kiñcīti iminā padena avasesakoṭṭhāsesu āpodhātuādayo saṅgahitā.
anya-e0101n:2118: Iti vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu, dvādasahi āpodhātu, catūhi tejodhātu, chahi vāyodhātūti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi catasso dhātuyo vitthāritā hontīti ayaṃ tāvettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
anya-e0101n:2119_0: 308. Bhāvanānaye panettha tikkhapaññassa bhikkhuno kesā pathavīdhātu, lomā pathavīdhātūti
anya-e0101n:2119_1: evaṃ vitthārato dhātupariggaho papañcato upaṭṭhāti. Yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ pathavīdhātu.
anya-e0101n:2119_2: Yaṃ ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ āpodhātu. Yaṃ paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ tejodhātu. Yaṃ
anya-e0101n:2119_3: vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ vāyodhātūti evaṃ manasikaroto panassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ
anya-e0101n:2119_4: hoti. Nātitikkhapaññassa pana evaṃ manasikaroto andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti. Purimanayena
anya-e0101n:2120_0: Kathaṃ? Yathā dvīsu bhikkhūsu bahupeyyālaṃ tantiṃ sajjhāyantesu tikkhapañño bhikkhu
anya-e0101n:2120_1: sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā peyyālamukhaṃ vitthāretvā tato paraṃ ubhatokoṭivaseneva sajjhāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:2120_2: karonto gacchati. Tatra nātitikkhapañño evaṃ vattā hoti “kiṃ sajjhāyo nāmesa oṭṭhapariyāhatamattaṃ
anya-e0101n:2120_3: kātuṃ na deti, evaṃ sajjhāye kariyamāne kadā tanti paguṇā bhavissatī”ti. So āgatāgataṃ
anya-e0101n:2120_4: peyyālamukhaṃ vitthāretvāva sajjhāyaṃ karoti. Tamenaṃ itaro evamāha – “kiṃ sajjhāyo
anya-e0101n:2120_5: nāmesa pariyosānaṃ gantuṃ na deti, evaṃ sajjhāye kariyamāne kadā tanti pariyosānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2120_6: gamissatī”ti. Evameva tikkhapaññassa kesādivasena vitthārato dhātupariggaho papañcato
anya-e0101n:2120_7: upaṭṭhāti. Yaṃ thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ, ayaṃ pathavīdhātūtiādinā nayena saṅkhepato manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:2120_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Itarassa tathā manasikaroto andhakāraṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:2121_0: Tasmā imaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena tikkhapaññena tāva rahogatena paṭisallīnena
anya-e0101n:2121_1: sakalampi attano rūpakāyaṃ āvajjetvā yo imasmiṃ kāye thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā,
anya-e0101n:2121_2: ayaṃ pathavīdhātu. Yo ābandhanabhāvo vā dravabhāvo vā, ayaṃ āpodhātu. Yo paripācanabhāvo
anya-e0101n:2121_3: vā uṇhabhāvo vā, ayaṃ tejodhātu. Yo vitthambhanabhāvo vā samudīraṇabhāvo vā, ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:2121_4: vāyodhātūti evaṃ saṃkhittena dhātuyo pariggahetvā punappunaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti
anya-e0101n:2121_5: dhātumattato nissattato nijjīvato āvajjitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2122_0: Atha vā pana ye ime catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ nissattabhāvadassanatthaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
anya-e0101n:2122_1: “aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito
anya-e0101n:2122_2: rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti cattāro koṭṭhāsā vuttā. Tesu taṃ taṃ antarānusārinā
anya-e0101n:2122_3: ñāṇahatthena vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā yo etesu thaddhabhāvo vā kharabhāvo vā,
anya-e0101n:2122_4: ayaṃ pathavīdhātūti purimanayeneva dhātuyo pariggahetvā punappunaṃ pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti
anya-e0101n:2122_5: dhātumattato nissattato nijjīvato āvajjitabbaṃ manasikātabbaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2122_7: appanaṃ appatto upacāramatto samādhi uppajjati. Ayaṃ saṅkhepato āgate catudhātuvavatthāne bhāvanānayo.
anya-e0101n:2123_0: 309. Vitthārato āgate pana evaṃ veditabbo. Idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetukāmena hi nātitikkhapaññena
anya-e0101n:2123_1: yoginā ācariyasantike dvācattālīsāya ākārehi vitthārato dhātuyo uggaṇhitvā vuttappakāre
anya-e0101n:2123_2: senāsane viharantena katasabbakiccena rahogatena paṭisallīnena sasambhārasaṅkhepato,
anya-e0101n:2124_0: Tattha kathaṃ sasambhārasaṅkhepato bhāveti? Idha bhikkhu vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhākāraṃ
anya-e0101n:2124_1: pathavīdhātūti vavatthapeti. Dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu yūsagataṃ udakasaṅkhātaṃ ābandhanākāraṃ
anya-e0101n:2124_2: āpodhātūti vavatthapeti. Catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanakaṃ tejaṃ tejodhātūti vavatthapeti.
anya-e0101n:2124_3: Chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhanākāraṃ vāyodhātūti vavatthapeti. Tassevaṃ vavatthāpayatoyeva
anya-e0101n:2124_4: dhātuyo pākaṭā honti. Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:2125_0: 310. Yassa pana evaṃ bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati, tena sasambhāravibhattito
anya-e0101n:2125_1: bhāvetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tena hi bhikkhunā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaniddese sattadhā
anya-e0101n:2125_2: uggahakosallaṃ dasadhā manasikārakosallañca vuttaṃ. Dvattiṃsākāre tāva taṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0101n:2125_3: aparihāpetvā tacapañcakādīnaṃ anulomapaṭilomato vacasā sajjhāyaṃ ādiṃkatvā sabbaṃ
anya-e0101n:2125_4: tattha vuttavidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ayameva hi viseso, tattha vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena
anya-e0101n:2125_5: kesādayo manasikaritvāpi paṭikkūlavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, idha dhātuvasena. Tasmā
anya-e0101n:2125_6: vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā pañcadhā kesādayo manasikaritvā avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:2126_0: 311. Ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme jātā. Tattha yathāvammikamatthake jātesu
anya-e0101n:2126_1: kuṇṭhatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānīti, napi kuṇṭhatiṇāni
anya-e0101n:2126_2: jānanti mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānīti, evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti
anya-e0101n:2126_3: mayi kesā jātāti, napi kesā jānanti mayaṃ sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanacamme jātāti, aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2126_4: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
anya-e0101n:2126_5: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2127_0: 312. Lomā sarīraveṭhanacamme jātā. Tattha yathā suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātesu dabbatiṇakesu
anya-e0101n:2127_1: na suññagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti mayi dabbatiṇakāni jātānīti, napi dabbatiṇakāni jānanti
anya-e0101n:2127_2: mayaṃ suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātānīti, evameva na sarīraveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti mayi lomā jātāti.
anya-e0101n:2127_3: Napi lomā jānanti mayaṃ sarīraveṭhanacamme jātāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2127_4: ete dhammā. Iti lomā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2128_0: 313. Nakhā aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā. Tattha yathā kumārakesu daṇḍakehi madhukaṭṭhike
anya-e0101n:2128_1: vijjhitvā kīḷantesu na daṇḍakā jānanti amhesu madhukaṭṭhikā ṭhapitāti, napi madhukaṭṭhikā
anya-e0101n:2128_2: jānanti mayaṃ daṇḍakesu ṭhapitāti, evameva na aṅguliyo jānanti amhākaṃ aggesu nakhā
anya-e0101n:2128_3: jātāti. Napi nakhā jānanti mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2128_4: ete dhammā. Iti nakhā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2129_0: 314. Dantā hanukaṭṭhikesu jātā. Tattha yathā vaḍḍhakīhi pāsāṇaudukkhalakesu kenacideva
anya-e0101n:2129_1: silesajātena bandhitvā ṭhapitathambhesu na udukkhalā jānanti amhesu thambhā ṭhitāti.
anya-e0101n:2129_2: Napi thambhā jānanti mayaṃ udukkhalesu ṭhitāti, evameva na hanukaṭṭhīni jānanti amhesu
anya-e0101n:2129_3: dantā jātāti. Napi dantā jānanti mayaṃ hanukaṭṭhīsu jātāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2129_4: ete dhammā. Iti dantā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2130_0: 315. Taco sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhito. Tattha yathā allagocammapariyonaddhāya
anya-e0101n:2130_1: mahāvīṇāya na mahāvīṇā jānāti ahaṃ allagocammena pariyonaddhāti. Napi allagocammaṃ
anya-e0101n:2130_2: jānāti mayā mahāvīṇā pariyonaddhāti, evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ahaṃ tacena pariyonaddhanti.
anya-e0101n:2130_3: Napi taco jānāti mayā sarīraṃ pariyonaddhanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2130_4: ete dhammā. Iti taco nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2131_0: 316. Maṃsaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā mahāmattikalittāya bhittiyā
anya-e0101n:2131_1: na bhitti jānāti ahaṃ mahāmattikāya littāti. Napi mahāmattikā jānāti mayā bhitti
anya-e0101n:2131_2: littāti, evameva na aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo jānāti ahaṃ navapesisatappabhedena maṃsena littoti.
anya-e0101n:2131_3: Napi maṃsaṃ jānāti mayā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo littoti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2131_4: ete dhammā. Iti maṃsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2132_0: 317. Nhāru sarīrabbhantare aṭṭhīni ābandhamānā ṭhitā. Tattha yathā vallīhi vinaddhesu
anya-e0101n:2132_1: kuṭṭadārūsu na kuṭṭadārūni jānanti mayaṃ vallīhi vinaddhānīti. Napi valliyo jānanti
anya-e0101n:2132_2: amhehi kuṭṭadārūni vinaddhānīti, evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānīti.
anya-e0101n:2132_3: Napi nhārū jānanti amhehi aṭṭhīni ābaddhānīti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2132_4: ete dhammā. Iti nhāru nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2133_0: 318. Aṭṭhīsu paṇhikaṭṭhi gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Gopphakaṭṭhi jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ
anya-e0101n:2133_1: ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Jaṅghaṭṭhi ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
anya-e0101n:2133_2: ṭhitaṃ. Kaṭiṭṭhi piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ, piṭṭhikaṇṭako gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
anya-e0101n:2133_3: ṭhito. Gīvaṭṭhi sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sīsaṭṭhi gīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Gīvaṭṭhi
anya-e0101n:2133_4: piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhitaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭako kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhito. Kaṭiṭṭhi ūruṭṭhike
anya-e0101n:2133_5: patiṭṭhitaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi jaṅghaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Jaṅghaṭṭhi gopphakaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2134_0: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakadārugomayādisañcayesu na heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā jānanti mayaṃ uparime
anya-e0101n:2134_1: uparime ukkhipitvā ṭhitāti. Napi uparimā uparimā jānanti mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu heṭṭhimesu
anya-e0101n:2134_2: patiṭṭhitāti, evameva na paṇhikaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2134_3: Na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti
anya-e0101n:2134_4: ahaṃ ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2134_5: Na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti
anya-e0101n:2134_6: ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
anya-e0101n:2134_7: ṭhitanti. Na sīsaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:2134_8: piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhitanti. Na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitoti.
anya-e0101n:2134_9: Na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ ūruṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhimhi
anya-e0101n:2134_10: patiṭṭhitanti. Na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Na gopphakaṭṭhi
anya-e0101n:2134_11: jānāti ahaṃ paṇhikaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete
anya-e0101n:2134_12: dhammā. Iti aṭṭhi nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
anya-e0101n:2135_0: 319. Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā veḷupabbādīnaṃ
anya-e0101n:2135_1: anto pakkhittachinnavettaggādīsu na veḷupabbādīni jānanti amhesu vettaggādīni pakkhittānīti.
anya-e0101n:2135_2: Napi vettaggādīni jānanti mayaṃ veḷupabbādīsu ṭhitānīti, evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti
anya-e0101n:2135_3: amhākaṃ anto miñjaṃ ṭhitanti. Nāpi miñjaṃ jānāti ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ anto ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2135_4: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti aṭṭhimiñjaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
anya-e0101n:2135_5: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2136_0: 320. Vakkaṃ galavāṭakato nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā
anya-e0101n:2136_1: vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā vaṇṭupanibaddhe
anya-e0101n:2136_2: ambaphaladvaye na vaṇṭaṃ jānāti mayā ambaphaladvayaṃ upanibaddhanti. Napi ambaphaladvayaṃ
anya-e0101n:2136_3: jānāti ahaṃ vaṇṭena upanibaddhanti, evameva na thūlanhāru jānāti mayā vakkaṃ upanibaddhanti.
anya-e0101n:2136_4: Napi vakkaṃ jānāti ahaṃ thūlanhārunā upanibaddhanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2136_5: ete dhammā. Iti vakkaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2137_0: 321. Hadayaṃ sarīrabbhantare uraṭṭhipañjaramajjhaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ
anya-e0101n:2137_1: nissāya ṭhapitāya maṃsapesiyā na sandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya
anya-e0101n:2137_2: maṃsapesi ṭhitāti. Napi maṃsapesi jānāti ahaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n:2137_3: evameva na uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya hadayaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi hadayaṃ
anya-e0101n:2137_4: jānāti ahaṃ uraṭṭhipañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2137_5: ete dhammā. Iti hadayaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2138_0: 322. Yakanaṃ antosarīre dvinnaṃ thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2138_1: Tattha yathā ukkhalikapālapassamhi lagge yamakamaṃsapiṇḍe na ukkhalikapālapassaṃ
anya-e0101n:2138_2: jānāti mayi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo laggoti. Napi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo jānāti ahaṃ ukkhalikapālapasse
anya-e0101n:2138_3: laggoti, evameva na thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ
anya-e0101n:2138_4: ṭhitanti. Napi yakanaṃ jānāti ahaṃ thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2138_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti yakanaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
anya-e0101n:2138_6: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2139_0: 323. Kilomakesu paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ. Appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ
anya-e0101n:2139_1: sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pilotikapaliveṭhite
anya-e0101n:2139_2: maṃse na maṃsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhitanti. Napi pilotikā jānāti mayā
anya-e0101n:2139_3: maṃsaṃ paliveṭhitanti, evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:2139_4: kilomakena paṭicchannanti. Napi kilomakaṃ jānāti mayā vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre
anya-e0101n:2139_5: ca maṃsaṃ paṭicchannanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti kilomakaṃ
anya-e0101n:2139_6: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2140_0: 324. Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0101n:2140_1: yathā koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāya gomayapiṇḍiyā na koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ
anya-e0101n:2140_2: jānāti gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitāti. Napi gomayapiṇḍi jānāti ahaṃ koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ
anya-e0101n:2140_3: nissāya ṭhitāti, evameva na udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya
anya-e0101n:2140_4: ṭhitanti. Napi pihakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2140_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti pihakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
anya-e0101n:2140_6: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2141_0: 325. Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānamantare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā
anya-e0101n:2141_1: olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāne sakuṇakulāvake na
anya-e0101n:2141_2: jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi sakuṇakulāvako lambamāno ṭhitoti. Napi sakuṇakulāvako
anya-e0101n:2141_3: jānāti ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāno ṭhitoti, evameva na taṃ sarīrabbhantaraṃ
anya-e0101n:2141_4: jānāti mayi papphāsaṃ lambamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi papphāsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ evarūpe sarīrabbhantare
anya-e0101n:2141_5: lambamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti papphāsaṃ
anya-e0101n:2141_6: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2142_0: 326. Antaṃ galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya
anya-e0101n:2142_1: obhujitvā ṭhapite chinnasīsadhammanikaḷevare na lohitadoṇi jānāti mayi dhammanikaḷevaraṃ
anya-e0101n:2142_2: ṭhitanti. Napi dhammanikaḷevaraṃ jānāti ahaṃ lohitadoṇiyā ṭhitanti, evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ
anya-e0101n:2142_3: jānāti mayi antaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi antaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2142_4: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti antaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
anya-e0101n:2142_5: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2143_0: 327. Antaguṇaṃ antantare ekavīsatiantabhoge bandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ
anya-e0101n:2143_1: sibbetvā ṭhitesu rajjukesu na pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti rajjukā maṃ sibbitvā
anya-e0101n:2143_2: ṭhitāti. Napi rajjukā jānanti mayaṃ pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbitvā ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n:2143_3: evameva na antaṃ jānāti antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitanti. Napi antaguṇaṃ jānāti
anya-e0101n:2143_4: ahaṃ antaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
anya-e0101n:2143_5: Iti antaguṇaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
anya-e0101n:2144_0: 328. Udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ. Tattha yathā suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhite
anya-e0101n:2144_1: suvānavamathumhi na suvānadoṇi jānāti mayi suvānavamathu ṭhitoti. Napi suvānavamathu
anya-e0101n:2144_2: jānāti ahaṃ suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhitoti, evameva na udaraṃ jānāti mayi udariyaṃ ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2144_3: Napi udariyaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udare ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete
anya-e0101n:2144_4: dhammā. Iti udariyaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2145_0: 329. Karīsaṃ pakkāsayasaṅkhāte aṭṭhaṅgulaveḷupabbasadise antapariyosāne ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0101n:2145_1: yathā veḷupabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇhapaṇḍumattikāya na veḷupabbaṃ jānāti mayi
anya-e0101n:2145_2: paṇḍumattikā ṭhitāti. Napi paṇḍumattikā jānāti ahaṃ veḷupabbe ṭhitāti, evameva na
anya-e0101n:2145_3: pakkāsayo jānāti mayi karīsaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi karīsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pakkāsaye ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2145_4: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti karīsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
anya-e0101n:2145_5: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2146_0: 330. Matthaluṅgaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittāya
anya-e0101n:2146_1: piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi ṭhitāti. Napi piṭṭhapiṇḍi jānāti
anya-e0101n:2146_2: ahaṃ lābukaṭāhe ṭhitāti, evameva na sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi matthaluṅgaṃ
anya-e0101n:2146_3: ṭhitanti. Napi matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2146_4: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti matthaluṅgaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
anya-e0101n:2146_5: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2147_0: 331. Pittesu abaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2147_1: Baddhapittaṃ pittakosake ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhite tele na pūvaṃ
anya-e0101n:2147_2: jānāti telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti. Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti,
anya-e0101n:2147_3: evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti. Napi abaddhapittaṃ
anya-e0101n:2147_4: jānāti ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti. Yathā vassodakena puṇṇe kosātakikosake na
anya-e0101n:2147_5: kosātakikosako jānāti mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi vassodakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kosātakikosake
anya-e0101n:2147_6: ṭhitanti, evameva na pittakosako jānāti mayi baddhapittaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi baddhapittaṃ
anya-e0101n:2147_7: jānāti ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
anya-e0101n:2147_8: Iti pittaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
anya-e0101n:2148_0: 332. Semhaṃ ekapatthapūrappamāṇaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā upari sañjātapheṇapaṭalāya
anya-e0101n:2148_1: candanikāya na candanikā jānāti mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi pheṇapaṭalaṃ jānāti
anya-e0101n:2148_2: ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhitanti, evameva na udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti mayi semhaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi
anya-e0101n:2148_3: semhaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete
anya-e0101n:2148_4: dhammā. Iti semhaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2149_0: 333. Pubbo anibaddhokāso yattha yattheva khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaaggijālādīhi abhihate
anya-e0101n:2149_1: sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati, gaṇḍapīḷakādayo vā uppajjanti, tattha
anya-e0101n:2149_2: tattha tiṭṭhati. Tattha yathā pharasuppahārādivasena paggharitaniyyāse rukkhe na
anya-e0101n:2149_3: rukkhassa pahārādippadesā jānanti amhesu niyyāso ṭhitoti, napi niyyāso jānāti ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:2149_4: rukkhassa pahārādippadesesu ṭhitoti, evameva na sarīrassa khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihatappadesā
anya-e0101n:2149_5: jānanti amhesu pubbo ṭhitoti. Napi pubbo jānāti ahaṃ tesu padesesu ṭhitoti. Aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2149_6: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti pubbo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
anya-e0101n:2149_7: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2150_0: 334. Lohitesu saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ pittaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ. Sannicitalohitaṃ
anya-e0101n:2150_2: tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha saṃsaraṇalohite abaddhapittasadisova vinicchayo. Itaraṃ pana
anya-e0101n:2150_3: yathā jajjarakapāle ovaṭṭhe udake heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni temayamāne na leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni
anya-e0101n:2150_4: jānanti mayaṃ udakena temiyamānāti. Napi udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tememīti,
anya-e0101n:2150_5: evameva na yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkādīni vā jānanti mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ
anya-e0101n:2150_6: amhe vā temayamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi lohitaṃ jānāti ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā
anya-e0101n:2150_7: vakkādīni temayamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
anya-e0101n:2150_8: Iti lohitaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
anya-e0101n:2151_0: 335. Sedo aggisantāpādikālesu kesalomakūpavivarāni pūretvā tiṭṭhati ceva paggharati
anya-e0101n:2151_1: ca. Tattha yathā udakā abbūḷhamattesu bhisamuḷālakumudanāḷakalāpesu na bhisādikalāpavivarāni
anya-e0101n:2151_2: jānanti amhehi udakaṃ paggharatīti. Napi bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ
anya-e0101n:2151_3: jānāti ahaṃ bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharāmīti, evameva na kesalomakūpavivarāni jānanti
anya-e0101n:2151_4: amhehi sedo paggharatīti. Napi sedo jānāti ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi paggharāmīti.
anya-e0101n:2151_5: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti sedo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
anya-e0101n:2151_6: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2152_0: 336. Medo thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho.
anya-e0101n:2152_1: Tattha yathā haliddipilotikapaṭicchanne maṃsapuñje na maṃsapuñjo jānāti maṃ nissāya
anya-e0101n:2152_2: haliddipilotikā ṭhitāti. Napi haliddipilotikā jānāti ahaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
anya-e0101n:2152_3: evameva na sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya medo ṭhitoti. Napi
anya-e0101n:2152_4: medo jānāti ahaṃ sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhitoti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2152_5: ete dhammā. Iti medo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2153_0: 337. Assu yadā sañjāyati tadā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Tattha
anya-e0101n:2153_1: yathā udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu na taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakā jānanti amhesu
anya-e0101n:2153_2: udakaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu
anya-e0101n:2153_3: ṭhitanti, evameva na akkhikūpakā jānanti amhesu assu ṭhitanti. Napi assu jānāti ahaṃ
anya-e0101n:2153_4: akkhikūpakesu ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti assu
anya-e0101n:2153_5: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
anya-e0101n:2154_1: ṭhitavilīnasneho. Tattha yathā pakkhittatele ācāme na ācāmo jānāti maṃ telaṃ ajjhottharitvā
anya-e0101n:2154_2: ṭhitanti. Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ ācāmaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti, evameva na hatthatalādippadeso
anya-e0101n:2154_3: jānāti maṃ vasā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāti. Napi vasā jānāti ahaṃ hatthatalādippadesaṃ
anya-e0101n:2154_4: ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti vasā
anya-e0101n:2154_5: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
anya-e0101n:2155_0: 339. Kheḷo tathārūpe kheḷuppattipaccaye sati ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale
anya-e0101n:2155_1: tiṭṭhati. Tattha yathā abbocchinnaudakanissande nadītīrakūpake na kūpatalaṃ jānāti
anya-e0101n:2155_2: mayi udakaṃ santiṭṭhatīti. Napi udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kūpatale santiṭṭhāmīti, evameva
anya-e0101n:2155_3: na jivhātalaṃ jānāti mayi ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo ṭhitoti. Napi kheḷo
anya-e0101n:2155_4: jānāti ahaṃ ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale ṭhitoti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2155_5: ete dhammā. Iti kheḷo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
anya-e0101n:2156_0: 340. Siṅghāṇikā yadā sañjāyati, tadā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
anya-e0101n:2156_1: Tattha yathā pūtidadhibharitāya sippikāya na sippikā jānāti mayi pūtidadhi ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2156_2: Napi pūtidadhi jānāti ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhitanti, evameva na nāsāpuṭā jānanti amhesu
anya-e0101n:2156_3: siṅghāṇikā ṭhitāti. Napi siṅghāṇikā jānāti ahaṃ nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
anya-e0101n:2156_4: ete dhammā. Iti siṅghāṇikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
anya-e0101n:2157_0: 341. Lasikā aṭṭhikasandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīsu ṭhitā.
anya-e0101n:2157_1: Tattha yathā telabbhañjite akkhe na akkho jānāti maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti.
anya-e0101n:2157_2: Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti, evameva na asītisatasandhayo
anya-e0101n:2157_3: jānanti lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitāti. Napi lasikā jānāti ahaṃ asītisatasandhayo
anya-e0101n:2157_4: abbhañjitvā ṭhitāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti lasikā
anya-e0101n:2157_5: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
anya-e0101n:2158_0: 342. Muttaṃ vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe
anya-e0101n:2158_1: ravaṇaghaṭe na ravaṇaghaṭo jānāti mayi candanikāraso ṭhitoti. Napi candanikāraso
anya-e0101n:2158_2: jānāti ahaṃ ravaṇaghaṭe ṭhitoti, evameva na vatthi jānāti mayi muttaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi
anya-e0101n:2158_3: muttaṃ jānāti ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
anya-e0101n:2158_4: Iti muttaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
anya-e0101n:2159_0: 343. Evaṃ kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā yena santappati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
anya-e0101n:2159_1: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātūti, yena jīrīyati,
anya-e0101n:2159_2: yena pariḍayhati, yena asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ
anya-e0101n:2159_3: sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātūti
anya-e0101n:2160_0: 344. Tato uddhaṅgame vāte uddhaṅgamavasena pariggahetvā adhogame adhogamavasena,
anya-e0101n:2160_1: kucchisaye kucchisayavasena, koṭṭhāsaye koṭṭhāsayavasena, aṅgamaṅgānusārimhi aṅgamaṅgānusārivasena,
anya-e0101n:2160_2: assāsapassāse assāsapassāsavasena pariggahetvā uddhaṅgamā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
anya-e0101n:2160_3: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātūti,
anya-e0101n:2160_4: adhogamā vātā nāma, kucchisayā vātā nāma, koṭṭhāsayā vātā nāma, aṅgamaṅgānusārino
anya-e0101n:2160_5: vātā nāma, assāsapassāsā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
anya-e0101n:2160_6: suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātūti evaṃ vāyokoṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattetabbo.
anya-e0101n:2160_7: Tassevaṃ pavattamanasikārassa dhātuyo pākaṭā honti. Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto
anya-e0101n:2161_0: 345. Yassa pana evaṃ bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati, tena salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato
anya-e0101n:2161_1: bhāvetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
anya-e0101n:2161_2: Tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2162: Dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tattheva paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti. Thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2163_0: Catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tena avinibhuttaṃ
anya-e0101n:2163_1: vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti. Thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti. Ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti.
anya-e0101n:2164_0: Chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tattheva thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2164_1: pathavīdhātūti. Ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti. Tassevaṃ
anya-e0101n:2164_2: vavatthāpayato dhātuyo pākaṭā honti. Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva
anya-e0101n:2165_0: 346. Yassa pana evampi bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati, tena salakkhaṇavibhattito
anya-e0101n:2165_1: bhāvetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Pubbe vuttanayeneva kesādayo pariggahetvā kesamhi thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2165_2: pathavīdhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2165_3: tejodhātūti. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti. Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse
anya-e0101n:2165_4: catasso catasso dhātuyo vavatthapetabbā. Tassevaṃ vavatthāpayato dhātuyo pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0101n:2165_5: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
anya-e0101n:2166_0: Apica kho pana vacanatthato, kalāpato, cuṇṇato, lakkhaṇādito, samuṭṭhānato, nānattekattato,
anya-e0101n:2166_2: paccayato, asamannāhārato, paccayavibhāgatoti imehipi ākārehi dhātuyo manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2167_0: 347. Tattha vacanatthato manasikarontena patthaṭattā pathavī. Appoti āpiyati appāyatīti
anya-e0101n:2167_1: vā āpo. Tejatīti tejo. Vāyatīti vāyo. Avisesena pana salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dukkhādānato
anya-e0101n:2167_2: dukkhādhānato ca dhātūti. Evaṃ visesasāmaññavasena vacanatthato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2168: 348. Kalāpatoti yā ayaṃ kesā lomātiādinā nayena vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu, pittaṃ semhanti ca ādinā nayena dvādasahākārehi āpodhātu niddiṭṭhā, tattha yasmā –
anya-e0101n:2169: Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, catasso cāpi dhātuyo;
anya-e0101n:2172_0: Tasmā kesāpi aṭṭhadhammakalāpamattameva. Tathā lomādayoti. Yo panettha kammasamuṭṭhāno
anya-e0101n:2172_1: koṭṭhāso, so jīvitindriyena ca bhāvena ca saddhiṃ dasadhammakalāpopi hoti. Ussadavasena
anya-e0101n:2172_2: pana pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti saṅkhaṃ gato. Evaṃ kalāpato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2173_0: 349. Cuṇṇatoti imasmiṃ hi sarīre majjhimena pamāṇena pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā
anya-e0101n:2173_1: sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā. Sā tato upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpodhātuyā
anya-e0101n:2173_2: saṅgahitā, tejodhātuyā anupālitā vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā na vikiriyati na viddhaṃsiyati,
anya-e0101n:2174: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā na paggharati na parissavati, apaggharamānā aparissavamānā pīṇitapīṇitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0101n:2175_0: Asitapītādipācakā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā
anya-e0101n:2175_1: āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahati.
anya-e0101n:2175_2: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0101n:2176_1: āposaṅgahitā tejānupālitā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti. Tāya ca pana vitthambhito ayaṃ
anya-e0101n:2176_2: kāyo na paripatati, ujukaṃ saṇṭhāti. Aparāya vāyodhātuyā samabbhāhato gamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsayanairiyāpathesu
anya-e0101n:2176_3: viññattiṃ dasseti, samiñjeti, sampasāreti, hatthapādaṃ lāḷeti. Evametaṃ itthipurisādibhāvena
anya-e0101n:2176_4: bālajanavañcanaṃ māyārūpasadisaṃ dhātuyantaṃ pavattatīti evaṃ cuṇṇato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2177_0: 350. Lakkhaṇāditoti pathavīdhātu kiṃ lakkhaṇā, kiṃ rasā, kiṃ paccupaṭṭhānāti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:2177_1: catassopi dhātuyo āvajjetvā pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā, patiṭṭhānarasā, sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
anya-e0101n:2177_2: Āpodhātu paggharaṇalakkhaṇā, brūhanarasā, saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānā. Tejodhātu uṇhattalakkhaṇā,
anya-e0101n:2178_0: 351. Samuṭṭhānatoti ye ime pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ vitthārato dassanavasena kesādayo dvācattālīsa
anya-e0101n:2178_1: koṭṭhāsā dassitā. Tesu udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā utusamuṭṭhānāva.
anya-e0101n:2178_2: Assu sedo kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti ime cattāro utucittasamuṭṭhānā. Asitādiparipācako tejo
anya-e0101n:2178_3: kammasamuṭṭhānova. Assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. Avasesā sabbepi catusamuṭṭhānāti
anya-e0101n:2179_0: 352. Nānattekattatoti sabbāsampi dhātūnaṃ salakkhaṇādito nānattaṃ. Aññāneva hi pathavīdhātuyā
anya-e0101n:2179_1: lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni. Aññāni āpodhātuādīnaṃ. Evaṃ lakkhaṇādivasena pana kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena
anya-e0101n:2179_2: ca nānattabhūtānampi etāsaṃ rūpamahābhūtadhātudhammaaniccādivasena ekattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0101n:2179_3: Sabbāpi hi dhātuyo ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā rūpāni. Mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n:2180: Mahantapātubhāvādīhīti etā hi dhātuyo mahantapātubhāvato, mahābhūtasāmaññato, mahāparihārato, mahāvikārato, mahattā bhūtattā cāti imehi kāraṇehi mahābhūtānīti vuccanti.
anya-e0101n:2181: Tattha mahantapātubhāvatoti etāni hi anupādinnasantānepi upādinnasantānepi mahantāni pātubhūtāni. Tesaṃ anupādinnasantāne –
anya-e0101n:2185: Upādinnasantānepi macchakacchapadevadānavādisarīravasena mahantāneva pātubhūtāni. Vuttañhetaṃ “santi, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā”tiādi.
anya-e0101n:2186: Mahābhūtasāmaññatoti etāni hi yathā māyākāro amaṇiṃyeva udakaṃ maṇiṃ katvā dasseti, asuvaṇṇaṃyeva leḍḍuṃ suvaṇṇaṃ katvā dasseti.
anya-e0101n:2187_0: Yathā ca sayaṃ neva yakkho na yakkhī samāno yakkhabhāvampi yakkhibhāvampi dasseti,
anya-e0101n:2187_1: evameva sayaṃ anīlāneva hutvā nīlaṃ upādārūpaṃ dassenti, apītāni alohitāni anodātāneva
anya-e0101n:2187_2: hutvā odātaṃ upādārūpaṃ dassentīti māyākāramahābhūtasāmaññato mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n:2188_0: Yathā ca yakkhādīni mahābhūtāni yaṃ gaṇhanti, neva nesaṃ tassa anto na bahi ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2188_1: upalabbhati, na ca taṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti, evameva tānipi neva aññamaññassa anto
anya-e0101n:2188_2: na bahi ṭhitāni hutvā upalabbhanti, na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhantīti acinteyyaṭṭhānatāya
anya-e0101n:2188_3: yakkhādimahābhūtasāmaññatopi mahābhūtāni. Yathā ca yakkhinīsaṅkhātāni mahābhūtāni
anya-e0101n:2188_4: manāpehi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavikkhepehi attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti,
anya-e0101n:2188_5: evameva etānipi itthipurisasarīrādīsu manāpena chavivaṇṇena manāpena attano aṅgapaccaṅgasaṇṭhānena
anya-e0101n:2188_6: manāpena ca hatthapādaṅgulibhamukavikkhepena attano kakkhaḷattādibhedaṃ sarasalakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2188_7: paṭicchādetvā bālajanaṃ vañcenti, attano sabhāvaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na dentīti vañcakattena
anya-e0101n:2189_0: Mahāparihāratoti mahantehi paccayehi pariharitabbato. Etāni hi divase divase upanetabbattā
anya-e0101n:2189_1: mahantehi ghāsacchādanādīhi bhūtāni pavattānīti mahābhūtāni. Mahāparihārāni vā bhūtānītipi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n:2190: Mahāvikāratoti etāni hi anupādinnānipi upādinnānipi mahāvikārāni honti. Tattha anupādinnānaṃ kappavuṭṭhāne vikāramahattaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti. Upādinnānaṃ dhātukkhobhakāle. Tathā hi –
anya-e0101n:2197: Patthaddho bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho kaṭṭhamukhena vā;
anya-e0101n:2199: Pūtiyo bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho pūtimukhena vā;
anya-e0101n:2201: Santatto bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho aggimukhena vā;
anya-e0101n:2203: Sañchinno bhavati kāyo, daṭṭho satthamukhena vā;
anya-e0101n:2206: Mahattā bhūtattā cāti etāni hi mahantāni mahatā vāyāmena pariggahetabbattā bhūtāni vijjamānattāti mahattā bhūtattā ca mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n:2207: Evaṃ sabbāpetā dhātuyo mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
anya-e0101n:2208_0: Salakkhaṇadhāraṇato pana dukkhādānato ca dukkhādhānato ca sabbāpi dhātulakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2208_1: anatītattā dhātuyo. Salakkhaṇadhāraṇena ca attano khaṇānurūpadhāraṇena ca dhammā.
anya-e0101n:2208_2: Khayaṭṭhena aniccā. Bhayaṭṭhena dukkhā. Asārakaṭṭhena anattā.
anya-e0101n:2209: Iti sabbāsampi rūpamahābhūtadhātudhammaaniccādivasena ekattanti evaṃ nānattekattato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2210_0: 353. Vinibbhogāvinibbhogatoti sahuppannāva etā ekekasmiṃ sabbapariyantime suddhaṭṭhakādikalāpepi
anya-e0101n:2210_1: padesena avinibbhuttā. Lakkhaṇena pana vinibbhuttāti evaṃ vinibbhogāvinibbhogato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2211_0: 354. Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti evaṃ avinibbhuttāsu cāpi etāsu purimā dve garukattā sabhāgā.
anya-e0101n:2211_1: Tathā pacchimā lahukattā. Purimā pana pacchimāhi pacchimā ca purimāhi visabhāgāti
anya-e0101n:2212_1: nissayā honti, sairiyāpathā, catusamuṭṭhānā. Bāhirā vuttaviparītappakārāti evaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravisesato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2213_0: 356. Saṅgahatoti kammasamuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu kammasamuṭṭhānāhi itarāhi ekasaṅgahā
anya-e0101n:2213_1: hoti samuṭṭhānanānattābhāvato. Tathā cittādisamuṭṭhānā cittādisamuṭṭhānāhīti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:2214_0: 357. Paccayatoti pathavīdhātu āposaṅgahitā tejoanupālitā vāyovitthambhitā tiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0101n:2214_1: mahābhūtānaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hoti. Āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejoanupālitā
anya-e0101n:2214_2: vāyovitthambhitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ ābandhanaṃ hutvā paccayo hoti. Tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā
anya-e0101n:2214_3: āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ paripācanaṃ hutvā paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n:2214_4: Vāyodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā tejoparipācitā tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ vitthambhanaṃ
anya-e0101n:2214_5: hutvā paccayo hotīti evaṃ paccayato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2215_0: 358. Asamannāhāratoti pathavīdhātu cettha “ahaṃ pathavīdhātū”ti vā, “tiṇṇaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2215_1: patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo homī”ti vā na jānāti. Itarānipi tīṇi “amhākaṃ pathavīdhātu
anya-e0101n:2215_2: patiṭṭhā hutvā paccayo hotī”ti na jānanti. Esa nayo sabbatthāti evaṃ asamannāhārato manasikātabbā.
anya-e0101n:2216_0: 359. Paccayavibhāgatoti dhātūnaṃ hi kammaṃ, cittaṃ, āhāro, utūti cattāro paccayā.
anya-e0101n:2216_1: Tattha kammasamuṭṭhānānaṃ kammameva paccayo hoti, na cittādayo. Cittādisamuṭṭhānānampi
anya-e0101n:2216_2: cittādayova paccayā honti, na itare. Kammasamuṭṭhānānañca kammaṃ janakapaccayo hoti,
anya-e0101n:2216_3: sesānaṃ pariyāyato upanissayapaccayo hoti. Cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittaṃ janakapaccayo
anya-e0101n:2216_4: hoti, sesānaṃ pacchājātapaccayo atthipaccayo avigatapaccayo ca. Āhārasamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2216_5: āhāro janakapaccayo hoti, sesānaṃ āhārapaccayo atthipaccayo avigatapaccayo ca. Utusamuṭṭhānānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2216_6: utu janakapaccayo hoti, sesānaṃ atthipaccayo avigatapaccayo ca. Kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2216_7: mahābhūtaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānānampi mahābhūtānaṃ paccayo hoti cittādisamuṭṭhānānampi.
anya-e0101n:2216_8: Tathā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Utusamuṭṭhānaṃ mahābhūtaṃ utusamuṭṭhānānampi
anya-e0101n:2217_1: ceva patiṭṭhāvasena ca paccayo hoti, na janakavasena. Itaresaṃ tisantatimahābhūtānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2217_2: nissayaatthiavigatavasena paccayo hoti, na patiṭṭhāvasena na janakavasena. Āpodhātu
anya-e0101n:2217_3: cettha itarāsaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādivasena ceva ābandhanavasena ca paccayo hoti, na
anya-e0101n:2217_4: janakavasena. Itaresaṃ tisantatikānaṃ nissayaatthiavigatapaccayavaseneva, na ābandhanavasena
anya-e0101n:2217_5: na janakavasena. Tejodhātupettha itarāsaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādivasena ceva paripācanavasena
anya-e0101n:2217_6: ca paccayo hoti, na janakavasena. Itaresaṃ tisantatikānaṃ nissayaatthiavigatapaccayavaseneva,
anya-e0101n:2217_7: na paripācanavasena, na janakavasena. Vāyodhātupettha itarāsaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sahajātādivasena
anya-e0101n:2217_8: ceva vitthambhanavasena ca paccayo hoti, na janakavasena. Itaresaṃ tisantatikānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2217_9: nissayaatthiavigatapaccayavaseneva, na vitthambhanavasena, na janakavasena. Cittaāhārautusamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātuādīsupi eseva nayo.
anya-e0101n:2219: Ekaṃ paṭicca tisso, catudhā tisso paṭicca eko ca;
anya-e0101n:2220: Dve dhātuyo paṭicca, dve chaddhā sampavattanti.
anya-e0101n:2221_0: Pathavīādīsu hi ekekaṃ paṭicca itarā tisso tissoti evaṃ ekaṃ paṭicca tisso catudhā
anya-e0101n:2221_1: sampavattanti. Tathā pathavīdhātuādīsu ekekā itarā tisso tisso paṭiccāti evaṃ tisso
anya-e0101n:2221_2: paṭicca ekā catudhā sampavattati. Purimā pana dve paṭicca pacchimā, pacchimā ca dve
anya-e0101n:2221_3: paṭicca purimā, paṭhamatatiyā paṭicca dutiyacatutthā, dutiyacatutthā paṭicca paṭhamatatiyā,
anya-e0101n:2221_4: paṭhamacatutthā paṭicca dutiyatatiyā, dutiyatatiyā paṭicca paṭhamacatutthāti evaṃ
anya-e0101n:2221_5: dve dhātuyo paṭicca dve chadhā sampavattanti.
anya-e0101n:2222_0: Tāsu pathavīdhātu abhikkamapaṭikkamādikāle uppīḷanassa paccayo hoti. Sāva āpodhātuyā
anya-e0101n:2222_1: anugatā patiṭṭhāpanassa. Pathavīdhātuyā pana anugatā āpodhātu avakkhepanassa. Vāyodhātuyā
anya-e0101n:2222_2: anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa. Tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ
anya-e0101n:2223_0: Evaṃ vacanatthādivasena manasi karontassāpi hi ekekena mukhena dhātuyo pākaṭā honti.
anya-e0101n:2223_1: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati. Svāyaṃ
anya-e0101n:2223_2: catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vavatthāpakassa ñāṇassānubhāvena uppajjanato catudhātuvavatthānantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0101n:2224_0: 360. Idañca pana catudhātuvavatthānaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu suññataṃ avagāhati, sattasaññaṃ
anya-e0101n:2224_1: samugghāteti. So sattasaññāya samūhatattā vāḷamigayakkharakkhasādivikappaṃ anāvajjamāno
anya-e0101n:2224_2: bhayabheravasaho hoti, aratiratisaho, na iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ugghātanigghātaṃ pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0101n:2224_3: Mahāpañño ca pana hoti amatapariyosāno vā sugatiparāyano vāti.
anya-e0101n:2228_0: 361. Ettāvatā ca yaṃ samādhissa vitthāraṃ bhāvanānayañca dassetuṃ “ko samādhi, kenaṭṭhena
anya-e0101n:2228_1: samādhī”tiādinā nayena pañhākammaṃ kataṃ, tattha “kathaṃ bhāvetabbo”ti imassa padassa
anya-e0101n:2229_0: Duvidhoyeva hayaṃ idha adhippeto upacārasamādhi ceva appanāsamādhi ca. Tattha dasasu
anya-e0101n:2229_1: kammaṭṭhānesu, appanāpubbabhāgacittesu ca ekaggatā upacārasamādhi. Avasesakammaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0101n:2229_2: cittekaggatā appanāsamādhi. So duvidhopi tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bhāvito
anya-e0101n:2229_3: hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “kathaṃ bhāvetabboti imassa padassa sabbappakārato atthavaṇṇanā samattā”ti.
anya-e0101n:2231_0: 362. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “samādhibhāvanāya ko ānisaṃso”ti, tattha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārādipañcavidho
anya-e0101n:2231_1: samādhibhāvanāya ānisaṃso. Tathā hi ye arahanto khīṇāsavā samāpajjitvā ekaggacittā
anya-e0101n:2231_2: sukhaṃ divasaṃ viharissāmāti samādhiṃ bhāventi, tesaṃ appanāsamādhibhāvanā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānisaṃsā
anya-e0101n:2231_3: hoti. Tenāha bhagavā “na kho panete, cunda, ariyassa vinaye sallekhā vuccanti. Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārā
anya-e0101n:2232_0: Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya samāhitena cittena vipassissāmāti bhāvayataṃ
anya-e0101n:2232_1: vipassanāya padaṭṭhānattā appanāsamādhibhāvanāpi sambādhe okāsādhigamanayena upacārasamādhibhāvanāpi
anya-e0101n:2232_2: vipassanānisaṃsā hoti. Tenāha bhagavā “samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha. Samāhito, bhikkhave,
anya-e0101n:2233_0: Ye pana aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito
anya-e0101n:2233_1: vuṭṭhāya ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotīti vuttanayā abhiññāyo patthento nibbattenti, tesaṃ
anya-e0101n:2233_2: sati sati āyatane abhiññāpadaṭṭhānattā appanāsamādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṃsā hoti.
anya-e0101n:2233_3: Tenāha bhagavā – “so yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmeti
anya-e0101n:2233_4: abhiññāsacchikiriyāya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane”ti.
anya-e0101n:2234_0: Ye aparihīnajjhānā brahmaloke nibbattissāmāti brahmalokūpapattiṃ patthentā apatthayamānā
anya-e0101n:2234_1: vāpi puthujjanā samādhito na parihāyanti, tesaṃ bhavavisesāvahattā appanāsamādhibhāvanā
anya-e0101n:2234_2: bhavavisesānisaṃsā hoti. Tenāha bhagavā – “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā kattha
anya-e0101n:2236_0: Ye pana ariyā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā satta
anya-e0101n:2236_1: divasāni acittā hutvā diṭṭheva dhamme nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmāti
anya-e0101n:2236_2: samādhiṃ bhāventi, tesaṃ appanāsamādhibhāvanā nirodhānisaṃsā hoti. Tenāha – “soḷasahi
anya-e0101n:2236_3: ñāṇacariyāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatā paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa”nti.
anya-e0101n:2240: 363. Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge samādhipi paridīpito hoti.
anya-e0101n:2244_0: 364. Paṭhamo sīlaniddeso. Dutiyo dhutaṅganiddeso;. Tatiyo kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇaniddeso.
anya-e0101n:2244_1: Catuttho pathavīkasiṇaniddeso. Pañcamo sesakasiṇaniddeso. Chaṭṭho asubhaniddeso.
anya-e0101n:2244_2: Sattamo chaanussatiniddeso. Aṭṭhamo sesānussatiniddeso. Navamo brahmavihāraniddeso.
